Matthew: Leꞌa bexa ndee bexa ngok usan gox polta ten Jesucristo, dub xa ras David no xa ras Abraham.
Leꞌa Abraham ngop Isaac, Isaac ngop Jacob, Jacob ngop Judá no stapla be wit xa.
Judá cha ngop Fares no Zara, leꞌa xnaꞌa bexa usaleaꞌ Tamar. Fares ngop Esrom, Esrom ngop Aram,
Aram ngop Aminadab, Aminadab ngop Naasón, Naasón ngop Salmón.
Salmón ngop Booz, leꞌa xnaꞌa Booz usaleaꞌ Rahab. Booz ngop Obed, leꞌa xnaꞌa Obed usaleaꞌ Rut. Obed ngop Isaí,
Isaí ngop David xa nibeꞌe, David ngop Salomón, leꞌa xnaꞌa Salomón xa ngok xagots ten Urías.
Salomón ngop Roboam, Roboam ngop Abías, Abías ngop Asa,
Asa ngop Josafat, Josafat ngop Joram, Joram ngop Uzías.
Uzías ngop Jotam, Jotam ngop Acaz, Acaz ngop Ezequías.
Ezequías ngop Manasés, Manasés ngop Amón, Amón ngop Josías.
Josías ngop Jeconías no be wit xa, zha na lajuers mbiꞌi bexa Babilonia bexa Israel.
Tsoꞌo na li ngwaꞌa bexa Israel gast Babilonia wa, leꞌa Jeconías ngop Salatiel, Salatiel ngop Zorobabel.
Zorobabel ngop Abiud, Abiud ngop Eliaquim, Eliaquim ngop Azor.
Azor ngop Sadoc, Sadoc ngop Aquim, Aquim ngop Eliud.
Eliud ngop Eleazar, Eleazar ngop Matán, Matán ngop Jacob.
Jacob ngop Kosé. Leꞌa xagots ten Kosé usaleaꞌ Marí, xa ngop Jesús, xa nak Cristo, xa mtuꞌub Dios.

Li leꞌa Abraham no gast David leꞌa ta wa dub tidaꞌ bexa. Leꞌa David no gast zha na ngwaꞌyoꞌo bexa Israel gast Babilonia wa, leꞌa zha weꞌe uyoꞌo stub stidaꞌgal bexa. No zha na ngwaꞌa bexa Babilonia no gast zha na ngol Jesucristo wa uyoꞌo stub stidaꞌgal bexa.

Lndeꞌe ngol Jesús xa nak Cristo: Leꞌa dub xagots nsaleaꞌ Marí yá msaꞌala diꞌizh uchilyaꞌano xa dub xabgiꞌi nsaleaꞌ Kosé. Parea zha biseata ikaꞌa xa Kosé, leꞌa xa nsoꞌnola dub meꞌed, leꞌa meꞌed wa meꞌed msaꞌa Espíritu ten Dios.
Leꞌa Kosé wa mbinbeꞌe ulaꞌa xa Marí, ná leꞌa ta na wen nak xa ta weꞌe xagaꞌtsa ndiꞌizh ulaꞌa xa Marí, ndontsa naꞌanpa ido ladna Marí.
Leꞌa zha na mbinbeꞌela Kosé li gun, leꞌa dub angel ten Dios mlundoꞌla ndoꞌ xa cuent dub ta mcheꞌa ladna xa, ndab angel ndoꞌ xa:
—Kosé xin David, lá yuꞌ ladna lu ikaꞌa lu Marí gak xagots ten lu, leꞌa meꞌed nsoꞌno Marí leꞌa meꞌed wa meꞌed msaꞌa Espíritu ten Dios.
Leꞌa Marí gap dub meꞌed bgiꞌi, cha usaleaꞌ lu meꞌed wa Jesús, geal leꞌa meꞌed wa koꞌo be xmen Dios ndoꞌ be ke ten bexa.
Leꞌa ta wa li ngok lak ndab dub xabgiꞌi mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta, ndab xa:
Blaꞌach bego, leꞌa dub xagots ben
gol ugal xabgiꞌi isoꞌno dub meꞌed.
Cha gap xa dub meꞌed bgiꞌi,
cha isaleaꞌ meꞌed Emanuel.
(Leꞌa Emanuel dub diꞌizh hebreo gab: Dios nsoꞌ wats beuna.)
Leꞌa gor uban Kosé ndoꞌ ta mcheꞌa ladna xa wa, cha mbin xa lak unibeꞌe angel ten Dios, ukaꞌa xa Marí gak xagots ten xa.
Ná leꞌa xa naꞌanpa ugal Marí zha biseata gap Marí meꞌed ned ten xa wa. Cha msaleaꞌ Kosé meꞌed wa Jesús.
Leꞌa Jesús ngol gezh Belén ten distrit Judea, zha na nak Herodes xa nibeꞌe Judea. Weꞌe leꞌa lad nlen wizh utoꞌo pla bexa ndák, ulayaꞌ bexa gezh Jerusalén.
Cha unabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ be men, ndab bexa:
—¿Ma meꞌed ngol gak xa nibeꞌe ten bega xa judio zha? Leꞌa besa uniꞌí ulen mbeal ten xa lad nlen wizh. Ta weꞌe nseabe besa yankea besa xa.
Leꞌa Herodes nsea itea bexa ndencho Jerusalén wa ni ko lá iniꞌí xteꞌe gun gor na mbiꞌín bexa ta wa.
Cha mchealte Herodes itea be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no be mech ten ley ten bexa judio. Cha unabdiꞌizh Herodes ndoꞌ bexa ná pa nsabndoꞌ gal Cristo xa na ndiꞌizh ga utuꞌubka Dios.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa xa wa gal gezh Belén ten Judea, lak mkeꞌa dub xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta, ndab Dios:
Lu Belén, gezh ten Judá,
nsakka lu ndoꞌ itea be gezh ten Judá,
geal leꞌa Belén itoꞌo dub xa nibeꞌe,
xa ulaꞌach be xmen naꞌ bexa Israel.
Leꞌa Herodes cha xgaꞌach utezh bexa ndák wa, cha unabdiꞌizh Herodes ná xá wizh na ned uniꞌí bexa mbeal wa.
Cha mtuꞌub Herodes bexa wa gezh Belén, ndab xa:
—Waꞌbe bego, cha bkwaꞌan bega pa ncho meꞌed wa. Leꞌa gor mzheal bega meꞌed, cha gidyab bega‑yá ndoꞌ naꞌ, ndontsa no naꞌ gaa sa wa, cha gankeꞌa naꞌ meꞌed.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín bexa ta li ndab Herodes wa, leꞌa bexa cha utoꞌo nchaꞌbe. Leꞌa mbeal na li uniꞌí bexa lad nlen wizh wa cha nchaꞌa ned ndoꞌ bexa, cha ngwaꞌisaꞌab‑a sa ncho meꞌed wa.
Leꞌa gor na uniꞌí bexa wa mbeal nsob sa wa, leꞌa bexa uzhebpa mten ladna.

Cha uyote bexa len niꞌi wa, cha uniꞌí bexa meꞌed nsea Marí xnaꞌa meꞌed. Cha msaxib bexa ngwankea bexa meꞌed wa. Cha mxaꞌal bexa be caj noꞌo bexa, cha uloꞌo bexa pla be taꞌa uzhebpa uyap: be ta oro, no dub ta uxeꞌe ta nyolꞌ, no mirra. Cha msaꞌa bexa be ta wa ukaꞌa meꞌed‑a.
Tsoꞌo wa leꞌa Dios ndab ndoꞌ bexa wa gor ndeyats bexa lá yach bexa ndoꞌ Herodes. Ta weꞌe cha nseaꞌ bexa lazh bexa ndi stub nes xaꞌaga.
Leꞌa gor na nseaꞌla bexa ndák wa, leꞌa dub angel ten Dios mlundoꞌ ndoꞌ Kosé gor naxyats xa, ndab angel:
—Goste, cha biꞌi meꞌed baꞌ no xnaꞌa meꞌed. Bxoꞌon waꞌ nacion Egipto. Cha weꞌetsa uyoꞌo bega gast zha na gáp naꞌ yach bega, leꞌa Herodes ukwaꞌan meꞌed baꞌ gut xa meꞌed.
Bi leꞌa teꞌal wa leꞌa Kosé cha utoꞌo no meꞌed no xnaꞌa meꞌed, nchaꞌbe bexa Egipto.
Cha kwen uyoꞌo bexa sa wa gast ngut Herodes. Leꞌa be ta wa li ngok lak nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios ta ndab dub xa sakndoꞌ Dios: “Uteꞌezh naꞌ xiꞌín naꞌ itoꞌo xa Egipto.”

Leꞌa gor uniꞌí Herodes leꞌa bexa ndák wa yá lá yachtabe, cha uzhebpa ngokloo xa. Cha unibeꞌe xa ndoꞌ be soldad, ndab xa yaꞌyut bexa itea be meꞌed ncho top liꞌin, no gast be medoꞌo gezh Belén no be gezh nde gax sa wa. Li unibeꞌe xa geal leꞌa bexa ndák wa ndab mtopla liꞌin ulen mbeal wa.
Li ngok ta wa lak mbidiꞌizh Jeremías sakndoꞌ Dios, ndab xa:
Mgen dub ruid siꞌil gezh Ramá,
Uzhebpa nbezhat bexa no ndoꞌon bexa.
Leꞌa Raquel ndoꞌonno be xin na.
Yá lá kaꞌabta xa itayoꞌon, geal leꞌa be xin xa ngutbe.
Ngol tsoꞌo wa leꞌa Herodes ngut. Weꞌe leꞌa dub angel ten Dios mlundoꞌ ndoꞌ Kosé nacion Egipto gor naxyats xa,
cha ndab angel:
—Goste, cha byoꞌo meꞌed baꞌ no xnaꞌa meꞌed leꞌaka nacion Israel, leꞌa bexa na nlad gut meꞌed baꞌ wa ngutlabe.
Leꞌa Kosé cha ngwaste, cha myoꞌo xa meꞌed no xnaꞌa meꞌed leꞌaka Israel.

Ná leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín Kosé leꞌa Arquelao xin Herodes myatsoꞌgal nibeꞌe Judea, cha mzheb xa yaꞌ xa sa wa. Leꞌa Dios cha uníꞌigal gor naxyats Kosé, ndab Dios lá yaꞌ xa Judea. Ta weꞌe cha nchaꞌa xa ndi distrit Galilea.
Ngwaꞌ bexa yoo bexa gezh Nazaret, lak ndab bexa uyoꞌo polta sakndoꞌ Dios, ndab xa: “Leꞌa be men gab leꞌa xa dub xa Nazaret.”
Ngol tsoꞌo wa leꞌa Juan xa ulaleaꞌ be men ngwaꞌyoꞌo geꞌe sa bid sa uxee ncho men, dub sa ten Judea. Ndadiꞌizh xa ndoꞌ be men,
ndab xa:
—Blaꞌa bego be ta ugap nak bega, leꞌa zha inibeꞌe Dios ladoꞌo be men yá gaxla nak.
Polta leꞌa Isaías mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios cuent ten Juan, ndab Isaías:
Leꞌa xa wa ikeseyadiꞌizh geꞌe sa bid, ugeꞌ gab xa:
“Bin parej bega nes ilen Xa Nibeꞌe.
Bkeasoꞌ bega nes ten xa.”
Leꞌa xab Juan nakchaꞌaw gich las came, no dub sinch gid nde len xa. Leꞌa xa ndaw mbit, nsea mzhin ser ndo xa.
Leꞌa kwaꞌad bexa Jerusalén no bexa idub distrit Judea no bexa ncho gax toꞌo yowbeꞌe Jordán utoꞌo, ndabeyoꞌón bexa xtaꞌan ndadiꞌizh Juan.
Mgondoꞌ bexa be ke ten bexa, cha ulaleaꞌ Juan bexa len nits yowbeꞌe Jordán.
Ná leꞌa gor na uniꞌí Juan leꞌa kwaꞌad bexa fariseo nsea bexa saduceo nseabe italeaꞌ, cha ndab Juan ndoꞌ bexa wa:
—¡Bego bexa ugap cuent be mbeꞌal! ¿Ton ndab ndoꞌ bega italeaꞌtsa bega, cha naꞌanpa utsaksi Dios bega zha?
Bin bega ta wen, ta uluu leꞌa bega mlaꞌaka ta ugap nak bega.
No ni lá gunbeꞌe bega gab bega leꞌa bega xin Abraham, ta weꞌe leꞌa Dios naꞌanpa utsaksi bega. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa Dios syoꞌo gan gunno be geꞌ ndee be xin Abraham.
Leꞌa Dios listla nsoꞌ utsaksi xa bexa ndun ta ugap, cuent dub xa nsoꞌnsén dub gibya, kabtoꞌog xa itea be ya lá nsaꞌa ngus wen, cha utsaꞌab xa ta wa ndoꞌ giꞌ yolꞌ‑a.

’Leꞌa naꞌ ndee nits‑tsa ngoleaꞌ be men, ta nluu leꞌa bexa mlaꞌaka be ta ugap nak bexa. Parea tsoꞌo naꞌ ilen stub xa koleaꞌ be men no Espíritu ten Dios no giꞌ. Leꞌa xa wa mas nsak ndoꞌ naꞌ gast ni lá isaya naꞌ goo naꞌ ndab xa wa.
Leꞌa xa wa listla nsoꞌ uti be men wen lat bexa ugap, cuent dub men nti bid ten trig lat be gix xab‑a. Cha kochaꞌaw xa trig wa len niꞌi, nsea utsoꞌol xa xab‑a wa ndoꞌ giꞌ nunk lá yuꞌu.
Leꞌa Jesús cha utoꞌo Galilea, nchaꞌa xa yowbeꞌe Jordán sa nsoꞌ Juan, ndontsa koleaꞌ Juan xa.
Ná leꞌa Juan lá kaꞌab, ndab xa:
—Nkiꞌin naꞌ leꞌa go koleaꞌ naꞌ, ná nat leꞌa go ndi nsea koleaꞌ naꞌ go.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Litsa gun una nat, leꞌa una nsabndoꞌ gun lak nlad Dios.
Leꞌa Juan cha ulaleaꞌ xa.
Leꞌa tsoꞌo na utaleaꞌ Jesús leꞌa gor na utoꞌo Jesús len nits, leꞌa gibeꞌa baꞌ cha myaꞌal. No mnaꞌ Jesús Espíritu ten Dios cuent dub palom nchaꞌlaꞌ sa nsoꞌ Jesús.
Cha ulen ti Dios gibeꞌa ndab:
—Ta ndee Xiꞌín naꞌ. Leꞌa naꞌ nkweaꞌ ladna xa, no ntenno lad naꞌ xa.
Leꞌa Espíritu ten Dios cha mbiꞌi Jesús geꞌe sa bid sa naꞌan men, sa gun maxuꞌu juers utsabgix Jesús.
Leꞌa dub top gaꞌal wizh leꞌa Jesús lá ngaw, cha ngol gor leꞌa xa uzhebpa ndanna.
Weꞌe leꞌa maxuꞌu cha ulen gun preb Jesús, ndab maxuꞌu ndoꞌ xa:
—Tal leꞌa lu nak Xin Dios, nat gud ndoꞌ be geꞌ baꞌ yak‑a pan.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa diꞌizh ten Dios nkeaniꞌi: “Naꞌanpa nabtsa ta ndaw men nban bexa. Mas nsak nxobgek men ndoꞌ diꞌizh ten Dios, leꞌa ta wa ndun nban xa.”
Leꞌa maxuꞌu cha mbiꞌigal Jesús gezh Jerusalén gek niꞌi ten Dios, sa ndon leꞌa gaꞌap.
Cha ndab maxuꞌu:
—Tal leꞌa lu Xin Dios, nat btsaꞌab dub brink gast ndoꞌ yo baꞌ, leꞌa diꞌizh ten Dios nkeaniꞌi ndab‑a:
Leꞌa Dios utuꞌub be angel ten na ulaꞌach lu.
Leꞌa bexa wa goꞌo lu ndoꞌ yaꞌa na,
ndontsa ni lá ikateꞌeb lu ndoꞌ ni dub geꞌ.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—No ndab diꞌizh ten Dios: “Lá gun lu preb Dios Xa Nibeꞌe.”
Leꞌa maxuꞌu cha mbiꞌi Jesús gek dub geꞌe gaꞌappa, cha mluu maxuꞌu itea be gezh nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo no be ta nsak ncho be gezh wa.
Cha ndab maxuꞌu:
—Itea be ta baꞌ usa naꞌ ikaꞌa lu tal leꞌa lu isaxib ndoꞌ naꞌ, yankea lu naꞌ.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ maxuꞌu:
—Bxoꞌon wats naꞌ, maxuꞌu. Leꞌa diꞌizh ten Dios nkeaniꞌi ndab‑a: “Wankea Dios Xa Nibeꞌe, no bin ta nladtsa xa.”
Leꞌa maxuꞌu cha mlaꞌa Jesús, cha ulen be angel ten Dios mlaꞌach bexa Jesús.
Ngol dub wizh leꞌa Jesús mbiꞌín leꞌa Juan nkea litgiꞌib, cha nseaꞌ Jesús leꞌaka Galilea.
Parea lá ngaꞌyoꞌo xa Nazaret, ndi ngwaꞌyoꞌo xa gezh Capernaum toꞌo lagun siꞌil, yo ten bexa ras ten Zabulón no ras ten Neftalí.
Li ngok‑a lak nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios, ta mas polta mkeꞌa Isaías sakndoꞌ Dios, ndab xa:
Bego ncho ndoꞌ yo ten Zabulón no yo ten Neftalí,
sa ntid nes toꞌo lagun,
lad ndaꞌas wizh sa nax yowbeꞌe Jordán;
Bego ncho Galilea,
sa ncho no bexa naꞌanpa xa judio:
Leꞌa bego nde sa ukaw,
parea leꞌa nat uniꞌí bega dub xeꞌa siꞌil.
Leꞌa bega nde sa wa cuent dub xa ngut,
parea nat mgondoꞌ bega xeꞌa ten Dios.
Leꞌa zha weꞌe cha usaxan Jesús ndadiꞌizh diꞌizh ten Dios ndoꞌ be men, ndab xa:
—Blaꞌa bego be ta ugap nak bega, leꞌa zha na inibeꞌe Dios ladoꞌo be men yá gaxla nak.

Leꞌa dub gor nchasea Jesús toꞌo lagun siꞌil nsaleaꞌ Galilea, cha uniꞌí xa top xabgiꞌi ndeutsaꞌab red ten na len nits, leꞌa bexa wa xa nsen mbeal. Leꞌa dub xa wa Simón, xa no nsaleaꞌga Pedr. Leꞌa stub xa wa Ndres wit Simón Pedr wa.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ bexa:
—Usankea bega tsoꞌo naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ uluu xteꞌe yunjunt bega be men ndoꞌ Dios.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha uxax mlaꞌa be red ten na, cha usankea bexa tsoꞌo Jesús.

Leꞌa gor usea bexa stub tuzh sa, cha uniꞌí Jesús stop xabgiꞌi, dub xa nsaleaꞌ Jacob nsea stub xa nsaleaꞌ Juan. Leꞌa bexa wa ndeno Zebedeo xus bexa ndoꞌ dub barco, ndego bexa ramient be red ten bexa. Leꞌa Jesús cha utezh itop wit bexa.
Leꞌa itop bexa cha uxax mchansoꞌ xus na ndoꞌ barco wa, cha usankea bexa tsoꞌo Jesús.

Leꞌa Jesús cha nchasea idub distrit Galilea, nluu xa be men len be niꞌi sa nzhealbe bexa judio sa wa. Mbidiꞌizh xa diꞌizh wen ten Dios ná xteꞌe nibeꞌe Dios be men, no myunyakna xa be men nsén guniꞌi xá gealgizh ná, no bexa kweaꞌ nsak.

Leꞌa ta li ndun Jesús wa mgen idub distrit Siria. Ta weꞌe leꞌa kwaꞌad be men ulenno bexa nsén isandoꞌ be gealgizh, no bexa gizh ncho mbi bxin len ladoꞌo na, no bexa nsak gizhkaw, no bexa lá yoo gan isea. Cha myunyakna Jesús bexa wa.
Cha usankea kwaꞌad be men tsoꞌo Jesús: bexa distrit Galilea, no distrit Decápolis, no gezh Jerusalén, no idub distrit Judea, no bexa ncho stub toꞌo yowbeꞌe Jordán.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí Jesús be men kwaꞌad wa, cha ukea xa dub bet, cha usob xa. Leꞌa be xmen xa cha ulayaꞌ wats xa.
Cha usaxan nluu xa bexa wa, ndab xa:
—Uzheꞌeb wen yoo ladna bexa ngondoꞌ leꞌa bexa nkiꞌin Dios, leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe ladoꞌo bexa.
’No uzheꞌeb wen yoo ladna bexa ndoꞌon, leꞌa Dios gal gor gun iten ladna bexa wa.
’No uzheꞌeb wen yoo ladna bexa bchaꞌan nak, leꞌa Dios usaꞌa gizhliyo ikaꞌa bexa wa.
’No uzheꞌeb wen yoo ladna bexa nkwaꞌan gun lak nlad Dios, leꞌa Dios saꞌa ta nlad bexa wa.
’No uzheꞌeb wen yoo ladna bexa nlats ladna be men, leꞌa Dios ilats ladna bexa wa.
’No uzheꞌeb wen yoo ladna bexa umbiꞌi nak ladoꞌo na, leꞌa bexa wa igondoꞌ Dios.
’No uzheꞌeb wen yoo ladna bexa nkwaꞌan xteꞌe lá kuyo be men, leꞌa bexa wa isaleaꞌ xin Dios.
’No uzheꞌeb wen yoo ladna bexa ntid be gealkweaꞌ ta na ndun bexa ta nsak ladna Dios, leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe ladoꞌo bexa.
’No uzheꞌeb wen yoo ladna bego gor na ugap ndanno be men bega, ta na ndangea ladna bega naꞌ. Leꞌa bexa wa xela iníꞌi ndoꞌ bega, no ukwiꞌin bexa gab bexa leꞌa bega sian ta ugap ndun.
Uzhebpa bten ladna bego be zha li wa, leꞌa Dios uzhebpa usaꞌa be ta wen ndoꞌ bega gibeꞌa. Leꞌa polta likaga ugap mbinno be men bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios.

’Leꞌa bega nak cuentta sed lat be men ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee. Parea tal leꞌa sed itoꞌo ta utix ten na, ¿xteꞌema yak utix‑a stub biaj zha? Leꞌa‑yá naꞌanta xtiꞌin, ta weꞌe yabitsa‑yá tsoꞌo juer sa ulako be men‑a.
’Leꞌa bego nak cuent xeꞌa ndoꞌ be men gizhliyo ndee, cuent dub gezh nde gaꞌap gek dub geꞌe lá yoo gan xgaꞌach kwe.
Leꞌa naꞌan ton usobgiꞌ dub xeꞌa, cha usob xa‑yá len dub caj. Ndi usob xa xeꞌa dub sa gaꞌap, ndontsa usu‑yá xeꞌa ndoꞌ itea bexa ncho len niꞌi wa.
No liga usu bego xeꞌa ten bega ndoꞌ be men, ndontsa inaꞌ bexa be ta wen ndun bega, cha no gab bexa siꞌil nak Tad Dios nsob gibeꞌa.
’Lá gunbeꞌe bega leꞌa naꞌ ndal unitndoꞌ ley mkeꞌa Moisés no be ta mkeꞌa bexa sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta. Leꞌa naꞌ ndi ndal gun cumplir be ta wa.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa nat na bi nde gizhliyo no gibeꞌa leꞌa ni dub letr ten ley ten Dios naꞌanpa initndoꞌ, gast itea‑yá gak cumplir.

Ta weꞌe tal ton lá uxobgek ndoꞌ dub taꞌa ndon leꞌa tuzh ndoꞌ ley wa, no liga nluu xa stubga men li gun, leꞌa xa wa ndon leꞌa lá nsak lat bexa nibeꞌe Dios. Ná leꞌa xa na nxobgekka ndoꞌ ta ndab ley ten Dios, no liga nluu xa be men, leꞌa xa wa nsakka lat bexa nibeꞌe Dios.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega tal leꞌa bega naꞌanpa mas uxobgek ndoꞌ Dios ndoꞌ lak ndun bexa fariseo no be mech ten ley, leꞌa bega lá yoo gan gak bexa leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe.
’Leꞌa bego mbiꞌínla ta ndab Dios ndoꞌ be men polta, ndab xa: “Lá gut bega men, leꞌa tal ton gut men leꞌa be men utsaksi xa wa.”

Parea leꞌa naꞌ ndi gáp leꞌa tal ton gakloo ndoꞌ stub men, leꞌa Dios utsaksi xa wa. No tal ton inisi stub men, leꞌa xa wa isoꞌ ndoꞌ bexa nibeꞌe. No tal ton gab “tont” ndoꞌ stub men, leꞌa xa wa yaꞌ ndoꞌ giꞌ infierno.
’No tal leꞌa bega nchaꞌlo med sa nsaꞌa men taꞌa ndoꞌ Dios, ná sa weꞌe utseꞌa ladna bega leꞌa stub ltsaꞌa bega ndakloo ndoꞌ bega,
blaꞌa bega sa weꞌetsa ndiꞌib‑a. Cha waꞌ bega ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa bega wa, bin bega ta gun wen yaꞌan bega ndoꞌ xa. Cha weꞌe byach bega bsaꞌa bega ta wa ndoꞌ Dios.

’No tal ton nlad usake bega, waꞌyadiꞌizhno bega xa gor biseata isoꞌ xa ndoꞌ juez. Leꞌa tal xa usake bega ndoꞌ juez, leꞌa juez cha yun cuent bega ndoꞌ bexa nlaꞌach litgiꞌib, cha ukeꞌa xa bega litgiꞌib.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa bego naꞌanpa itoꞌo sa wa gast kixka bega itea ta nsaꞌab bega wa.
’Leꞌa bego mbiꞌínla ta ndab diꞌizh ten Dios: “Lá ugal bega dub xagots naꞌanpa xagots ten bega.”
Parea leꞌa naꞌ ndi gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa tal ton iwiꞌi ndoꞌ dub xagots ndanbeꞌe xa ugal xa xagots wa, leꞌa xa wa ndap ke ndoꞌ Dios cuent mgal‑la xa xagots wa.
’Ta weꞌe tal leꞌa bega ndun dub ta ugap ta naꞌ dub ngusndoꞌ bega, mas wen itoꞌo‑yá. Ndi mas wen naꞌan dub ngusndoꞌ bega nat, ni ka idub bega yaꞌ infierno.
No liga tal leꞌa bega ndun dub ta ugap nsea yaꞌa bega, mas wen yabtoꞌog‑a. Ndi mas wen naꞌan dub yaꞌa bega nat, ni ka idub bega yaꞌ infierno.
’No ndab diꞌizh ten Dios: “Leꞌa tal ton dub xabgiꞌi nlad ulaꞌa xagots ten na, leꞌa xa syoꞌo gan usaꞌatsa dub git ndoꞌ xagots wa, gab git leꞌa xa mlaꞌa xagots.”

Parea leꞌa naꞌ ndi gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa tal ton dub xabgiꞌi ulaꞌa xagots ten na, cha ikaꞌa xagots wa stubga xabgiꞌi, leꞌa xabgiꞌi ned wa ndun leꞌa xagots wa ndap ke ndoꞌ Dios. No liga leꞌa stub xabgiꞌi na ikaꞌaga xagots wa noga ndap ke ndoꞌ Dios. Ná tal ton dub xagots ugal stubga xabgiꞌi, leꞌa xabgiꞌi ten xa wa sak ulaꞌa xa.
’No mbiꞌínla bega stub taꞌa ndab Dios ndoꞌ bexa polta, ndab xa: “Tal leꞌa bega ndab Dios nsobwiꞌi sunka bega dub taꞌa, weꞌe leꞌa bega juerska li gun. Naꞌanpa ulaꞌa bega lá gun bega ta wa.”
Parea leꞌa naꞌ ndi gáp ndoꞌ bega, leꞌa gor na ndab bega gun bega dub taꞌa, naꞌanpa useꞌat bega Dios, ndi gabtsa bega gun bega ta wa. No naꞌanpa useꞌat bega gibeꞌa, leꞌa gibeꞌa baꞌ sa nsob Dios.
No ni naꞌanpa useꞌat bega gizhliyo, leꞌa gizhliyo ndee sa nibeꞌe Dios. No ni lá useꞌat bega Jerusalén, leꞌa Jerusalén gezh ten Dios xa ndon leꞌa nibeꞌe.
No ni lá useꞌat bega gek bega, leꞌa bega lá yoo gan ucheꞌa ni dub gichgek bega xaꞌaga color.
Ndi gor na gun bega dub taꞌa, litsa gud bega. No tal naꞌanpa gun bega dub taꞌa, litsa gud bega. Leꞌa itea taꞌa na kota bega ndoꞌ ta ndee wa, leꞌa ta wa ta ten maxuꞌu.
’No mbiꞌínla bega ta ndab diꞌizh ten Dios: “Tal ton guzhaꞌa ngusndoꞌ dub men, leꞌa men wa noga li gunno xa wa. No tal ton koꞌoga dub ndeay dub men, leꞌa men wa noga li gunno xa wa.”
Parea leꞌa naꞌ ndi gáp naꞌanpa ukixke bega ta ugap mbinno dub men bega. Tal ton kichyaꞌa ndoꞌ bega lad gaꞌal, blaꞌa bega kichyaꞌa xa no stubga lad.
No tal ton usake bega ulat xa dub xab bega, blaꞌa bega gast no stub‑a goꞌo xa.
No tal ton gab juerska goꞌo bega dub taꞌa noꞌo xa dub kilómetro nes nsea xa, ndi top li sa biꞌi bega‑yá.
No tal ton inab dub taꞌa ndoꞌ bega, usaꞌa bega‑yá. No tal ton inab dub ta ikiꞌin xa, lá gab bega leꞌa bega lá usaꞌa‑yá.
’No mbiꞌínla bega stubga taꞌa ndab be men: “Bkweaꞌ ladna bega be ltsaꞌa bega, no bxee ladna bega ndoꞌ bexa ugap ndanno bega.”

Parea leꞌa naꞌ ndi gáp ndoꞌ bega bkweaꞌ ladna bega bexa ugap ndanno bega. No utsin bidiꞌizh bega ndoꞌ bexa xela níꞌi ndoꞌ bega. No utsin gok bega ndoꞌ bexa nxee ladna ndoꞌ bega. No unab bega ndoꞌ Dios gakno Dios bexa na kweaꞌ níꞌi ndoꞌ bega no bexa na ugap ndanno bega.

Li nsabndoꞌ gun bega ta na nak bega xinka Dios Xus beuna, xa nsob gibeꞌa. Leꞌa xa ndun leꞌa wizh nsu xeꞌa ndoꞌ itea be men, bexa wen no bexa ugap. No nlaꞌ xa gi ndantiꞌin itea be men, bexa wen no bexa ugap.

Tal leꞌa bega nkweaꞌ ladna sbeꞌen bexa nkweaꞌ ladna bego, ¿xteꞌe nsak bega leꞌa Dios usaꞌa ta wen ndoꞌ bega zha? ¿Lá iniꞌí bega zha leꞌa gast bexa nsen med ten gobier Roma liga nkweaꞌ ladna be ltsaꞌa na?
No tal leꞌa bega utsin nidiꞌizh ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌatsa bega, ¿xteꞌe nsak bega zha leꞌa bega wen ndun? ¿Lid no bexa lá nchandoꞌ Dios li ndun?
Ta weꞌe sbeꞌen ta wen bin bega, lak sbeꞌen ta wen ndun Tad Dios xa nsob gibeꞌa.

’Blaꞌach bega leꞌaka bega leꞌa gor na ndun bega ta wen ndoꞌ stub men, naꞌanpa gun bega‑yá dub mod na iniꞌí be men ta ndun bega wa. Tal leꞌa bega li gun, leꞌa Tad Dios xa nsob gibeꞌa lá kix ta li mbin bega wa.

Leꞌa gor na nsaꞌa bega ta nkiꞌin dub men uban nak, naꞌanpa gudiꞌizh bega‑yá ndoꞌ be men, lak ndun bexa nluu cuentta xa wen ná xa xa ugap. Leꞌa bexa wa ndadiꞌizh‑a len be niꞌi sa nzhealbe beuna xa judio no ndadiꞌizh bexa‑yá be nes, ndontsa gab be men leꞌa bexa xa wenka. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa ta wen iníꞌi be men ndoꞌ bexa wa, leꞌa ta weꞌetsa gun bexa gan.
Ná leꞌa gor nsaꞌa bega ta nkiꞌin dub men, naꞌanpa gab bega ta wa ndoꞌ ni dub men.
Tal leꞌa bega li xagaꞌtsa gakno stub men, weꞌe leꞌa Tad Dios iniꞌí ta wa, cha gaꞌalka usaꞌa xa ta ikaꞌa bega.

’Leꞌa gor gudiꞌizhno bega Dios, lá gak bega lak nak bexa nluu cuentta xa wen ná xa xa ugap. Leꞌa bexa wa ndal ladna nsoꞌyadiꞌizh ndoꞌ Dios sbeꞌen len niꞌi sa nzhealbe beuna xa judio no be sa skin nes ndontsa iniꞌí be men‑a. Ná leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa ta wen níꞌi be men ndoꞌ bexa wa, leꞌa ta weꞌetsa gun bexa gan.

Ná leꞌa bego gor gudiꞌizhno bega Dios, uyoꞌo bega len lid bega, cha btsaw bega toꞌo puert, cha bidiꞌizhno bega Tad Dios dub mod na ni dub men lá iniꞌí‑yá. Leꞌa ta na li xagaꞌtsa ndun bega, leꞌa Dios iniꞌí ta wa cha gaꞌalka usaꞌa xa ta ikaꞌa bega.
’Leꞌa gor na ndadiꞌizhno bega Dios, naꞌanpa gab bega dubtsa diꞌizh ngi sian biaj, lak ndun bexa lá nchandoꞌ Dios, ndanbeꞌe bexa leꞌa ta na uzhebpa ndadiꞌizh bexa, ta weꞌe mas goꞌón Dios ta ndab bexa.
Lá gak bega lak nak bexa wa, leꞌa Tad Dios xa nsob gibeꞌa yá uniꞌíla xtaꞌan nkiꞌin bega gor na biseata inab bega‑yá.
Ta weꞌe lndeꞌe bidiꞌizhno bega Dios:
Go Dios Xus besa, go nsob gibeꞌa,
yankea be men leaꞌ go.
No uxax ilen tiemp inibeꞌe go be men.
Gak ta nlad go ndoꞌ gizhliyo, lak ndak‑a gibeꞌa.
Nab besa usaꞌa go ta gaw besa wizh nat,
lak nkiꞌin besa‑yá itea wizh.
No bingeꞌ ladna go be ke ten besa,
lak ndangeꞌ ladna besa ndoꞌ be men ugap ndanno besa.
Lá ulaꞌa go gailaꞌ besa ndoꞌ be ta ugap,
ndi uloꞌo go besa ndoꞌ itea be ta ugap.
Leꞌa idub tiemp leꞌa go xa ndon leꞌa nibeꞌe
no xa ndon leꞌa juert no xa ndon leꞌa nsak.
Lika nak‑a.
’Leꞌa tal bega gungeꞌ ladna be ta ugap ndanno be men bega, weꞌe leꞌa Tad Dios xa nsob gibeꞌa noga sungeꞌ ladna be ke ten bega.
Parea tal leꞌa bega lá gungeꞌ ladna ndoꞌ be men ugap ndanno bega, weꞌe leꞌa Tad Dios noga lá gungeꞌ ladna ndoꞌ bego.

’Leꞌa zha na lá ndaw bega dub tiemp, naꞌanpa gun bega uban inaꞌ ndoꞌ bega, lak ndun bexa ndab leꞌa xmen Dios parea naꞌanpa ta ugea‑yá. Leꞌa bexa li ndun ndontsa iniꞌí be men leꞌa bexa lá ndaw wizh wa. Ná leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa ta wen níꞌi be men ndoꞌ bexa wa, leꞌa ta weꞌetsa gun bexa gan.
Naꞌ leꞌa bego zha na li lá gaw bega, ndi ulo bega ta uxeꞌe gek bega, no udaꞌab bega ndoꞌ bega,
ndontsa naꞌanpa inaꞌ be men ti lá ngaw bega wizh wa. Nabtsa Dios inaꞌ ta li xagaꞌtsa ndun bega, cha gaꞌalka usaꞌa Dios ta ikaꞌa bega.
’Lá yunjunt bega be ta sian ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee, leꞌa mbes sazhaꞌa‑yá, no slen yasoꞌo‑yá, no ncho waꞌan sgowaꞌan‑a.
Ndi bin bega be ta nsak ndoꞌ Dios, li kochaꞌaw bega sian taꞌa gibeꞌa, sa na ni mbes lá guzhaꞌa‑yá, no ni yasoꞌo lá gaw‑a, no ni waꞌan lá kowaꞌan‑a.
Leꞌa sa kochaꞌaw bega be ta mas nsak cuent ten bega, leꞌa sa wa mas ncho tseꞌe gek bega.
’Leꞌa ngusndoꞌ dub men leꞌa nak xeꞌa ten xa. Tal leꞌa ngusndoꞌ bega ta wen, leꞌa bega nkesea ndoꞌ xeꞌa.
Ná tal ngusndoꞌ bega naꞌanpa ta wen, leꞌa bega nkesea ndi sa ukaw. No tal xeꞌa ncho len ladoꞌo bega ndi nyak sa ukaw, ¡uzhebpa dub sa ukaw nkesea bega!

’Naꞌan ton yoo gan gun tiꞌin ten top xa nibeꞌe xa. Leꞌa gal gor leꞌa xa ixee ladna ndoꞌ dub xa nsea ikweaꞌ ladna xa stub xa, no uxobgek xa ndoꞌ dubtsa xa nsea lá uxobgek xa ndoꞌ stub xa wa. Liga tal leꞌa bega nkwaꞌan sian med, leꞌa bega lá yoo gan gun tiꞌin ndoꞌ Dios.

’Ta weꞌe gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega, lá yuꞌ ladna bega xtaꞌan gaw bega no xtaꞌan goo bega ndontsa iban bega. No ni lad gak bega lá yuꞌ ladna bega. ¿Lá iniꞌí bega zha leꞌa gealnaban ten bega mas nsak ndoꞌ be ta gaw bega, no leꞌa bega mas nsak ndoꞌ xab bega?

Binbeꞌe bega lak nak be migin ni lá ndas ma bid, no ni lá nteleꞌe ma ta gaw ma, no ni lá ndap ma sa nyochaꞌaw ta gaw ma. Ná leꞌa Dios Xus beuna nsob gibeꞌa ngawka bema. ¿Lá iniꞌí bega zha leꞌa ndoꞌ Dios leꞌa bega uzhebpa mas nsak ndoꞌ be migin?
’¿Ton bega gun gan tal uzhebpa yuꞌ ladna bega gaꞌal bega stol metr?
¿No xtaꞌan nyuꞌ ladna bega lad gak bega zha? Bwiꞌi bega ndoꞌ be géꞌe, ná xteꞌe ndiꞌibyaꞌal‑a, ná ni lá ndun‑a tiꞌin, no ni lá ndandeꞌe‑yá lad.
Ná leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa lat itea be lad uzhebpa wen ngok Salomón naꞌan dub lad chul lakta dub géꞌe.
Leꞌa Dios lita chul ndanno be géꞌe ndiꞌib geꞌe, ná ta gal geꞌa yabtoꞌog‑a cha yolꞌ‑a. ¿Lid mas uzheꞌeb gakno Dios bega, maska ndidotsa ndangea ladna bega xa?
Lá yuꞌ ladna bega xtaꞌan gaw bega no xtaꞌan goo bega no lad gak bega.
Leꞌa be men lá nchandoꞌ Dios itea be ta ndee nkwaꞌan bexa, ná leꞌa Tad Dios xa ncho gibeꞌa uniꞌíla xtaꞌan nkiꞌin bega.
Ndi bkwaꞌan bega xteꞌe uxobgek bega ndoꞌ Dios, no xteꞌe gun bega ta nlad xa. Weꞌe leꞌa Dios saꞌaka itea ta nkiꞌin bega wa.
Ta weꞌe lá yuꞌ ladna bega xteꞌe itid bega wizh geꞌa, leꞌa itea be wizh ncho ta itid bega. Leꞌa kadga wizh binbeꞌetsa bega be ta nsatid bega wizh wa.
’Lá gab bega leꞌa be men lid leꞌa ndun, ndontsa naꞌanpa no Dios gab leꞌa bega lid leꞌa ndun.
Leꞌa lak ndab bego ndoꞌ be men, no liga gab Dios ndoꞌ bego. No lak ndanno bega be men, no liga gunno Dios bega.
¿Xtaꞌan nwiꞌi bega gix tuzh ncho ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa bega zha, ná ni lá naꞌ bega leꞌa ndoꞌ bega ntsaw dub bleꞌa ya siꞌil?
¿Xteꞌema yoo gan gab bega ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa bega: “Bsaꞌa ndoꞌ lu ko naꞌ gix tuzh ncho ndoꞌ lu”, ná leꞌa ndoꞌ bega ntsaw dub bleꞌa ya siꞌil?
Ndab bega ugap nak stubga men, ná leꞌa bega ndi mas ugap nak. Ned udob bega ya siꞌil ntsaw ndoꞌ bega, weꞌeta sun bega gan koꞌo bega gix tuzh ncho ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa bega.

’Lá uluu bega diꞌizh ten Dios ndoꞌ bexa lá nsakyoꞌón‑a. Leꞌa bexa ndun lak ndun dub kuch, tal leꞌa dub men nchaꞌano dub ngusnik uyap ndoꞌ ma, leꞌa ma slako tsoꞌo‑yá, ni lá iniꞌí ma xtaꞌan‑a. No ta ndun bexa wa cuent ta ndun dub mbek ndawkeꞌa yaꞌa men gor ngaw xa ma.
’Unab bega ta nkiꞌin bega ndoꞌ Dios, leꞌa Dios saꞌaka ta wa. Bkwaꞌan bega Dios, leꞌa bega szhealka xa. Utezh bega Dios, leꞌa Dios saknoka bega.
Leꞌa itea bexa na nab ta nkiꞌin na, leꞌa xa nkaꞌaka‑yá; leꞌa itea bexa nkwaꞌan Dios, leꞌa bexa nzhealka xa; leꞌa itea bexa nbezh Dios, leꞌa Dios ndaknoka.
’Leꞌa bego na ndap meꞌed, tal leꞌa dub xmeꞌed bega inab dub pan, ¿cha saꞌa bega ndi dub geꞌ ndoꞌ meꞌed zha?
No tal leꞌa xmeꞌed bega inab dub mbeal, ¿cha saꞌa bega ndi dub mbeꞌal ndoꞌ meꞌed zha?
Leꞌa bego bexa ugap, ná sbeꞌen be ta wen nsaꞌa bega ndoꞌ be xin bega. Mata Dios Xus beuna nsob gibeꞌa saꞌa sbeꞌen be ta wen ndoꞌ bexa inab‑a.
’Ta weꞌe utsin bin bega ndoꞌ be men lak nlad bego utsin gun be men ndoꞌ bega. Leꞌa ta ndee nak xan itea be ta unibeꞌe Dios, no be ta mluu bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta.
’Bin bega juers yate bega toꞌo puert uyaꞌa. Ncho dub nes uxen nchaꞌa sa nsob dub puert uxen. Kwaꞌadpa men yate puert wa, ná leꞌa bexa wa yaꞌ ndoꞌ giꞌ.
No ncho dub nes uyaꞌa nchaꞌa sa nsob dub puert uyaꞌa. Uxee men izheal yate puert wa, ná leꞌa bexa wa gap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios.
’Lá ulaꞌach bega be men nkwiꞌin ndab leꞌa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios. Bchaꞌan nluꞌu bexa cuent borreg, ná leꞌa len ladoꞌo bexa leꞌa bexa ugiꞌi cuent dub mbee.
Leꞌa be ta ndun bexa wa, ta weꞌe sgondoꞌ bega ná xteꞌe nak xa, lak dub yagich naꞌanpa usaꞌa uv no ni ngus laꞌaw lá usaꞌa‑yá.
Liga itea be ya wen sbeꞌen ngus wentsa nsaꞌa. Ná leꞌa itea be ya na nsaꞌa ngus lá isuꞌu gaw be men, leꞌa ta wa sbeꞌen ngus weꞌetsaga nsaꞌa.
Leꞌa dub ya wen naꞌanpa nsaꞌa ngus lá isuꞌu gaw be men. No liga dub ya nsaꞌa ngus lá ndaw men lá yoo gan usaꞌaga ngus wen.
Leꞌa itea ya na lá nsaꞌa ngus wen, gal gor yabtoꞌog‑a cha yolꞌ‑a.
Liga nak bexa ukwiꞌin wa, leꞌa ta nduntsa xa sgondoꞌ bega xteꞌe nak xa.
’Leꞌa kwaꞌad be men ndab leꞌa xa nak xmen naꞌ, parea naꞌanpa itea bexa wa yate sa nibeꞌe Dios gibeꞌa. Leꞌa sa wa yate bexa nxobgektsa ndoꞌ Dios Xus naꞌ xa nsob gibeꞌa.
Gal wizh wa leꞌa kwaꞌad bexa gab ndoꞌ naꞌ: “Tad, ¿lá iniꞌí go zha leꞌa besa juers ten ga mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios, no juers ten ga ulantuꞌub besa mbi bxin, nsea sian be uyon mbin besa?”
Cha ndi gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bexa wa: “Leꞌa naꞌ lá nchandoꞌ bega. Nat bxoꞌon bega wats naꞌ, bego xa ndun ta ugap.”
’Leꞌa tal ton goꞌón ta ndáp naꞌ ndee, cha liga gun xa, leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa xa wa nak cuent dub xabgiꞌi list, dub xa mbindeꞌe lid na ndoꞌ geꞌdaꞌa.
Ngol gor ulen gi, ngopyoꞌo nits yoꞌow, no ulen mbi siꞌil sa nde niꞌi wa, no ukeꞌa nits niꞌi wa, ná niꞌi wa naꞌankapa ilate, leꞌa xan‑a nsob ndoꞌ geꞌdaꞌa.
Ná leꞌa tal ton goꞌón ta ndáp naꞌ ndee, ná lá uxobgek bexa ndoꞌ‑yá, leꞌa xa wa cuent dub xa lá ndanbeꞌe, dub xa mbindeꞌe lid na ndoꞌ yux.
Ngol gor ulen gi, no ngopyoꞌo nits yoꞌow, no ulen mbi siꞌil sa nde niꞌi wa, no ukeꞌa nits niꞌi wa, cha ulate idub niꞌi.
Leꞌa gor mtayadiꞌizh Jesús ta ndee, leꞌa be men ndanseana xteꞌe ndadiꞌizh xa,
geal leꞌa ta ndadiꞌizh xa wa nluu leꞌa xa uzheꞌeb ndap juers, naꞌanpa lak ndadiꞌizh be mech ten ley.
Leꞌa gor nchaꞌlaꞌ Jesús bet wa, leꞌa kwaꞌad be men usankea tsoꞌo xa.
Cha ulen dub xabgiꞌi nsaꞌgea las na, leꞌa ta wa dub gealgizh nsaleaꞌ lepra. Cha msaxib xa ndoꞌ Jesús gast ndoꞌ yo ngol xtuzh xa, ndab xa:
—Señor, tal go nlad yunyakna go naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ uní leꞌa ga sunka gan.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mxoꞌob yaꞌa na tsoꞌo xa wa, cha ndab Jesús:
—Nladka naꞌ yakna lu. ¡Nat myakna lu!
Cha bi leꞌa gor wa leꞌa gealgizh wa cha mnitndoꞌ.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa:

—Blaꞌach, naꞌan ton ndoꞌ ná gudiꞌizh lu xteꞌe myakna lu. Ndi waꞌ ndoꞌ uleꞌay iniꞌí xa leꞌa lu myaklana. No biꞌi be man xnab lak unibeꞌe ley mkeꞌa Moisés usaꞌa be men zha nyakna bexa, ndontsa iniꞌí be men leꞌa lu myaklana.
Leꞌa gor na ulayaꞌ Jesús gezh Capernaum, leꞌa wats Jesús ulen dub soldad, dub xa Roma nibeꞌe dub gayoꞌoga be soldad. Cha unab xa ndoꞌ Jesús,
ndab xa:
—Señor, leꞌa dub xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ naꞌ uzheꞌeb kweaꞌ nsak. Leꞌa xa lá yoota gan isea, uzhebpa gealkweaꞌ nax niꞌí xa ta lid naꞌ.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Naꞌ gaa yunyakna xa.
Ná leꞌa soldad wa cha ndab:
—Señor, leꞌa naꞌ naꞌanpa isayaꞌ yate go len lid naꞌ. Nat gudtsa go yakna xa, leꞌa xa syakkana.

Leꞌa naꞌ ndee nxobgek ndoꞌ xa mas nibeꞌe ndoꞌ naꞌ. No ncho be soldad nibeꞌe naꞌ ndoꞌ na. Leꞌa gor na ndáp naꞌ ndoꞌ dub xa yaꞌ xa, leꞌa xa cha ndaꞌkaga. No gor na ndáp naꞌ giꞌid stub xa, leꞌa xa cha ndiꞌidkaga. No gor na nibeꞌe naꞌ ndoꞌ xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa cha ndunkaga ta li ndáp naꞌ wa.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín Jesús ta wa, cha ngwanseana xa, ndab xa ndoꞌ be men nchankea tsoꞌo xa:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego, naꞌanpa izheal naꞌ ni dub xa Israel lndeꞌeta ngeꞌ ladna naꞌ.
No gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega leꞌa gal dub wizh leꞌa kwaꞌad be men itoꞌo lad nlen wizh no lad ndaꞌas wizh, cha kwe bexa wats Abraham no Isaac no Jacob sa nibeꞌe Dios gibeꞌa.
Naꞌ leꞌa bexa Israel, bexa na ndiꞌizh nsabndoꞌ yaꞌbe sa nibeꞌe Dios, leꞌa bexa wa ndi itatebe tsoꞌo juer sa ukaw. Cha goꞌon bexa gast ndeay bexa gaw bexa tant dub gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí bexa.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ soldad nibeꞌe wa:
—Nat byaꞌ ga, leꞌa lak mgeꞌ ladna go naꞌ, li gak‑a.
Cha bi leꞌa gor wa leꞌa xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ soldad wa cha myakna.
Cha nchaꞌa Jesús ta lid Pedr, cha uniꞌí Jesús xnazhaꞌap Pedr nax ndoꞌ loꞌon uzhebpa ncho xlea.
Cha mgal Jesús yaꞌa xa, cha mtoꞌo xlea xa. Leꞌa xagots wa cha ngwaste msaꞌa ta gaw bexa.
Leꞌa gor uyoꞌo teꞌal, leꞌa be men ulenno kwaꞌadpa bexa ncho mbi bxin ladoꞌo na. Leꞌa Jesús cha ulantuꞌub be mbi bxin nsea sbeꞌen diꞌizhtsa, no myunyakna xa itea bexa gizh.
Li ngok‑a lak ta polta ndab Isaías, xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios: “Leꞌa xa leꞌa uloꞌo beuna ndoꞌ be gealgizh nsén beuna no be gealkweaꞌ nchono beuna.”
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí Jesús idub gangeak wats xa nde be men kwaꞌad, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ be xmen xa itakea bexa stub toꞌo lagun Galilea.
Weꞌe leꞌa dub mech ten ley cha ulen wats Jesús, ndab xa:
—Mech, leꞌa naꞌ no isankea tsoꞌo go guniꞌi pa yaꞌ ga.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Leꞌa be mbeas ndap geꞌed nyoꞌo na, no leꞌa be migin ndap be xuꞌun ten na, parea leꞌa Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo lá ndap sa uneꞌe xa.
Leꞌa stub xa na no nkeseano Jesús cha ndab:
—Señor, blaꞌa ga ned yaꞌukaꞌach naꞌ xus naꞌ. Cha weꞌeta isankea naꞌ tsoꞌo ga.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa wa:
—Usankea tsoꞌo naꞌ. Blaꞌa leꞌa bexa lá ndap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios ukaꞌach ltsaꞌa ngut na.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukea ndoꞌ barco no be xmen xa, cha nchaꞌbe bexa ndoꞌ nits.
Leꞌa sa wa cha ulen dub mbi siꞌil gast nyoꞌo nits wa len barco. Ná leꞌa Jesús ndi naxyats.
Leꞌa be xmen xa cha mkwaꞌan xa, ndab bexa:
—¡Señor, lá ulaꞌa ga gat beuna, leꞌa beuna ngi slaꞌyoꞌo len nits!
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan lbaꞌata nzheb bega zha? ¿Lid ndangea ladna bega naꞌ zha?
Weꞌe cha ngwaste xa, uteyo xa mbi no nits, cha uleas mbi no ndon xe ute nits.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ngwanseana, ndab bexa ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa xa:
—Wen, ¿tonxá xa ndee zhaga, gast mbi nsea nits nxobgek ndoꞌ diꞌizh ten xa?

Leꞌa gor ulayaꞌ bexa stub toꞌo lagun sa nibeꞌe gezh Gadara, weꞌe cha ulen top xabgiꞌi wats Jesús, utoꞌo bexa lat be geꞌloꞌo sa ngaꞌach be men ngut. Leꞌa bexa wa ncho mbi bxin len ladoꞌo bexa, no uzhebpa ugiꞌi bexa, gast ni dub men lá yoo gan itid nes nax sa wa.
Cha ugeꞌ ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Xtaꞌan ngi besa nsea ugal lu zha, Jesús Xin Dios? ¿Nsea utsaksi lu besa, zha biseata gal wizh li gun lu?
Leꞌa gax sa wa ndeseayaw kwaꞌadpa kuch.
Cha ndab be mbi bxin wa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Tal leꞌa lu kontuꞌub besa, blaꞌa yate besa len be kuch baꞌ.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Waꞌbe bega.

Leꞌa be mbi bxin wa cha utoꞌo ladoꞌo be xabgiꞌi wa, cha uyoꞌo beya len be kuch wa. Leꞌa itea be kuch wa cha karrel nchaꞌa gek dub weꞌa toꞌo nits. Cha ubix bema gast len nits ulaꞌyoꞌo bema, cha ngut bema.
Leꞌa bexa nkeno kuch wa cha mxoꞌon. Ngol gezh wa cha mbidiꞌizh bexa itea be ta uyoꞌo wa, gast xteꞌe myakna bexa ncho mbi bxin len ladoꞌo na.
Leꞌa kwaꞌadpa bexa gezh wa cha utoꞌo nchaꞌbe sa nsoꞌ Jesús. Leꞌa gor uniꞌí bexa Jesús, cha unab bexa ikaꞌan xa sa wa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukeagal ndoꞌ barco wa, cha utakea xa stub toꞌo lagun, nseaꞌ xa gezh Capernaum sa ncho xa.

Leꞌa sa wa cha ulenno pla be men dub xabgiꞌi gizh lá yoo gan isea, nax ndoꞌ dub yaloꞌon. Leꞌa Jesús cha mnaꞌla leꞌa bexa ngeꞌ ladna leꞌa Jesús sun gan yunyakna xa gizh wa, cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ xa gizh wa:
—Amig, bten ladna lu, leꞌa ke ten lu myuꞌula.
Weꞌe leꞌa pla be mech ten ley nde sa wa cha mbinbeꞌebe: “Leꞌa ta ndab xa baꞌ uzheꞌeb dub taꞌa lá nsak ladna Dios.”
Ná leꞌa Jesús mgenna xteꞌe ndanbeꞌe bexa wa, cha ndab Jesús:
—¿Xtaꞌan lbaꞌa ugap ndanbeꞌe bega len ladoꞌo bega zha?
¿Xtaꞌan mas lid bid gáp naꞌ leꞌa ke ten xa ndee myuꞌula, nati gáp naꞌ gaste xa, cha isea xa?
Leꞌa nat iniꞌí bego leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, no syoꞌo gan utsuꞌu ke ten be men.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ xa gizh wa:
—Goste, cha udob yaloꞌon ten lu baꞌ, cha byaꞌ ta lid lu.
Leꞌa xa cha ngwaste, cha nseaꞌ xa ta lid xa.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí be men ta wa, cha uzhebpa ngwanseana bexa, no ndab bexa leꞌa Dios uzheꞌeb dub Dios siꞌil ta na li msaꞌa xa juers ndoꞌ men.
Leꞌa gor nchaꞌa Jesús cha uniꞌí xa dub xa nsaleaꞌ Mateo nsobyun tiꞌin nsen xa med nkix be men ndoꞌ gobier Roma. Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ xa:
—¡Utsea! ¡Usankea tsoꞌo naꞌ!
Leꞌa Mateo cha ngwasoꞌ, cha usankea xa tsoꞌo Jesús.
Ngol tsoꞌo wa leꞌa Jesús nsea be xmen xa ngwaꞌdaw ta lid Mateo. Leꞌa sa wa no kwaꞌad bexa ndun ltsaꞌa tiꞌin ndun Mateo wa ngwaꞌbe, no kwaꞌadta bexa na ndab be men ugap nak bexa.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí bexa fariseo ta wa, cha ndab bexa ndoꞌ be xmen Jesús:
—¿Xtaꞌan lbaꞌa ndawno mech ten bega bexa nsen med no bexa ugap baꞌ zha?
Ná leꞌa Jesús mbiꞌín ta ndab bexa wa, cha ndab Jesús:
—Leꞌa bexa naꞌanpa gizh lá nkiꞌin doctor, ndi leꞌa bexa gizh nkiꞌinka xa wa.

Waꞌutsid bega ná xteꞌe gab diꞌizh ten Dios, sa ndab Dios: “Leꞌa naꞌ mas nlad ikweaꞌ ladna bega men, ndoꞌ lak nlad naꞌ usaꞌa bega man xnab ndoꞌ naꞌ.” Leꞌa naꞌ naꞌanpa ndaltezh bexa ndanbeꞌe leꞌa lá ndap ke. Leꞌa naꞌ ndi ndaltezh bexa ngondoꞌ leꞌa ndapka ke, ndontsa yach bexa wats Dios.
Weꞌe leꞌa pla be xmen Juan xa ulaleaꞌ be men wa cha ulen ndabbe ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Leꞌa besa ndee no bexa fariseo ncho sian be wizh lá ndaw besa. Ná leꞌa be xmen ga zha, ¿xtaꞌan lid no bexa li ndun ta wa?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:

—¿Nsak bega zha leꞌa dub sa nchilyaꞌa men leꞌa bexa nde sa wa nsabndoꞌ uban yoo ladna, zha bi ncho xabgiꞌi nchilyaꞌa wa? Parea gal dub wizh leꞌa be men goꞌo xabgiꞌi mchilyaꞌa wa. Leꞌa zha weꞌe leꞌa be men nde sa wa lá gaw dub tiemp.
’Naꞌan ton ngo ramient dub lad gox nsea dub bleꞌa lad kub, leꞌa lad kub wa syaꞌad, cha ndi mas stsaw‑a lad gox wa.

No naꞌan ton ngo vin kub len dub bols gid gox, leꞌa bich ten vin kub wa stsaw bols gid gox wa. Leꞌa vin wa cha ibid stsiꞌi no sazhaꞌa bols gox wa. Leꞌa vin kub wa nsabndoꞌ yoꞌo len bols gid kubga, ndontsa ni dub‑a lá gazhaꞌa.
Ndalen li nsoꞌyadiꞌizh Jesús, leꞌa dub xabgiꞌi nsak ten bexa judio ulen, cha usaxib xa ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa meꞌed gots ten naꞌ tiꞌi ngutma. Waꞌ una uxoꞌob ga yaꞌa ga tsoꞌo meꞌed, ndontsa iban meꞌed.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús no be xmen xa cha nchaꞌano xa wa.
Leꞌa toꞌo nes wa nsoꞌ dub xagots nsak gealgizh nleꞌa xa ten idub dub tibtopla liꞌin. Leꞌa xa ubii ndi tsoꞌo Jesús, cha mgal xa ndats xab Jesús,
leꞌa xa mbinbeꞌe tal leꞌa xa ugal masa xab Jesús, leꞌa xa syakkana.
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha mgeaksoꞌ mwiꞌi ndoꞌ xa, cha ndab Jesús:
—Xagots, bten ladna lu, leꞌa ta na mgeꞌ ladna lu naꞌ, ta weꞌe mbin myakna lu.
Cha bi leꞌa gor wa myakna xa.
Ngol gor ulayaꞌ Jesús ta lid xabgiꞌi nsak wa, leꞌa Jesús cha uniꞌí bexa ndoꞌol bzhee, no xteꞌeta ugeꞌ ndeyoꞌon be men.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ bexa wa:
—Utate bega, leꞌa meꞌed baꞌ naꞌanpa ngut, leꞌa meꞌed ga naxyats.
Leꞌa be men wa cha ndi mxiꞌidno Jesús.
Ná leꞌa gor utatela bexa, cha uyoꞌo Jesús len niꞌi, cha usen xa yaꞌa meꞌed, cha ngwaste meꞌed.
Leꞌa ta li mbin Jesús wa mgen itea be gezh nde gax sa wa.
Leꞌa gor utoꞌo Jesús sa wa leꞌa top xabgiꞌi lá naꞌ nseabenkea tsoꞌo Jesús, ugeꞌ ndab bexa:
—¡Xin David! ¡Blats ladna go besa!
Leꞌa gor uyoꞌo Jesús len niꞌi, cha ulen bexa wa wats Jesús. Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—¿Ndangea ladna bega leꞌa naꞌ sun gan yakna bega zha?
Leꞌa bexa cha ndab:
—Señor, leꞌa besa ndangeaka ladna‑yá.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mgal ngusndoꞌ bexa, ndab Jesús:
—Nat yakna bega lak ndangea ladna bega‑yá.
Cha mnaꞌla bexa. Leꞌa Jesús cha uzhebpa ndab lá gudiꞌizh bexa‑yá ndoꞌ ni dub men.
Ná leꞌa gor nseaꞌbe bexa, cha mbidiꞌizh bexa ta li mbin Jesús wa ndoꞌ itea be men ncho gax sa wa.
Leꞌa gor utoꞌo itop be xabgiꞌi sa wa, weꞌe leꞌa stapla be men ulenno dub xabgiꞌi mud, ncho mbi bxin len ladoꞌo na.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ulantuꞌub mbi bxin len ladoꞌo xa wa, cha usaxan ndadiꞌizh xabgiꞌi wa. Leꞌa be men uzhebpa ndanseana, ndab bexa:
—¡Ta ndee dub ta nunk beuna gol niꞌí idub Israel ndee!
Ná leꞌa bexa fariseo ndabbe:
—Leꞌa juers ten maxuꞌu na nibeꞌe be mbi bxin ngontuꞌub Jesús be mbi bxin len ladoꞌo be men.

Tsoꞌo wa leꞌa Jesús ukesea itea be gezh ubiꞌi no be gezh byux sa wa, mluu xa be men len be niꞌi sa nzhealbe bexa judio be gezh wa. Mbidiꞌizh xa diꞌizh wen ten Dios ná xteꞌe gak bexa dub xa leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe, no myunyakna xa be men nsén isandoꞌ gealgizh no be gealkweaꞌ.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí Jesús be men kwaꞌad, cha mlats ladna Jesús bexa, leꞌa bexa nyuꞌ ladna no ni lá iniꞌí bexa xteꞌe gun bexa, cuent be borreg ni lá ndap ton ulaꞌach ma.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Ncho kwaꞌad be men gol goꞌón diꞌizh wen ten Dios, nak bexa cuent sianpa be taꞌa iganleꞌe, parea leꞌa bexa gun tiꞌin wa platsa.
Ta weꞌe unab bega ndoꞌ Dios Xwan tiꞌin utuꞌubta xa bexa gun tiꞌin ndee.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha utezh isatibtop be xmen xa, cha msaꞌa xa juers ndoꞌ bexa kontuꞌub bexa be mbi bxin, no yunyakna bexa be men nsén isandoꞌ gealgizh no be gealkweaꞌ.
Leꞌa bexa wa bexa mtuꞌub Jesús, gun bexa tiꞌin ten Dios. Leꞌa ta wa Simón Pedr, no Ndres wit xa; nsea Jacob no Juan wit Jacob be xin Zebedeo.
Nsea Julip no Bartol no Tomás no Mateo xa nsen med nkaꞌa gobier Roma, no Jacob xin Alfeo, no Lebeo xa no nsaleaꞌ Tadeo.
No Simón xa partid Caná, nsea Judas Iscariot, xa na leꞌa myun cuent Jesús tsoꞌo wa.
Leꞌa isatibtop bexa wa mtuꞌub Jesús, ndab Jesús xteꞌe gun bexa, ndab xa:
—Lá yaꞌbe bega sa ndencho bexa naꞌanpa xa judio, ni lá yaꞌ bega be gezh ten bexa Samaria.
Ndi waꞌbe bega sa ndencho bexa Israel, bexa nak cuent be borreg ulaꞌ.
Cha bidiꞌizh bega ndoꞌ bexa wa leꞌa zha inibeꞌe Dios ladoꞌo be men yá gaxla nak.

No byunyakna bega bexa gizh, no bexa nsén gealgizh lepra. No uxiste bega bexa tiꞌi ngut. No ulantuꞌub bega be mbi bxin len ladoꞌo be men. Lak naꞌanpa ikix bega nsa naꞌ juers ndee ndoꞌ bega, no liga gaꞌbin bega be ta wa naꞌanpa kix bexa ndoꞌ bega.
’Lá goꞌo bega ni med oro, ni plata, ni cobre,
no ni bols goꞌo bega nes. No ni lá goꞌo bega top nes xab bega, no ni stub nes ndab bega, ni bordón lá goꞌo bega. Leꞌa dub xa ndun tiꞌin nsabndoꞌ yax ten na.
’Leꞌa guniꞌi xá gezh ná ilayaꞌ bega, tal gezh siꞌil‑a natal gezh tuzh‑a, bkwaꞌan bega dub men utsin nak, cha uyoꞌo bega ta lid xa gast zha ikaꞌan bega gezh wa.
Leꞌa gor na yoo bega len dub niꞌi, cha utsin unidiꞌizh bega ndoꞌ xa ncho sa wa.
Leꞌa tal xa utsin ndanno bega, weꞌe leꞌa xa wen yoo ladna. Ná tal leꞌa xa naꞌanpa utsin ndun, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa wen yoo ladna.

’Ná tal be men wa lá utsin ndanno bega no ni lá ulaꞌach xa ta gudiꞌizh bega, bkaꞌan bega sa wa guniꞌi tal ta lid dub men‑a no tal dub gezh‑a. Cha blate bega gast yakol ngwaꞌal xoꞌo bega, ta uluu leꞌa Dios lá nsak ladna lak nak bexa wa.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa gal wizh gab Dios ná ton ndap ke, leꞌa bexa gezh wa mas gealkweaꞌ iniꞌí ndoꞌ bexa uyoꞌo gezh Sodoma nsea gezh Gomorra.
’Blaꞌach bega leꞌa naꞌ ntuꞌub bega yaꞌbe bega cuentta be borreg nde lat be mbee. Ta weꞌe list gok bega cuentta list be uzhib. No bchaꞌan gok bega lakta bchaꞌan nak be palom.
No gop bega cuent ndoꞌ be men, bexa na yun cuent bega ndoꞌ bexa naktiꞌin, no kin bexa bega len be niꞌi sa nzhealbe bexa judio.

Leꞌa bexa gast ndoꞌ bexa naktiꞌin ubiꞌi no ndoꞌ bexa mas leꞌa nibeꞌe goꞌo bega ke na nak bega xmen naꞌ. Leꞌa gor weꞌe sak gudiꞌizh bega cuent ten naꞌ ndoꞌ bexa wa no ndoꞌ kwaꞌadta bexa naꞌanpa xa judio.
Parea leꞌa gor na yun bexa cuent bega, lá yuꞌ ladna bega xteꞌe ikaꞌab bega, leꞌa gal gor wa leꞌa Dios leꞌa usaꞌa diꞌizh ikaꞌab bega.
Leꞌa ta gudiꞌizh bega wa naꞌanpa ta ndanbeꞌetsa bega, leꞌa ta wa ndi ta usaꞌa Espíritu ten Dios Xus beuna gudiꞌizh bega.
’Leꞌa ncho be men leꞌaka wit na yun cuent gat xa ke ndangea ladna xa naꞌ. No nchoga bexa liga yun cuent leꞌaka xin na. No ncho bexa leꞌakaga gaklono xus na gast gab bexa gat xus bexa.
No itea be men ixeeno ladna bega ke na ndangea ladna bega naꞌ. Ná leꞌa tal ton bega uxik ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ wa, leꞌa bega gap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios.
Leꞌa zha na ugap gunno bexa bega dub gezh, bxoꞌon bega, waꞌ bega stubga gezh. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa zha biseata itid bega itea be gezh Israel, leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ilengal.
’Leꞌa dub xin utsid dub mech naꞌanpa mas nsak ndoꞌ mech ten na. No liga leꞌa dub mos naꞌanpa mas nsak ndoꞌ xa nibeꞌe ten xa.

Leꞌa xin utsid dub mech itid lak ntid mech wa. No liga dub mos itid lak ntid xa nibeꞌe ten xa. Tal leꞌa be men níꞌi ndoꞌ naꞌ ndee maxuꞌu Beelzebú, matagal ndoꞌ bega nak be xmen naꞌ, ¿xteꞌema ugap gab bexa wa?
’Lá izheb bega ndoꞌ be men, leꞌa itea be ta ugaꞌach, leꞌa gal gor leꞌa be ta wa uluꞌukabe. No itea be taꞌa ngachyoꞌo, leꞌa gal gor leꞌa be men iniꞌíka ta wa.
Leꞌa be ta ndáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega gor teꞌal, gud bega‑yá gor tezhea ndoꞌ be men. Leꞌa be ta xgaꞌach ndoꞌón bega, gast gek niꞌi usoꞌ bega ugeꞌ gudiꞌizh bega‑yá.

Lá izheb bega ndoꞌ be men. Leꞌa bexa sun gan gut bexa bega, ná leꞌa gealnaban ncho len ladoꞌo bega leꞌa bexa wa lá gun gan gut. Ndi mas bzheb bega ndoꞌ Dios xa na sun gan gut be men, cha utsaꞌab xa gealnaban ten bexa infierno.
’Leꞌa top migin nzheꞌa dub med tuzh, parea ni dub bema lá gat tal Dios lá ulaꞌa gat ma.
Leꞌa Dios uzhebpa nlaꞌach bega gast uniꞌí xa plo gichgek bega ncho.
Ta weꞌe lá izheb bega, leꞌa bega mas nsak ndoꞌ be migin.
’Leꞌa tal ton gab ndoꞌ gaꞌal be men leꞌa xa xmen naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ noga gáp ndoꞌ Xus naꞌ xa nsob gibeꞌa leꞌa xa wa xmenka naꞌ.
Ná leꞌa tal ton gab ndoꞌ be men leꞌa xa naꞌanpa xmen naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ noga gáp ndoꞌ Xus naꞌ xa nsob gibeꞌa leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa xmen naꞌ.
’Lá gunbeꞌe bega leꞌa naꞌ ndal por na uzheꞌeb wen kwe be men ndoꞌ gizhliyo. Leꞌa naꞌ ndi ndal leꞌa be men iteltsaꞌa.
Leꞌa naꞌ ndal leꞌa be xabgiꞌi kuyono leꞌaka xus na, leꞌa be xagots kuyono leꞌaka xnaꞌa na, leꞌa xinxix xa kuyono leꞌaka xnazhaꞌap xa.
Leꞌa bexa na mas gakloo ndoꞌ dub men, leꞌa ta wa leꞌaka bexa ta lid xa.

’Leꞌa tal ton mas ndankea xus na no xnaꞌa na ndoꞌ lak ndankea xa naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa isayaꞌ gak xmen naꞌ. Liga tal ton mas nkweaꞌ ladna be xmeꞌed na ndoꞌ naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa isayaꞌ gak xmen naꞌ.
Tal leꞌa bego lá goꞌo cruz ten na, cha lá isankea bega tsoꞌo naꞌ, leꞌa bega lá isayaꞌ gak xmen naꞌ.
Leꞌa tal ton ukwaꞌan xteꞌe wen yoo xa, leꞌa xa wa ndi gun perdid gealnaban ten na ndoꞌ Dios. Ná tal ton gat geal ndangea ladna xa naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa gap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios.
’Leꞌa tal ton utsin gak ndoꞌ bega, leꞌa ta wa cuentkata ndoꞌ naꞌ utsin nak xa. No liga leꞌa tal ton utsin nak ndoꞌ naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa utsinga nak ndoꞌ Dios xa mtuꞌub naꞌ.

Leꞌa tal ton utsin gak ndoꞌ dub profet geal profet xa, leꞌa Dios no ndoꞌ xa wa usaꞌa ltsaꞌa ta usaꞌa Dios ndoꞌ be profet. No liga tal ton utsin gak ndoꞌ dub xa wen geal wen xa, leꞌa Dios no ndoꞌ xa wa usaꞌa ltsaꞌa ta usaꞌa Dios ndoꞌ bexa wen.
Leꞌa tal ton usaꞌa masa dub vas nits myalꞌ goo dub xmen naꞌ, geal leꞌa xa xmen naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa Dios usaꞌaka ta wen nsabndoꞌ ikaꞌa xa.
Leꞌa gor na mtayadiꞌizh Jesús ndoꞌ isatibtop be xmen xa ná xteꞌe nsabndoꞌ gun bexa, cha utoꞌo xa nchaꞌuluu xa be men be gezh nde gax wa.
Leꞌa zha wa leꞌa Juan xa na ulaleaꞌ be men wa nkea litgiꞌib. Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín xa be taꞌa ndun Jesucristo, cha mtuꞌub xa top xmen xa,
ngwaꞌ inabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab bexa:
—¿Go nak xa na ndab Dios ilen wa zha? ¿Nati kweas besa ilen stubga xa?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Byaꞌbe bega, cha gud bega ndoꞌ Juan ta naꞌ bega no ta ndoꞌón bega.

Leꞌa bexa lá yoo gan iwiꞌibe, nat leꞌa bexa naꞌla. Leꞌa bexa lá yoo gan isea, nat leꞌa bexa nseala. Leꞌa bexa nsén gealgizh lepra, nat leꞌa bexa myaklana. Leꞌa bexa ngwaꞌad, nat leꞌa bexa ndoꞌónla. Leꞌa bexa ngut, nat leꞌa bexa nbanla. No bexa uban nak ndoꞌón diꞌizh wen ten Dios.
Uzhebpa wen yoo ladna tal ton igondoꞌ ton nak naꞌ.
Leꞌa gor nseaꞌbe itop be xmen Juan, leꞌa Jesús cha usaxan mbidiꞌizh ndoꞌ be men cuent ten Juan, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa gor na ngwaꞌbe bega geꞌe sa uxee ncho men, ¿xtaꞌan ngwaꞌiwiꞌi bega zha? ¿Dub yalod nkwiꞌin mbi?
Nati, ¿xtaꞌan ngwaꞌiwiꞌi bega zha? ¿Dub xabgiꞌi nak dub lad uzhebpa uyap nsak? Leꞌa bega uniꞌíka leꞌa bexa ndak lad uyap wa, leꞌa bexa wa ncho ta lid bexa nibeꞌe.
¿Xtaꞌan ngwaꞌiwiꞌi bega zha? ¿Ngwaꞌiwiꞌi bega dub xa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios zha? Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa Juan ta ugeaka ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios, parea leꞌa xa mas nsak ndoꞌ iteata bexa li ndun wa.
Leꞌa diꞌizh ten Dios nkeaniꞌi ndab Dios cuent ten Juan:
Bwiꞌi, leꞌa naꞌ utuꞌub dub xa yaꞌ ned ndoꞌ lu,
uxaꞌal xa nes isea lu.

No gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega leꞌa lat be men ngol ndoꞌ gizhliyo naꞌan ni stub xa mas nsak ndoꞌ Juan xa ulaleaꞌ be men. Ná leꞌa tal ton uxee nsak lat bexa nibeꞌe Dios, leꞌa cuent ten Dios leꞌa xa wa mas nsak ndoꞌ Juan.
’Leꞌa zha ulen Juan xa ulaleaꞌ be men wa no gast nat, leꞌa ncho bexa ngiꞌi nka inibeꞌe Dios be men, nlad bexa initndoꞌ ta nibeꞌe Dios be men.
Leꞌa ta mkeꞌa itea bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios no ley mkeꞌa Moisés wa mbidiꞌizh xteꞌe nibeꞌe Dios be men gast zha ulen Juan.
Leꞌa tal bega nlad gungea ladna‑yá, leꞌa Juan leꞌa nak Elí, xa na ndab be profet giꞌidka.
Bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, blaꞌach bega ta ndáp naꞌ ndee.
’¿Xtaꞌanma dub ta nak cuent ta ndun be men ncho nat? Leꞌa bexa wa nak cuent be meꞌed nde ndoꞌ xgeꞌe, ugeꞌ ndab be meꞌed ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa meꞌed:
“Mbiꞌil besa bzhee, ná leꞌa bega lá ngolndatsbe. No mbiltoꞌoga besa be cant uban nsea, ná leꞌa bega lá ngoꞌonga.”
Leꞌa zha ulen Juan ncho wizh lá ngaw xa, no ni lá ndo xa vin. Cha ndab bega leꞌa xa ncho mbi bxin len ladoꞌo na, ta weꞌe li ndun xa.

Ná leꞌa nat ndalga naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo. Leꞌa naꞌ ndaw, no ndoꞌo naꞌ, ná leꞌa bega ndab leꞌa naꞌ uzhebpa ndaw, no uzhebpa ndoꞌo naꞌ vin. Ndab bega leꞌa naꞌ nchealtsaꞌa bexa ugap nak, no bexa nsen med nkix be men ndoꞌ gobier Roma. Parea leꞌa bexa ndák lak nsaꞌa Dios, leꞌa be ta wen ndun bexa wa nluu leꞌa bexa ndákka.
Weꞌe cha usaxan uteyo Jesús bexa na ncho be gezh na mas sian be uyon mbin xa, geal leꞌa bexa wa ni lá ulaꞌa be ta ugap nak bexa. Ndab Jesús:

—¡Proꞌob bego xa gezh Corazín no gezh Betsaida! Tal be uyon mbin naꞌ lat bega wa ndi ngun naꞌ gezh Tiro no gezh Sidón, polta ngokla bexa lad nagats, no usobla bexa ndoꞌ diꞌ, ta uluu leꞌa bexa uban myoꞌo ladna no mlaꞌala bexa be ta ugap nak bexa.
Ta weꞌe gáp naꞌ leꞌa gal wizh gab Dios ná ton ndap ke, leꞌa bego xa gezh Corazín no gezh Betsaida mas uzheꞌeb iniꞌí gealkweaꞌ ndoꞌ bexa Tiro no Sidón wa.
No bego bexa gezh Capernaum, ¿ndanbeꞌe bega zha gibeꞌa yaꞌ bega? Leꞌa Dios ndi utsaꞌab bega infierno. Tal be uyon mbin naꞌ lat bega wa ndi ngak gezh Sodoma, nal gast gor nat bi nde gezh wa.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa gal wizh gab Dios ná ton ndap ke, leꞌa bega xa Capernaum wa mas uzheꞌeb iniꞌí gealkweaꞌ ndoꞌ bexa uyoꞌo gezh Sodoma.
Leꞌa zha wa cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ Dios:

—Nsa naꞌ xno ndoꞌ go, Xus naꞌ, go Xa Nibeꞌe gibeꞌa no gizhliyo, leꞌa go lá ulaꞌa leꞌa bexa ndák wa no bexa ntsid wa yakbeꞌena be ta ndee. Ndi mluu ga‑yá ndoꞌ bexa naꞌanpa ndák, bexa nak cuent be meꞌed.
Li ngok‑a, Xus naꞌ, geal leꞌa go li nlad gak‑a.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be men nde sa wa:

—Leꞌa Dios Xus naꞌ msaꞌa itea be taꞌa ndoꞌ naꞌ. No naꞌan ton nchandoꞌ naꞌ, nabtsa Dios nchandoꞌ naꞌ. No naꞌan ton nchandoꞌ Dios Xus naꞌ, nabtsa naꞌ xa nak Xin xa nchandoꞌ xa, no bexa na nlad naꞌ uluꞌu naꞌ ná ton nak Dios ndoꞌ bexa.
Utseabe itea bego na noꞌo be yoꞌo kweꞌa no mzhannabe, leꞌa naꞌ gakno bega uneꞌe ladoꞌo bega.
Bin bega lak nluu naꞌ bega, no btsid bega ndoꞌ naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ bchaꞌan nak, no naꞌanpa zhin nak naꞌ. Li ndontsa uneꞌe ladoꞌo bega.
Leꞌa ta ndáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bego wa dub ta naꞌanpa bid gun bega, cuent dub yoꞌo ta uxaxtsa.
Leꞌa ngol dub wizh neꞌe be men, leꞌa Jesús nchaꞌtid sa nax dub bleꞌa yo ncho trig. Leꞌa be xmen Jesús ndannabe, ta weꞌe cha uxeꞌe bexa pla be bid ten trig, cha udaw bexa‑yá.
Leꞌa ncho bexa fariseo uniꞌí ta wa, cha ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Bwiꞌi go ná xtaꞌan ndun be xmen go, ta lá nsabndoꞌ gun bexa wizh neꞌe beuna.
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—¿Ni lá ndoꞌol bega sa ndab diꞌizh ten Dios ta mbin David dub biaj zha na uzhebpa ndanna xa no bexa ndeseano xa zha?
Leꞌa David uyoꞌo len niꞌilad ten Dios, cha udaw xa be pan leꞌay, ta lá nsabndoꞌ gaw xa no bexa ndeno xa, nab be uleꞌay ndaw‑a.
¿No ni lá ndoꞌol bega ndoꞌ ley ten Dios leꞌa be uleꞌay wa ndun tiꞌin len niꞌi ten Dios wizh neꞌe be men, ná leꞌa ta wa naꞌanpa dub ke?
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa sa ndee nat nchola dub xa mas nsak ndoꞌ niꞌi ten Dios wa.

Leꞌa diꞌizh ten Dios nkeaniꞌi ndab Dios: “Leꞌa naꞌ mas nlad ikweaꞌ ladna bega men, ndoꞌ lak nlad naꞌ usaꞌa bega xnab ndoꞌ naꞌ.” Tal leꞌa bega yakbeꞌena ta ndee wa, leꞌa bega lá gab ugap ndun bexa ndee, dub ta naꞌanpa dub ke.
Leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, noga nibeꞌe wizh neꞌe be men.
Cha nchaꞌa Jesús uyoꞌo xa len niꞌi sa nzhealbe bexa judio gezh wa.
Leꞌa sa wa nsob dub xabgiꞌi ubidya dub yaꞌa na. Leꞌa bexa fariseo nkwaꞌan ná xteꞌe usake bexa Jesús, cha unabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab bexa:
—¿Syoꞌo gan yunyakna men dub xa gizh wizh neꞌe beuna zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Tal leꞌa dub bega ndap dub borreg, cha ulaꞌyoꞌo ma len dub geꞌed wat wizh neꞌe beuna, ¿lid yaꞌloꞌo bega ma leꞌaka wizh wa zha?
¿Lá iniꞌí bega zha leꞌa dub men uzhebpa mas nsak ndoꞌ dub borreg? Ta weꞌe leꞌa beuna syoꞌoka gan gakno stub xa be wizh neꞌe beuna.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ xa gizh dub yaꞌa na wa:
—Bkea yaꞌa lu.
Leꞌa xa wa cha mkea yaꞌa na, cha uxax myakna‑yá lak nak stub‑a.
Cha nseaꞌbe bexa fariseo, mzhealbe bexa mbidiꞌizh bexa xteꞌe gun bexa gan gat Jesús.
Leꞌa Jesús mgenna ta li nlad bexa gun bexa wa, ta weꞌe cha mkaꞌan xa sa wa. No kwaꞌad be men usankea tsoꞌo xa, cha myunyakna xa itea bexa gizh wa.
No uzhebpa ndab Jesús ndoꞌ bexa lá gudiꞌizh bexa ton myunyakna bexa.
Leꞌa ta wa ngok lak ndab profet Isaías polta, ndab Dios:
Bwiꞌi bego leꞌa xa ndee xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ naꞌ,
leꞌa naꞌ mti xa no nkweaꞌ lad naꞌ xa
no ntenno lad naꞌ xa.
Usa naꞌ Espíritu ten naꞌ yoo len ladoꞌo xa,
leꞌa xa gudiꞌizh ndoꞌ be men,
gab xa xteꞌe wen yaꞌan bexa ndoꞌ naꞌ.
Leꞌa xa ni lá kuyotoꞌo, no ni lá kwezhat xa;
No ni naꞌanpa igen ti xa be nes.
Leꞌa xa wa bchaꞌan gak ndoꞌ bexa kweaꞌ ncho ladna,
bexa nak cuent dub xos ya yamer gach,
no cuent nak dub bealꞌ ndidotsa nsayolꞌ.
Li utsin gak xa ndoꞌ bexa wa gast gal wizh gun xa gan
leꞌa be men wa wen yaꞌan ndoꞌ Dios.
No idub ndoꞌ gizhliyo igeꞌ ladna be men xa.
Weꞌe leꞌa be men cha ulenno dub xabgiꞌi gizh wats Jesús. Leꞌa mbi bxin ncho len ladoꞌo xa wa mbin mud xa no lá naꞌ xa. Leꞌa Jesús cha myunyakna xa ndontsa naꞌ xa no níꞌi xa.
Leꞌa be men wa ngwatenaꞌbe, ndab bexa ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa xa:
—¿Syoꞌo gan gak xa ndee xin David xa ndiꞌizh utuꞌubka Dios zha?
Ná leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín bexa fariseo ta wa, cha ndab bexa ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa xa:
—Leꞌa Jesús ngontuꞌub be mbi bxin len ladoꞌo be men juers ten Beelzebú, maxuꞌu nibeꞌe be mbi bxin.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mgenna xteꞌe ndanbeꞌe bexa, cha ndab Jesús:

—Tal leꞌa be xmen dub xa nibeꞌe iteltsaꞌabe, cha bi leꞌakaga bexa kuyo, weꞌe leꞌa bexa wa yá naꞌantapa gak juertbe. No tal leꞌa be men ncho dub gezh natal dubtsa niꞌi bi leꞌaka kuyobe, leꞌa juers ten bexa idub.
No liga tal leꞌa maxuꞌu kuyono leꞌaka be mbi bxin ten na, weꞌe leꞌa maxuꞌu wa no be mbi bxin wa iteltsaꞌabe, cha idub juers ten maxuꞌu.

Ndab bega leꞌa naꞌ ngontuꞌub be mbi bxin juers ten Beelzebú. ¿Ná ton nsaꞌa juers ngontuꞌub be xmen bega be mbi bxin wa zha? Ta weꞌe leꞌa ta na ndun be xmen bega wa leꞌa nluu leꞌa bega naꞌanpa utsin ndanbeꞌe.
Ná leꞌa naꞌ ngontuꞌub be mbi bxin juers ten Espíritu ten Dios, ta na nluu leꞌa Dios yá ngol tiemp inibeꞌe len ladoꞌo be men.
’¿No xteꞌema yoo gan yate dub men len lid dub xabgiꞌi juert, kowaꞌan xa be ta ncho sa wa, tal men wa lid ned uxi xa juert wa zha? Lima syoꞌo gan kowaꞌan xa be taꞌa len lid xa juert wa.
’Leꞌa tal ton lá nsak ladna be ta ndun naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa ndakloo ndoꞌ naꞌ. No liga leꞌa tal ton naꞌanpa ndakno naꞌ nyakjunt be men ndoꞌ Dios, leꞌa xa wa ndi ndun nsasit be men wats Dios.

’Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa itea be ta ugap ndun be men no itea be ta kweaꞌ níꞌi bexa, leꞌa ta wa dub ke syoꞌoka gan gungeꞌ ladna Dios. Ná leꞌa tal ton inisi Espíritu ten Dios, weꞌe leꞌa Dios lá gungeꞌ ladna ke wa.
Leꞌa tal ton inisi naꞌ ndee, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, leꞌa ke weꞌe syoꞌoka gan yuꞌu. Ná leꞌa tal ton inisi Espíritu ten Dios, leꞌa ke weꞌe yá lá yuꞌuta, ni tiemp ndee no ni tiemp ilen wa.
’Leꞌa dub ya wen nsaꞌa sbeꞌen ngus wen. No dub ya naꞌanpa wen nsaꞌa sbeꞌen ngus lá yoo gan gaw men. Leꞌa be ngus ten dub ya nluu xá ya na‑yá.
¡Leꞌa bego xa ugap cuent be uzhib! ¿Xteꞌema yoo gan gudiꞌizh bega be ta wen zha, ná bega bexa ugap? Leꞌa ta na ncho ladoꞌo dub men, ta weꞌetsa ndadiꞌizh xa.
Leꞌa be men wen wa ndadiꞌizh ta wen, lak ta wen ncho ladoꞌo xa. No liga leꞌa bexa ugap ndadiꞌizh be ta ugap, lak ta ugap ncho ladoꞌo xa.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa gal wizh gab Dios ná ton ndap ke, leꞌa itea be men isoꞌ ndoꞌ Dios gab bexa ná xtaꞌan mbidiꞌizh bexa itea be diꞌizh ugap.
Tal leꞌa bega ndadiꞌizh ta wen, weꞌe leꞌa Dios gab leꞌa bega naꞌanpa ndap ke. Ná tal leꞌa bega ndadiꞌizh ta ugap, weꞌe leꞌa Dios gab leꞌa bega ndapka ke.
Weꞌe ncho bexa fariseo no be mech ten ley ukaꞌab ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Mech, leꞌa besa nlad gun go dub ta uluu leꞌa go Dioska mtuꞌub.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:

—Leꞌa be men ncho nat uzhebpa be men ugap no ndankea bexa be ta naꞌanpa ta ugeapa nak Dios. Unab bega gun naꞌ dub ta uluu na ton nak naꞌ, parea leꞌa naꞌ lá gun ta unab bega wa. Ndi iniꞌítsa bega leꞌa naꞌ itiꞌid ltsaꞌa ta utid Jonás, xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta.
Lak uyoꞌo Jonás len dub mbeal siꞌil chon wizh no chon teꞌal, no liga leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, yoo len yo chon wizh no chon teꞌal.

’Leꞌa gal wizh na gab Dios ná ton ndap ke, weꞌe leꞌa bexa uyoꞌo gezh Nínive wa gab leꞌa be men ncho nat ndee ugap nak. Leꞌa bexa Nínive mlaꞌa be ta ugap nak bexa, gor na mbiꞌín bexa diꞌizh ten Dios ta mbidiꞌizh Jonás. Ná leꞌa sa ndee nsoꞌ dub xa mas nsak ndoꞌ Jonás.

No gal wizh wa leꞌa xagots unibeꞌe be men lad sur isoꞌ, gab xa leꞌa bega ndee ndapka ke. Leꞌa xa wa uzhebpa sit utoꞌo ndontsa mbidyoꞌón xa ta mbidiꞌizh Salomón, be ta uzheꞌeb ngók xa. Leꞌa sa ndee nsoꞌ dub xa mas nsak ndoꞌ Salomón wa, ná leꞌa bega lá nsakyoꞌón ta ndab xa.
’Leꞌa gor na ntoꞌo dub mbi bxin len ladoꞌo dub men, leꞌa ta wa cha nchaꞌa sa naꞌan men, nchaꞌkwaꞌan ná pa yoo na. Ná leꞌa gor na lá izheal pa yoo mbi bxin wa,
cha ndab mbi bxin wa: “Nsea naꞌ leꞌaka ta lid naꞌ sa utoꞌo naꞌ.” Leꞌa gor mtanseaꞌ mbi bxin wa, leꞌa ladoꞌo men wa cuent dub niꞌi tach, ndon umbiꞌi nak‑a no chul nsaxkwaꞌa‑yá.
Weꞌe leꞌa mbi bxin wa cha nchaꞌgiꞌi stub sgaꞌad be mbi bxin mas ugap nak, cha yoo be mbi bxin wa ladoꞌo men wa. Cha mas kweaꞌ yoo xa ndoꞌ lak zha ned wa. No liga yasea be men ugap ncho tiemp nat.
Bi li nsoꞌyadiꞌizh Jesús ndoꞌ be men, leꞌa xnaꞌa Jesús no be wit xa ulayaꞌ sa wa. Ndebe bexa tsoꞌo juer, nlad bexa gudiꞌizhno bexa Jesús.
Leꞌa dub men cha ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Unaꞌ go leꞌa xnaꞌa go no be wit ga ndebe tsoꞌo juer ndee nlad gudiꞌizhno ga.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab ndoꞌ xa wa:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ go ná ton xa na ta ugeaka nak xnaꞌa naꞌ nsea be wit naꞌ.
Cha mluyaꞌa Jesús be xmen xa ndab xa:
—Leꞌa bexa nde ndee nak xnaꞌa naꞌ no be wit naꞌ.
Leꞌa itea bexa ndun lak nlad Xus naꞌ xa nsob gibeꞌa, bexa weꞌe nak wit naꞌ no bsan naꞌ no xnaꞌa naꞌ.
Bi leꞌa wizh wa leꞌa Jesús utoꞌo len niꞌi wa, cha nchaꞌa xa toꞌo lagun Galilea, cha usob xa.
Weꞌe leꞌa kwaꞌad be men mzhealbe wats xa, cha ukea xa ndoꞌ dub barco, cha usob xa. Leꞌa itea be men wa utebe ndoꞌ yo bid toꞌotsa nits.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mluu sian taꞌa, msaktabeꞌe xa be taꞌa, ndab xa:
—Blaꞌach bego leꞌa dub xa ndun tiꞌin geꞌe utoꞌo nchaꞌutob xa bid ten trig ndoꞌ yo.
Leꞌa gor na mteꞌach xa‑yá, ncho‑yá ulate toꞌo nes. Leꞌa be migin cha ulen cha udaw‑a.
No ncho‑yá ulate ndoꞌ yo geꞌ, sa uxee yo. Leꞌa ná wa uxax ulen,
parea ngol gor mnaꞌ bea leꞌa‑yá cha mgoꞌol cha ubid‑a, geal leꞌa‑yá naꞌanpa wat ndiꞌib loꞌ na.
No ncho‑yá ulate lat be gix nsoꞌ gich. Ngol gor leꞌa gix wa ngoꞌol, cha ulo xleaꞌ‑yá.
Parea leꞌa ncho‑yá ulate sa utaꞌa yo, cha msaꞌa‑yá sian bid. Ncho be trig wa msaꞌa dub gayoꞌoga bid. No ncho‑yá msaꞌa dub chon gaꞌal bid. No ncho‑yá msaꞌa dub galntiꞌi bid.
Bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, blaꞌach bego ta ndáp naꞌ ndee.
Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha ulen wats xa, cha ndab bexa:
—¿Xtaꞌan sbeꞌen nsaktabeꞌe ga be taꞌa no be ta nluu ga?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa Dios nsaꞌa ta yakbeꞌena bega be ta ugaꞌach cuent ten xteꞌe nibeꞌe Dios. Ná leꞌa ndoꞌ bexa xaꞌaga naꞌanpa nsaꞌa Dios yakbeꞌena bexa‑yá.
Leꞌa tal ton isakyoꞌón ta ndáp naꞌ, leꞌa Dios usaꞌa mas yakbeꞌena xa. Ná leꞌa tal ton lá isakyoꞌón, leꞌa Dios slat gast ta tuzh nyakbeꞌena xa wa.

Ta weꞌe li sbeꞌen be taꞌa nsaktabeꞌe naꞌ be ta nluu naꞌ ndoꞌ be men. Leꞌa bexa nwiꞌi, ná lá nyakbeꞌena bexa ta naꞌ bexa. No ndoꞌón bexa ta ndáp naꞌ, ná ni lá isakyoꞌón bexa‑yá no ni lá yakbeꞌena bexa‑yá.
Leꞌa ta ndun bexa wa nak lak ta mkeꞌa Isaías sakndoꞌ Dios, ndab Dios:
Ndoꞌón bega‑yá,
parea lá nyakbeꞌena bega‑yá.
No nwiꞌi bega‑yá,
parea lá iniꞌí bega xtaꞌan‑a.
Leꞌa be men ndee uzhebpa myak ngud ladoꞌo na.
No lá ndoꞌón bexa, no nsaꞌnyaw ndoꞌ bexa.
Ta weꞌe lá inaꞌ bexa, no ni lá goꞌón bexa,
no ni lá yakbeꞌena bexa.
No ni naꞌanpa ilen bexa wats naꞌ
utsuꞌu naꞌ be ke ten bexa.
Cha no ndab Jesús:
—Ná leꞌa Dios ndun wen nyoꞌo ladna bego, geal leꞌa bega naꞌ be ta ndee no ndoꞌón bega‑yá.

Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa kwaꞌad bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios no bexa wen nak uyoꞌo polta, nlad bexa iniꞌí bexa ltsaꞌa ta naꞌ bega nat, ná leꞌa bexa lá iniꞌí ta wa. No nlad bexa goꞌón bexa ltsaꞌa ta ndoꞌón bega nat, ná leꞌa bexa lá ngoꞌón ta wa.
’Blaꞌach bega nat ná xtaꞌan gab ta mbidiꞌizh naꞌ cuent ten xa na ngwaꞌyas trig.
Leꞌa toꞌo nes sa ulate bid ten trig wa nak cuent bexa na ndoꞌón diꞌizh ten Dios ná xteꞌe nibeꞌe Dios be men, parea lá nyakbeꞌena bexa‑yá. Cha nlen maxuꞌu, cha ngoꞌo maxuꞌu diꞌizh wa len ladoꞌo bexa.
Leꞌa yo geꞌ wa nak cuent bexa nten ladna ndoꞌón diꞌizh ten Dios.
Ná leꞌa bexa wa nak cuent dub ya trig lá ndap sian loꞌ na. Ndangea ladna bexa diꞌizh ten Dios dub ndeꞌep, ná leꞌa gor na juert ncho bexa geal ndangea ladna bexa diꞌizh wa, cha nlaꞌa xa‑yá.

Leꞌa yo ncho gix nsoꞌ gich wa nak cuent bexa na ndoꞌón diꞌizh ten Dios, ná leꞌa bexa nyuꞌ ladna be taꞌa ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee, no ngeꞌ ladna bexa be ta siantsa ndap xa. Leꞌa bexa wa nak cuent dub trig naꞌan xtaꞌan usaꞌa.
Parea leꞌa sa utaꞌa yo wa nak cuent bexa na ndoꞌón diꞌizh ten Dios no nyakbeꞌena bexa‑yá. Leꞌa bexa wa wen nak cuentta be trig nsaꞌa dub gayoꞌo bid no dub chon gaꞌal bid no dub galntiꞌi bid.
Leꞌa Jesús cha msaktabeꞌe stub taꞌa, ndab xa ndoꞌ be men:
—Leꞌa lak nibeꞌe Dios be men nak cuent ta ngwasea dub men ngos sbeꞌen bni wen ten trig ndoꞌ dub bleꞌa yo ten xa.
Parea ngol dub teꞌal gor ndeyats be men, cha ulen dub xa ndakloo ndoꞌ xa. Cha ngos xa be gix lá isuꞌu lat be bni ten trig wa, cha nseaꞌ xa.
Leꞌa zha ulen trig no ulenga be bid ndoꞌ‑yá, cha no gix wa ulen lat‑a.
Weꞌe leꞌa bexa ndun tiꞌin sa wa cha ngwaꞌyab‑a ndoꞌ xwan yo wa, ndab bexa: “Señor, ¿lid ngos ga sbeꞌen bni wen geꞌe ten ga baꞌ zha? ¿Ná nat pa utoꞌo be gix ncho lat‑a zha?”
Leꞌa xa cha ndab: “Dub xa ndakloo ndoꞌ naꞌ ngos‑a.” Leꞌa bexa wa cha unabdiꞌizh ndab: “¿Nlad go yaꞌbedib besa be gix baꞌ zha?”
Leꞌa xa cha ndab: “Lá yaꞌdib bega‑yá. Leꞌa tal bega kiꞌib be gix baꞌ, leꞌa be trig baꞌ no sgiꞌib.

Blaꞌa bego li junt gaꞌal‑a gast gal zha ibeleꞌe be bid ten trig. Zha weꞌe leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bexa gun tiꞌin wa uteleꞌe bexa ned lak be gix, cha uxi bexa gen‑a, cha utsoꞌol bexa‑yá. Weꞌe uteleꞌe bexa be bid ten trig wa, cha kochaꞌaw bexa‑yá ta lid naꞌ.”
Weꞌe msaktabeꞌe Jesús stub taꞌa, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa lak nibeꞌe Dios be men nak lak ta ngwasea dub bid ten mostas, ta ngos dub xabgiꞌi ndoꞌ dub bleꞌa yo ten xa.
Leꞌa ta wa dub bid ndon leꞌa tuzh ndoꞌ itea be bid, parea ngoꞌol‑a cuent dub ya siꞌil, mas siꞌil ndoꞌ itea be ta xgeꞌa ndas be men, gast be migin ndandeꞌe xuꞌun ten na ndoꞌ be xos‑a.
Cha msaktabeꞌe xa stub taꞌa, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa lak nibeꞌe Dios be men nak lak nyak levadur. Leꞌa dub xagots mgoch dub tuzh‑a top gaꞌal kil arin. Ngol tsoꞌo wa leꞌa idub koꞌob arin wa usabich.
Itea be ta ndee msaktabeꞌe Jesús be taꞌa ndoꞌ be men, leꞌa xa sbeꞌen li mbidiꞌizh ndoꞌ be men.
Li ngok‑a lak ndab dub xa uyoꞌo polta sakndoꞌ Dios, ndab xa:
Sbeꞌen usaktabeꞌe naꞌ be taꞌa,
gor na gudiꞌizh naꞌ ndoꞌ be men.
Gáp naꞌ be ta ugaꞌach nak,
be taꞌa ni dub men gol iniꞌí idub ncho gizhliyo.
Cha mlaꞌa Jesús be men wa, cha uyoꞌo xa len dub niꞌi. Leꞌa be xmen xa cha no ulen wats xa, ndab bexa:
—Bidiꞌizh ga ná xteꞌe nak ta msaktabeꞌe ga wa cuent ten gix ncho geꞌe wa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Leꞌa xa ndas bni wen wa, leꞌa ta wa Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Leꞌa geꞌe wa leꞌa ta wa ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee. Leꞌa bni wen wa leꞌa ta wa bexa nibeꞌe Dios. Leꞌa be gix wa, leꞌa ta wa bexa nibeꞌe maxuꞌu.
Leꞌa xa ugap wa xa ngos gix wa, leꞌa ta wa maxuꞌu. Leꞌa gor uteleꞌe bexa trig wa, leꞌa ta wa zha idub tiemp ndee. Leꞌa bexa uteleꞌe be ta wa, leꞌa bexa wa be angel ten Dios.
Leꞌa lak igiꞌib be gix no yolꞌ‑a, liga gak‑a gal zha idub tiemp ndee.
Leꞌa gal zha wa leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, utuꞌub be angel ten naꞌ uteleꞌe itea bexa ugap nak no bexa nkiꞌil be men gun ta ugap.
Leꞌa be angel wa cha utsaꞌab bexa ndoꞌ giꞌ, sa goꞌon bexa no gast ndeay bexa gaw bexa tant dub gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí bexa.
Weꞌe leꞌa bexa wen wa iluu cuent xeꞌa wizh sa nibeꞌe Dios Xus beuna. Bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, ¡blaꞌach bego ta ndáp naꞌ ndee!

’No lak nibeꞌe Dios nak cuentta dub ta uzhebpa nsak ngachyoꞌo ndoꞌ dub yo. Leꞌa gor mzheꞌal dub men‑a, cha mkachko xa‑yá leꞌaka sa wa. Cha nten ladna xa nseaꞌ xa, ngwaꞌudoꞌo xa iteanak ta ndap xa, cha usiꞌi xa yo wa.
’No leꞌa lak nibeꞌe Dios nak cuent ta ngwasea dub xa nsiꞌi utiꞌix be taꞌa, nkeseakwaꞌan xa be perla wen isiꞌi xa.
Leꞌa gor na mzheal xa dub ná ndon leꞌa nsak, cha ngwaꞌudoꞌo xa iteanak be ta ndap xa, cha usiꞌi xa perla wa.
’No leꞌa lak nibeꞌe Dios nak lak ndanno be men dub red ntsaꞌab bexa ndoꞌ nits, nsen‑a isandoꞌ mbeal.
Leꞌa gor nzhea‑yá cha ngoꞌo bexa‑yá toꞌo nits. Cha nsob bexa sa wa nti xa be mbeal wen wa ngochaꞌaw xa len zhum. Leꞌa bema lá isuꞌu wa ngote bexa dub lad.
No liga gak‑a gal zha idub tiemp ndee. Leꞌa be angel ten Dios ilen koꞌo bexa ugap lat bexa wen.
Cha utsaꞌab be angel bexa ugap wa ndoꞌ giꞌ. Cha goꞌon bexa no gast ndeay bexa gaw bexa, tant dub gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí bexa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ be xmen na ndab xa:
—¿Nyakbeꞌena bega iteanak ta ndáp naꞌ ndee zha?
Leꞌa bexa cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Besa nyakbeꞌekana‑yá, Señor.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Leꞌa bexa ntsid ley ten Dios leꞌa gor na nyakbeꞌena bexa lak nibeꞌe Dios be men, leꞌa bexa wa nak cuent dub xwan niꞌi ngote be ta nsak ten xa sa nchochaꞌaw‑a, be ta kub no be ta gox.
Leꞌa gor na mtayadiꞌizh Jesús be ta na li msaktabeꞌe xa be taꞌa wa, cha nseaꞌ xa.
Leꞌa zha ulayaꞌ xa gezh Nazaret sa ngoꞌol xa, cha usaxan nluu xa be men len niꞌi sa nzhealbe bexa judio. Leꞌa be men cha ngwanseana xteꞌe ndadiꞌizh xa, ndab bexa ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa xa:
—¿Pa mtsid xa baꞌ be ta ndák xa zha? ¿No xteꞌema ndun xa be uyon wa?
¿Naꞌanpa xa ndee xin carpinter wa zha? ¿Naꞌanpa Marí nak xnaꞌa xa zha? ¿No naꞌanpa wit xa Jacob no Kosé no Simón no Judas?
¿Naꞌanpa be bsan xa ncho lat beuna gezh ndee zha? ¿Xteꞌema ndák xa ta wa zha?
Weꞌe naꞌanpa isakyoꞌón bexa ta ndab Jesús, ná leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—Leꞌa be men ndap mod ndoꞌ dub xa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios. Parea leꞌa bexa lazh xa no bexa ncho ta lid xa naꞌanpa ndap mod ndoꞌ xa.
Ta weꞌe lá ngun Jesús sian uyon sa wa ke na lá ngungea ladna bexa ta ndadiꞌizh Jesús.
Leꞌa tiemp weꞌe leꞌa Herodes xa nibeꞌe sa wa mbiꞌín be ta ndun Jesús.
Cha ndab Herodes ndoꞌ bexa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ xa:
—Leꞌa Jesús wa leꞌa nak Juan xa ulaleaꞌ be men wa mbangal ndoꞌ gealgut. Ta weꞌe ndap xa juers ndun xa be uyon wa.
Leꞌa mas polta leꞌa Herodes unibeꞌe ndoꞌ be xmen na isen bexa Juan, cha uxi bexa Juan caden, no ukeꞌa bexa Juan litgiꞌib. Li mbin xa ke ten Herodías xagots ten Julip wit Herodes,
geal leꞌa Juan ndabla ndoꞌ Herodes:
—Naꞌanpa utsin nak‑a ukaꞌa lu Herodías.
Ta weꞌe leꞌa Herodes nlad gut Juan, parea leꞌa xa nzheb ndoꞌ be men leꞌa bexa itea ndab leꞌa Juan dub xa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios.

Leꞌa ngol dub wizh ngol leaꞌ Herodes, leꞌa xa ulo dub gast. Leꞌa sa wa utoꞌo xingots Herodías mbilndats xa ndoꞌ gaꞌal bexa nde ndoꞌ gast wa. Leꞌa Herodes cha uzhebpa ngol ladna xteꞌe mbilndats nagots wa,
cha ndab Herodes ndoꞌ xa:
—Nsobwiꞌi Dios usa naꞌ guniꞌi xtaꞌan inab lu.
Leꞌa nagots wa cha ndab ndoꞌ Herodes lak ndabla xnaꞌa na wa:
—Nat bsaꞌa ga gek Juan xa ulaleaꞌ be men, ixoꞌob‑a ndoꞌ dub plat.
Weꞌe leꞌa Herodes cha uban myoꞌo ladna. Parea ke na ndab xa leꞌa Dios nsobwiꞌi no ke na mbiꞌín be men nde ndoꞌ mes ta ndab xa wa, ta weꞌe unibeꞌe xa ndoꞌ be xmen xa usaꞌa bexa gek Juan,
ndab xa yaꞌlabtoꞌog bexa gen Juan len litgiꞌib.
Cha myoꞌo bexa gek Juan uxoꞌob‑a ndoꞌ dub plat, cha msaꞌa xa‑yá ndoꞌ nagots wa. Leꞌa xa wa cha ngwaꞌusaꞌa‑yá ndoꞌ xnaꞌa na.
Leꞌa be xmen Juan cha ulen, cha mbiꞌi bexa Juan mkaꞌach bexa xa. Cha ngwaꞌyab bexa‑yá ndoꞌ Jesús.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín Jesús ta wa, cha ukea xa ndoꞌ dub barco nchaꞌa xa dub sa naꞌan men. Ná leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín be men pa nchaꞌa Jesús, cha utoꞌo bexa be gezh nchaꞌa ndats bexa sa nchaꞌa Jesús.
Leꞌa sa wa leꞌa gor ulaꞌ Jesús ndoꞌ barco wa cha uniꞌí xa kwaꞌad be men wa, cha mlats ladna xa bexa. Cha myunyakna xa be men gizh nde lat bexa wa.
Leꞌa ngol gor uzhelapa leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha ubii wats Jesús, cha ndab bexa:
—Leꞌa sa ndee dub sa naꞌanpa ncho men, no nat yá uzhela. Gud go ndoꞌ bexa kwaꞌad baꞌ yaꞌisiꞌi bexa ta gaw bexa be gezh baꞌ.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Naꞌanpa juerska yaꞌbe bexa. Ndi bsaꞌa bego ta gaw bexa.
Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha ndab:
—Leꞌa besa ndap sgaꞌaytsa pan no stoptsa mbeal.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Utseano bega‑yá sa ndee.

Cha ndab xa ndoꞌ be men kwaꞌad wa kwe bexa ndoꞌ gixgi. Cha usen xa isagaꞌay pan wa no itop mbeal wa, cha mwiꞌi xa gibeꞌa msaꞌa xa xno ndoꞌ Dios. Cha uleꞌa xa be pan sian bleꞌa, cha msaꞌa xa‑yá ndoꞌ be xmen xa. Leꞌa bexa cha mtseꞌa‑yá ndoꞌ be men.
Leꞌa itea bexa wa udaw gast plo mzhea bexa. Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha mteleꞌe stibtop zhum byux be ta myaꞌan sobr wa.
Leꞌa lat bexa li udaw wa pa dub gaꞌay mil xabgiꞌi, parea naꞌanpa igaꞌab be xagots no be meꞌed.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Bkea bega leꞌaka ndoꞌ barco baꞌ, cha waꞌned bega ndoꞌ naꞌ stub toꞌo nits baꞌ.
Ndalen wa leꞌa Jesús ndab ndoꞌ be men kwaꞌad wa yaꞌbe bexa.
Leꞌa gor na yá nseaꞌbe be men wa, leꞌa Jesús nab ukea dub bet ngwaꞌyadiꞌizhno Dios. Leꞌa gor na nseala teꞌal leꞌa Jesús nab nsoꞌ sa wa.
Leꞌa gor weꞌe leꞌa barco sitla nchaꞌa tol‑la ndoꞌ nits. Leꞌa be golp ten nits uzhebpa nkeꞌa las barco, no leꞌa mbi uzhebpa nlen ndoꞌ nits lad ndoꞌ barco.
Ngol gor yamer gat xeꞌa, leꞌa Jesús nchasea ndats ndoꞌ nits, nchaꞌbii xa sa nchaꞌbe bexa wa.
Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha uniꞌí xa nsea xa ndoꞌ nits, cha mzheb bexa no ugeꞌ ndab bexa:
—¡Leꞌa ta baꞌ dub ta uxin!
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—¡Gop bega valor! ¡No lá izheb bega! Leꞌa ta ndee naꞌka.
Leꞌa Pedr cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Señor, tal leꞌa go Jesús, unibeꞌe ga gal naꞌ wats ga ndoꞌ nits baꞌ.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa:
—¡Utsea!
Leꞌa Pedr cha ulaꞌ ndoꞌ barco nchasea ndats ndoꞌ nits, nchaꞌa xa wats Jesús.
Parea ngol gor uniꞌí Pedr lita nsoꞌ mbi siꞌil wa, cha mzheb xa. Cha usaxan nchaꞌlayoꞌo xa len nits. Cha utezhat xa ndab xa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¡Señor, utsealoꞌo ga naꞌ!
Cha bi leꞌa gor wa leꞌa Jesús cha mkea yaꞌa na, cha usen xa yaꞌa Pedr. Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ xa:
—¡Ndidotsa ngeꞌ ladna lu naꞌ! ¿Xtaꞌan lá ndangea ladna lu naꞌ zha?
Leꞌa gor na ukea Jesús no Pedr ndoꞌ barco wa, leꞌa mbi wa cha uleas.
Weꞌe leꞌa bexa nde ndoꞌ barco cha ngwankea Jesús, ndab bexa:
—Ta ugeaka leꞌa go nak Xin Dios.
Leꞌa bexa cha utakea ndoꞌ nits wa, ulayaꞌ bexa sa nsaleaꞌ Genesaret.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí be men leꞌa Jesús nkesea sa wa, cha mtuꞌub bexa men ngwaꞌyab‑a ndoꞌ bexa ncho idub gangeak sa wa. Weꞌe cha ulenno be men itea bexa gizh wats Jesús.
Cha unab bexa ulaꞌa xa masa ndats xab xa ugal bexa gizh wa. Leꞌa itea bexa na li ngal xab Jesús wa cha myaknabe.
Tsoꞌo wa leꞌa pla be mech ten ley nsea bexa fariseo utoꞌo gezh Jerusalén nchaꞌbe wats Jesús. Cha ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Xtaꞌan ni lá ndankea be xmen lu be costumbr mchaꞌan be usan gox polta? Lbaꞌatsa naꞌa bexa gor ndaw bexa parea naꞌanpa naꞌa bexa lak nibeꞌe costumbr wa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan lá ndun bega lak nibeꞌe ley ten Dios, ndi ndankeatsa bega be costumbr ten leꞌaka bega?
Leꞌa Dios unibeꞌe ndab: “Wankea bega xus bega nsea xnaꞌa bega.” No ndab xa: “Leꞌa tal ton kweaꞌ iníꞌi ndoꞌ xus na natal ndoꞌ xnaꞌa na, leꞌa xa wa nsabndoꞌ gat.”
Ná leꞌa bego ndi ndab leꞌa tal ton gab ndoꞌ xus na natal ndoꞌ xnaꞌa na “leꞌa itea ta ndiꞌizh gakno naꞌ bega wa, leꞌa ta wa ndi usa naꞌ ndoꞌ Dios”,
weꞌe leꞌa xa wa yá naꞌantapa juerska gakno xus na no xnaꞌa na. Li nlaꞌa bega ta unibeꞌe Dios, ndankea bega ndi sbeꞌen costumbr ten bega.
Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega ugap nak. Ugeaka ndab Isaías sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta, ndab xa lak nak bego:
Leꞌa be men ndee diꞌizhtsa ndankea naꞌ,
parea leꞌa ladoꞌo xa sit nak ndoꞌ naꞌ.
Naꞌan xtiꞌin ta ndankea bexa naꞌ,
leꞌa cuent diꞌizh ten naꞌ nluu bexa,
parea diꞌizh ten be mentsa‑yá.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha utezh be men kwaꞌad wa, ndab xa:
—Blaꞌach bego ta gáp naꞌ ndee. No byakbeꞌena bega‑yá.
Leꞌa be ta ndaw be men naꞌanpa leꞌa ndun bzhiꞌik ladoꞌo be men. Ndi ta ugap ndadiꞌizh be men leꞌa ndun bzhiꞌik bexa.
Cha ulen be xmen Jesús wats xa, ndab bexa:
—¿Uniꞌí go leꞌa bexa fariseo ngokloo gor na mbiꞌín bexa ta li ndab go wa?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa bexa nak cuent dub ya naꞌanpa ngas Xus naꞌ xa nsob gibeꞌa, leꞌa gal dub wizh leꞌa xa kib‑a.
Blaꞌa bega bexa, leꞌa bexa cuent dub xa lá naꞌ nchaꞌano stub xa lá naꞌ. Leꞌa tal li goꞌo dub xa lá naꞌ stubga xa lá naꞌ, leꞌa bexa itop slaꞌyoꞌo len dub geꞌed.
Leꞌa Pedr cha ndab:
—Bluu ga xteꞌe nak ta msaktabeꞌe ga wa ndoꞌ besa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Noga bego ni lá nyakbeꞌena ta ndáp naꞌ zha?
¿Lá nyakbeꞌena bega zha leꞌa ta ndaw dub men nchaꞌa len xa, cha nchaꞌaga‑yá len letrina?
Ná leꞌa ta ugap ndadiꞌizh be men wa ladoꞌoka xa ntoꞌo. Cha ndun bzhiꞌik‑a xa ndoꞌ Dios.

Leꞌa len ladoꞌo be men ntoꞌo be ta ugap ndanbeꞌe bexa. Ta weꞌe ncho xa ndut men. No ngal xa xa ten stubga men. No ndun xa ta ugap ltsaꞌa ta li nak wa. No ndun xa gealwaꞌan no gealkwiꞌin. No nisi xa be ltsaꞌa xa.
Leꞌa itea be ta ugap ndee ndun bzhiꞌik bexa cuent ten Dios. Parea ta na lá unaꞌa dub xa lak nibeꞌe bexa wa cha gaw xa, leꞌa ta wa naꞌanpa gun bzhiꞌik xa cuent ten Dios.
Cha utoꞌo Jesús nchaꞌa xa dub sa gax gezh Tiro no gezh Sidón.
Weꞌe leꞌa dub xagots ncho sa wa dub xa Canaán ulen wats Jesús, ugeꞌ ndab xa:
—¡Señor, xin David! ¡Blats ladna go naꞌ! Leꞌa xiꞌín gots naꞌ ncho mbi bxin len ladoꞌo na uzhebpa kweaꞌ nsak xa.
Ná leꞌa Jesús ni lá ikaꞌab ndoꞌ xa. Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha ulen wats xa, cha ndab bexa:
—Gud go ndoꞌ xa baꞌ yaꞌ xa, leꞌa xa uzhebpa ndun ruid nsenkea xa tsoꞌo beuna.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Leꞌa Dios mtuꞌub naꞌ gakno naꞌ bexa Israeltsa, bexa nak cuent be borreg ulaꞌ.
Parea leꞌa xagots wa ubii, cha usaxib xa ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab xa:
—¡Señor, gokno ga naꞌ!
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Naꞌanpa utsin nak ulat besa pan ndoꞌ be meꞌed, cha usaꞌab besa‑yá ndoꞌ be mbek.
Leꞌa xagots wa cha ndab:
—Ta ugeaka ta wa, Señor, parea leꞌa be mbek ndaw be taꞌa nlate xan mes ten xwan ma.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Xagots, uzheꞌeb ngeꞌ ladna lu naꞌ. Nat gak ta nlad lu.
Bi leꞌa gor wa leꞌa xingots xa wa cha myakna.
Leꞌa Jesús cha utoꞌo sa wa nchaꞌagal xa toꞌo lagun Galilea. Cha ukea xa dub bet, cha usob xa.

Weꞌe leꞌa kwaꞌadpa men ulen wats xa, nseano bexa bexa lá yoo gan isea, no bexa lá naꞌ, no bexa lá yoo gan gudiꞌizh, no bexa moch, nsea kwaꞌadta bexa gizh. Cha mte bexa bexa gizh wa ndoꞌ Jesús, cha myunyakna Jesús bexa.

Leꞌa be men wa ngwanseanabe gor uniꞌí bexa leꞌa bexa lá yoo gan gudiꞌizh wa ndadiꞌizhla, no bexa moch wa myaklana, no bexa lá yoo gan isea wa utsinla nsea, no bexa lá naꞌ wa nwiꞌila. No ndab be men leꞌa Dios ten bexa Israel uzheꞌeb dub Dios juert.
Cha utezh Jesús be xmen na, cha ndab xa:

—Leꞌa naꞌ nlats ladna be men kwaꞌad ndee, leꞌa bexa wizh nyonla nde wats naꞌ, parea lá ndapta bexa ta gaw na. Leꞌa naꞌ lá nlad utuꞌub naꞌ bexa lbaꞌatsa lá gaw bexa, nchaꞌa bexa lá uxik ilanseaꞌ ta lid na.
Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa:
—¿Pa izheal beuna pan gaw dub lbaꞌata men kwaꞌad baꞌ? Leꞌa sa ndee sit nde be gezh.
Leꞌa Jesús cha unabdiꞌizh ndab:
—¿Plo pan ndap bega zha?
Leꞌa bexa cha ndab:
—Sgaꞌad pan nsea stapla mbeal byux.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be men kwaꞌad wa kwe bexa ndoꞌ yo.
Cha usen xa isagaꞌad pan nsea be mbeal wa, cha msaꞌa xa xno ndoꞌ Dios, no uleꞌa xa be ta wa sian bleꞌa. Weꞌe msaꞌa xa‑yá ndoꞌ be xmen xa, utseꞌa bexa‑yá ndoꞌ be men wa.
Leꞌa be men wa itea udaw gast plo mzhea bexa. Cha mteleꞌe be xmen Jesús sgaꞌad zhum byux be ta myaꞌan sobr.
Leꞌa lat bexa udaw wa ncho pa dap mil xabgiꞌitsa, parea naꞌanpa igaꞌab be xagots no be meꞌed.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be men yaꞌbe bexa. Cha ukea xa ndoꞌ barco wa nchaꞌa xa dub sa gax gezh nsaleaꞌ Magdala.
Leꞌa pla bexa fariseo no bexa saduceo ulen wats Jesús, nlad bexa gun bexa preb Jesús, ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Leꞌa besa nlad gun ga dub ta uluu leꞌa ga Dioska mtuꞌub.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa ncho uzhe leꞌa gibeꞌa baꞌ nane naꞌ, cha ndab bego leꞌa geꞌa naꞌanpa ilaꞌ gi.

No ncho tempran leꞌa gibeꞌa baꞌ nane naꞌ no nde xkaw, cha ndab bega nat ilaꞌ gi. ¡Bego nluu cuentta xa wen ná bega ugap nak! Nyakbeꞌena bega xteꞌe nak be ta naꞌ bega gibeꞌa baꞌ, ná ni lá nyakbeꞌena bega ta ndun Dios tiemp nat.

Leꞌa be men ncho nat uzhebpa be men ugap no nkwaꞌan bexa be ta naꞌanpa ta ugeapa nak Dios. Ndab bega gun naꞌ dub ta uluu na ton nak naꞌ, parea leꞌa naꞌ lá gun ta ndab bega. Ndi iniꞌítsa bega leꞌa naꞌ itiꞌid ltsaꞌa ta utid Jonás, xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta.
Cha mlaꞌa Jesús bexa, cha nchaꞌa xa.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús nsea be xmen xa utakea stub toꞌo nits, parea myalad bexa ngoꞌo bexa pan gaw bexa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—Blaꞌach bego, uzhebpa gop bega cuent nsea levadur ten bexa fariseo no levadur ten bexa saduceo.
Leꞌa bexa cha ndabbe ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa na:
—Li ndab xa baꞌ geal leꞌa beuna lá ngoꞌo pan.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mgenna ta li ndanbeꞌe bexa wa, cha ndab xa:
—¿Xtaꞌan lbaꞌa nyuꞌ ladna bega leꞌa bega lá noꞌo pan zha? ¡Ndidotsa ngeꞌ ladna bega naꞌ!
¿Bi lá nyakbeꞌena bega be ta uniꞌí bega uyoꞌo wa zha? ¿Ni lá ntseꞌa ladna bega xteꞌe msa naꞌ gaꞌay pan udaw gaꞌay mil xabgiꞌi wa, no plo zhum ta myaꞌan sobr mteleꞌe bega zha weꞌe zha?
¿No ni lá ntseꞌa ladna bega xteꞌe msa naꞌ dub gaꞌad pan udaw dub dap mil xabgiꞌi zha, no plo zhum ta myaꞌan sobr mteleꞌe bega zha?
¿Xtaꞌan lá nyakbeꞌena bega leꞌa naꞌ naꞌanpa ndadiꞌizh cuent ten pan gor ndáp naꞌ gop bega cuent nsea levadur ten bexa fariseo no levadur ten bexa saduceo zha?
Leꞌa bexa wa cha myakbeꞌena leꞌa Jesús naꞌanpa ngab gap bexa cuent nsea levadur ten pan. Leꞌa xa ndi ndab gap bexa cuent nsea ta nluu bexa fariseo nsea bexa saduceo.
Leꞌa gor na ulayaꞌ bexa gax dub gezh nsaleaꞌ Cesarea Filipo, leꞌa Jesús cha unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ be xmen na, ndab xa:
—¿Xteꞌe ndab be men ton nak Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo zha?
Leꞌa bexa cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa ncho be men ndab leꞌa go nak Juan xa ulaleaꞌ be men. No ncho bexa ndab leꞌa go nak Elí. No nchoga bexa ndab leꞌa go Jeremías, natal stubga xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Leꞌa bego zha xteꞌe gab ton nak naꞌ?
Leꞌa Simón Pedr cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa go nak Cristo Xin Dios nban.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa wa:
—Simón xin Jonás, uzhebpa wen yoo ladna lu, leꞌa ta ndab lu naꞌanpa men mluu ndoꞌ lu, ndi Xus naꞌ xa ncho gibeꞌa mluu‑yá ndoꞌ lu.
Leꞌa lu nsaleaꞌ Pedr. Leꞌa ndoꞌ geꞌdaꞌa ndee kwe dub xkwaꞌa men gungea ladna naꞌ. Leꞌa juers ten gealgut naꞌanpa gun gan ndoꞌ bexa wa.

Leꞌa naꞌ leꞌa usoꞌ lu gak lu xa yansu bexa leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe. Leꞌa itea be ta inibeꞌe lu ta lá gun bexa, leꞌa ta wa nokaga Dios lá ulaꞌa. No liga itea be ta inibeꞌe lu gun bexa, leꞌa ta wa ta na nokaga Dios inibeꞌe li gak.
Leꞌa Jesús cha unibeꞌe ndoꞌ be xmen na naꞌanpa gab bexa ndoꞌ ni dub men leꞌa Jesús nak Cristo xa mtuꞌub Dios.
Leꞌa zha weꞌe usaxan Jesús ndadiꞌizh ndoꞌ be xmen na leꞌa xa juerska yaꞌ Jerusalén, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa Jerusalén wa leꞌa bexa gox nsak nsea be uleꞌay nibeꞌe nsea be mech ten ley ugap gunno naꞌ. No gut bexa naꞌ, parea leꞌa wizh yon leꞌa naꞌ iban ndoꞌ gealgut.
Weꞌe leꞌa Pedr cha mbiꞌi Jesús dub lad, cha uteyo Pedr xa, ndab Pedr:
—¡Naꞌanpa li gak‑a, Señor! ¡Leꞌa Dios lá ulaꞌa li yasea ga!
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha myach mwiꞌi ndoꞌ Pedr, ndab xa:
—Utatsoꞌ wats naꞌ, leꞌa lu ndadiꞌizh cuent maxuꞌu, lá nlad lu gun naꞌ ta nlad Dios. Leꞌa lu lá ndanbeꞌe lak ndanbeꞌe Dios, leꞌa lu ndi ndanbeꞌe lak ndanbeꞌe be mentsa.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Tal ton nlad isankea tsoꞌo naꞌ, nsabndoꞌ ulaꞌa xa iteanak ta nlad xa, cha goꞌo xa cruz ten xa, cha isankea xa tsoꞌo naꞌ.
Leꞌa tal ton ukwaꞌan xteꞌe wen yoo xa, leꞌa xa wa ndi gun perdid gealnaban ten na ndoꞌ Dios. Ná leꞌa tal ton gat geal ndangea ladna xa naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa gap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios.
Tal leꞌa dub men ndap iteanak be ta ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee, cha gak perdid gealnaban ten xa ndoꞌ Dios, ¿xtiꞌin iteanak be ta ndap xa wa zha? Leꞌa be ta wa naꞌanpa ugal isiꞌi xa gealnaban ten xa.
Leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ilenno xeꞌa siꞌil ten Dios Xus naꞌ no be angel. Cha kixga naꞌ ikaꞌa kad dub men be ta mbin xa.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa ncho bega nde ndee naꞌanpa gat gast iniꞌí bega leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ilen inibeꞌegal.
Ngol sxoꞌop wizh leꞌa Jesús mbiꞌi Pedr no Jacob no Juan wit Jacob, ukea bexa dub bet gaꞌap sa naꞌan men.
Leꞌa sa wa leꞌa Jesús mtixndoꞌ ndoꞌ gaꞌal bexa wa, leꞌa ndoꞌ Jesús myak cuent xeꞌa wizh no xab xa ndon mbe mnaꞌ cuent xeꞌa.
Zha leꞌa sa wa mlundoꞌ Moisés no Elí ndeyadiꞌizhno Jesús.
Weꞌe leꞌa Pedr cha ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Señor, uzhebpa wen nde beuna sa ndee. Tal go nlad gundeꞌe besa chon ramad: dub‑a ná ten go, leꞌa stub‑a ná ten Moisés, nsea stub‑a ná ten Elí.
Ndalen li nsoꞌyadiꞌizh Pedr, cha ulen dub xkaw msu xeꞌa idub sa ndebe bexa. Leꞌa lat xkaw wa mgen ti Dios ndab:
—Leꞌa ta ndee Xiꞌín naꞌ. Leꞌa naꞌ nkweaꞌ ladna xa no ntenno lad naꞌ xa. Bsakyoꞌón bega ta ndab xa.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín be xmen Jesús ta wa, cha msaxib bexa gast ndoꞌ yo ngol xtuzh bexa, no uzhebpa mzheb bexa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ubii gax wats bexa, cha mgal Jesús gek bexa, cha ndab xa:
—Gosoꞌ bega, lá izhebta bega.
Leꞌa gor na mwiꞌi bexa yá naꞌanla ton ndebe sa wa. Leꞌa Jesús nabla nsoꞌ.
Leꞌa gor na nchaꞌlayoꞌo bexa bet wa, leꞌa Jesús ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—Naꞌan ton ndoꞌ ná gudiꞌizh bega ta li uniꞌí bega wa, gast gor ibangal naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ Jesús ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan ndab be mech ten ley leꞌa Elí ned ilen, weꞌeta ilen Cristo xa utuꞌub Dios zha?
