Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Ta ugeaka leꞌa Elí nedka ilen ndontsa list kwe be men.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego, leꞌa Elí wa mbiꞌidla. Ná leꞌa be men lá igondoꞌ xa, ndi ugap mbinno bexa xa lakta nlad bexa. No liga gunno bexa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Weꞌe leꞌa be xmen Jesús myakbeꞌena leꞌa Jesús mbidiꞌizh cuent ten Juan xa ulaleaꞌ be men.
Leꞌa gor na mlaꞌnchaꞌ bexa sa nde be men kwaꞌad, leꞌa dub xabgiꞌi cha ulen wats Jesús, cha msaxib xa ndoꞌ Jesús ndab xa:
—Señor, blats ladna go xiꞌín naꞌ, leꞌa meꞌed uzhebpa kweaꞌ nsak gizhkaw. Sian biaj nlayat meꞌed ndoꞌ giꞌ no ndoꞌ nits.
Leꞌa naꞌ ngwaꞌnola meꞌed ndoꞌ be xmen ga, ná leꞌa bexa lá ngun gan yakna meꞌed.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ be men:
—Uzheꞌeb ngud nak bega no ndidotsa ngeꞌ ladna bega Dios. ¿Ploxá tiemp yoꞌo naꞌ lat bega zhaga? ¿Sta ploxá tiemp uxik naꞌ ndoꞌ bega zhaga? Utseano bega meꞌed baꞌ sa ndee.
Leꞌa Jesús cha uteyo mbi bxin ncho ladoꞌo meꞌed bgiꞌi wa. Leꞌa mbi bxin wa cha utoꞌo, cha bi leꞌa gor wa myakna meꞌed wa.
Tsoꞌo wa leꞌa be xmen Jesús ulen wats Jesús, unabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab bexa:
—¿Xtaꞌan lá ngun besa gan igontuꞌub besa mbi bxin wa zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:

—Leꞌa bega ndidotsa ngeꞌ ladna Dios. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega tal leꞌa bega ngeꞌ ladna Dios lak tuzh dub bid ten ya mostas, leꞌa bega sunka gan gab ndoꞌ bet ndee: “Bxoꞌon sa ndee, waꞌ sa baꞌ”; leꞌa bet cha uxoꞌon. Tal leꞌa bega li igeꞌ ladna Dios, leꞌa bega itea taꞌa sunka gan.
Parea leꞌa be ltsaꞌa mbi bxin ndee lá yoo gan itoꞌo xagaꞌ. Nkiꞌin lá gaw bega dub tiemp no mas gudiꞌizhno bega Dios ndontsa slaꞌa be mbi bxin wa be men.
Leꞌa dub wizh zha ndencho bexa wa Galilea, leꞌa Jesús ndabgal ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, yak cuent ndoꞌ yaꞌa be men.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha gut naꞌ, parea leꞌa wizh yon leꞌa naꞌ ibangal.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha uzhebpa uban myoꞌo ladna.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha nchaꞌagal gezh Capernaum. Weꞌe leꞌa bexa na nkaꞌa med ten niꞌi ten Dios ulen ndoꞌ Pedr, ndab bexa:
—¿Nkix mech ten bega med ndantiꞌin bexa niꞌi ten Dios zha?
Leꞌa Pedr cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa xa nkixka‑yá.
Ngol gor uyoꞌo Pedr len niꞌi, leꞌa Jesús ned uníꞌi ndoꞌ Pedr, ndab xa:
—¿Xteꞌe nsak lu, Simón? Leꞌa bexa ndon leꞌa nibeꞌe ndoꞌ gizhliyo, ¿ton ndoꞌ ná ndun bexa cobr be med zha? ¿Ndoꞌ bexa lazh xa nate ndoꞌ bexa ntoꞌo sit?
Leꞌa Pedr cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Ndoꞌ bexa ntoꞌo sit ndun bexa cobr.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Ta ugeaka leꞌa bexa lazh xa nibeꞌe wa naꞌanpa juerska kix ta wa.
Parea ndontsa lá gakloo bexa, waꞌ toꞌo lagun, cha btsaꞌab gibganch ndoꞌ nits wa. Leꞌa mbeal ned isen‑a, leꞌa toꞌo ma wa izheal lu dub med. Cha biꞌi‑yá waꞌtix ta ten itop beuna.
Tsoꞌo wa leꞌa be xmen Jesús ulen ndoꞌ Jesús ndab bexa:
—¿Ton mas nsak lat bexa nibeꞌe Dios?
Leꞌa Jesús cha utezh dub meꞌed, cha msoꞌ Jesús meꞌed tlaw bexa.
Cha ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa tal bega lá yak lak nak be meꞌed, leꞌa bega lá yoo gan yate lat bexa leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe.
Ta weꞌe leꞌa tal ton yak tuzh ndoꞌ Dios lak nak dub meꞌed ndee, leꞌa xa wa mas nsak lat bexa leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe.
Leꞌa tal ton dub xmen naꞌ utsin gak xa ndoꞌ dub meꞌed nak cuent meꞌed ndee, leꞌa xa wa cuentkata ndoꞌ naꞌ utsin nak.
’Leꞌa tal ton utsabgix dub xa ndangea ladna naꞌ ndoꞌ ta ugap, leꞌa xa wa mas dub gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí ndoꞌ dub xa nkea dub geꞌ siꞌil gen na, cha utsaꞌab be men xa sa mas wat len nitsdoꞌo.
Proꞌob be men nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo isabgix ndoꞌ ta ugap. Idub tiemp ncho ta ntsabgix be men ndoꞌ ta ugap, parea uzhebpa proꞌob bexa leꞌa utsabgix stubga men.

’Ta weꞌe tal leꞌa dub yaꞌa bega natal dub xoꞌo bega utsabgix bega, ulobtoꞌog bega‑yá cha udabi bega‑yá. Mas wen yoo bega wats Dios moch bega, ndoꞌ ndap bega itop yaꞌa bega nsea itop xoꞌo bega yaꞌ bega ndoꞌ giꞌ nunk lá yuꞌu.
No tal leꞌa dub ngusndoꞌ bega utsabgix bega, uloꞌo bega‑yá cha udabi bega‑yá. Mas wen yoo bega wats Dios dubtsa ngusndoꞌ bega, ndoꞌ itop ngusndoꞌ bega yaꞌ bega ndoꞌ giꞌ infierno.
’Blaꞌach bega lá uxelad bega ni dub men ndangea ladna naꞌ lak dub meꞌed. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa be angel ndesoꞌ ulaꞌach bexa wa idub tiemp nde wats Xus naꞌ, xa nsob gibeꞌa.
Leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ndalteꞌezh naꞌ bexa ulaꞌ, bexa sit nak wats Dios, ndontsa gap bexa gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios.
’¿Xá nsak bega zha? Tal leꞌa dub xabgiꞌi ndap dub gayoꞌo borreg, cha ilaꞌ dub ma, ¿lid ulaꞌa xa isadap gaꞌal ncho tiꞌin bdap ma, cha ndi yaꞌ xa be geꞌe yaꞌkwaꞌan xa ma li ulaꞌ wa?
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega, leꞌa gor mzheal xa ma, leꞌa xa mas itenno ladna ma ulaꞌ wa ndoꞌ isadap gaꞌal ncho tiꞌin bdap bema naꞌanpa ilaꞌ.
No liga leꞌa Dios Xus beuna xa nsob gibeꞌa lá nlad isabgix ni dub bexa ndangea ladna naꞌ.
’Tal dub ltsaꞌa ga ugap gunno ga, cha waꞌyadiꞌizhno ga nab xa. Tal xa nsakyoꞌón ta ndab ga wa, leꞌa ga mbinka gan mchealtsaꞌa xa wa.
Ná tal leꞌa xa lá isakyoꞌón ta ndab ga, biꞌi ga stub xa natal stop xa ndontsa no bexa gab ndoꞌ xa ná xtaꞌan ta ugap mbin xa.
Tal leꞌa xa wa lá isakyoꞌón ta ndab bexa wa, cha gab ga‑yá sa nzhealbe bexa nak xmen naꞌ. No binno bega xa cuent dub xa lá nchandoꞌ Dios natal cuent dub xa ugap nsen med nkix be men ndoꞌ Roma.

’Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa ta na lá nlaꞌa bega gun be men ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee, leꞌa ta wa no Dios lá ulaꞌa gun bexa wa. No liga ta na nsaꞌa bega diꞌizh gun be men ndoꞌ gizhliyo, leꞌa ta wa no Dios usaꞌa diꞌizh gun bexa.
’No gáp naꞌ stub biaj, tal leꞌa top bega dubtsa gudiꞌizh inab dub taꞌa ndoꞌ Xus naꞌ xa nsob gibeꞌa, leꞌa xa saꞌaka ta inab bega wa.
Leꞌa sa nde top xa natal chon xa nak xmen naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ no nsoꞌ tlaw bexa sa wa.
Leꞌa Pedr cha ulen wats Jesús cha unabdiꞌizh Pedr, ndab xa:
—Señor, ¿plo biaj nsabndoꞌ gungeꞌ lad naꞌ ndoꞌ dub ltsaꞌa naꞌ tal xa ugap gunno naꞌ zha? ¿Nati gaꞌad biaj?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Naꞌanpa gáp naꞌ gaꞌadtsa biaj gungeꞌ ladna lu ndoꞌ xa, leꞌa naꞌ ndi gáp gast chon gaꞌal ncho tiꞌi gaꞌad biaj gungeꞌ ladna lu ndoꞌ xa.
’Leꞌa lak nibeꞌe Dios be men nak lak ndun dub rey nibeꞌe, gor na nlad xa iniꞌí xa ná plo med nsaꞌab be xmen xa ndoꞌ xa.
Leꞌa gor na tiꞌi usaxan rey ndun ta wa, cha nseano bexa dub xmen rey uzhebpa sian mil med nsaꞌab ndoꞌ rey.
Leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa ndap xtaꞌan kix xa, ta weꞌe leꞌa rey wa unibeꞌe ndoꞌ be xmen na udoꞌo bexa xa nsaꞌab med wa no xagots ten xa no be xin xa no iteanak be ta ndap xa wa, ndontsa kix xa med wa.
Weꞌe leꞌa xa wa cha msaxib ndoꞌ rey, ndab xa: “Señor, kweas go dub ndeꞌep leꞌa naꞌ skixka itea med wa.”
Leꞌa rey cha mlats ladna xa wa, mbingeꞌ ladna rey ta li nsaꞌab xa wa, cha mxaꞌak rey xa.
Parea leꞌa gor utoꞌo xmen rey sa wa, mzheꞌal xa stubga xmen rey nsaꞌab dub tuzh med ndoꞌ xa. Cha usen xa gen xa wa nkeutsebe xa‑yá, cha ndab xa: “¡Utix ta nsaꞌab lu ndoꞌ naꞌ!”
Leꞌa xa nsaꞌabga wa cha usaxib, ndab xa: “Kweas ga dub ndeꞌep leꞌa naꞌ skixka itea‑yá.”
Ná leꞌa xa wa lá ngungeꞌ ladna, cha ndi ngwaꞌukeꞌa xa xa nsaꞌab med wa litgiꞌib gast kix xa ta nsaꞌab xa wa.
Leꞌa gor na uniꞌí stapla be xmen rey ta li mbin xa wa, cha uzheꞌeb uban myoꞌo ladna bexa. Cha nseaꞌbeyab bexa ndoꞌ rey ta li ngok wa.
Leꞌa rey cha utezh xa na li mbin wa, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ xa: “¡Uzhebpa ugap nak lu! Leꞌa naꞌ mbingeꞌ ladna iteanak be ta nsaꞌab lu ndoꞌ naꞌ naꞌanpa ikix lu‑yá, geal leꞌa lu li unab ndoꞌ naꞌ.
¿Lid no lu nsabndoꞌ ilats ladna ltsaꞌa lu wa zha, lak mlats lad naꞌ lu?”
Leꞌa rey cha ngokloo cha unibeꞌe xa ndoꞌ be soldad ten xa utsaksi bexa xa wa gast kix xa itea be med nsaꞌab xa.
No ndab Jesús:
—Leꞌa Xus naꞌ xa nsob gibeꞌa noga li gunno bego tal leꞌa bega lá gungeꞌ ladna ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa bega idub ncho ladna bega be ta ugap ndanno bexa bega.
Leꞌa gor mtayadiꞌizh Jesús ta wa, cha mkaꞌan xa Galilea nchaꞌa xa Judea stub toꞌo yowbeꞌe Jordán.
Leꞌa sa wa leꞌa kwaꞌadpa men usankea tsoꞌo xa, cha myunyakna Jesús bexa gizh sa wa.
Weꞌe leꞌa pla bexa fariseo ulen wats Jesús, nlad bexa gab Jesús dub ta lid leꞌa nak, ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Utsin nak ulaꞌa dub xabgiꞌi xagots ten na, tal xa lá nsak ladna xtaꞌanla dub ta ndun xa zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—¿Lá ndoꞌol bega zha sa nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios, leꞌa Dios leꞌa mbindeꞌe xabgiꞌi no xagots zha ned wa?
Cha ndab Dios: “Ta weꞌe ulaꞌa xabgiꞌi xus na no xnaꞌa na zha na ikaꞌa xa xagots ten xa. Leꞌa cuent ten Dios leꞌa itop xa wa yak dubtsa men.”
Leꞌa bexa wa dubtsa men myak, yá lid topta xa. Ta weꞌe gáp naꞌ leꞌa bexa mchealte Dios, lá nsabndoꞌ dub men uteltsaꞌa bexa.
Leꞌa bexa fariseo wa cha unabdiꞌizhgal ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan ndab ley mkeꞌa Moisés zha leꞌa dub xabgiꞌi syoꞌo gan ulaꞌa xagots ten na, tal ned usaꞌa xa dub git ndoꞌ xagots, gab‑a leꞌa xa ulaꞌa xa wa?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Geal ngud nak ladoꞌo bega, ta weꞌe mkeꞌa Moisés syoꞌo gan li ulaꞌa bega xagots ten bega. Ná leꞌa zha ned naꞌanpa li ngak‑a.

Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa tal ton dub xabgiꞌi ulaꞌa xagots ten na, cha ikaꞌa xa stubga xagots, leꞌa xabgiꞌi wa ndapka ke ndoꞌ Dios. No liga tal stub xabgiꞌi ikaꞌaga xagots wa, leꞌa xa wa no ndap ke ndoꞌ Dios. Ná leꞌa tal ton dub xagots ndap xabgiꞌi ugal stubga xabgiꞌi, leꞌa xabgiꞌi ten xa wa sak ulaꞌa xa.
Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Tal li nsabndoꞌ lá ulaꞌa xabgiꞌi xagots ten na, mas wen naꞌanpa ukwaꞌan xa xagots.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Naꞌanpa itea xabgiꞌi uxik lá ukwaꞌan xagots, ndi ncho bexa li msaꞌa Dios nak bexa.

No ncho be xabgiꞌi lá ukwaꞌan xagots geal leꞌa zha ndalkata xa lá yoo gan gap xa xin xa leꞌa xa lá utsin nak. No ncho be xabgiꞌi leꞌaka be men li ndazhaꞌa xa. No ncho be xabgiꞌi lá ukwaꞌan xagots ndontsa mas gun xa tiꞌin ten Dios. Leꞌa tal ton bexa na syoꞌo gan li gun, leꞌa bexa nsabndoꞌka li gun ta wa.
Weꞌe leꞌa be men ulenno be meꞌed ten na wats Jesús, ndontsa uxoꞌob Jesús yaꞌa na gek be meꞌed, inab xa ulaꞌach Dios be meꞌed. Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha uteyo bexa nseano be meꞌed wa.
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Blaꞌa bego giꞌid be meꞌed baꞌ wats naꞌ. Lá uka bega giꞌid be meꞌed, leꞌa sa nibeꞌe Dios wa yate bexa yak lak nak be meꞌed ndee.
Cha mxoꞌob xa yaꞌa xa gek be meꞌed wa, weꞌe cha nseaꞌ xa.
Leꞌa dub xabgiꞌi cha ulen wats Jesús unabdiꞌizh xa ndoꞌ xa ndab xa:
—Mech wen, ¿xtaꞌan dub ta wen gun naꞌ ndontsa no naꞌ gap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios, ta nunk lá idub zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan ngi wen ndab lu ndoꞌ naꞌ zha? Naꞌan ton wen ndoꞌ gizhliyo, ndon nabtsa Dios wen nak. Parea tal leꞌa lu nlad gap gealnaban ta nunk lá idub, bxobgek ndoꞌ be ta nibeꞌe Dios.
Leꞌa xabgiꞌi wa cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌanma be ta unibeꞌe Dios gun naꞌ zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Lá gut lu men. Lá ugal lu xa ten stubga men. Lá gun lu gealwaꞌan. Lá gun lu gealkwiꞌin.
Wankea xus lu nsea xnaꞌa lu. Bkweaꞌ ladna lu be ltsaꞌa lu lakkata lu.
Leꞌa xabgiꞌi wa cha ndab:
—Iteanak ta ndab go wa ndunka naꞌ idub zha tuzhta naꞌ. ¿Xtaꞌan ndun jwalt gun naꞌ?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Tal lu nlad gak lak nlad Dios, byaꞌ cha bdoꞌo itea be ta ndap lu, cha btseꞌa med wa ndoꞌ bexa uban nak. Weꞌe gap lu sian taꞌa ndoꞌ Dios. Cha utsea usankea tsoꞌo naꞌ.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín xabgiꞌi wa ta wa, cha uban myoꞌo ladna xa, cha nseaꞌ xa, leꞌa xa uzhebpa sian taꞌa ndap.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega uzheꞌeb ugan yate dub xa rik sa nibeꞌe Dios.
Stub biaj gáp naꞌ‑yá: ndi mas lid bid itid dub came geꞌed xan dub yagux, ndoꞌ yak dub xa rik dub xa nibeꞌe Dios.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín be xmen Jesús ta wa, cha uzhebpa ngwanseana bexa, ndab bexa ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa xa:
—¿Tonxá syoꞌo gan yate sa nibeꞌe Dios zhaga?
Leꞌa Jesús cha mwiꞌi ndoꞌ bexa ndab xa:
—Leꞌa cuent ten nabtsa be men leꞌa‑yá lá yoo gan. Ná leꞌa cuent ten Dios itea taꞌa syoꞌoka gan.
Leꞌa Pedr cha ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Unaꞌ go, leꞌa besa mlaꞌa itea be taꞌa ndap besa, cha ndi usankea besa tsoꞌo ga. ¿Ta weꞌe xtaꞌan ikaꞌa besa zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa wa:

—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa gal dub wizh yunchaꞌaw Dios iteanak be taꞌa, zha na leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, isoꞌob wats Dios sa inibeꞌe naꞌ. Leꞌa gal zha wa leꞌa bego nsankea tsoꞌo naꞌ nat noga gap tibtop sa isob bega inibeꞌe bega ndoꞌ isatibtop xkwaꞌa bexa Israel.

Leꞌa tal ton ulaꞌa lid na no wit na no bsan na no xus na no xnaꞌa na no xagots ten na no xmeꞌed na no be yo ten na ndontsa gun xa tiꞌin ten naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa ikayaꞌa stub gayoꞌo biaj mas be ta mlaꞌa xa wa. No gap xa gealnaban ta nunk lá idub.
Ná kwaꞌad bexa nsak nat wa, yak bexa naꞌanpa nsak; no leꞌa bexa naꞌanpa nsak nat wa, yak bexa nsak.
’Leꞌa lak nibeꞌe Dios nak lak mbin dub xabgiꞌi ndap dub bleꞌa yo ncho ya uv. Utoꞌo xa dub tempran gor nseayat xeꞌa nchaꞌkwaꞌan xa bexa gun tiꞌin ten uv.
Ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa gun tiꞌin wa leꞌa xa kix dub med denario dub wizh, cha unika bexa. Cha mtuꞌub xa bexa ndoꞌ tiꞌin wa.
Cha utoꞌogal xa gor nkea ugeꞌa gor tempran, nchaꞌa xa ndoꞌ xgeꞌe. Weꞌe uniꞌí xa pla xabgiꞌi naꞌan xtiꞌin ndap gun.
Cha ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa wa: “No bega waꞌyun tiꞌin ndoꞌ ya uv ten naꞌ. Leꞌa naꞌ kix dub lak taꞌa nsabndoꞌ ikaꞌa bega.” Leꞌa bexa wa cha nchaꞌaga.
Cha liga utoꞌogal xa gor gawizh no gor nkea yon uzhe, no ligal ndab xa ndoꞌ be men.
No utoꞌogal xa pa gor nkea ugaꞌay uzhe, cha mzheal xa stapla bexa lá ndap tiꞌin gun na. Cha unabdiꞌizh xa ndab xa: “¿Xtaꞌan lndeꞌe nde bega sa ndee idub wizh, ni lá ndun bega tiꞌin?”
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ndabbe: “Naꞌan ton nsaꞌa tiꞌin gun besa.” Leꞌa xwan geꞌe wa cha ndab: “Waꞌyun bega tiꞌin ndoꞌ ya uv ten naꞌ. Leꞌa naꞌ kix dub lak ta nsabndoꞌ ikaꞌa bega.”

’Leꞌa gor na yá ngwaꞌas wizh, leꞌa xwan tiꞌin wa cha ndab ndoꞌ xa nchansu ndoꞌ tiꞌin wa: “Utezh bexa ndun tiꞌin baꞌ. Cha ndon ned bexa tsoꞌo uyote baꞌ utix ikaꞌa bexa, weꞌeta utix ikaꞌa bexa ned uyote baꞌ.”
Leꞌa gor nseabe bexa uyote gor nkea ugaꞌay gor uzhe, cha utix xa dub med denario ukaꞌa kadga dub bexa wa.
Leꞌa tsoꞌo wa gor nseabe bexa ned uyote gor tempran wa, mbinbeꞌe bexa mas sian med ikaꞌa bexa. Ná leꞌa bexa no ukaꞌa dubtsa denario kadga dub bexa.
Leꞌa gor usen bexa med wa, cha ngokloo bexa ndoꞌ xwan tiꞌin wa,
ndab bexa ndoꞌ xa: “Leꞌa bexa tsoꞌo uyote mbin tiꞌin baꞌ dub gortsa mbin tiꞌin. Ná go dubtsa utix ukaꞌa bexa baꞌ no besa na mxik uzheꞌeb utii mbin tiꞌin idub wizh.”
Leꞌa xwan tiꞌin wa cha ndab ndoꞌ dub bexa wa: “Amig, naꞌ naꞌanpa dub ta ugap ndanno lu. ¿Cha lid uni lu ikaꞌa lu dub denario dub wizh zha?
Nat byaꞌ, cha byoꞌo ta ukaꞌa lu baꞌ. Leꞌa naꞌ nlad usa dub lak ta ukaꞌa lu ndoꞌ bexa tsoꞌo uyote baꞌ.
¿Lid syoꞌo gan gunno naꞌ med ten naꞌ guniꞌi xteꞌe nlad naꞌ zha? ¿Xtaꞌan ndaklono lu stub xa baꞌ geal leꞌa naꞌ utsin nak ndoꞌ xa?”
Cha no ndab Jesús:
—Li leꞌa kwaꞌad bexa nsak nat wa, yak bexa naꞌanpa nsak; leꞌa bexa naꞌanpa nsak nat wa, yak bexa nsak. Leꞌa Dios nbezh kwaꞌad men, parea naꞌanpa nti Dios kwaꞌad xa.
Leꞌa gor na nsoꞌ bexa nes nchaꞌa bexa gezh Jerusalén, leꞌa Jesús mbiꞌi isatibtop be xmen na dub lad, cha ndab xa:
—Blaꞌach bego leꞌa beuna nchaꞌbe Jerusalén, leꞌa sa wa leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, yak cuent ndoꞌ yaꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no be mech ten ley. Leꞌa bexa wa gab nsabndoꞌ gat naꞌ,
cha yun bexa cuent naꞌ ndoꞌ bexa naꞌanpa xa judio. Leꞌa bexa wa inisi naꞌ no kin bexa naꞌ no gut bexa naꞌ ndoꞌ cruz. Parea leꞌa gal wizh yon leꞌa naꞌ ibangal ndoꞌ gealgut.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jacob nsea Juan be xin Zebedeo ulenno xnaꞌa na wats Jesús. Leꞌa xagots wa cha msaxib ndoꞌ Jesús, inab xa dub taꞌa ndoꞌ Jesús.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa:
—¿Xtaꞌan nlad lu gun naꞌ zha?
Leꞌa xa wa cha ndab:
—Nlad naꞌ gab go kwe itop xiꞌín naꞌ ndee sa inibeꞌe go, dub xa wats ga lad gaꞌal no stub xa wats ga lad raves.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ itop bexa wa:
—Leꞌa bego ni lá iniꞌí xtaꞌan unab bega. ¿Sxik bega itid bega gealkweaꞌ cuent gealkweaꞌ itiꞌid naꞌ zha? ¿No sni bega gat bega lak gat naꞌ zha?
Leꞌa bexa cha ndab:
—Snika besa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:

—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa bego stidka be gealkweaꞌ cuent gealkweaꞌ itiꞌid naꞌ, no sat bega lak gat naꞌ. Parea leꞌa sa kwe bega, dub bega wats naꞌ lad gaꞌal no stub bega lad raves wa, leꞌa sa wa naꞌanpa naꞌ inibeꞌe. Leꞌa Dios Xus naꞌ leꞌa gab ná ton kwe sa wa.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín isatiꞌi xmen Jesús ta li unab Jacob nsea Juan wa, cha ngokloo bexa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha utezh bexa wa, cha ndab xa:
—Leꞌa bego uniꞌíka leꞌa bexa nibeꞌe be nacion naꞌanpa ulaꞌa gun be men dub taꞌa naꞌanpa nibeꞌe bexa, no bexa mas nsak ten bexa uzhebpa nibeꞌe ndoꞌ be men.
Ná leꞌa bego ndee naꞌanpa li nsabndoꞌ gak. Ndi tal ton bega nlad gak dub xa nsak lat bega, leꞌa xa wa nsabndoꞌ gakno iteata bega.
No tal ton bega nlad yansu lat bega, leꞌa xa wa nsabndoꞌ gun tiꞌin ndoꞌ bega.
Leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, naꞌanpa ndal por na gun be men tiꞌin ndoꞌ naꞌ. Leꞌa naꞌ ndi ndalyun tiꞌin ndoꞌ be men, no usa naꞌ gealnaban ten naꞌ gat naꞌ kix naꞌ ke ten kwaꞌad men.
Leꞌa gor nseaꞌ Jesús nsea be xmen na utoꞌo bexa gezh Jericó wa, leꞌa kwaꞌadpa be men nchabenkea tsoꞌo xa.
Leꞌa toꞌo nes wa ndebe top xabgiꞌi lá naꞌ. Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín bexa leꞌa Jesús nseatid sa wa, cha ugeꞌ ndab bexa:
—¡Señor, xin David! ¡Blats ladna go besa!
Leꞌa be men cha uteyo bexa ndontsa naꞌan xteꞌe gab bexa. Ná leꞌa bexa ndi mas ugeꞌ ndab:
—¡Señor, xin David! ¡Blats ladna go besa!
Leꞌa Jesús ngwaꞌisoꞌ utezh itop xa lá naꞌ wa. Cha unabdiꞌizh Jesús ndoꞌ bexa ndab xa:
—¿Xtaꞌan nlad bega gunno naꞌ bega?
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ndab:
—Señor, leꞌa besa nlad inaꞌ.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha mlats ladna bexa, cha mgal Jesús ngusndoꞌ bexa. Cha bi leꞌa gor wa leꞌa bexa wa mnaꞌlabe. Cha no bexa usankea tsoꞌo Jesús.
Leꞌa ngol gor na yá nchaꞌlayaꞌ gax Jesús no be xmen xa Jerusalén, ulayaꞌ bexa gezh Betfagé sa nsob Bet Olivo. Leꞌa Jesús cha mtuꞌub top xmen na,
ndab xa:
—Waꞌ bega len gezh nde mas ndoꞌ ndee, cha izheal bega dub burr gots nsoꞌ nchii, no dub xin ma. Cha uxaꞌak bega bema, goꞌo bega ma sa ndee.
No tal ton uka ma ndoꞌ bega, gud bega leꞌa mech guntiꞌin ma. Cha ulaꞌa xa goꞌo bega ma.
Li ndab Jesús ndontsa gak‑a lak ndab dub profet sakndoꞌ Dios, ndab xa:
Gud bego ndoꞌ bexa gezh Sion:
“Bwiꞌi bega, leꞌa xa nibeꞌe ten bega nsea sa ndee.
Bchaꞌan nak xa nsob xa tsoꞌo dub burr,
tsoꞌo dub burr tuzh, xin dub man yoꞌo.”
Leꞌa be xmen Jesús wa cha nchaꞌbe, cha mbin bexa lakka unibeꞌe Jesús ndoꞌ bexa.
Cha mbiꞌi bexa burr wa nsea burr tuzh wa, cha mtiꞌib bexa dubga xab bexa tsoꞌo ma. Cha usob Jesús tsoꞌo ma.
Leꞌa kwaꞌad be men cha mte be lad nbix bexa ndoꞌ nes sa itid Jesús, no ncho bexa ulobtoꞌog be xos ya gin, cha mte bexa‑yá nes wa.
Leꞌa be men nchaꞌbe ned ndoꞌ Jesús no be men nseabenkea tsoꞌo Jesús ugeꞌ ndab:
—¡Siꞌil nak xin David! ¡Dios uzhebpa nlaꞌach xa baꞌ, xa na mtuꞌub Dios Xa Nibeꞌe! ¡Siꞌil nak Dios nsob gaꞌap!
Leꞌa gor na uyote Jesús len gezh Jerusalén, leꞌa iteanak be men usaxan ndeseyoch, unabdiꞌizh bexa ndab bexa:
—¿Ton xa baꞌ zha?
Leꞌa be men ndeseano Jesús wa cha ndab:
—Leꞌa xa ndee Jesús, xa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios, xa gezh Nazaret ten Galilea.
Leꞌa Jesús cha nchaꞌa len niꞌi ten Dios, cha ulantuꞌub xa bexa nadoꞌotiꞌix taꞌa sa wa. No mtixte xa be mes ten bexa ntil be med, no be yaxil ten bexa ndiꞌibudoꞌo be palom.
Cha ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa wa:
—Leꞌa diꞌizh ten Dios nkeaniꞌi ndab Dios: “Leꞌa lid naꞌ isaleaꞌ dub sa ndadiꞌizhno be men naꞌ.” Ná leꞌa bego ndi ndanno‑yá cuent dub geꞌloꞌo ten be waꞌan.
Weꞌe leꞌa pla bexa lá naꞌ no bexa coj cha ulen wats Jesús tale ten niꞌi ten Dios wa, cha myunyakna Jesús bexa.
Parea leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no be mech ten ley uzheꞌeb ngokloo gor uniꞌí bexa be uyon ndun Jesús wa, no mbiꞌín bexa ta ugeꞌ ndab be meꞌed tale ten niꞌi ten Dios, ndab meꞌed: “¡Siꞌil nak xin David!”
Cha ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Lid ndoꞌón lu xtaꞌan ndab be meꞌed baꞌ zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Naꞌ ndónka‑yá. ¿Parea lá ndoꞌol bega zha sa nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios cuent ten ta ndee? Ndab‑a:
Leꞌa go Dios gun leꞌa be meꞌed nsea be medoꞌo gab xteꞌe siꞌil nak go.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mlaꞌa bexa mkaꞌan xa gezh Jerusalén. Cha nchaꞌa xa gezh Betania, sa uyoꞌo xa teꞌal wa.
Leꞌa stub wizh gor tempran myach xa nchaꞌa xa Jerusalén. Leꞌa nes wa leꞌa Jesús ndanna.
Weꞌe uniꞌí xa dub ya higo gax toꞌo nes wa, cha nchaꞌkwaꞌan xa ngus gaw xa ndoꞌ ya wa. Parea naꞌanpa izheal xa ngus ndoꞌ‑yá, ndi latsa nsoꞌ ndoꞌ‑yá. Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ ya wa:
—Idub isob lu naꞌantapa isoꞌ ngus ndoꞌ lu.
Leꞌa ya higo wa cha ubid.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí be xmen Jesús ta wa cha ngwanseana bexa, unabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab bexa:
—¿Xteꞌe uxax ubid ya higo baꞌ?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:

—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa tal bega idub ncho ladna ngeꞌ ladna Dios, leꞌa bega sun gan gun lak mbinno naꞌ ya higo ndee, no sun bega gan gab bega ndoꞌ bet ndee: “Utatsob, waꞌ len nitsdoꞌo”, leꞌa‑yá cha lika gak.
Leꞌa itea be ta inab bega ndoꞌ Dios tal ngeꞌka ladna bega xa, leꞌa Dios saꞌaka‑yá.
Leꞌa gor na mlanseagal Jesús wats niꞌi ten Dios, cha usaxan xa nluu xa be men. Weꞌe leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no bexa gox nsak ten bexa judio ulen wats Jesús, ndab bexa:
—¿Ton ulaxoꞌob lu gun lu be ta wa zha? ¿Nati ton mtuꞌub lu gun lu ta wa?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa naꞌ no inabdiꞌizh dub taꞌa ndoꞌ bego. Tal leꞌa bega ikaꞌab, weꞌe no naꞌ gáp ná ton ulaxoꞌob naꞌ li gun naꞌ ta wa.
¿Ton mtuꞌub Juan ulaleaꞌ Juan be men zha? ¿Dios nati dub men?
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ndabbe ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa na:
—Tal leꞌa beuna gab leꞌa Dios leꞌaka mtuꞌub Juan, leꞌa Jesús inabdiꞌizh ná xtaꞌan lá ngungea ladna beuna xa.
Ná tal leꞌa beuna gab leꞌa Juan dub men mtuꞌub, leꞌa be men ndee sakloo ndoꞌ beuna, leꞌa bexa itea mbingea ladna leꞌa Juan dub xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios.
Cha ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Leꞌa besa lá iniꞌí ton mtuꞌub Juan.
Leꞌa Jesús cha noga ndab:
—Ni naꞌga lá gáp ton ulaxoꞌob naꞌ gun naꞌ be ta ndee.
Leꞌa Jesús cha unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ bexa wa ndab xa:
—¿Xteꞌe nyakbeꞌena bega ta gáp naꞌ ndee wa? Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi ndap top xin na. Cha ngwaꞌ xa ndoꞌ xin ned xa, ndab xa: “Xiꞌín naꞌ, waꞌyun tiꞌin ndoꞌ yo ten naꞌ sa ncho ya uv.”
Leꞌa xin xa wa cha ukaꞌab ndab: “Naꞌ lá nlad gaa.” Parea tsoꞌo wa leꞌa xa mgondoꞌ leꞌa xa ugap ndab, cha nchaꞌaka xa ndoꞌ tiꞌin wa.
Leꞌa xabgiꞌi wa no ngwaꞌ ndoꞌ stubga xin na wa, cha leꞌakagal li ndab xa ndoꞌ xin xa. Leꞌa xin xa wa cha ukaꞌab ndab: “Leꞌa naꞌ saaka, tad.” Ná leꞌa xa ndi ni lá nga.
¿Ton ndoꞌ itop xa wa mbin ta nlad xus na zha?
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ndab:
—Xin ned xa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa bexa nsen med nkaꞌa gobier Roma no be xagots ndun juis mgiꞌi nadoꞌo bexa las bexa, leꞌa ncho bexa wa syoteka sa nibeꞌe Dios. Ná leꞌa bego lá yate sa wa.

Leꞌa Juan xa ulaleaꞌ men mbidyadiꞌizh xteꞌe nsabndoꞌ wen gun bega, ná leꞌa bega ni lá ngungea ladna xa. Ná leꞌa bexa nsen med wa no be xagots ndun juis mgiꞌi wa mbingea ladna Juan. Leꞌa bego uniꞌí leꞌa bexa wa mbingea ladna Juan, ná leꞌa bega ni lá igondoꞌ ti no bega nsabndoꞌ gungea ladna xa.

’Blaꞌach bega stub taꞌa usaktabeꞌe naꞌ: Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi ndap dub bleꞌa siꞌil yo. Cha ngos xa ya uv ndoꞌ‑yá, cha ulo xa lo idub gangeak wats‑a. No mbindeꞌe xa dub sa kichkeꞌe xa uv wa, koꞌo xa nits ten uv. No mbindeꞌe xa dub sa gaꞌap isob xa ulaꞌach sa wa. Cha mkwaꞌan xa pla men gun tiꞌin sa wa. Cha nchaꞌa xa sit.
Leꞌa zha na yamer ngol tiemp ten uv wa, cha mtuꞌub xa pla xmos xa yaꞌ ndoꞌ be men wa, yaꞌyoꞌo bexa ta na ndal xwan yo wa.
Ná leꞌa be men wa ndi usen be mos wa, udin bexa dub xa, cha mbit bexa stub xa, cha mlaꞌgeꞌ bexa stub xa.
Leꞌa xwan yo wa cha mtuꞌubgal mas kwaꞌad mos ndoꞌ zha ned wa. Ná leꞌa be men wa ligal mbinno bexa wa.
Tsoꞌo wa leꞌa xwan yo wa mtuꞌub xin na, mbinbeꞌe xa leꞌa be men gap mod ndoꞌ xa.
Ná leꞌa gor uniꞌí be men wa xin xwan yo wa, cha ndi ndab bexa ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa na: “Leꞌa xa baꞌ leꞌa yaꞌanno yo ndee. Nchaꞌyut beuna xa, cha yaꞌanno beuna‑yá.”
Cha usen bexa xa, cha uloꞌo bexa xa dub lad toꞌo yo wa, cha mbit bexa xa.
Cha unabdiꞌizh Jesús ndoꞌ be men nde wats xa ndab xa:
—¿Xteꞌe nsak bega zha? ¿Leꞌa gor giꞌid xwan yo wa xteꞌe gunno xa bexa mlaꞌach yo wa?
Leꞌa bexa cha ndab:
—Leꞌa xa utsaksika bexa ugap wa gast gat bexa. Cha usaꞌa xa yo wa ndoꞌ be men xaꞌaga ulaꞌach‑a, bexa na usaꞌa be ta ndal xwan yo wa gal tiemp ten uv wa.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—¿Ni lá ndoꞌol bega diꞌizh ten Dios zha? Ndab‑a:
Leꞌa geꞌ na mxelad bexa ndandeꞌe niꞌi,
leꞌa ta wa nat nak geꞌ ndon leꞌa nsak nbexan niꞌi.
Leꞌa Dios leꞌa mbin ta ndee,
dub ta ndanseana beuna.
Ta weꞌe leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa Dios ulat ta na nak bega xmen xa, cha ndi usaꞌa Dios ta wa ndoꞌ bexa nxobgek ndoꞌ xa.
Leꞌa bexa na ilayat tsoꞌo geꞌ wa, leꞌa bexa wa syuꞌbe. Leꞌa bexa ilaꞌ geꞌ wa tsoꞌo na wa, leꞌa bexa wa sachkeꞌe.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín be uleꞌay nibeꞌe nsea bexa fariseo wa be ta li msaktabeꞌe Jesús wa, cha myakbeꞌena bexa leꞌa Jesús li ndab cuent ten bexa.
Cha nlad bexa isen bexa Jesús, parea leꞌa bexa nzheb ndoꞌ be men kwaꞌad, leꞌa be men ndangea ladna leꞌa Jesús ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios.
Cha msaktabeꞌe Jesús stub taꞌa, ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa wa:
—Leꞌa lak nibeꞌe Dios be men nak lak mbin dub rey ngo dub ujest nchilyaꞌa dub xin xa.
Cha mtuꞌub xa be mos ten xa nchaꞌyab ndoꞌ be men ulola rey kombid ndoꞌ bexa wa giꞌid bexa ujest wa. Ná leꞌa be men lá kaꞌab yaꞌ.

Weꞌe cha mtuꞌubgal xa stapla mos ten xa, ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa: “Waꞌyab bega ndoꞌ bexa wa, leꞌa be ta gaw beuna yá listla nak. Leꞌa be ngon nsea be bser ndaꞌal ten naꞌ yá ngutla. No iteata be taꞌa listla nak. Nat giꞌid bexa ujest nchilyaꞌa xiꞌín naꞌ.”
Ná leꞌa bexa wa ni lá isakyoꞌón be ta ndab be mos wa. Ncho bexa nchaꞌa geꞌe ten na, no ncho xa nchaꞌbe ndoꞌ tiꞌin ten na.
No ncho bexa usen be mos ten rey wa, mtsawiꞌi bexa be mos wa gast ngut bexa.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín rey ta wa cha ngokloo xa, cha mtuꞌub xa be soldad ten xa yaꞌyut bexa be men na li mbit be mos wa no utsoꞌol be soldad gezh ten bexa.
Cha ndab rey ndoꞌ be mos ten na: “Leꞌa ujest uchilyaꞌa xiꞌín naꞌ yá listla nak. Parea leꞌa bexa uyoꞌo kombid ndoꞌ na wa lá nsabndoꞌ giꞌid.
Nat waꞌ bega be nes, cha gab bega ndoꞌ guniꞌi ton izheꞌal bega giꞌid xa ujest.”
Leꞌa be mos cha utoꞌo ngwaꞌkesea be nes, cha myunjunt bexa iteanak be men mzheꞌal bexa, bexa wen no bexa ugap. Weꞌe leꞌa sa ncho ujest wa mzhea nde be men wa.
’Leꞌa rey cha nsea iwiꞌi ndoꞌ bexa nde sa wa. Cha uniꞌí xa dub xabgiꞌi naꞌanpa nak lad nsabndoꞌ gak bexa dub sa nchilyaꞌa men.
Leꞌa rey wa cha ndab ndoꞌ xa: “Amig, ¿xteꞌe uyoꞌo lu sa ndee, ná lu naꞌanpa nak lad ndak bexa nde sa ndee, sa nchilyaꞌa men zha?” Ná leꞌa xabgiꞌi wa ni lá ikaꞌab ndoꞌ rey.
Leꞌa rey cha ndab ndoꞌ be mos ten na: “Bxi bega xoꞌo xa ndee no yaꞌa xa, cha btsaꞌab bega xa tsoꞌo juer sa ukaw, sa goꞌon xa no gast ndeay xa gaw xa tant dub gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí xa.”
Cha no ndab Jesús:
—Liga leꞌa Dios nbezh kwaꞌad men, parea naꞌanpa uti Dios itea be men.
Leꞌa bexa fariseo cha nseaꞌbe, cha mbidiꞌizh bexa ná xteꞌe ukwiꞌinno bexa Jesús gab Jesús dub ta lid leꞌa nak.
Cha mtuꞌub bexa pla be xmen bexa no stapla be xmen Herodes wats Jesús. Leꞌa bexa cha unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab bexa:
—Mech, leꞌa besa uniꞌí leꞌa go ndadiꞌizh sbeꞌen gealngea no wen nluu ga lak nlad Dios gak be men, ni lá nlaꞌach ga ta ndab be men no ni tal xteꞌe nak bexa.
Nat gud ga ná xteꞌe nsak ga: ¿Nsabndoꞌ kix beuna med nab César xa nibeꞌe Roma nate naꞌanpa kix beuna‑yá?
Ná leꞌa Jesús mgenna ta ugap ndanbeꞌe bexa, cha ndab Jesús:
—Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega xa ugap nak. ¿Xtaꞌan li ndun bega preb naꞌ zha?
Bluu bega dub med nkix be men ndoꞌ xa nibeꞌe wa.
Weꞌe cha msaꞌa bexa dub med denario.
Leꞌa Jesús cha unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ bexa:
—¿Ton gek ná no leaꞌ ná nkea las med ndee zha?
Leꞌa bexa cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Gek César no leaꞌ César.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Bsaꞌa bega be ta ten César ndoꞌ César. Leꞌa ndoꞌ Dios bsaꞌa bega be ta ten Dios.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín bexa ta wa, cha ngwanseana bexa xteꞌe ukaꞌab Jesús, cha nchaꞌa bexa mlaꞌa bexa Jesús.
Bi leꞌa wizh wa leꞌa pla bexa saduceo ulen wats Jesús. Leꞌa bexa saduceo ndangea ladna leꞌa bexa ngut wa lá ibantabe. Cha unabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab bexa:

—Mech, leꞌa ta mkeꞌa Moisés ndab leꞌa tal ton dub xabgiꞌi gat, ná lá ngap xa xin xa, leꞌa wit xa wa nsabndoꞌ uchilyaꞌano xagots ten xa ngut wa, ndontsa tal gap bexa dub meꞌed leꞌa meꞌed wa gak cuent xin xa ngut wa.
Leꞌa sa ndee uyoꞌo dub gaꞌad wit xa. Leꞌa xa ned wa mchilyaꞌano dub xagots, cha tsoꞌo wa ngut xa, ni lá ngap xagots wa xin xa. Weꞌe leꞌa stubga wit xa cha mchilyaꞌano xagots wa.
Cha li ngwasea wit itop xa no xa yon wa no gast isagaꞌad bexa.
Leꞌa tsoꞌo na ngut itea be xabgiꞌi wa leꞌa xagots wa noga ngut.
Leꞌa zha na iban bexa ngut wa, leꞌa lat isagaꞌad bexa wa ¿ton gak xabgiꞌi ten xagots wa, xa na li mchilyaꞌano itea be xabgiꞌi wa?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Uzhebpa lid leꞌa ndanbeꞌe bega, geal leꞌa bega lá nyakbeꞌena xteꞌe ndab diꞌizh ten Dios, no ni lá nchandoꞌ bega juers ten Dios.
Leꞌa gal zha na iban bexa ngut, leꞌa be men naꞌantapa uchilyaꞌano be ltsaꞌa na zha wa. Leꞌa bexa ndi yak cuent be angel ten Dios ncho gibeꞌa.
Parea leꞌa cuent ten ta iban bexa ngut wa, ¿lá ndoꞌol bega diꞌizh ten Dios ta ndab Dios zha? Ndab xa,
leꞌa xa nak Dios ndankea Abraham no Isaac no Jacob. Leꞌa Dios naꞌanpa Dios ten bexa ngut, leꞌa xa ndi Dios ten bexa nban, ta weꞌe uniꞌí beuna leꞌa bexa wa bi nbanka maska ngut bexa ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín be men ta wa, cha ngwanseana bexa xteꞌe ndadiꞌizh Jesús.
Leꞌa bexa fariseo, gor na mbiꞌín bexa leꞌa Jesús mbin gan yá lá utsakndoꞌta bexa saduceo wa, cha mzhealbe bexa wats Jesús.
Leꞌa dub bexa wa xa nak mech ten ley mbin preb Jesús, unabdiꞌizh xa ndab xa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Mech, ¿ma ta na mas nsak lat be ta unibeꞌe Dios zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Wankea Dios Xa Nibeꞌe idub ncho ladna ladoꞌo lu no idub gealnaban ten lu no idub lak ndanbeꞌe lu.
Leꞌa ná ndee wa mas nsak ndoꞌ iteanak be taꞌa unibeꞌe Dios.
Leꞌa ná itop ndee lakkaga nak ná ned wa: Bkweaꞌ ladna lu be ltsaꞌa lu lakkata lu.
Leꞌa itop be ná ndee wa nak xan iteanak be ta unibeꞌe Dios, ley mkeꞌa Moisés nsea ta mkeꞌa be profet.
Ndalen li ndebe bexa fariseo sa wa, leꞌa Jesús unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ bexa,
ndab xa:
—¿Xteꞌe ndanbeꞌe bega zha ton nak Cristo xa utuꞌub Dios, xá ras ná xa?
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa xa wa gak dub xa ras ten David.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Ta ugeaka ta wa, ná leꞌa David leꞌaka ndab sakndoꞌ Espíritu ten Dios leꞌa Cristo nak xa nibeꞌe ten xa. Ndab David:
Leꞌa Dios Xa Nibeꞌe ndab ndoꞌ Xa Nibeꞌe ten naꞌ:
“Usob wats naꞌ lad gaꞌal ndee,
gast gal gor ute naꞌ bexa ndaklono lu xan ndats lu.”
Leꞌa David ndab leꞌa Cristo nak Xa Nibeꞌe ten xa. ¿Ná xteꞌe yoo gan gak Cristo wa xin David zha?
Leꞌa ni dub bexa wa lá ikaꞌab ni stub diꞌizh. No idub tsoꞌo wa ni lá ngun bexa rages inabdiꞌizhta bexa ndoꞌ Jesús.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mbidiꞌizh ndoꞌ be men no ndoꞌ be xmenka xa, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa be mech ten ley no bexa fariseo nak bexa nsabndoꞌ leꞌa uluu xteꞌe gab ley mkeꞌa Moisés.
Ta weꞌe blaꞌach bega xtaꞌan ndab bexa no bxobgek bega ndoꞌ be ta nluu bexa. Parea lá gun bega lak ndun bexa wa, leꞌa bexa naꞌanpa ndun ta ndab bexa gun bega.
Leꞌa be ta sian nluu bexa wa nak cuent dub yoꞌo uzheꞌeb kweꞌa nsaꞌa bexa goꞌo bega. Parea ni dub ngutsyaꞌa xa lá ndakno bexa bega goꞌo bega‑yá.

Leꞌa iteanak ta wen ndun bexa, li ndun bexa ndontsa iniꞌí be men‑a. Ndal ladna bexa nkeꞌa be caj byux xtuzh bexa no yaꞌa bexa, ta ncho git tuzh nkea diꞌizh ten Dios len‑a. No ndal ladna bexa ndak bexa be lad nsob be ta koꞌol toꞌo‑yá.
No nti bexa be sa mas nsak isob bexa sa ndaꞌdaw bexa ndoꞌ dub gast, no len be niꞌi nzhealbe beuna xa judio.
No nlad bexa utsin inidiꞌizh be men ndoꞌ bexa be ndoꞌ xgeꞌe, gab be men “mech” ndoꞌ xa.
’Ná leꞌa bega naꞌanpa ukwaꞌan xteꞌe gab be men “mech” ndoꞌ bega, leꞌa bega dubkama mech ndap leꞌa ta wa xa nak Cristo. No leꞌa itea bega dubtsa nak.
No naꞌan ton ndoꞌ ná gab bega “tad” ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee, leꞌa bega dubtsa tad ndap leꞌa ta wa Dios nsob gibeꞌa.
No lá ulaꞌa bega gab be men leꞌa bega xa nibeꞌe, leꞌa xa nibeꞌe dubtsa ncho, leꞌa ta wa xa nak Cristo.
Leꞌa tal ton mas nsak lat bega, leꞌa xa wa nsabndoꞌ gun tiꞌin ndoꞌ iteanak bega.
Leꞌa tal ton gunbeꞌe leꞌa mas nsak, leꞌa gal gor leꞌa xa ido ladna. No liga leꞌa tal ton yak tuzh ndoꞌ be men, leꞌa gal gor leꞌa be men iniꞌí leꞌa xa wa nsakka.

’¡Proꞌob bego, mech ten ley no xa fariseo! Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega xa ugap nak. Nka bega yak be men bexa leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe. Ni leꞌa bego nak bexa leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe, no ni lá nlaꞌa bega gak be men xa nibeꞌe Dios.

’¡Proꞌob bego, mech ten ley no xa fariseo! Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega xa ugap nak. Nlat bega itea be ta ndap be xagots ngut xabgiꞌi ten na. No kwenpa ndadiꞌizh bega ndoꞌ Dios ndontsa gab be men leꞌa bega ndankeaka Dios. Leꞌa bego na li ndun wa mas uzheꞌeb gealkweaꞌ iniꞌí.

’¡Proꞌob bego, mech ten ley no xa fariseo! Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega xa ugap nak. Leꞌa bega ndesea itea lad ndoꞌ gizhliyo no ndoꞌ nitsdoꞌo, ndeseakwaꞌan bega be men gungea ladna be ta nluu bega. Ná leꞌa gor mbin bega gan ndangea ladna dub xa ta wa, leꞌa ke ten ta mluu bega ndoꞌ xa wa leꞌa xa mas nsabndoꞌ yaꞌ infierno ndoꞌ lak nsabndoꞌ yaꞌ bego.

’¡Proꞌob bego, leꞌa bego cuent dub xa lá naꞌ nlad goꞌo stubga men! Leꞌa bega ndab leꞌa tal ton gab lak ta ugeakapa ncho niꞌi ten Dios no liga ta ugeakapa gun xa dub taꞌa, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa juerska li gun. Parea no ndab bega tal xa gab lak ta ugeakapa ncho ta oro len niꞌi ten Dios, weꞌe leꞌa xa wa juerska li gun ta ndab xa wa.
¡Ugap ndanbeꞌe bego, nak bego cuent dub xa lá naꞌ! ¿Xtaꞌan mas nsak zha? ¿Be ta oro wa nate niꞌi ten Dios, ta na ndun umbiꞌi nak oro wa ndoꞌ Dios?

No ndab bega leꞌa tal ton gab lak ta ugeakapa ncho altar wa, no liga ta ugeakapa gun xa dub taꞌa, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa juerska li gun. Parea no ndab bega tal xa gab lak ta ugeakapa ncho be xnab, weꞌe leꞌa xa wa juerska li gun ta ndab xa wa.
¡Ugap ndanbeꞌe bega no nak bega cuent dub xa lá naꞌ! ¿Xtaꞌan mas nsak zha? ¿Xnab wa nate altar wa, ta na ndun umbiꞌi nak xnab wa ndoꞌ Dios?
Leꞌa tal ton nseꞌat altar wa gor na ndab xa gun xa dub taꞌa, leꞌa ta wa cuent no be xnab ndiꞌib ndoꞌ altar wa nseꞌat xa.
No tal ton nseꞌat niꞌi ten Dios gor na ndab xa gun xa dub taꞌa, leꞌa ta wa cuent no Dios xa ncho sa wa nseꞌat xa.
No tal ton nseꞌat gibeꞌa gor na ndab xa gun xa dub taꞌa, leꞌa ta wa cuent no sa nsob Dios nsea Dios nseꞌat xa wa.

’¡Proꞌob bego, mech ten ley no xa fariseo! Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega xa ugap nak. Leꞌaka nak nsaꞌa bega dub gen byonxtil lat dub tiꞌi gen‑a uxen bega, no liga ndanno bega eneldo no komin. Parea leꞌa bega lá ndun be ta mas nsak nibeꞌe ley ten Dios, ta na ndab utsin gunno bega be men lak nsabndoꞌ‑yá no ilats ladna bega be men, no igeꞌ ladna bega Dios. Be ta wen ndee nsabndoꞌ gun bega no usaꞌaka bega be ta wa lakka ndun bega nat.
Leꞌa bega cuent dub xa lá naꞌ nlad goꞌo stubga men. Nyuꞌ ladna bega be ta byuxtsa, ná leꞌa ta mas nsak nlaꞌa bega, cuent dub men ngoꞌo dub mlat ncho len tas, parea ndi ngab xa dub came.

’¡Proꞌob bego, mech ten ley no xa fariseo! Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega xa ugap nak. Leꞌa bega uzhebpa nyuꞌ ladna nyat tsoꞌo vas nsea plat, parea leꞌa len ladoꞌo bega uzhebpa ugap nak, no uzhebpa nsaꞌab ladna bega be taꞌa.
¡Bego xa fariseo nak cuent dub xa lá naꞌ! Ndi ned isambiꞌi len ladoꞌo bega, weꞌeta umbiꞌi gak idub bega.

’¡Proꞌob bego, mech ten ley no xa fariseo! Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega xa ugap nak. Leꞌa bega nak cuent dub baꞌa nagud chulpa nluꞌu tsoꞌo‑yá. Ná leꞌa len‑a ndi ncho tit men ngut no uzhebpa ta bzhiꞌik.
Li nak bego, ndab be men leꞌa bega xa wen, parea leꞌa len ladoꞌo bega uzhebpa ncho gealkwiꞌin no sianta be ta ugap.

’¡Proꞌob bego, mech ten ley no xa fariseo! Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega xa ugap nak. Leꞌa bega ndanchaꞌaw ta chul nsob sa mgaꞌach bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta no nsaxkwaꞌa bega be baꞌa ten bexa mxobgek ndoꞌ Dios.
No ndab bega tal leꞌa bega yoꞌo zha uyoꞌo bexa polta wa, naꞌanpa no bega ngakno be men wa gor na mbit bexa be profet.
Parea leꞌa ta li ndab bega wa nluu leꞌa bega dubtsa nakka no bexa na li mbit bexa wa.
¡Bego usandoꞌ be ta ugap mbin be usan gox ten bega polta!
’¡Leꞌa bego xa ugap cuent be mbeꞌal! ¿Xteꞌe ni bega naꞌanpa utsaksi Dios bega, utsaꞌab xa bega ndoꞌ infierno sa nde giꞌ?

Leꞌa naꞌ utuꞌubkata bexa gudiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios, no bexa ndák, no be mech uluu bega. Ná leꞌa bega ndi gut ncho bexa ukeꞌa bega bexa wa ndoꞌ cruz. No kin bega ncho bexa len be niꞌi sa nzhealbe beuna xa judio. No isankea bega tsoꞌo bexa guniꞌi tal pa gezh na nchaꞌbe bexa.

Ta weꞌe leꞌa bega gap ke ten itea bexa ugap li ndut be men wen. Leꞌa ta wa gast zha ngut Abel no gast zha ngut Zacarías xin Berequías, gor na mbit usan gox polta ten bega xa wats altar dub lad wats niꞌi ten Dios.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa Dios utsaksi bego ncho nat ke ten iteanak be ta wa.

’Leꞌa bego ndencho Jerusalén, leꞌa bega ndut bexa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios no nlaꞌgeꞌ bega bexa na ntuꞌub Dios ndoꞌ bega. Sian biaj nlad naꞌ yunjunt naꞌ bega lak nyunjunt dub ngidtsan be ngid ben ten ma len xkwag ma, parea leꞌa bega nunk lá kaꞌab.
Blaꞌach bego, leꞌa nat leꞌa Dios ulaꞌalad bega.
No gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega leꞌa bega yá naꞌantapa iniꞌí naꞌ gast gal wizh gab bega: “Dios uzhebpa nlaꞌach xa baꞌ, xa na mtuꞌub Dios Xa Nibeꞌe.”
Leꞌa Jesús cha utoꞌo tale ten niꞌi ten Dios, cha nseaꞌ xa. Leꞌa be xmen xa cha ubii wats xa mluu bexa ndoꞌ xa xteꞌe ta chul nakchaꞌaw niꞌi ten Dios wa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—¿Naꞌ bego itea ta ndee zha? Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa gal dub wizh ilate iteanak be ta baꞌ, gast ni stub geꞌ baꞌ lá kwiꞌibta tsoꞌo ltsaꞌa na.
Cha nchaꞌbe bexa Bet Olivo, cha usob Jesús sa wa. Leꞌa be xmen xa cha nabtsa ubii wats xa, cha unabdiꞌizh bexa ndab bexa:
—Gud ga, ¿pol gak be ta ndab go wa zha? ¿No xteꞌe iniꞌí besa zha na yamer ilengal ga, no zha yamer idub tiemp ndee?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Blaꞌach bego naꞌan ton ukwiꞌinno bega.
Leꞌa kwaꞌad be men ilen gab leꞌa xa leꞌa nak naꞌ. Gab xa leꞌa xa leꞌa nak Cristo xa na mtuꞌub Dios; cha ukedino bexa kwaꞌad be men.
Leꞌa gor na goꞌón bega ncho guerr be sa sit no sa gax, lá yuꞌ ladna bega. Leꞌa ta wa nsabndoꞌka yoo, ná leꞌa zha wa biseata gal be wizh lult.
Leꞌa gal zha wa kuyo be nacion no stubga nacion. Leꞌa be xmen dub xa nibeꞌe kuyono be xmen stubga xa nibeꞌe. No yoo gealgizh ugiꞌi no win no be xoꞌo ubiꞌi.
Parea leꞌa itea be ta ndee wa pen isobxanma be gealkweaꞌ ilen wa.
’Leꞌa be men yun cuent bega ndoꞌ bexa nibeꞌe. Leꞌa bexa wa kin bega no gast gut bexa ncho bega. No iteanak be men ixeeno ladna bega ke na nak bega xmen naꞌ.
Leꞌa kwaꞌad bexa ulaꞌa ta na ndangea ladna bexa naꞌ. No yun bexa cuent be ltsaꞌa xa ndoꞌ men utsaksi bexa. No ixeeno ladna bexa be ltsaꞌa xa.
No ilen kwaꞌad bexa ukwiꞌin gab leꞌa xa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios. Leꞌa bexa wa gun gan ukedino kwaꞌadpa be men.
No gun be men sianpa be ta ugap, gast kwaꞌadpa bexa yá lá ikweaꞌta ladna be ltsaꞌa na.
Ná leꞌa tal ton uxik ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ wa no bi ngeꞌ ladna xa naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa gap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios.
Leꞌa diꞌizh wen ten Dios ná xteꞌe nibeꞌe Dios be men wa iteꞌachso idub nax ndoꞌ gizhliyo, ndontsa leꞌa iteanak be men goꞌón‑a. Weꞌeta ilen be wizh lult.
’Leꞌa Daniel xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios ndab leꞌa yoo dub ta uzhebpa ugap no bzhiꞌik len sa umbiꞌi ten niꞌi ten Dios (leꞌa xa ndoꞌol ta ndee nsabndoꞌ yakbeꞌena‑yá). Leꞌa gal zha iniꞌí bega ta wa,
weꞌe leꞌa bexa ndencho Judea ndee nsabndoꞌ uxoꞌonbe yaꞌbe bexa be geꞌe ubiꞌi.
Leꞌa be men ndiꞌib gek lid na wa no nsabndoꞌ uxoꞌonbe, ni lá koꞌo xa be taꞌa len lid xa.
Leꞌa bexa ndeyun tiꞌin geꞌe ni lá nsabndoꞌ yachta ilenyoꞌo be xab na.
Leꞌa gal be wizh wa uzhebpa kweaꞌ itid be xagots nsoꞌno meꞌed no be xagots ndap medoꞌo.
Unab bega ndoꞌ Dios natsa leꞌa tiemp uxoꞌon bega wa naꞌanpa gal tiemp kwal natal dub wizh neꞌe be men.
Leꞌa be wizh weꞌe yoo dub gealkweaꞌ siꞌil, dub ta nunk gol yoꞌo zha mbindeꞌeta Dios gizhliyo ndee, no ni lá yoota‑yá stub biaj.
Tal leꞌa Dios ulaꞌa sian wizh yoo ta uzheꞌeb wa, leꞌa be men stea gat. Parea lá ulaꞌa Dios yoo sian wizh wa, geal leꞌa xa nlats ladna bexa mti xa.
’Weꞌe leꞌa tal ton gab ndoꞌ bega: “Bwiꞌi bego, leꞌa xa ndee Cristo”, natal gab xa: “Unaꞌ bego, leꞌa sa baꞌ nsoꞌ Cristo”, lá gungea ladna bega ta wa.

Yoo bexa ukwiꞌin gab leꞌa nak Cristo, no ncho bexa ukwiꞌin gab leꞌa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios. Leꞌa bexa wa no gun sian taꞌa yanseana be men ndontsa ukedino xa bexa. No gun xa juers ukedino bexa wa gast bexa mti Dios.
Blaꞌach bego leꞌa naꞌ yá ndáp nedla ta ndee ndoꞌ bega.
Ta weꞌe tal ton gab ndoꞌ bega: “Waꞌwiꞌi bega, leꞌa xa nak Cristo nkesea geꞌe”, naꞌanpa yaꞌ bega sa wa. No tal ton gab: “Utseawiꞌi bega, leꞌa Cristo ncho len niꞌi baꞌ”, lá gungea ladna bega ta wa.
Leꞌa lak nlaꞌ bealꞌ usiꞌi nsu‑yá xeꞌa lad nlen wizh no gast lad ndaꞌas wizh, no liga gak‑a zha ilengal naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Leꞌa lak sa nyakjunt be bech nluu leꞌa sa wa nax dub man ngut, no liga leꞌa zha ilengal naꞌ leꞌa itea be men iniꞌí‑yá.
’Leꞌa gor utidla tiemp ncho be gealkweaꞌ wa, leꞌa ndoꞌ wizh ikaw, leꞌa mbeꞌe yá lá usuta xeꞌa, leꞌa be mbeal ndiꞌib gaꞌap baꞌ ilate, no gast idub gibeꞌa iwiꞌin.

Leꞌa gor ulundoꞌ be ta gibeꞌa wa leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, yamer ilengal. Cha goꞌon be men itea be ras ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo, no iniꞌí bexa leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ilenno juers ten Dios lat xkaw no dub xeꞌa siꞌil.
Cha kwezh dub trompet, cha utuꞌub naꞌ be angel ten naꞌ, yunjunt bexa wa bexa mti Dios idub ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
’Bwiꞌi bego lak nak be ya laꞌaw. Leꞌa zha na nsaxan‑a nxich‑a, leꞌa zha wa uniꞌíka bega leꞌa tiemp bigi yá gal.
No liga leꞌa zha na naꞌ bego ncho itea be ta mbidiꞌizh naꞌ ndee, weꞌe iniꞌí bega leꞌa be wizh lult wa yamer ilen.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa itea be ta ndee itid zha biseata gat be men ncho gal zha wa.
Leꞌa gibeꞌa no gizhliyo initndoꞌ, parea leꞌa be ta ndáp naꞌ ndee yooka.
’Parea naꞌan ton iniꞌí xá wizh ná no xá gor yoo be ta ndee. Ni be angel ncho gibeꞌa lá iniꞌí ta wa. Nabtsa Dios Xus naꞌ uniꞌí‑yá.
Leꞌa lak ngok‑a zha uyoꞌo Noé, no liga gak‑a zha ilengal naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Leꞌa tiemp uyoꞌo Noé zha biseata ilen gilog wa leꞌa be men ndeyaw, no ndo bexa no ndeuchilyaꞌa bexa, no ngodiꞌin bexa xin xa, gast wizh uyoꞌo Noé len barco wa.
Leꞌa be men wa lá iniꞌí xtaꞌan yoo gast gor ulen gilog wa cha mbit‑a itea bexa. No liga gak‑a gor ilengal naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Leꞌa zha wa leꞌa top xabgiꞌi junt ndeyun tiꞌin geꞌe, cha yoꞌo Dios dubtsa xa, leꞌa stub xa wa yaꞌan.
No liga leꞌa top xagots junt ndeyajw, cha yoꞌo Dios dubtsa xa, leꞌa stub xa wa yaꞌan.
’Ta weꞌe list ute bega, leꞌa bega lá iniꞌí xá wizh na ilengal naꞌ.
Parea nsabndoꞌ yakbeꞌena bega ta ndee: tal leꞌa xwan dub niꞌi iniꞌí xá gor giꞌid waꞌan ta lid xa, leꞌa xa isob ulaꞌach ndontsa naꞌan ton yoo len lid xa kowaꞌan ta ncho sa wa.
Ta weꞌe no bega list ute, leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ilengal dub gor ni lá ndanbeꞌe bega ti ilen naꞌ.
’¿Ton bega nak cuent dub mos ndák ndun lak ndab dub xwan niꞌi? Leꞌa xwan niꞌi wa uchaꞌan mos wa inibeꞌe xa stapla bexa ndun tiꞌin ten xa, no usaꞌa mos ta gaw bexa wa.
Leꞌa gor ilaꞌnchaꞌ xwan niꞌi wa uzhebpa wen yoo ladna mos ndun lak ndab xa wa.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa xwan niꞌi wa usoꞌ mos wen wa, yansu xa itea be ta ndap xa wa.
Ná tal leꞌa mos wa dub xa ugap, gunbeꞌe xa gab xa leꞌa xa nibeꞌe ten xa nleꞌata ilen.
Cha ndi isaxan xa kin xa iteata be mos wa. No nchealtsaꞌa xa bexa gu, gaw bexa no goo bexa.
Weꞌe leꞌa xwan niꞌi wa ilaꞌnchaꞌ dub wizh no dub gor ni lá ndanbeꞌe mos ti ilen xa.
Leꞌa xa wa cha uzheꞌeb utsaksi mos wa, cha utsaꞌab xa mos wa wats bexa nluu cuentta xa wen ná bexa xa ugap nak. Leꞌa sa wa goꞌon xa no gast ndeay xa gaw xa tant gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí xa.
’Leꞌa zha weꞌe leꞌa lak nibeꞌe Dios be men wa nak cuent ta ngwasea dub tiꞌi xagots ben usen be xeꞌa aceit ten na, cha nchaꞌikanes bexa dub xabgiꞌi uchilyaꞌa.
Leꞌa gaꞌay bexa wa xa list nak, parea leꞌa stub sgaꞌay bexa wa naꞌanpa xa list nak.
Leꞌa bexa naꞌanpa list nak wa mbiꞌi be xeꞌa ten na, parea naꞌanpa ngoꞌota xa aceit.
Ná leꞌa bexa list nak wa mbiꞌi be xeꞌa ten na no stubga bot aceit.
Leꞌa xabgiꞌi uchilyaꞌa wa naꞌanpa ilayaꞌ gor mbinbeꞌe bexa wa, weꞌe ulen xkaꞌal itea bexa, cha ngwadgats bexa.
Leꞌa utol teꞌal cha mgen dub ti men ugeꞌ ndab: “¡Yá nseala xabgiꞌi uchilyaꞌa wa! ¡Utoꞌo bega, waꞌikanes bega xa!”
Weꞌe cha itea be xagots wa ngwastebe, cha usaxan bexa ndeusaxkwaꞌa bexa xeꞌa ten bexa.
Leꞌa bexa naꞌanpa list nak wa ndab ndoꞌ bexa list nak wa: “Bsaꞌa bega dub tuzh aceit ten bega ikaꞌa besa, leꞌa xeꞌa ten besa yamer yuꞌu.”
Ná leꞌa bexa list nak wa cha ndab: “Tal leꞌa besa usaꞌa‑yá leꞌa‑yá lá ugal gun tiꞌin beuna. Mas wen waꞌ bega sa ndaꞌad‑a, cha usiꞌi bega ná gun tiꞌin bega.”
Parea ndalen nchaꞌisiꞌi sgaꞌay xagots wa aceit, leꞌa xabgiꞌi uchilyaꞌa wa ulansea. Leꞌa be xagots list nde wa uyoꞌo len niꞌi no xabgiꞌi wa sa uchilyaꞌa xa, cha myaw toꞌo niꞌi wa.
Tsoꞌo wa mlaꞌnchaꞌ be xagots naꞌanpa list nak wa, ndab bexa: “¡Señor, señor, bxaꞌal ga toꞌo niꞌi yoꞌo besa!”
Ná leꞌa xabgiꞌi wa cha ndi ukaꞌab ndab: “Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa naꞌ lá nchandoꞌ bega.”
Cha no ndab Jesús:
—No bega list ute, leꞌa bega lá iniꞌí xá wizh ná no xá gor ilengal naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
’Leꞌa lak nibeꞌe Dios nak lak mbin dub xabgiꞌi ikaꞌan sit, utezh xa be mos ten xa. Cha msaꞌa xa be med ten xa gunno bexa‑yá tiꞌin.
’Leꞌa ndoꞌ dub mos msaꞌa xa gaꞌay med uzhebpa nsak. Leꞌa ndoꞌ stub xa msaꞌa xa top‑a, no ndoꞌ stub xa msaꞌa xa dub‑a. Lak ndák bexa wa, liga sian‑a msaꞌa xabgiꞌi wa. Cha ukaꞌan xa nchaꞌa xa sit.
Weꞌe leꞌa xa usen dub gaꞌay med wa mbintiꞌin ta wa, cha mbin xa gan stub sgaꞌayga med ndoꞌ‑yá.
No liga mbin xa usen top‑a wa, cha mbin xa gan stopga‑yá.
Ná leꞌa xa usen dub‑a wa, cha ndi utoꞌo ngwaꞌdan xa dub geꞌed len yo, cha mkachko xa med ten xa nibeꞌe wa.
’Tsoꞌo wa kwenla leꞌa xa nibeꞌe wa mtanseaꞌ, cha nlad xa iniꞌí xa ná xteꞌe mbinno bexa med wa.
Ned ulen xa li usen gaꞌay med wa, cha myun xa cuent ta wa no sgaꞌayga‑yá ndoꞌ xa nibeꞌe wa. Ndab xa: “Señor, leꞌa go msaꞌa gaꞌay med ndee. Leꞌa ná ndee sgaꞌay ná mbin naꞌ gan.”
Leꞌa xa nibeꞌe wa cha ndab: “Uzhebpa wen lu mos. Wen mbin lu tiꞌin nsea dub tuzh med ndee. Nat leꞌa naꞌ usa sian taꞌa inibeꞌe lu. Uyoꞌo, cha junt iten ladna beuna.”
Tsoꞌo wa ulen xa li usen top med wa, cha ndab xa: “Señor, leꞌa go msaꞌa top med ndee. Leꞌa ná ndee stop ná mbin naꞌ gan.”
Leꞌa xa nibeꞌe wa cha ndab: “Uzhebpa wen lu mos. Wen mbin lu tiꞌin nsea dub tuzh med ndee. Nat leꞌa naꞌ usa sian taꞌa inibeꞌe lu. Uyoꞌo, cha junt iten ladna beuna.”
’Ná leꞌa gor ulen xa usen dubtsa med wa, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ xa nibeꞌe wa: “Señor, leꞌa naꞌ uní leꞌa go uzhebpa dub xa nibeꞌe. Nsen go be taꞌa ni lid ta ten ga, no nteleꞌe ga be taꞌa ni lid ta ngas ga.
Ta weꞌe mzheb naꞌ, cha ngwaꞌukachkoꞌo naꞌ med ten ga len yo. Bwiꞌi ga leꞌa med ten ga ndee.”
Leꞌa xa nibeꞌe wa cha ndab: “Leꞌa lu dub mos ugap no zhaꞌab. Tal leꞌa lu uniꞌí leꞌa naꞌ nsen be taꞌa ni lid ta ten naꞌ, no nteleꞌe naꞌ be taꞌa ni lid ta ngas naꞌ,
¿xtaꞌan lid ngaꞌulaꞌa lu med ten naꞌ banco, ndontsa nat nseal naꞌ isen naꞌ be xin med wa?”
Cha ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa nde sa wa: “Blat bega med nsén xa baꞌ, cha bsaꞌa bega‑yá ndoꞌ xa nsén dub tiꞌi med baꞌ.
Leꞌa bexa utsin ndun wa, leꞌa bexa wa mas sian ta ikaꞌa. Ná leꞌa xa na naꞌanpa utsin ndun wa, leꞌa bexa slat be ta ndido ndap xa wa.
Leꞌa mos ugap ndee xa lá isuꞌu. Btsaꞌab bega xa tsoꞌo juer sa ukaw baꞌ, sa goꞌon xa no gast ndeay xa gaw xa, tant dub gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí xa.”
’Leꞌa zha leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ilengal no xeꞌa siꞌil ten Dios no itea be angel ten naꞌ, cha isoꞌob naꞌ sa nibeꞌe naꞌ no juers siꞌil ten naꞌ,
weꞌe leꞌa itea be men nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee yakjunt ndoꞌ naꞌ. Cha uteltsaꞌa naꞌ bexa lak nteltsaꞌa dub xa nlaꞌach man be borreg lat be chiv.
Leꞌa bexa cuent nak borreg kwe lad gaꞌal wats naꞌ, leꞌa bexa cuent nak chiv kwe lad raves.
Weꞌe leꞌa naꞌ nak xa nibeꞌe cha gáp ndoꞌ bexa nde lad gaꞌal wa: “Utsea bega leꞌa Dios Xus naꞌ gun wen yoo ladna bega. Uyote bega sa nibeꞌe naꞌ, sa na ngokndeꞌe yoo bega zha ngokndeꞌekata gizhliyo.
Li ndáp naꞌ geal leꞌa gor na ndanna naꞌ, leꞌa bega msaꞌa ta udaw naꞌ. Leꞌa gor ndak lad naꞌ, leꞌa bega msaꞌa nits nguꞌu naꞌ. Leꞌa gor ukesea naꞌ sit, leꞌa bega msaꞌa sa ngot naꞌ.
Leꞌa gor lá ndap naꞌ xab naꞌ, leꞌa bega msaꞌa lad ngok naꞌ. Leꞌa gor kweaꞌ usak naꞌ no zha ukea naꞌ litgiꞌib, leꞌa bega mbiꞌid inaꞌ naꞌ.”
Leꞌa bexa wen wa cha inabdiꞌizh gab: “Señor, ¿Pol uniꞌí besa ndanna ga, cha msaꞌa besa ta udaw ga? ¿No pol ndak ladna ga, cha msaꞌa besa nits ngu ga?
¿No pol ukesea ga sit, cha msaꞌa besa sa ngot ga? ¿No pol lá ndap ga xab ga, cha msaꞌa besa lad ngok ga?
¿No pol uniꞌí besa kweaꞌ usak ga no ukea ga litgiꞌib, cha ngwaꞌinaꞌ besa ga?”
Weꞌe leꞌa naꞌ cha gáp ndoꞌ bexa: “Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa gor li utsin mbinno bega dub xa naꞌanpa nsak, dub xa cuentta nak wit naꞌ no bsan naꞌ, leꞌa bega no ndoꞌ naꞌ ndee li utsin mbin.”
’Leꞌa naꞌ cha gáp ndoꞌ bexa nde lad wats raves naꞌ: “Utate bega wats naꞌ, bego na ndap ke ndoꞌ Dios. Waꞌbe bega ndoꞌ giꞌ nunk lá yuꞌu, sa msaxkwaꞌa Dios yaꞌbe maxuꞌu no be mbi bxin ten maxuꞌu.
Li ndáp naꞌ geal leꞌa gor na ndanna naꞌ, leꞌa bega ni lá usaꞌa ta ngaw naꞌ. No gor ndak lad naꞌ, leꞌa bega ni lá usaꞌa nits ngoꞌo naꞌ.

Leꞌa gor ukesea naꞌ sa sit, leꞌa bega ni lá usaꞌa sa ngat naꞌ. Leꞌa gor lá ndap naꞌ xab naꞌ, leꞌa bega ni lá usaꞌa lad ngak naꞌ. Leꞌa gor kweaꞌ usak naꞌ no gor ukea naꞌ litgiꞌib, leꞌa bega ni lá ngiꞌid inaꞌ naꞌ.”

Weꞌe leꞌa bexa wa cha inabdiꞌizh gab bexa: “Señor, ¿pol uniꞌí besa ndanna ga, no ndak ladna ga, no sa sit ukesea ga, no ni lá ndap ga xab ga, no kweaꞌ usak ga, no ukea ga litgiꞌib, ná leꞌa besa ni lá ngakno ga?”

Leꞌa naꞌ cha ikaꞌab ndáp: “Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa gor na naꞌanpa li utsin ngun bega ndoꞌ dub xa naꞌanpa nsak, dub xa cuentta nak wit naꞌ no bsan naꞌ, leꞌa bega no ndoꞌ naꞌ li naꞌanpa utsin ngun.”
Leꞌa bexa ugap wa cha yaꞌbe sa iniꞌí bexa gealkweaꞌ nunk lá idub. Ná leꞌa bexa wen wa yaꞌbe sa gap bexa gealnaban nunk lá idub.
Leꞌa gor mtayadiꞌizh Jesús itea be ta wa, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ be xmen xa:
—Leꞌa bego uniꞌíka leꞌa stop wizh ndun jwalt yoo ujest Pascua, zha na leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, yak cuent ndoꞌ yaꞌa be men, cha ukeꞌa bexa naꞌ ndoꞌ cruz.
Weꞌe leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no be mech ten ley no bexa gox nsak ten bexa judio mzhealbe tale ten niꞌi ten Caifás, xa nak uleꞌay ndon leꞌa nsak.
Cha dubtsa mbidiꞌizh bexa isen bexa Jesús dub mod na lá iniꞌí be men‑a, cha gut bexa Jesús.
Parea ndab bexa:
—Naꞌanpa isen beuna xa len ujest, ndontsa lá ixaꞌach be men gakloo ndoꞌ beuna.
Leꞌa dub wizh nsob Jesús ta lid Simón xa Betania, xa na polta usak gealgizh lepra.
Weꞌe ulen dub xagots sa nsob Jesús ndoꞌ mes, nsea dub bot tuzh nakchaꞌaw geꞌ alabastro ncho ta uxeꞌe len‑a, dub ta uyappa nsak. Cha ulo xa ta uxeꞌe wa gek Jesús.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí be xmen Jesús ta wa cha ngokloo bexa, ndab bexa ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa xa:
—¿Xtaꞌan ngi mbizhaꞌa xagots ndee ta baꞌ zha?
Tal leꞌa xa ndi udoꞌo‑yá, leꞌa xa yoꞌo gan utseꞌa med wa ndoꞌ bexa uban nak, leꞌa‑yá uzhebpa dub ta nsak.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín Jesús ta wa, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa:
—¿Xtaꞌan ngi li nisi bega xagots ndee zha? Leꞌa xa dub ta wen mbinno naꞌ.
Leꞌa bexa uban nak wa guniꞌi polga nchoka lat bega, parea leꞌa naꞌ ndee naꞌanpa kwenta nchoꞌono bega.
Leꞌa ta na li mbin xagots ndee ulo xa ta uxeꞌe gek naꞌ, leꞌa ta wa li mbin xa ndontsa listla nak naꞌ zha igaꞌach naꞌ.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega guniꞌi pa ndoꞌ gizhliyo gudiꞌizh be men diꞌizh wen ten Dios, no ta li mbin xagots ndee gudiꞌizh bexa, ndontsa iniꞌí be men ta wen mbin xa.
Leꞌa Judas Iscariot, dub xa nak isatibtop xmen Jesús, cha ngwaꞌ ndoꞌ be uleꞌay nibeꞌe,
cha unabdiꞌizh xa ndab xa:
—¿Plo med usaꞌa bego ika naꞌ yun naꞌ cuent Jesús ndoꞌ bega?
Cha msaꞌa bexa galntiꞌi med plata ndoꞌ xa.
Zha weꞌe leꞌa Judas cha usaxan nkwaꞌan ná xteꞌe yun xa cuent Jesús ndoꞌ yaꞌa bexa.
Leꞌa ngol wizh ned ten ujest zha ndaw bexa judio pan naꞌan levadur, leꞌa be xmen Jesús ulen wats Jesús, cha ndab bexa:
—¿Pa nlad go yaꞌyundeꞌe besa ta gaw beuna ujest Pascua?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Waꞌ bega gezh Jerusalén baꞌ ta lid xa na lika ndáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega wa, cha gud bega ndoꞌ xa leꞌa Mech ten bega ndab: “Leꞌa tiemp wa yá ngol. Leꞌa ta lid ga gaw naꞌ ta ten ujest Pascua no be xmen naꞌ.”
Weꞌe leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha mbin lak ndab Jesús, cha mbinchaꞌaw bexa ta gaw xcheꞌe bexa ujest Pascua.
Leꞌa ngol gor uyoꞌo teꞌal leꞌa Jesús nsea isatibtop be xmen xa mzhealbe sa wa, cha usaxan bexa gaw bexa.
Ndalen li ndeyaw bexa wa, leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa dub bega na no nsob sa ndee yun cuent naꞌ ndoꞌ be men.
Leꞌa bexa cha uzheꞌeb uban myoꞌo ladna, usaxan nabdiꞌizh dub gaꞌga bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Lid naꞌ ta wa zha, Señor?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa dub bego na nsobyawno naꞌ plat ndee yun cuent naꞌ.
Ta ugeaka leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, itiꞌidka lak nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios. Parea proꞌob xabgiꞌi na yun cuent naꞌ ndoꞌ bexa wa. Mas wen lá yoꞌo xabgiꞌi wa ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Leꞌa Judas, xa na yun cuent Jesús, cha unabdiꞌizh ndab:
—¿Lid naꞌ ta wa zha, Mech?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Luka ta wa lak ndab lu.
Leꞌa gor na li ndeyaw bexa, leꞌa Jesús cha usen dub pan, cha msaꞌa xa xno ndoꞌ Dios. Cha uleꞌa xa‑yá, no mtseꞌa xa‑yá ndoꞌ be xmen xa, ndab xa:
—Usen bega pan ndee, cha udaw bega‑yá, leꞌa ta ndee beꞌal las naꞌ.
Cha liga usen Jesús dub vas ncho vin, cha msaꞌa xa xno ndoꞌ Dios. Cha msaꞌa xa‑yá ndoꞌ bexa, ndab xa:
—Iteanak bega gu ta ncho len vas ndee,
leꞌa ta ndee ten ten naꞌ usa naꞌ ndontsa utsuꞌu Dios ke ten be men. Leꞌa ta ndee nluu leꞌa nat leꞌa Dios mbinno be men dub trat kub ná xteꞌe wen yaꞌan bexa ndoꞌ Dios.
No gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega leꞌa naꞌ yá naꞌantapa goꞌo vin ten uv, gast gal wizh goꞌono naꞌ bega‑yá stub biaj sa nibeꞌe Dios Xus naꞌ.
Cha mbiltoꞌo bexa dub cant ndoꞌ Dios. Cha utoꞌo bexa nchaꞌbe bexa Bet Olivo.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—Leꞌa teꞌal ndee leꞌa iteanak bega ulaꞌa naꞌ, lak nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios, ndab‑a: “Leꞌa naꞌ gut xa nlaꞌach be borreg, cha iteꞌachso bema.”
Ná leꞌa tsoꞌo na iban naꞌ leꞌa naꞌ ned ilayaa ndoꞌ bega Galilea.
Leꞌa Pedr cha ndab:
—Maska itea be men ulaꞌa ga, ná leꞌa naꞌ nunk lá ula ga.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ Pedr:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ lu leꞌa teꞌal ndee gor biseata kwezh boy, leꞌa lu ta ugeaka mkwiꞌinla chon biaj, ndab lu leꞌa lu lá nchandoꞌ naꞌ.
Ná leꞌa Pedr cha ndab:
—Maska gat naꞌ gor na gat go, leꞌa naꞌ nunk lá gáp leꞌa naꞌ lá nchandoꞌ ga.
Leꞌa iteata be xmen Jesús ndab lak ndab Pedr.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ulayaꞌ sa nsaleaꞌ Getsemaní nsea be xmen xa. Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ bexa:
—Ndeꞌetsa ute bega, ndalen ndaꞌyadiꞌizhno naꞌ Dios sa baꞌ.
Cha mbiꞌi Jesús chon bexa stub tuzh sa, leꞌa ta wa Pedr no itop xin Zebedeo. Leꞌa Jesús cha uzhebpa uban myoꞌo ladna no kweaꞌ myoꞌo ladna xa.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ yon bexa wa:
—Uzhebpa uban ncho lad naꞌ gast ngi sat naꞌ. Ndeꞌetsa ute bega, cha utenaꞌno bega naꞌ.
Cha usea Jesús stub tuzh sa, cha usaxib xa gast ndoꞌ yo ngol xtuzh xa, cha uníꞌi xa ndoꞌ Dios, ndab xa:
—Tad, tal syoꞌo gan, lá ulaꞌa ga itiꞌid naꞌ ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ uzheꞌeb ndee. Parea lá gak‑a lak nlad naꞌ, ndi gak‑a lak nlad go.
Weꞌe leꞌa gor na nseaꞌ Jesús sa na nde yon xmen xa, leꞌa bexa ndeyats. Cha ndab xa ndoꞌ Pedr:
—¿Ni dub gor lá uxik bega kwenaꞌno bega naꞌ zha?
Utenaꞌ bega no bidiꞌizhno bega Dios, ndontsa naꞌanpa utsabgix maxuꞌu bega. Leꞌa ladoꞌo bega nlad gun ta wen, ná leꞌa idub bega lá uxik.
Cha nchaꞌagal Jesús nchaꞌyadiꞌizhno xa Dios, ndab xa:
—Tad, tal naꞌ juerska itiꞌid ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ ndee, gak‑a lak nlad go.
Leꞌa gor nseaꞌgal Jesús sa nde bexa wa, leꞌa bexa ndeyatsgal, geal leꞌa bexa uzhebpa nyoꞌo xkaꞌalna.
Cha mlaꞌagal xa bexa, nchaꞌyadiꞌizhnogal xa Dios biaj yon, cha ndabgal xa lakka ndabla xa ndoꞌ Dios.
Cha nseaꞌgal xa sa nde bexa, cha ndab xa:
—¿Galka bi ndeyats bega zha, no bi ndeuneꞌe bega zha? Nat bwiꞌi bega yá ngol gor leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, yak cuent ndoꞌ yaꞌa bexa ugap.
Goste bega, nchaꞌbe beuna. Bwiꞌi bega leꞌa xa yun cuent naꞌ yá nseala baꞌa.
Bi li nsoꞌyadiꞌizh Jesús leꞌa Judas, xa no nak dub tibtop xmen Jesús, ulennola be men kwaꞌad noꞌo be spad nsea garrot. Leꞌa ta wa bexa mtuꞌub uleꞌay nibeꞌe no bexa gox nsak isen bexa Jesús.
Leꞌa Judas, xa li yun cuent Jesús, nedla ndab ndoꞌ be men wa: “Leꞌa xa na gaw naꞌ chit beꞌal ndoꞌ na wa, xa weꞌe isen bega.”
Leꞌa gor ulayaꞌ Judas sa wa, cha uxax ubii xa wats Jesús, cha ndab xa:
—Tiux ga, Mech.
Cha mchealtoꞌo xa ndoꞌ Jesús.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Amig, ¿xtiꞌin nsea lu?
Weꞌe leꞌa bexa kwaꞌad wa cha ubii gax, cha usen bexa Jesús.
Ná leꞌa dub xa nsoꞌ wats Jesús uloꞌo spad tuzh ten na, cha ulobtoꞌog xa nchaꞌ dub xmen uleꞌay ndon leꞌa nsak.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa ten spad wa:
—Ulochaꞌaw spad ten lu len lid‑a. Leꞌa itea bexa ndantiꞌin spad, leꞌa xa wa ndoꞌ spadka gat.
¿Lá iniꞌí lu leꞌa naꞌ syoꞌo gan inaꞌab ndoꞌ Xus naꞌ bi leꞌa nat, cha utuꞌub xa masla dub tibtop xkwaꞌa siꞌil be angel gakno naꞌ?
Parea tal naꞌ li gun, weꞌe naꞌanpa gak‑a lak nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios be ta nsabndoꞌ itiꞌid naꞌ.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be men wa:
—¿Xtaꞌan nseano bega spad nsea garrot isen bega naꞌ cuent dub waꞌan? Itea wizh nluu naꞌ be men wats niꞌi ten Dios lat bega, ná lá isen bega naꞌ sa wa.
Parea leꞌa iteanak be ta ndee nsatid ndontsa gak‑a lak nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios, ta ndab bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios.
Weꞌe leꞌa itea be xmen Jesús cha mxoꞌon, mlaꞌa bexa Jesús.
Leꞌa bexa na li usen Jesús wa cha mbiꞌi xa ta lid Caifás uleꞌay ndon leꞌa nsak, sa mzhealbela be mech ten ley no bexa gox nsak.
Leꞌa Pedr sittsa nchankea tsoꞌo Jesús, gast uyoꞌo Pedr len tale ten niꞌi wa. Cha usob Pedr gax wats bexa nlaꞌach sa wa, natsa iniꞌí xa ná xtaꞌan yasea Jesús.
Leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no bexa gox nsak no iteata bexa nsak wa nkwaꞌan be men ukwiꞌin gab leꞌa Jesús ndapka ke, ta nsabndoꞌ gat xa.
Leꞌa kwaꞌad be men mkwiꞌin nsake Jesús, ná lá izheal bexa nibeꞌe wa ni dub ke nsabndoꞌ gat Jesús. Weꞌe ulen stop bexa,
cha mkwiꞌin bexa ndab:
—Leꞌa xa baꞌ ndab leꞌa xa sun gan ulate niꞌi ten Dios, cha gal wizh yon leꞌa xa gundeꞌegal‑a.
Weꞌe leꞌa uleꞌay ndon leꞌa nsak wa ngwasoꞌ, ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Ni lá utsakndoꞌ lu zha? ¿Ta ugeaka ta ndab bexa ndee leꞌa lu li ndab zha?
Ná leꞌa Jesús naꞌan xteꞌe ngab. Weꞌe leꞌa uleꞌay wa cha ndabgal ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Leꞌa Dios nban nsobwiꞌi, leꞌa naꞌ nibeꞌe ndoꞌ lu gud ndoꞌ besa naga lu nak Cristo Xin Dios zha.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Goka ndab‑a. No gáp naꞌ leꞌa nat idub nchaꞌa ndoꞌ ndee leꞌa bega iniꞌíka leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, isob wats Dios lad gaꞌal xa ndon leꞌa nibeꞌe, no ilengal naꞌ ndoꞌ xkaw.
Leꞌa uleꞌay ndon leꞌa nsak wa cha utsaw xab na tant ndakloo xa, cha ugeꞌ ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa nde sa wa:
—¡Leꞌa xa ndee unisi Dios! ¿Xtaꞌanta nkiꞌin beuna kwaꞌadta xa usake xa? Leꞌa bega mbiꞌín xteꞌe ugap uníꞌi xa.
¿Nat zha xteꞌe gab bega, xteꞌe gunno beuna xa?
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—¡Leꞌa xa ndapka ke nsabndoꞌ gat xa!
Cha mchukko bexa ndoꞌ Jesús, no udin bexa Jesús. No ncho bexa utichyaꞌa ndoꞌ Jesús,
ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Tal lu ta ugeaka nak Cristo, ¡gud ná ton udin lu!
Ndalen wa leꞌa Pedr nsob tsoꞌo juer tale wa. Cha ubii dub xagots ndun tiꞌin sa wa wats Pedr, ndab xa:
—Go no ukeseano Jesús xa Galilea, ¿la?
Ná leꞌa Pedr cha mkwiꞌin ndoꞌ gaꞌal itea bexa wa ndab:
—Naꞌ lá iní xtaꞌan ndab go ndoꞌ naꞌ.
Cha nchaꞌa Pedr mas gax toꞌo puert. Weꞌe cha uniꞌí stubgal xagots Pedr, ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa nde sa wa:
—Leꞌa xa ndee no ukeseano Jesús xa Nazaret.
Ná leꞌa Pedr cha mkwiꞌingal ndab xa:
—Leꞌa Dios nsobwiꞌi leꞌa naꞌ lá nchandoꞌ xabgiꞌi baꞌ.
Tsoꞌoma wa leꞌa bexa nde sa wa ubii wats Pedr ndab bexa:
—Ta ugeaka leꞌa go no nak dub xmen xa baꞌ, leꞌa go ndadiꞌizh lak ndadiꞌizh bexa Galilea.
Leꞌa Pedr cha ngokloo ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—¡Nsobwiꞌi Dios leꞌa naꞌ lá nchandoꞌ xa baꞌ!
Zha leꞌa dub boy utezh.
Weꞌe leꞌa Pedr cha mtseꞌa ladna ta ndab Jesús: “Leꞌa teꞌal ndee gor biseata kwezh boy, leꞌa lu mkwiꞌinla chon biaj ndab lu leꞌa lu lá nchandoꞌ naꞌ.” Cha utoꞌo Pedr tsoꞌo juer, cha uzhebpa mbiꞌin xa.
Leꞌa ngol gor ngot xeꞌa, leꞌa itea be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no bexa gox nsak ten bexa judio dubtsa mbidiꞌizh xteꞌe gun bexa gan gat Jesús.
Cha mxi bexa Jesús cha mbiꞌi bexa xa ndoꞌ Poncio Pilat, xa nibeꞌe idub región wa.

Leꞌa Judas xa na li myun cuent Jesús wa, gor uniꞌí xa leꞌa bexa wa dubtsa mbidiꞌizh gat Jesús, cha mgondoꞌ xa leꞌa xa ugap mbin. Cha mbiꞌi xa isagalntiꞌi med plata wa sa nde be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no bexa gox nsak wa.
Cha ndab Judas ndoꞌ bexa:
—Leꞌa naꞌ mbin dub ta ugap, myun naꞌ cuent dub xa gat, mas ni lá ndap xa ke.
Ná leꞌa bexa wa cha ndab:
—Leꞌa besa naꞌan xá gealnyuꞌ ná ta li mbin lu wa. Leꞌa ta wa cuent ten lu nak.
Weꞌe leꞌa Judas cha udabi be med wa len niꞌi ten Dios. Cha utoꞌo xa sa wa, cha ulo xa doꞌo gen xa, mtsebe xa gen xa.
Leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe cha mkanleꞌe be med wa, cha ndab bexa:
—Lá nsabndoꞌ guntiꞌin beuna med ndee cuent be med gon, leꞌa‑yá ngoktiꞌin ndontsa gat dub men.
Cha mbidiꞌizh bexa isiꞌi bexa dub bleꞌa yo ten dub xa ndandeꞌe be ta btsiꞌin, ndontsa sa weꞌe igaꞌach tal ton bexa sit gat gezh Jerusalén.
Ta weꞌe gast nat leꞌa yo wa nsaleaꞌ Yo Ten.
Li ngok‑a lak ndab Jeremías xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta, ndab xa: “Usen bexa galntiꞌi med plata, lak mbidiꞌizh bexa Israel kix bexa.
Leꞌa med wa cha usiꞌi bexa yo ten xa ndandeꞌe be ta btsiꞌin. Leꞌa ta wa ta ndab Dios ndoꞌ naꞌ.”
Leꞌa gor nsoꞌ Jesús ndoꞌ Pilat xa nibeꞌe wa, leꞌa Pilat cha unabdiꞌizh ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Lu nak xa nibeꞌe ten bexa judio zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Goka ndab‑a.
Weꞌe leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no bexa gox nsak wa sian taꞌa msake Jesús, ná leꞌa Jesús ni lá utsakndoꞌ.
Leꞌa Pilat cha ndabgal ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Lá ndoꞌón lu be ta sian li nsake bexa baꞌ lu zha?
Parea leꞌa Jesús ni dub diꞌizh lá ikaꞌab, cha uzheꞌeb ngwanseana Pilat.
Leꞌa itea liꞌin zha ndal ujest Pascua wa, leꞌa Pilat ngoꞌo dub men nkea litgiꞌib, tal ton nlad be men itoꞌo.
Leꞌa zha wa uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi nsaleaꞌ Barrabás nkea litgiꞌib, dub xa uniꞌí itea be men xtaꞌan ta ugap mbin xa.
Leꞌa gor mzhealbe be men ta lid Pilat, leꞌa Pilat cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—¿Ton nlad bega ula naꞌ, Barrabás nate Jesús xa ndab be men nak Cristo?
Leꞌa Pilat uniꞌí leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe nxee ladna ndoꞌ Jesús ta na mas kwaꞌad men ndeseano Jesús, ta weꞌe myun bexa cuent Jesús.
Leꞌa gor na li nsob Pilat sa nibeꞌe Pilat wa, leꞌa xagots ten xa mtuꞌub dub xa gab ndoꞌ xa: “Naꞌan xteꞌe gunno lu xabgiꞌi wen wa, leꞌa naꞌ uzhebpa mzheb dub ta mcheꞌano lad naꞌ xa teꞌal.”
Parea leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no bexa gox nsak mkiꞌil be men wa inab bexa igoꞌo Pilat Barrabás litgiꞌib, cha gat Jesús.
Ta weꞌe leꞌa gor na unabdiꞌizhgal Pilat ndoꞌ be men ná ton ndoꞌ itop bexa wa nlad bexa igoꞌo Pilat, leꞌa be men wa cha ndab:
—¡Bgoꞌo ga Barrabás!
Leꞌa Pilat cha ndab:
—¿Xteꞌe gunno naꞌ Jesús xa ndab be men nak Cristo zha?
Leꞌa iteanak bexa wa cha ugeꞌ ndabbe:
—¡Ikea xa ndoꞌ cruz!
Leꞌa Pilat cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan dub ta ugap mbin xa zhaga?
Parea leꞌa be men wa ndi mas ugeꞌ ndab:
—¡Ikea xa ndoꞌ cruz!
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí Pilat leꞌa Pilat lá gun gan ndoꞌ bexa leꞌa bexa ndi mas ndakloobe, cha usen Pilat dub ta ncho nits. Cha mnaꞌa Pilat ndoꞌ gaꞌal be men wa, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa naꞌ naꞌanpa leꞌa ndap ke gat xa wen ndee. Leꞌa ta wa cuent ten bega nak.
Weꞌe leꞌa iteanak be men wa cha ndabbe:
—Leꞌa besa ndee no be xin besa leꞌa ndap ke gat xa baꞌ.
Weꞌe leꞌa Pilat cha mgoꞌo Barrabás litgiꞌib. Cha ndab Pilat ndoꞌ be soldad kin bexa Jesús, cha ukeꞌa bexa Jesús ndoꞌ cruz.
Leꞌa be soldad ten Pilat cha mbiꞌi Jesús len lid Pilat sa nsaleaꞌ pretorio. Cha mzhealbe kwaꞌadta be soldad gangeak wats Jesús.
Cha ulate bexa xab Jesús, no mgak bexa Jesús dub lad koꞌol ta nane.
No msob bexa dub ta rued xos yagich gek Jesús cuent coron. Cha msob bexa dub bar yaꞌa Jesús lad gaꞌal. Cha msaxib bexa ndoꞌ Jesús mbin usaladno bexa Jesús, ndab bexa:
—¡Siꞌil nak xa nibeꞌe ten bexa judio!
Cha mchukko bexa ndoꞌ Jesús, cha ute bexa bar nsén Jesús, cha leꞌaka bar wa nlaꞌ bexa gek Jesús.
Leꞌa gor na mtayun usaladno bexa Jesús, cha ulate bexa lad nane nak Jesús. Cha mgak bexa Jesús leꞌaka xab Jesús, cha nchaꞌano bexa Jesús sa ikea xa ndoꞌ cruz.
Leꞌa gor utoꞌo be soldad sa wa, cha mzheꞌal bexa dub xabgiꞌi nsaleaꞌ Simón xa gezh Cirene. Cha mbin bexa juers goꞌo xa cruz ten Jesús.
Cha ngol gor ulayaꞌ bexa sa nsaleaꞌ Gólgota, dub diꞌizh gab tit gek men.
Cha msaꞌa bexa vin kwi mbich ta ulaꞌpa goo Jesús. Ná leꞌa gor na mbin xa preb‑a, cha lá kaꞌabta xa goo xa‑yá.

Cha mkeꞌa be soldad Jesús ndoꞌ cruz, cha uloꞌo bexa dub suert ndontsa iniꞌí bexa ná ton ikaꞌa be xab Jesús. Li ngok‑a lak ndab dub xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta, ndab xa: “Uloꞌo bexa dub suert ndontsa iniꞌí bexa ná ton ikaꞌa be xab naꞌ.”
Cha ndeulaꞌach be soldad xa sa wa.
Leꞌa gek cruz ten Jesús wa mkeꞌa bexa dub letr ndab ná xtaꞌan li nkea xa ndoꞌ cruz, ndab‑a: “TA NDEE JESÚS, XA NIBEꞌE TEN BEXA JUDIO.”
Nsea top waꞌan mkeꞌa bexa ndoꞌ cruz wats Jesús, dub xa wats lad gaꞌal Jesús, nsea stub xa wats lad raves.
Leꞌa be men nseabetid sa wa xela uníꞌi ndoꞌ Jesús, nkwiꞌin bexa gek bexa,
ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Lu ndab leꞌa lu ulate niꞌi ten Dios, cha ixiste lu‑yá wizh yontsa. Nat byun libr leꞌaka lu. ¡Tal lu Xin Dios, ulaꞌ ndoꞌ cruz baꞌ!
No liga leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no be mech ten ley no bexa fariseo no bexa gox nsak wa ndun usaladno Jesús, ndab bexa ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa bexa:
—Leꞌa xa baꞌ leꞌa ngokno be men, ná lá gun xa gan ulat xa leꞌaka xa ndoꞌ gealgut. Tal leꞌa xa baꞌ xa nibeꞌe ten beuna xa Israel, ilaꞌ xa ndoꞌ cruz, cha gungea ladna beuna xa.
Leꞌa xa baꞌ ndab leꞌa ngeꞌ ladna Dios. Nat gakno Dios xa tal leꞌa Dios nlad, leꞌa xa baꞌ ndab leꞌa xa Xin Dios.
No liga leꞌa itop waꞌan nkea ndoꞌ be cruz wats Jesús wa xela uníꞌi ndoꞌ Jesús.
Leꞌa ngol gor gawizh leꞌa idub ndoꞌ gizhliyo mkaw gast gor nkea uyon gor uzhe.
Leꞌa ngol gor nkea uyon wa leꞌa Jesús ugeꞌ ndab:
—Elí, Elí, ¿lama sabactani? —leꞌa ta wa dub diꞌizh gab: Dios ten naꞌ, Dios ten naꞌ, ¿xtaꞌanxá mlalad go naꞌ zhaga?
Leꞌa ncho bexa nde sa wa gor na mbiꞌín bexa ta li ndab Jesús wa, cha ndab bexa:
—Leꞌa xa baꞌ nbezh Elí.
Zha leꞌa dub bexa wa utoꞌo karrel, nchaꞌdob dub lad xiꞌil, cha ulo xa‑yá ndoꞌ vinagr. Cha msob xa‑yá gek dub yalod ndontsa goo Jesús ta wa.
Parea leꞌa iteata bexa wa ndab ndoꞌ xa wa:
—Kweas go, leꞌa beuna iniꞌí naga siꞌid yakno Elí xa.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ugeꞌgal utezhat, cha ngut xa.
Zha leꞌa lad utaꞌa ncho bseꞌa len niꞌi ten Dios cha usaw gast gaꞌap no gast ilaꞌ, ngok top bleꞌa‑yá. No ngok xoꞌo gast uleꞌa be geꞌ ubiꞌi,
no myaꞌal be geꞌloꞌo sa mgaꞌach be men ngut. Cha myaste kwaꞌad bexa ngut, bexa nak xmen Dios.
Cha utoꞌo bexa wa len baꞌa wa. Leꞌa tsoꞌo na mbangal Jesús, cha uyote bexa wa Jerusalén cha uniꞌí kwaꞌad be men bexa.
Leꞌa gor ngok xoꞌo nsea iteata be taꞌa wa, leꞌa xa nibeꞌe ten soldad no iteata be soldad ndeulaꞌach Jesús wa cha uzhebpa mzheb, ndab bexa:
—Ta ugeaka leꞌa xabgiꞌi ndee Xinka Dios.
Leꞌa sa wa sittsa ndewiꞌi kwaꞌad be xagots, bexa na utoꞌo Galilea usankea bexa tsoꞌo Jesús, no ngokno bexa Jesús nes nchaꞌa xa Jerusalén.
Leꞌa lat bexa wa no Marí xa gezh Magdala nsoꞌ, no Marí xnaꞌa Jacob nsea Kosé, no xnaꞌa be xin Zebedeo.
Leꞌa ngol gor uzhe cha ulen dub xabgiꞌi rik nsaleaꞌ Kosé, xa gezh Arimatea, dub xa no ndangea ladna Jesús.
Leꞌa xa wa ngwaꞌ ndoꞌ Pilat, cha unab xa Jesús. Leꞌa Pilat cha unibeꞌe ulaꞌa be soldad goꞌo Kosé Jesús.
Cha uxeꞌe Kosé Jesús ndoꞌ cruz wa, cha mtixko xa Jesús dub lad koꞌol ta umbiꞌi.
Cha ulo xa Jesús len dub baꞌa cuent geꞌloꞌo, dub ta tlaw myan ndoꞌ geꞌdaꞌa. Cha mtixte xa dub geꞌ siꞌil toꞌo baꞌa wa, cha nseaꞌ xa.
Leꞌa sa wa nde Marí xa Magdala no stubga Marí lad toꞌo baꞌa wa.
Leꞌa ngot xeꞌa stubga wizh dub wizh neꞌe bexa judio, leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no bexa fariseo ngwaꞌ ndoꞌ Pilat,
ndab bexa:
—Señor, leꞌa besa ntseꞌa ladna leꞌa Jesús xa ukwiꞌin wa ndab gor na bi nban xa leꞌa xa wizh yontsa iban ndoꞌ gealgut.

Ta weꞌe nab besa ndoꞌ go inibeꞌe ga yaꞌulaꞌach be soldad toꞌo baꞌa gast wizh yon. Tal naꞌanpa li gun ga leꞌa be xmen xa giꞌid gor teꞌal, cha goꞌo bexa wa xa. Cha ukwiꞌin bexa gab bexa ndoꞌ be men leꞌa xa wa mbanla ndoꞌ gealgut. Tal leꞌa bexa li ukwiꞌin leꞌa ta wa mas ugap ndoꞌ lak mkwiꞌin Jesús wa.
Weꞌe leꞌa Pilat cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—Ulaꞌachka be soldad sa wa. Waꞌ bega cha btsaw chá bega toꞌo baꞌa wa lak ndák bega.
Weꞌe leꞌa bexa wa cha nchaꞌbe, cha ulo bexa dub taꞌa toꞌo baꞌa wa, natsa iniꞌí bexa tal ton uxaꞌal‑a. Cha myanbe be soldad sa wa ulaꞌach bexa‑yá.
Ngol utid wizh neꞌe bexa wa, gor ngot xeꞌa wizh ned ten sman, leꞌa Marí xa Magdala no stubga Marí nchaꞌwiꞌi baꞌa wa.
Weꞌe cha ngok dub xoꞌo siꞌil. Leꞌa dub angel ten Dios utoꞌo gibeꞌa ulaꞌ sa wa, cha udob xa geꞌ toꞌo baꞌa wa, cha usob xa tsoꞌo‑yá.
Leꞌa angel wa ndon nduꞌu naꞌ cuent bealꞌ usiꞌi. No xab xa ndon mbe xiꞌil naꞌ.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí be soldad ta wa, uzheꞌeb nzheb bexa gast nxis bexa, cha ulayat bexa ndoꞌ yo cuent bexa ngut.
Leꞌa angel ndab ndoꞌ be xagots wa:
—Lá izheb bego, leꞌa naꞌ uníka leꞌa bego nkwaꞌan Jesús, xa ngut ndoꞌ cruz.
Leꞌa xa naꞌan sa ndee, leꞌa xa ndi mbanla lakka ndab xa. Utseawiꞌi bega sa mkaꞌach bexa xa.
Cha uxax byaꞌ bega, cha gud bega ndoꞌ be xmen Jesús leꞌa xa mbanla ndoꞌ gealgut. No nchaꞌa nedla xa ndoꞌ bexa wa Galilea, leꞌa sa wa iniꞌígal bexa xa. Leꞌa naꞌ ta ndeekama nsabndoꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego.
Weꞌe leꞌa be xagots wa nzheb, parea uzhebpa nten ladna bexa. Cha uxax mkaꞌan bexa wats baꞌa wa, karrel nseaꞌbeyab bexa‑yá ndoꞌ be xmen Jesús. Leꞌa nes nseaꞌbe be xagots wa,
ngi zha uniꞌí bexa leꞌa Jesús nseala nes, cha unidiꞌizh Jesús ndoꞌ bexa. Cha ubii bexa wats Jesús, msaxib bexa ndoꞌ xa. Cha udiꞌid bexa xoꞌo Jesús, ndankea bexa xa.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa:
—Lá izheb bega. Byaꞌyab bega ndoꞌ be xmen naꞌ, bexa cuent nak wit naꞌ, yaꞌbe bexa Galilea, leꞌa sa wa iniꞌígal bexa naꞌ.
Ndalen li nchaꞌbe be xagots nes wa, leꞌa pla be soldad nlaꞌach toꞌo baꞌa wa uyote gezh wa, cha mbidiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ be uleꞌay nibeꞌe wa iteanak be ta li uyoꞌo wa.
Leꞌa bexa nibeꞌe ten uleꞌay wa cha ngwaꞌyadiꞌizhno bexa gox nsak ten bexa judio ná xteꞌe gun bexa. Weꞌe cha msaꞌa bexa sian med ndoꞌ be soldad wa,
ndab bexa:
—Gud bega leꞌa be xmen Jesús mbiꞌid gor teꞌal cha mbiwaꞌan bexa Jesús gor ndeyats bega.
Tal leꞌa xa nibeꞌe wa goꞌón‑a, leꞌa besa leꞌa ikaꞌab sakndoꞌ bega, ndontsa naꞌan xtaꞌan gunno xa bega.
Weꞌe leꞌa be soldad wa cha usen be med wa, cha mbidiꞌizh bexa lak ndab be uleꞌay wa. Leꞌa ta wa gast wizh nat li ndadiꞌizh bexa judio lak mkwiꞌin be soldad wa.
Weꞌe leꞌa isatibdub be xmen Jesús nchaꞌbe Galilea, gast bet sa ndabka Jesús yaꞌbe bexa wa.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí bexa Jesús, cha ngwankea bexa xa, parea ncho bexa bi lá ndangea ladna ti leꞌa Jesús xa wa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ubii wats bexa, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa Dios msaꞌa juers nibeꞌe naꞌ iteanak be ta ncho gibeꞌa no ndoꞌ gizhliyo.

Ta weꞌe waꞌ bega idub nax ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndoꞌ be men itea be nacion, bluu bega bexa xteꞌe gak bexa xmen naꞌ. Cha ulaleaꞌ bega bexa, guntiꞌin bega leaꞌ Dios Xus naꞌ, no lea naꞌ xa nak Xin Dios, no leaꞌ Espíritu ten Dios.
Bluu bega bexa uxobgek bexa iteanak ta unibeꞌe naꞌ ndoꞌ bega. Lá yalad bega leꞌa naꞌ nkeseano tseꞌe bega gast initndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee. Lika nak‑a.
Mark: Lndeꞌe usaxan diꞌizh wen ten Jesucristo, Xin Dios,
lak mkeꞌa profet Isaías sakndoꞌ Dios ndab xa:
Unaꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ utuꞌub dub xa yaꞌ ned ndoꞌ lu gudiꞌizh diꞌizh ten naꞌ,
ndontsa listla kwe be men gal zha ilen lu.
Leꞌa xa wa ikeseyadiꞌizh geꞌe sa bid, ugeꞌ gab xa:
“Bin parej bega nes ilen Xa Nibeꞌe.
Bkeasoꞌ bega nes ten xa.”
Leꞌa xa wa Juan, xa uyoꞌo geꞌe sa bid. Ulaleaꞌ xa be men len nits, no ndab xa ulaꞌa bexa be ta ugap nak bexa, no italeaꞌ bexa, ndontsa utsuꞌu Dios be ke ten bexa.
Leꞌa kwaꞌad bexa Jerusalén no bexa idub distrit Judea utoꞌo nchaꞌyoꞌón diꞌizh ten Juan. Leꞌa gor na mgondoꞌ bexa be ke ten bexa, leꞌa Juan cha ulaleaꞌ bexa len nits yowbeꞌe Jordán.
Leꞌa xab Juan nakndeꞌe gich las came, nsea dub sinch gid nde len xa. Leꞌa xa ndaw mbit, nsea mzhin ser ndo xa.
Ndadiꞌizh Juan, ndab xa ndoꞌ be men:
—Leꞌa tsoꞌo naꞌ ndee ilen stub xa mas nsak ndoꞌ naꞌ. Leꞌa naꞌ ni lá isayaꞌ kote ndab xa wa.
Leꞌa naꞌ nits‑tsa ngoleaꞌ bega, ná leꞌa xa ilen tsoꞌo naꞌ ndee koleaꞌ be men no Espíritu ten Dios.
Ngol dub wizh leꞌa Jesús utoꞌo gezh Nazaret ten distrit Galilea. Nchaꞌa Jesús sa nsoꞌ Juan, cha ulaleaꞌ Juan Jesús len nits yowbeꞌe Jordán.
Leꞌa gor na utoꞌo Jesús len nits wa, leꞌa Jesús uniꞌí myaꞌal gibeꞌa. Leꞌa Espíritu ten Dios cuent dub palom nchaꞌlaꞌ sa nsoꞌ Jesús.
No ulen ti Dios gibeꞌa ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Lu nak Xiꞌín naꞌ. Leꞌa naꞌ nkweaꞌ ladna lu, no ntenno lad naꞌ lu.
Leꞌa Espíritu ten Dios cha mbiꞌi Jesús geꞌe bid sa naꞌan men.
Leꞌa sa wa uyoꞌo Jesús dub top gaꞌal wizh lat be man geꞌe wa. Weꞌe ulen maxuꞌu uzheꞌeb mbin preb Jesús nlad maxuꞌu utsabgix Jesús. Tsoꞌo wa cha ulen be angel ten Dios mlaꞌach bexa Jesús.
Tsoꞌo na mkeꞌa be men Juan litgiꞌib, leꞌa Jesús cha nseaꞌ leꞌaka Galilea, ukesea uluu xa be men diꞌizh wen ten Dios ná xteꞌe nibeꞌe Dios be men.
Ndab xa:
—Leꞌa tiemp yá ngol. Leꞌa zha inibeꞌe Dios ladoꞌo be men yá gax nak. Blaꞌa bego be ta ugap nak bega, no bingea ladna bega diꞌizh wen ten Dios.
Leꞌa dub gor nchasea Jesús toꞌo lagun siꞌil nsaleaꞌ Galilea, cha uniꞌí xa Simón nsea Ndres wit Simón, ndeutsaꞌab red ten na len nits, leꞌa bexa wa xa nsen mbeal.
Cha ndab Jesús:
—Usankea bega tsoꞌo naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ uluu xteꞌe yunjunt bega be men ndoꞌ Dios.
Bi leꞌa gor wa cha mlaꞌa bexa be red ten bexa, cha nchaꞌano bexa Jesús.
Weꞌe cha usea bexa stub tuzh sa. Cha uniꞌí Jesús dub xa nsaleaꞌ Jacob nsea stub xa nsaleaꞌ Juan wit Jacob. Leꞌa bexa wa ndiꞌib ndoꞌ dub barco ndego ramient be red ten na.
Cha utezh Jesús itop wit bexa. Leꞌa bexa wa cha mchansoꞌ xus na Zebedeo ndoꞌ barco wa no be mos ten bexa. Leꞌa Jacob no Juan cha nchaꞌano Jesús.
Cha uyote bexa len gezh Capernaum. Leꞌa ngol wizh neꞌe be men, leꞌa Jesús cha nchaꞌuluu be men len niꞌi sa nzhealbe bexa judio gezh wa.
Leꞌa be men wa ndanseana xteꞌe ndadiꞌizh xa, leꞌa ta ndadiꞌizh xa wa nluu leꞌa xa uzheꞌeb ndap juers, naꞌanpa lak nluu be mech ten ley.
Leꞌa len niꞌi wa nsob dub xabgiꞌi nsak gizh tont ncho mbi bxin len ladoꞌo na. Leꞌa ta wa ugeꞌ ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Xtaꞌan nsea ugal lu besa, Jesús xa Nazaret? ¿Nati nsea unitndoꞌ lu besa zha? Naꞌ uní ton nak lu, leꞌa lu xa umbiꞌi mtuꞌub Dios.
Leꞌa Jesús uteyo mbi bxin wa, ndab xa:
—¡Kexga lu! ¡Utoꞌo len ladoꞌo xa baꞌ!
Weꞌe leꞌa mbi bxin wa udabi xabgiꞌi wa, cha utezhat xa, cha utoꞌo mbi bxin wa len ladoꞌo xa.
Weꞌe leꞌa itea be men wa ngwanseana, nabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa xa, ndab bexa:
—¿Xteꞌe nak ta ndee zha? Leꞌa xa nluu dub taꞌa ni gol goꞌón beuna, no uzheꞌeb ndap xa juers, gast be mbi bxin nxobgek ndoꞌ ta ndab xa.
Leꞌa ta li mbin Jesús wa cha uxax mgen idub Galilea.
Leꞌa gor na utoꞌo bexa len niꞌi wa, leꞌa Jesús nchaꞌano Jacob nsea Juan ta lid Simón nsea Ndres.
Leꞌa xnazhaꞌap Simón nax ncho xlea. Leꞌa gor na ndab bexa‑yá ndoꞌ Jesús,
leꞌa Jesús cha ubii sa nax xa wa, usen xa yaꞌa xa, cha uxiste Jesús xa. Cha bi leꞌa gor wa mtoꞌo xlea xa, cha msaꞌa xa ta gaw bexa wa.
Leꞌa gor na ngwaꞌasla wizh cha nsea teꞌal, leꞌa be men ulenno kwaꞌadpa bexa gizh nsea bexa nsak gizh tont ncho mbi bxin len ladoꞌo na.
Leꞌa idub gezh men myakjunt toꞌo niꞌi wa.
Leꞌa Jesús myunyakna kwaꞌadpa be men nsén isandoꞌ gealgizh, nsea ulantuꞌub Jesús be mbi bxin ncho len ladoꞌo be men wa. Lá ulaꞌa xa ngudiꞌizh be mbi bxin, geal leꞌa be ta wa uniꞌí ton nak Jesús.
Ngol gor bi teꞌalta leꞌa Jesús ngwaste, cha nchaꞌa xa dub sa naꞌan men, sa na ngwaꞌyadiꞌizhno xa Dios.
Leꞌa Simón no stapla bexa utoꞌo nchaꞌkwaꞌan Jesús.
Ná gor na mzheal bexa Jesús, cha ndab bexa ndoꞌ xa:
—Leꞌa be men weꞌe itea nkwaꞌan ga.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Nchaꞌbe beuna be gezh gax ndee. Uluꞌu naꞌ be men, leꞌa naꞌ tiꞌin weꞌe ndal ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha nchasea be gezh idub distrit Galilea, nluu xa be men len be niꞌi sa nzhealbe bexa judio, nsea ulantuꞌub Jesús be mbi bxin ncho len ladoꞌo be men.
Leꞌa dub wizh ulen dub xabgiꞌi wats Jesús, dub xa nsaꞌgea las na, leꞌa ta wa dub gealgizh nsaleaꞌ lepra. Cha msaxib xa ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab xa:
—Tal go nlad yunyakna go naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ uní leꞌa ga sunka gan.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mlats ladna xa wa, cha mxoꞌob Jesús yaꞌa na tsoꞌo xa wa. Cha ndab Jesús:
—Nladka naꞌ yakna lu. Nat myakna lu.
Bi leꞌa gor wa leꞌa gealgizh wa cha unitndoꞌ, cha myakna las xa.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha unibeꞌe ndoꞌ xa, ndab Jesús:
—Nat syoꞌo gan yaꞌ lu.

Naꞌan ton ndoꞌ ná gudiꞌizh lu xteꞌe myakna lu. Dubgaꞌal ndoꞌ uleꞌay waꞌ uluu las lu, leꞌa lu myaklana. Nsea biꞌi be man xnab lak nibeꞌe ley mkeꞌa Moisés usaꞌa be men zha nyakna bexa, ndontsa iniꞌí be men leꞌa lu myaklana.

Ná leꞌa nes nseaꞌ xabgiꞌi wa, usaxan ndadiꞌizh xa ndoꞌ be men xteꞌe myunyakna Jesús xa. Ta weꞌe leꞌa Jesús lá yoota gan gaꞌal yate ni dub len gezh wa. Sbeꞌen dub lad sa naꞌan men ukesea xa, ná leꞌa be men itea lad utoꞌo nchaꞌbeka wats Jesús.
Ngok stapla wizh mtanchaꞌgal Jesús gezh Capernaum. Weꞌe mbiꞌín be men pa niꞌi na ncho Jesús.
Cha uxax mzhealbe kwaꞌad men sa wa, gast ni toꞌo niꞌi wa lá ugalta kwe be men. Cha mluu Jesús bexa diꞌizh ten Dios.
Leꞌa gor wa ulayaꞌ dap men nchaꞌano dub xabgiꞌi gizh lá yoo gan isea.
Ná leꞌa tant kwaꞌad be men nde sa wa, leꞌa bexa lá yoꞌo gan ibii wats Jesús. Cha ndi ukea bexa gek niꞌi wa, mxaꞌal bexa‑yá gaꞌal‑la sa nsoꞌ Jesús. Cha mlaꞌko bexa yaloꞌon nax xa gizh wa ndoꞌ na.
Leꞌa Jesús mnaꞌla leꞌa bexa mgeꞌ ladna leꞌa Jesús sun gan yunyakna xa gizh wa. Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ xa:
—Amig, leꞌa be ke ten lu myuꞌula.
Ná leꞌa be mech ten ley ndebe sa wa cha mbinbeꞌebe:
“¿Xtaꞌan ngi li ndab xa ndee zhaga? Leꞌa ta ndab xa uzheꞌeb dub ta lá nsak ladna Dios. ¿Ton isuꞌu utsuꞌu be ke ten be men zha? Nabtsa Dios suꞌu.”
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha mgenna xteꞌe ndanbeꞌe bexa wa. Cha ndab Jesús:
—¿Xtaꞌan lbaꞌa ndanbeꞌe bega zha?
¿Xtaꞌan mas lid bid gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ xa gizh ndee, leꞌa ke ten xa myuꞌula, nati gáp naꞌ gaste xa, cha kob xa yaloꞌon ten xa, cha isea xa?
Leꞌa nat iniꞌí bega leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, no syoꞌo gan utsuꞌu be ke ten be men.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ xa gizh wa:
—Gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ lu goste, cha udob yaloꞌon ten lu baꞌ, cha byaꞌ ta lid lu.
Leꞌa xa wa uxax ngwaste, cha udob xa yaloꞌon ten xa. Cha utoꞌo xa sa wa ndoꞌ gaꞌal iteanak be men. Leꞌa itea bexa nde sa wa ngwanseana, ndab bexa leꞌa Dios uzheꞌeb dub Dios juert, no ndab bexa:
—Ta ndee dub ta nunk beuna gol niꞌí.
Tsoꞌo wa nchaꞌagal Jesús toꞌo lagun wa. Leꞌa kwaꞌad men ulen wats Jesús, cha mluu Jesús bexa diꞌizh ten Dios.
Leꞌa sa nchaꞌtid Jesús wa uniꞌí Jesús dub xabgiꞌi nsaleaꞌ Leví xin Alfeo. Leꞌa Leví wa nsobyun tiꞌin nsen xa med nkix be men ndoꞌ gobier Roma. Cha ndab Jesús:
—¡Utsea! ¡Usankea tsoꞌo naꞌ!
Leꞌa Leví cha ngwasoꞌ, cha usankea xa tsoꞌo Jesús.
Ngol tsoꞌo wa leꞌa Jesús nsea be xmen xa ngwaꞌdaw ta lid Leví. No kwaꞌad be men nchaꞌano Jesús sa wa, bexa ndun ltsaꞌa tiꞌin mbin Leví, nsea kwaꞌadta bexa na ndab be men ugap nak bexa.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí be mech ten ley no bexa fariseo leꞌa Jesús nsobyawno bexa ugap no bexa nsen med, cha weꞌe unabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ be xmen Jesús, ndab bexa:
—¿Xtaꞌan ndawno Jesús bexa nsen med baꞌ no iteata bexa ugap baꞌ zha?
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín Jesús ta wa, cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ bexa wa:
—Leꞌa be men naꞌanpa gizh lá nkiꞌin doctor, ndi leꞌa xa gizh nkiꞌinka xa wa. Leꞌa naꞌ naꞌanpa ndalteꞌezh bexa ndanbeꞌe leꞌa lá ndap ke; naꞌ ndi ndalteꞌezh bexa ngondoꞌ leꞌa ndap ke.
Leꞌa be xmen Juan nsea be xmen bexa fariseo ncho be wizh lá ndaw bexa ndontsa mas yankea bexa Dios. Weꞌe ngol dub wizh leꞌa pla be men ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Leꞌa be xmen Juan nsea be xmen bexa fariseo ncho wizh lá ndaw bexa. Ná leꞌa be xmen ga zha, ¿xtaꞌan lid no bexa li ndun ta wa?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—¿Nsak bega zha leꞌa dub sa nchilyaꞌa men leꞌa bexa nde sa wa lá nsabndoꞌ gaw, zha bi ncho xabgiꞌi mchilyaꞌa wa?
Parea gal dub wizh leꞌa be men goꞌo xabgiꞌi mchilyaꞌa wa. Weꞌe leꞌa bexa nde sa wa lá gaw dub tiemp.
’Naꞌan ton ngo ramient lad gox nsea dub bleꞌa lad kub. Tal leꞌa xa li gun, leꞌa lad kub wa syaꞌad, cha ndi mas stsaw‑a lad gox wa.

No naꞌan ton ngo vin kub len dub bols gid gox. Tal leꞌa xa li gun leꞌa bich ten vin kub stsaw bols gid gox wa. Leꞌa vin wa cha ibid stsiꞌi no sazhaꞌa bols gox wa. Leꞌa vin kub wa nsabndoꞌ yoo len bols gid kubga.
Leꞌa ngol dub wizh neꞌe be men leꞌa Jesús nchaꞌtid sa nax dub bleꞌa yo ncho trig. Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha uxeꞌe pla be bid ten trig.
Leꞌa ncho bexa fariseo cha ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Unaꞌ go, ¿xtaꞌan lbaꞌa ndun bexa baꞌ, ta na lá nsabndoꞌ gun bexa wizh neꞌe beuna zha?
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Ni lá ndoꞌol bega sa ndab diꞌizh ten Dios ta na mbin David dub biaj, zha na uzhebpa ndanna xa no bexa ndeseano xa zha?
Leꞌa David uyoꞌo len niꞌilad ten Dios, zha na ngok Abiatar uleꞌay ndon leꞌa nsak, cha udaw xa be pan leꞌay, ta lá nsabndoꞌ gaw dub men naꞌanpa nak uleꞌay. No msaꞌa xa‑yá ndoꞌ bexa ndeno xa.
No ndab Jesús ndoꞌ bexa:
—Leꞌa Dios msaꞌa wizh neꞌe be men ndontsa gakno‑yá be men. Naꞌanpa mbindeꞌe Dios be men yankea bexa wizh wa.
Ta weꞌe leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, noga nibeꞌe wizh neꞌe beuna.
Leꞌa stub wizh uyoꞌo Jesús len niꞌi sa nzhealbe bexa judio gezh wa. Leꞌa sa wa nsob dub xabgiꞌi ubidya dub yaꞌa na.
