’¡Proꞌob bego mech ten ley no bexa fariseo! Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega xa ugap. Leꞌa bego nak cuent dub baꞌa ni lá nluu. Leꞌa be men nsea tsoꞌo‑yá, parea ni lá iniꞌí bexa xtaꞌan‑a.
Leꞌa dub mech ten ley ukaꞌab ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Mech, leꞌa go no ndoꞌ besa kweaꞌ uníꞌi.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¡Proꞌob bego mech ten ley! Leꞌa be ta sian nluu bega wa cuent dub yoꞌo kweꞌa ni lá uxik be men goꞌo‑yá. Ná leꞌa bega ni dub ngutsyaꞌa na lá ndakno bexa goꞌo bexa‑yá.
’¡Proꞌob bego! Leꞌa be usan gox polta ten bega mbit bexa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios. Ná nat leꞌa bega ndi ndandeꞌe ta chul nsob sa mgaꞌach bexa wa.
Leꞌa ta wa nluu leꞌa bega dubtsaka nak no be usan gox polta ten bega. Leꞌa bexa wa mbit bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios, ná nat leꞌa bega nsaxkwaꞌaga baꞌa ten bexa wa.
’Ta weꞌe lndeꞌe ndab Dios: “Leꞌa naꞌ utuꞌubkata bexa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ naꞌ, no bexa ndadiꞌizh diꞌizh ten naꞌ. Leꞌa ncho bexa utuꞌub naꞌ wa leꞌa be men gut xa, no ncho bexa leꞌa be men ugap gunno xa.”
Ta weꞌe leꞌa bego ncho tiemp nat gap ke ten itea bexa ugap li ndut bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios wa gast idub zha utexanta gizhliyo.

Leꞌa ta wa gast zha ngut Abel no gast zha ngut Zacarías, mbit be men xa wa wats altar dub lad wats niꞌi ten Dios. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa Dios utsaksi be men ncho nat ke ten iteanak be ta mbin bexa polta wa.
’¡Proꞌob bego mech ten ley! Leꞌa bega nka igondoꞌ be men Dios. Leꞌa bega lá nchandoꞌ Dios, no ni lá nlaꞌa bega igondoꞌ bexa Dios.
Leꞌa gor na mtayadiꞌizh Jesús, leꞌa be mech ten ley no bexa fariseo uzhebpa ndakloobe ndoꞌ Jesús. Cha usaxan bexa unabdiꞌizh bexa sian ta ugan,
nlad bexa gab Jesús dub ta lid leꞌa nak, ndontsa ke weꞌe usake bexa Jesús.
Leꞌa gor wa leꞌa sian mil be men ulayaꞌ wats Jesús, gast nsoꞌ bexa tsoꞌo xoꞌo ltsaꞌa bexa tant dub kwaꞌad bexa. Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Uzhebpa gop bega cuent nsea levadur ten bexa fariseo, leꞌa bexa nluꞌu cuentta xa wen, ná leꞌa bexa ugap nak.
Leꞌa itea be ta ugaꞌach, leꞌa gal gor leꞌa be ta wa uluꞌukabe. No itea be ta ngachyoꞌo, leꞌa gal gor leꞌa be men iniꞌíka ta wa.
Ta weꞌe leꞌa itea ta ndadiꞌizh bega dub sa ukaw, leꞌa ta wa sgenka ndoꞌ xeꞌa. No itea ta xgaꞌach ndadiꞌizh bega len niꞌi, leꞌa ta wa gast idub gezh sgenka.
’Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego nak amig ten naꞌ, lá izheb bega ndoꞌ bexa ndut men, leꞌa bexa wa ta weꞌetsa sun gan gun.
Ndi gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega ná ton ndoꞌ ná nsabndoꞌ izheb bega: bzheb bega ndoꞌ Dios, xa na sun gan gut be men, cha utsaꞌab xa gealnaban ten bexa infierno. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego, ndoꞌ xa weꞌe bzheb bega.
’Leꞌa dub gaꞌay migin nzheꞌa top med byux, ná leꞌa cuent ten Dios leꞌa kadga dub migin wa nsak.
Lá izheb bega leꞌa bega mas nsak ndoꞌ be migin. Leꞌa Dios uzhebpa nlaꞌach bega gast uniꞌí xa plo gichgek bega.
No ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa tal ton gab ndoꞌ be men leꞌa xa xmen naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, noga gáp ndoꞌ be angel ten Dios leꞌa xa xmenka naꞌ.
Parea leꞌa tal ton gab ndoꞌ be men leꞌa xa naꞌanpa xmen naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ noga gáp ndoꞌ be angel ten Dios leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa xmen naꞌ.
’Leꞌa tal ton inisi naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, leꞌa Dios sungeꞌka ladna ta wa. Ná leꞌa tal ton inisi Espíritu ten Dios, leꞌa Dios lá gungeꞌ ladna ke wa.
’Leꞌa bega yak cuent ndoꞌ bexa nibeꞌe ten bexa judio no ndoꞌ be juez no ndoꞌ bexa naktiꞌin. Parea lá yuꞌ ladna bega xteꞌe ikaꞌab bega, no xteꞌe utsakndoꞌ bega,
leꞌa Espíritu ten Dios leꞌa uluu xteꞌe gab bega gor wa.
Leꞌa lat be men kwaꞌad wa utoꞌo dub xa ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Mech, gud go ndoꞌ wit naꞌ ite besa be taꞌa msaꞌa xus besa.
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab ndoꞌ xa wa:
—Naꞌan ton msoꞌ naꞌ gak naꞌ juez ite naꞌ be taꞌa ten bega.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be men wa:
—Blaꞌach bega naꞌanpa isaꞌab ladna bega gap bega sian taꞌa, leꞌa be ta sian ndap dub men lá isuꞌu gun wen yoo xa.
No msaktabeꞌe Jesús dub taꞌa mluu xa ndab xa:
—Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi rik uzhebpa ngok taꞌa ndoꞌ yo ten xa.
Cha mbinbeꞌe xa wa: “¿Xteꞌe gun naꞌ nat? ¿Pa kochaꞌaw naꞌ be ta sian ndee?”
Tsoꞌo wa mbinbeꞌe xa: “Naꞌ uníla xteꞌe gunno naꞌ‑yá. Naꞌ ulate be sa nyochaꞌaw be taꞌa ten naꞌ. Cha gunde naꞌ stapla be sa mas ubiꞌi, sa yoo be ta sian ndee no iteata be taꞌa ndap naꞌ.
Cha gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ naꞌ leꞌa naꞌ ndap sianpa be ta gaw na sian liꞌin. Cha une naꞌ, no gaw naꞌ, no goꞌo naꞌ, no iten lad naꞌ.”
’Ná leꞌa Dios ndab: “Mgiꞌi, ngud nak lu. Leꞌa teꞌal nat leꞌa lu gat. ¿Cha ton yaꞌanno be ta sian ulochaꞌaw lu baꞌ zha?”
Nsea ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be men:
—Li nak be men na nlad gap sian taꞌa ndoꞌ gizhliyo, parea leꞌa ndoꞌ Dios leꞌa xa uban nak.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Ta weꞌe leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega lá yuꞌ ladna bega xtaꞌan gaw bega ndontsa iban bega. No ni lad gak bega lá yuꞌ ladna bega.
Leꞌa gealnaban ten bega mas nsak ndoꞌ be ta gaw bega, no leꞌa bega mas nsak ndoꞌ be xab bega.

Binbeꞌe bega lak nak be migin, ni lá ndas ma bid, no ni lá nteleꞌe ma ta gaw ma, no ni lá ndap ma dub sa nyochaꞌaw ta gaw ma, ná leꞌa Dios ngawka ma. ¿Lá iniꞌí bega zha leꞌa bega uzhebpa mas nsak ndoꞌ be migin?
No ni dub bega tal leꞌa xa uzhebpa yuꞌ ladna, lá gun xa gan gaꞌal xa ni stol metr.
Tal leꞌa bega ni ta tuzh wa lá yoo gan gun, ¿xtaꞌan ngi nyuꞌ ladna bega iteata be taꞌa zhaga?

’Bwiꞌi bega ndoꞌ be géꞌe no xteꞌe ndiꞌibyaꞌal‑a, parea ni lá ndun‑a tiꞌin, no ni lá ndandeꞌe‑yá lad. Ná leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa lat itea be lad uzhebpa wen ngok Salomón naꞌan dub lad chul lakta dub géꞌe.

Leꞌa Dios lita chul ndanno be géꞌe ndiꞌib be geꞌe, ná ta gal geꞌatsa yabtoꞌog‑a cha yolꞌ‑a. Parea leꞌa bega uzhebpa mas nsak ndoꞌ dub géꞌe, ta weꞌe leꞌa Dios saknokaga bega maska ndidotsa ngeꞌ ladna bega Dios.
Ta weꞌe lá gunbeꞌe bega xtaꞌan gaw bega no xtaꞌan goo bega. Ni lá yuꞌta ladna bega ta wa.
Leꞌa be men lá nchandoꞌ Dios wa itea be ta ndee nkwaꞌan xa, ná leꞌa Dios Xus beuna uniꞌíka xtaꞌan nkiꞌin bega.
Ndi bkwaꞌan bega xteꞌe gak bega dub men leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe, weꞌe leꞌa Dios saꞌaka iteanak be ta nkiꞌin bega.
’Lá izheb bego nak cuent be borreg ten naꞌ, leꞌa Dios Xus bega usaꞌa sa nibeꞌe xa yoo bega.

Bdoꞌo bega be ta ten bega, cha btseꞌa bega med wa ndoꞌ bexa uban nak. Tal leꞌa bega li gun, leꞌa bega li kochaꞌaw sian taꞌa gibeꞌa. Leꞌa ta wa cuent dub bols lá gak gox, dub sa na ni waꞌan lá yoo gan yate, no ni mbes lá gaw‑a.
Tal leꞌa bega li gun ta wen wa, weꞌe leꞌa bega mas ukwaꞌan ta nsak ladna Dios.
’List ute bega, no isengiꞌla xeꞌa ten bega.
Gok bega cuent dub mos nkenkeaꞌ gor ilen xa nibeꞌe ten xa, mtoꞌo xa sa mchilyaꞌa men. Leꞌa gor ilaꞌnchaꞌ xa wa cha kwezh xa mos, leꞌa mos wa listla nsoꞌuxaꞌal sa yoo xa.
Uzhebpa wen yoo ladna be mos ndenaꞌbe gor ilaꞌnchaꞌ xa nibeꞌe ten na. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa xa nibeꞌe wa cha gab ndoꞌ mos isob xa ndoꞌ mes, cha usaꞌa xa ta gaw mos wa.
Guniꞌi xá gor ilen xa, tal ilen xa utol teꞌal natal ilen xa gor nsayat xeꞌa, tal leꞌa be mos wa listka nde, leꞌa bexa wa wen yoo.
’Parea leꞌa naꞌ nlad yakbeꞌena bega ta ndee: leꞌa tal leꞌa dub xwan niꞌi uniꞌí xá gor giꞌid dub waꞌan ta lid xa, leꞌa xa isob ulaꞌach ndontsa naꞌanpa yoo waꞌan len lid xa kowaꞌan be taꞌa ten xa.
Ta weꞌe no bega list ute, leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ilengal dub gor ni lá ndanbeꞌe bega ti ilen naꞌ.
Leꞌa Pedr cha unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ Jesús ndab:
—Señor, ta msaktabeꞌe go wa, ¿ndab ga ta wa ndoꞌtsa besa zha, nate no ndoꞌ itea be men?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Ton bega nak cuent dub mos ndák ndun lak ndab dub xwan niꞌi? Leꞌa xwan niꞌi wa uchaꞌan mos wa inibeꞌe xa stapla bexa ndun tiꞌin ten xa wa, no usaꞌa mos ta gaw bexa.
Leꞌa gor na ilaꞌnchaꞌ xwan niꞌi wa uzhebpa wen yoo ladna mos ndun lak ndab xa wa.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa xwan niꞌi wa usoꞌ mos wen wa, inibeꞌe xa itea be ta ndap xa wa.
Ná tal leꞌa mos wa dub xa ugap, gunbeꞌe xa gab xa leꞌa xa nibeꞌe ten xa nleꞌata ilen. Cha ndi isaxan xa kin xa iteata be mos wa, be xabgiꞌi no be xagots. No gaw xa no goo xa no gun xa gealgu.
Weꞌe leꞌa xwan niꞌi wa cha ilaꞌnchaꞌ dub wizh no dub gor ni lá ndanbeꞌe mos ti ilen xa. Cha uzhebpa utsaksi xa mos wa lak ntsaksi xa itea be mos lá nxobgek.
’Tal leꞌa dub mos uniꞌíka xtaꞌan nlad xa nibeꞌe ten na, ná ni lid list ngun xa, no ni lá ngun xa ta nlad xa nibeꞌe ten xa, leꞌa xa wa uzhebpa gealkweaꞌ iniꞌí.

Ná tal leꞌa dub mos ni lá nchandoꞌ xteꞌe nak ta nlad xa nibeꞌe ten na, cha ndun xa ta na nsabndoꞌ utsaksi bexa xa, leꞌa xa wa mas uxee gealkweaꞌ iniꞌí. Leꞌa itea bexa na mas sian taꞌa msaꞌa Dios ndák xa, leꞌa bexa wa liga sian tiꞌin nsabndoꞌ gun ndoꞌ Dios. No leꞌa bexa na mas sian taꞌa nsaꞌa Dios ulaꞌach bexa, leꞌa bexa wa liga nsabndoꞌ mas uxobgek ndoꞌ Dios.
’Leꞌa naꞌ ndal utsengiꞌ ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee. Leꞌa naꞌ nlad malay‑a nsayolꞌla.
Leꞌa naꞌ ned nsabndoꞌ itiꞌid ndoꞌ dub gealkweaꞌ siꞌil, no uzheꞌeb kweaꞌ ncho lad naꞌ gast itiꞌid naꞌ ta wa.
Lá gunbeꞌe bega leꞌa naꞌ ndee ndal ndontsa uzheꞌeb wen kwe be men ndoꞌ gizhliyo. Leꞌa naꞌ ndi ndal leꞌa be men iteltsaꞌa.
Leꞌa nat idubta ndoꞌ ndee, tal leꞌa dub niꞌi ncho gaꞌay men leꞌa chon xa wa gakloo ndoꞌ stop xa, no stop xa wa gakloga ndoꞌ yon xa wa.

Ncho be xabgiꞌi gakloo ndoꞌ be xinbgiꞌi na; no leꞌa be xin xa gakloga ndoꞌ xa. Leꞌa ncho be xagots gakloo ndoꞌ be xingots na; no leꞌa be xingots xa gakloga ndoꞌ xnaꞌa na. Leꞌa be xagots no gakloo ndoꞌ xinxix na; no leꞌa xinxix xa gakloga ndoꞌ leꞌaka xnazhaꞌap xa.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be men kwaꞌad wa:
—Leꞌa gor na naꞌ bega nlen xkaw lad ndaꞌas wizh, cha ndab bega leꞌa gi ilaꞌ, cha lika ndak‑a.
No zha na nlen mbi lad sur, cha ndab bega leꞌa wizh wa uzhebpa utii gak, cha likaga ndak‑a.
¡Leꞌa bega nluu cuentta xa wen, ná bega xa ugap! Nyakbeꞌena bega xteꞌe nak ta naꞌ bega gibeꞌa baꞌ no be ta gizhliyo ndee, ná ni lá nyakbeꞌena bega ta ndun Dios tiemp nat.
’Bwiꞌi bega naga leꞌa nak ta ndun bega.
Leꞌa tal ton nlad usake bega, waꞌyadiꞌizhno bega xa gor biseata isoꞌ xa ndoꞌ juez. Leꞌa tal xa usake bega ndoꞌ juez, leꞌa juez cha yun cuent bega ndoꞌ xa nlaꞌach litgiꞌib, cha ukeꞌa litgiꞌib xa bega.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa bega lá itoꞌo sa wa gast kixka bega iteanak ta nsaꞌab bega wa.
Leꞌa gor wa leꞌa be men cha ndab ndoꞌ Jesús, xteꞌe mbit be soldad ten Pilat pla bexa Galilea, gor na nsaꞌa bexa man xnab ndoꞌ Dios.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Nsak bega zha leꞌa ta na li ngwasea bexa Galilea wa li ngok geal leꞌa bexa mas ndap ke ndoꞌ iteata be men Galilea zha?
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa ta wa naꞌanpa li nak. Leꞌa tal bega lá ulaꞌa be ta ugap nak bega, leꞌa itea bega no sat.
¿Nati nsak bega zha leꞌa isatiꞌin bchon be men na li ngut gor ulayat torre Siloé tsoꞌo bexa wa mas ndap ke ndoꞌ itea bexa ndencho Jerusalén wa?
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa ta wa naꞌanpa li nak. Tal leꞌa bega lá ulaꞌa be ta ugap nak bega, leꞌa bega itea sat.
Cha msaktabeꞌe Jesús dub taꞌa mluu xa, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa dub xabgiꞌi ndap dub ya nsaꞌa ngus laꞌaw. Leꞌa ya wa nsob ndoꞌ yo sa ncho ya uv ten xa wa. Cha ngol gor ngwaꞌkwaꞌan xa ngus ndoꞌ ya laꞌaw wa, ná lá izheal xa‑yá.
Cha ndab xa ndoꞌ mos ten xa, xa nlaꞌach be ya wa: “Unaꞌ, leꞌa chonla liꞌin nchasea ndalkwan naꞌ ngus ndoꞌ ya ndee, ná lá nzheal naꞌ‑yá. Nat ulobtoꞌog‑a, ndontsa ndi gaktiꞌin sa nsob‑a.”
Leꞌa xa na nlaꞌach ya wa cha ukaꞌab ndab ndoꞌ xa wa: “Señor, blaꞌa ga‑yá liꞌin ndeetsa. Leꞌa naꞌ uxach xan‑a no koꞌo naꞌ kweal‑a.
Tal leꞌa‑yá saꞌa ngus, lbaꞌatsa nsob‑a. Ná tal lá usaꞌa‑yá ngus, weꞌe yabtoꞌog‑a.”
Leꞌa dub wizh neꞌe bexa judio, leꞌa Jesús nluu bexa len dub niꞌi sa nzhealbe bexa wa.
Leꞌa sa wa ulen dub xagots tsoꞌotek dub tiꞌin bchonla liꞌin, ni lá yoo gan isoꞌgaꞌal xa. Leꞌa ta wa ta mbinno dub mbi bxin xa.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí Jesús xagots wa, cha utezh Jesús xa, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ xagots wa:
—Xagots, leꞌa lu myaklana.
Cha mxoꞌob Jesús be yaꞌa na tsoꞌo xa. Leꞌa xa wa cha usoꞌgaꞌal, cha msaꞌa xa xno ndoꞌ Dios.
Parea leꞌa xa nchansu niꞌi wa cha ngokloo ke na myunyakna Jesús xa wa dub wizh neꞌe bexa judio, ndab xa ndoꞌ be men:
—Xoꞌop wizh nsabndoꞌ gun beuna tiꞌin. Leꞌa len be wizh wa syoꞌo gan giꞌid bega yakna bega, naꞌanpa be wizh neꞌe beuna ndee.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Leꞌa bego lá ndun lak ndab bega wa. ¿Lak bego lá nxaꞌak bega xgon bega no xburr bega, ndaꞌugo bega ma nits wizh neꞌe beuna zha?
Leꞌa maxuꞌu dub tiꞌin bchonla liꞌin li mbinno xagots ndee, dub xa ras Abraham. ¿Lid nsabndoꞌ yakna xa wizh neꞌe beuna zha?
Leꞌa gor na li ndab Jesús, leꞌa itea bexa na ndakloo ndoꞌ Jesús wa cha mdo ladnabe. Ná leꞌa be men kwaꞌad wa uzhebpa mten ladna no be ta wen ndun Jesús.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan dub taꞌa nak lak nibeꞌe Dios be men? ¿Xteꞌema gudiꞌizh naꞌ‑yá?
Leꞌa ta wa nak cuent ta ngwasea dub bid ten mostas, ta ngos dub xabgiꞌi ndoꞌ dub bleꞌa yo ten na. Cha ngoꞌol‑a gast ngok‑a dub ya siꞌil, gast be migin mbindeꞌe xuꞌun ten na ndoꞌ xos‑a.
No ndab Jesús:
—¿Xtaꞌan stub taꞌa nak lak nibeꞌe Dios?
Leꞌa ta wa nak lak nyak levadur. Leꞌa dub xagots mgoch dub tuzh‑a dub top gaꞌal kil arin. Ngol tsoꞌo wa leꞌa idub koꞌob arin wa usabich.
Leꞌa nes nchaꞌa Jesús Jerusalén, leꞌa xa nluu be men ncho be gezh ubiꞌi no be gezh byux.
Weꞌe leꞌa dub men unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ Jesús ndab:
—Señor, ¿ndidotsa bexa gap gealnaban nunk lá idub zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab ndoꞌ be men:
—Bin bega juers yate bega toꞌo puert uyaꞌa. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa kwaꞌadpa bexa nlad yate sa wa, ná leꞌa bexa lá gun gan.

Leꞌa gor na yá mtsawla xwan niꞌi toꞌo puert wa, leꞌa bega yaꞌanbe tsoꞌo juer utsiꞌid toꞌo niꞌi wa, gab bega: “Señor, bxaꞌal ga toꞌo niꞌi yoo besa.” Parea leꞌa xwan niꞌi wa ndi ikaꞌab gab: “Naꞌ ni lá nchandoꞌ bega.”
Weꞌe leꞌa bega isaxan gab: “Leꞌa besa udawno ga, no nguno besa ga. No mbidiꞌizh ga ndoꞌ besa be ndoꞌ xgeꞌe ten besa.”
Leꞌa xa wa cha ikaꞌab gab: “Leꞌa naꞌ lá nchandoꞌ bega. Nat bxoꞌon bega wats naꞌ, bego xa ndun ta ugap.”

Weꞌe leꞌa bego iniꞌí leꞌa Abraham no Isaac no Jacob no itea be profet wa nde wats Dios sa nibeꞌe Dios, ná leꞌa bega ndi dub lad tsoꞌo juer yaꞌanbe. Cha uzhebpa goꞌon bega no gaw bega ndeay bega, tant dub gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí bega.
’Leꞌa uzhebpa kwaꞌad be men ilen itea lad ndoꞌ gizhliyo, kwe bexa ndoꞌ mes sa nibeꞌe Dios.
Leꞌa ncho bexa naꞌanpa nsak nat wa, gal gor leꞌa bexa yak bexa nsak. No liga ncho bexa nsak nat wa, gal gor leꞌa bexa wa yak bexa naꞌanpa nsak.
Bi leꞌa wizh wa ulayaꞌ pla bexa fariseo ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Bkaꞌan sa ndee leꞌa Herodes ndab gut lu.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Byaꞌ bega cha gud bega ndoꞌ mbeas wa, leꞌa naꞌ bi ngontuꞌub be mbi bxin len ladoꞌo be men, no nyunyakna naꞌ be men gizh. Parea yamer usandoꞌ naꞌ tiꞌin ten naꞌ wa.
Leꞌa nat guniꞌi xtaꞌan yoo leꞌa naꞌ nda Jerusalén sa na nsabndoꞌka gaa naꞌ. Leꞌa dub xa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios naꞌanpa nsabndoꞌ gat dub lad sa nde Jerusalén.

’Leꞌa bego ndencho Jerusalén, leꞌa bega ndut bexa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios, no nlaꞌgeꞌ bega bexa na ntuꞌub Dios ndoꞌ bega. Sian biaj nlad naꞌ yunjunt naꞌ bega, lak nyunjunt dub ngidtsan be ngid ben ten ma len xkwag ma, ná leꞌa bega nunk lá kaꞌab.
Blaꞌach bega, leꞌa nat leꞌa Dios ulaꞌalad bega. No gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega leꞌa bega yá naꞌantapa iniꞌí naꞌ gast gal wizh gab bega: “Dios uzhebpa nlaꞌach xa baꞌ, xa na mtuꞌub Dios Xa Nibeꞌe.”
Leꞌa dub wizh neꞌe bexa judio leꞌa dub xa nibeꞌe ten bexa fariseo mbiꞌi Jesús, nchaꞌdaw bexa ta lid xa. Leꞌa sa wa leꞌa bexa fariseo nlaꞌach ná xteꞌe gun Jesús.
Ná leꞌa lad ndoꞌ Jesús nsob dub xa uzhebpa ncho giꞌ.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ be mech ten ley no ndoꞌ bexa fariseo:
—¿Nsabndoꞌ yunyakna beuna dub xa gizh wizh neꞌe beuna zha nate naꞌan?
Ná leꞌa bexa ni lá ikaꞌabbe. Leꞌa Jesús cha mgal las xa gizh wa, cha myunyakna Jesús xa, cha ndab xa yaꞌ xa wa.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ bexa nde sa wa:
—Tal leꞌa bega ndap dub burr natal dub ngon, cha ilaꞌyoꞌo ma len dub so wizh neꞌe beuna, ¿lid cha uxax yaꞌloꞌo bega ma bi leꞌaka wizh wa zha?
Leꞌa bexa wa ni lá yoꞌota gan xteꞌe ngabbe.
Leꞌa Jesús nsoꞌwiꞌi ndoꞌ bexa na ulo xa fariseo kombid ndoꞌ na wa, ná xteꞌe mti bexa sa mas nsak isob bexa. Cha mtenxeꞌa Jesús bexa xteꞌe nsabndoꞌ gun bexa, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa gor na ko dub men kombid ndoꞌ bega dub sa uchilyaꞌa xa, lá isob bega sa mas nsak. Leꞌa gal gor na ilen stub xa mas nsak ndoꞌ bega,
cha gab xwan niꞌi wa usaꞌa bega sa wa isob xa mas nsak wa. Weꞌe leꞌa bega uzhebpa ido ladna yatsob bega gast tsoꞌo li.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndi usob bega mas sitxá, ndontsa gor na ilen xwan niꞌi wa, leꞌa xa ndi gab: “Amig, utsea isob lu mas gax ndee.” Weꞌe leꞌa be men iniꞌí leꞌa bega xa nsak.
Leꞌa tal ton gunbeꞌe leꞌa mas nsak, leꞌa gal gor leꞌa xa ido ladna. No liga leꞌa tal ton yak tuzh ndoꞌ be men, leꞌa gal gor leꞌa be men iniꞌí leꞌa xa wa nsakka.
No ndab Jesús ndoꞌ xa na ulo kombid wa:

—Leꞌa gor na gun lu dub gast, lá ko lu kombid ndoꞌ be amig ten lu, ni ndoꞌ be wit lu, ni ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa lu, ni ndoꞌ bexa rik ncho gax sa ncho lu. Ná nchaꞌa xa gal gor no ko kombid ndoꞌ lu, cha litsa myoꞌsoꞌ ta mbin lu wa.
Leꞌa gor na gun lu dub gast, utezh bexa prob no bexa moch no bexa coj no bexa lá naꞌ.
Li ndontsa wen yoo ladna lu, leꞌa bexa wa lá gun gan kix ta wa. Ná leꞌa Dios kixka ta wa gal wizh na ibangal bexa na ndun lak nlad Dios.
Weꞌe leꞌa dub xa na nsobno Jesús ndoꞌ mes wa gor na mbiꞌín xa ta wa, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¡Uzhebpa wen yoo ladna xa na no gaw sa nibeꞌe Dios!
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa wa:
—Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi ulo dub gast siꞌil ugaw xcheꞌe xa kwaꞌadpa be men.
Leꞌa ngol gor na yaꞌgaw bexa, leꞌa xa wa cha mtuꞌub dub mos ten xa, yaꞌyab xa ndoꞌ bexa wa gidbe bexa leꞌa itea taꞌa listla nak.
Parea leꞌa itea bexa wa cha ndab leꞌa bexa lá yoo gan yaꞌ. Leꞌa xa ned wa ndab: “Bingeꞌ ladna go, leꞌa naꞌ tiꞌi usiꞌi dub bleꞌa yo, ta weꞌe lá yoo gan isea naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ tiꞌi gawiꞌi yo wa.”
Leꞌa xa itop wa cha ndab: “Bingeꞌ ladna go, leꞌa naꞌ tiꞌi usiꞌi gaꞌay nes ngon, ta weꞌe lá yoo gan isea naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ tiꞌi gayun preb ma.”
Leꞌa stub xa cha ndab: “Leꞌa naꞌ tiꞌi mchilyaꞌa, ta weꞌe lá yoo gan isea naꞌ.”

Leꞌa mos wa cha myach myaꞌyab xa ta wa ndoꞌ xa nibeꞌe xa. Weꞌe leꞌa xa wa cha ngokloo, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ mos wa: “Uxax waꞌ ndoꞌ xgeꞌe baꞌ no be nes ten gezh ndee. Cha biꞌi bexa prob sa ndee no bexa moch no bexa coj no bexa lá naꞌ.”
Leꞌa mos wa cha nchaꞌ ndab xa ndoꞌ xwan niꞌi wa: “Señor, leꞌa naꞌ mbín ta ndab go wa, parea leꞌa ta lid ga ndee siꞌilta nsaꞌab.”
Leꞌa xa nibeꞌe wa cha ndabgal ndoꞌ mos: “Waꞌ be nes ubiꞌi no be nes byux, cha bin juers giꞌid bexa sa ndee, ndontsa izheaka ta lid naꞌ ndee.
Leꞌa bexa ned uloꞌo naꞌ kombid ndoꞌ na wa ni dub xa lá gawno naꞌ.”
Leꞌa tsoꞌo wa uzhebpa kwaꞌad be men nchaꞌano Jesús. Leꞌa Jesús cha mgeaksoꞌ mwiꞌi ndoꞌ bexa, ndab xa:

—Tal ton nlad isankea tsoꞌo naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa nsabndoꞌ mas yankea naꞌ ndoꞌ xus xa no xnaꞌa xa no xagots ten xa no be xin xa no wit xa no bsan xa. No mas yankea xa naꞌ ndoꞌ leꞌaka leꞌa xa. Tal leꞌa xa lid li gun, leꞌa xa lá yoo gan gak xmen naꞌ.
Leꞌa tal ton lá goꞌo cruz ten na cha isankea xa tsoꞌo naꞌ, leꞌa xa wa lá yoo gan gak xmen naꞌ.
’¿Nati ton bega nlad gundeꞌe dub niꞌi siꞌil, lid ned ngoꞌo bega cuent naga ndap bega dub lak med itatsoꞌ yandoꞌ niꞌi wa zha?
Tal leꞌa bega utexan niꞌi wa, cha lá gun bega gan yandoꞌ‑yá, leꞌa itea be men na iniꞌí‑yá uxiꞌidno bega.
No gab bexa: “Leꞌa xabgiꞌi ndee msobxan niꞌi, parea lá ngun xa gan yandoꞌ‑yá.”
¿No xá rey na kuyono stubga rey, lid ned ngoꞌo xa cuent naga sun dub tiꞌi mil xmen xa gan kuyono dub gaꞌal mil xmen stubga rey wa zha?
Tal leꞌa xa uniꞌí leꞌa xa lá gun gan, leꞌa gor na bi sitta nseabe bexa, leꞌa xa utuꞌub dub xmen na yaꞌinabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ stub rey wa ná plo taꞌa usaꞌa xa ndontsa lá kuyo bexa.
No liga bego na lá ulaꞌa itea be taꞌa ndap na, leꞌa bega lá yoo gan gak xmen naꞌ.
’Leꞌa sed wa ta wen, parea tal leꞌa‑yá itoꞌo utix ten na, ¿xteꞌema yak utix‑a stub biaj zha?
Weꞌe leꞌa sed wa yá lá isuꞌuta, no ni kweal lá isuꞌu‑yá gak‑a, ndi yabitsa‑yá. Bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, blaꞌach bego ta ndáp naꞌ ndee.
Leꞌa kwaꞌad bexa nsen med nkix be men ndoꞌ gobier no kwaꞌadta bexa ugap ulen wats Jesús, goꞌón bexa ta ndadiꞌizh Jesús.
Leꞌa bexa fariseo no be mech ten ley cha unisi Jesús, ndab bexa:
—Leꞌa xa baꞌ nchealtsaꞌa bexa ugap, no ndawno xa bexa baꞌ.
Cha msaktabeꞌe Jesús dub taꞌa mluu xa ndab xa:
—Tal leꞌa dub bego ndap dub gayoꞌo borreg, cha ulaꞌ dub ma, ¿lá ulaꞌa bega isadap gaꞌal ncho tiꞌin bdap ma wa geꞌe wa zha, cha ndi yaꞌkwaꞌan bega ma na li ulaꞌ wa, gast plo izhealka bega ma?
Leꞌa gor na mzheal bega ma, leꞌa bega iten ladna uxoꞌob bega ma tsoꞌo xik bega yoꞌo bega ma.
Leꞌa gal gor na ilanseaꞌ bega, cha uchealte bega be amig ten bega no bexa ncho gax wa. Cha gab bega: “Bten ladna bega lakta nten lad naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ mzheal‑la borreg ten naꞌ, ma ulaꞌ wa.”
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa Dios no be angel li mas nten ladna gor na nyach dub xa ugap wats Dios, ndoꞌ isadap gaꞌal ncho tiꞌin bdap bexa wen, bexa lá ikiꞌinta yach bexa wats Dios.
’Tal leꞌa dub xagots ndap dub tiꞌi med nsak, cha mlaꞌ xa dub‑a, ¿naꞌanpa cha ukegiꞌ xa dub xeꞌa ged zha, cha ndon ku uloꞌob xa len lid xa, gast plo izhealka xa‑yá?
Leꞌa gor na yá mzheal xa‑yá, cha gab xa ndoꞌ be amig ten xa no ndoꞌ bexa ncho gax wa: “Bten ladna bega lakta nten lad naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ mzheal‑la med ulaꞌ wa.”
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego li nten ladna be angel ten Dios gor na nyach dub men ugap wats Dios.
No ndab Jesús:
—Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi ndap top xinbgiꞌi na.
Leꞌa xa tuzh wa cha ndab ndoꞌ xus na: “Bsaꞌa ga be ta na ndal naꞌ.” Leꞌa xus xa cha mtseꞌa be ta ten na ndoꞌ bexa wa.
Ngol stapla wizh leꞌa xa tuzh wa cha mdoꞌo itea be ta li ukaꞌa xa wa, cha nchaꞌa xa stubga nacion sit. Leꞌa sa wa mbin gast xa med ten xa wa ndoꞌ be taꞌa ni lid nsabndoꞌ gun xa.
Leꞌa tsoꞌo na mteꞌa xa med wa, leꞌa sa wa uyoꞌo dub win siꞌil. Leꞌa xa wa no lá ndapla ta gaw na.
Cha mkwaꞌan xa tiꞌin gun xa ndoꞌ dub men ncho sa wa. Leꞌa xa wa mtuꞌub xa yaꞌkeno xa be kuch.
Leꞌa ta na lita ndanna xa wa, gast nlad xa gaw xa gix ndaw kuch wa. Ná leꞌa xwan kuch wa lá usaꞌa ta gaw xa.
Cha mbinbeꞌe xa: “Plota mos ndap xus naꞌ ta lid na no sian be ta ndaw xa ndap xa. Ná naꞌ gast ngi sat tant ndanna naꞌ.
Nat leꞌa naꞌ nsea ta lid xus naꞌ, gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ xa: Leꞌa naꞌ mbin dub ta ugap ndoꞌ Dios no ndoꞌ go.
Yá lá nsabndoꞌ gab go leꞌa naꞌ xin ga. Leꞌa naꞌ ndi gak masa dub mos ten ga.”
Weꞌe cha utoꞌo xa, nseaꞌ xa ta lid xus xa.
’Leꞌa gor na bi sitta nseaꞌ xa, leꞌa xus xa uniꞌíla xa, cha uzheꞌeb mlats ladna xus xa xa. Weꞌe utoꞌo xus xa karrel, cha udiꞌid xa xin xa.
Leꞌa xin xa cha ndab: “Leꞌa naꞌ mbin ta ugap ndoꞌ Dios no ndoꞌ go. Yá lá nsabndoꞌta gab go leꞌa naꞌ xin ga.”
’Parea leꞌa xus xa ndi unibeꞌe ndoꞌ be mos ndab xa: “Utseano bega dub lad ndon leꞌa wen gak xa, no dub ganil yoo yaꞌa xa, no dub nes gelgid ukeꞌa xa.
No waꞌyoꞌo bega dub bser, ma ndon leꞌa ugeladna. Cha bit bega ma, leꞌa beuna ko dub gast siꞌil.
Leꞌa xiꞌín naꞌ ndee cuent dub xa ngutla, ná leꞌa xa mbangal. Leꞌa xa ndee dub xa ulaꞌ, ná nat mzhealgal naꞌ xa.” Cha usaxan ulo bexa gast wa.
’Leꞌa gor wa leꞌa xin ned xa wa ndi geꞌe nkesea. Ngol gor na nsalanseaꞌ xa gax ta niꞌi, leꞌa xa mbiꞌínla ruid ten be musk no ruid ten bexa ndeyalndatsbe.
Leꞌa xa cha utezh dub mos, cha unabdiꞌizh xa ndoꞌ xa wa ná xtaꞌan ncho.
Leꞌa mos wa cha ndab: “Leꞌa wit ga mlaꞌnchaꞌ. Leꞌa xus bega mbit bser ndaꞌal wa, geal leꞌa wit ga ndon wen mtanchaꞌ.”
’Cha ngokloo xa wa, lá nlad xa yoo xa len niꞌi. Leꞌa xus xa cha utoꞌo unab ndoꞌ xa yoo xa len niꞌi.
Leꞌa xa cha ukaꞌab ndab ndoꞌ xus xa: “Unaꞌ go plota liꞌin nxobgek naꞌ ndoꞌ ga, ndun naꞌ tiꞌin ten ga. Ná nunk go lá usaꞌa masa dub chiv koꞌo naꞌ dub gast no be amig ten naꞌ.
Ná nat mlaꞌnchaꞌ xin ga uloꞌo ga gast, mbit ga bser ndaꞌal wa, ná leꞌa xa wa ndi mbin gast be med ten ga lat be xagots ugap.”
Leꞌa xus xa cha ukaꞌab ndab: “Leꞌa lu nunkka lá nlaꞌa naꞌ. Leꞌa itea be ta ten naꞌ leꞌa ta wa ta tenka lu.
Leꞌa beuna nsabndoꞌka ko dub gast no iten ladna beuna, leꞌa wit lu ndee cuent xa yá ngutla, ná nat mbangal xa. Leꞌa xa cuent xa ulaꞌ, ná nat mzheꞌalgal min xa.”
No ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi rik, ndap xa dub mos nchansu be tiꞌin ten xa. Ngol dub wizh leꞌa be men msake xa ndoꞌ xa rik wa, ndab bexa leꞌa xa ndun gast med ndoꞌ dub ta ni lid nsabndoꞌ.
Weꞌe leꞌa xa rik wa cha utezh xa wa, ndab xa: “¿Xteꞌe nak ta na ndon naꞌ ndun lu? Uloꞌo cuent ten be tiꞌin ndun lu wa, leꞌa lu lá gakta xa yansu be tiꞌin ten naꞌ.”
Leꞌa mos wa cha mbinbeꞌe: “¿Xteꞌe gun naꞌ nat? Leꞌa xa ten tiꞌin ndee yá lá usaꞌata tiꞌin ndee gun naꞌ. Leꞌa naꞌ lá isuꞌu gun tiꞌin geꞌe. No ido lad naꞌ inaꞌab naꞌ med ndoꞌ be men.
Nat leꞌa naꞌ uníla xteꞌe gun naꞌ ndontsa gor na ulat xa tiꞌin ndun naꞌ ndee, leꞌa be men utsin gak ndoꞌ naꞌ ta lid bexa.”
’Leꞌa mos wa cha utezh kadga dub xa na nsaꞌab ndoꞌ xa rik wa. Cha ndab xa ndoꞌ xa ned wa: “¿Plo taꞌa nsaꞌab go ndoꞌ xa nibeꞌe naꞌ?”
Leꞌa xa wa cha ndab: “Dub dap mil litr aceit nsaꞌab naꞌ.” Leꞌa mos wa cha ndab: “Leꞌa git ndee gab plo taꞌa nsaꞌab go. Uxax bkeꞌa ga top mil litr.”

Cha ndab mos wa ndoꞌ stubga xa: “Go zha, ¿plo taꞌa nsaꞌab ga?” Leꞌa xa wa cha ndab: “Dub gayoꞌo ngoch trig nsaꞌab naꞌ.” Leꞌa mos wa cha ndab: “Leꞌa git ndee gab ná plo taꞌa nsaꞌab ga. Bkeꞌa ga dub dap gaꞌal ngoch‑a.”
Leꞌa xwan tiꞌin wa cha mgondoꞌ leꞌa mos wa list mbin. Leꞌa be men lá nchandoꞌ Dios mas listbe cuent ten be ta ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo, ndoꞌ be men nchandoꞌ Dios.
’Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega, bintiꞌin bega med gizhliyo ndee ndontsa li gun bega gan amig. Leꞌa gal zha na itea med ten bega ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee, gap bega dub sa yoo bega, sa nunk lá idub.
’Leꞌa xa na utsin nyansu dub tuzh taꞌa, leꞌa xa wa liga utsin syansu be ta sian. Leꞌa xa na ni dub tuzh taꞌa naꞌanpa utsin nyansu, leꞌa xa wa liga naꞌanpa utsin yansu be ta sian.
No liga leꞌa bego na naꞌanpa utsin nyansu be ta ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee, leꞌa Dios naꞌanpa usaꞌa taꞌa ta ugeaka nsak yansu bega‑yá.
Tal leꞌa bega naꞌanpa utsin nyansu be ta naꞌanpa ta ten bega, leꞌa Dios naꞌanpa usaꞌa be ta na ndiꞌizh ikaꞌa bega wa.

’Naꞌan ton yoo gan gun tiꞌin ndoꞌ top xa nibeꞌe ten na. Leꞌa gal gor leꞌa xa dubtsa xa ikea ladna, leꞌa ndoꞌ stub xa wa ixee ladna xa. No uxobgek xa ndoꞌ dubtsa xa, leꞌa ndoꞌ stub xa wa lá uxobgek xa. No liga tal leꞌa bega nkwaꞌan sian med, leꞌa bega lá isuꞌu gun tiꞌin ndoꞌ Dios.
Leꞌa bexa fariseo mbiꞌín ta li ndab Jesús wa, cha mxiꞌidno bexa Jesús, leꞌa bexa li nkwaꞌan sian med.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa wa:
—Leꞌa bega wen ndun ndoꞌ gaꞌal be men, ná leꞌa Dios nchandoꞌ ladoꞌo bega. Leꞌa be ta ni be men uzheꞌeb nsak, leꞌa cuent ten Dios leꞌa ta wa naꞌan xtiꞌin.

’Zha na biseata ilanseaꞌ Juan xa na ulaleaꞌ be men, leꞌa be ley mkeꞌa Moisés no ta na mkeꞌa bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios ndab xteꞌe gun be men. Ná leꞌa tsoꞌo wa ulen diꞌizh wen ten Dios, ta na ndab xteꞌe inibeꞌe Dios be men. Nat leꞌa kwaꞌad be men ndun juers gak bexa dub men leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe.
Parea leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa gibeꞌa no gizhliyo snitndoꞌ, ná leꞌa ni dub tuzh ley ten Dios naꞌanpa initndoꞌ.
’Leꞌa tal ton dub xabgiꞌi ulaꞌa xagots ten na, cha ikaꞌa xa stubga xagots, leꞌa xabgiꞌi wa ndapka ke ndoꞌ Dios. No liga tal stub xabgiꞌi ikaꞌaga xagots wa, leꞌa xa wa no ndap ke ndoꞌ Dios.
’Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi rik, ngok xa sbeꞌen lad uzheꞌeb uyap, ta konch ugats no ta nagud. Nsea itea wizh ngo xa dub gast uzhebpa wen ta lid xa.
No uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi prob nsaleaꞌ Lázaro uzhebpa gizh idub gid las xa. Leꞌa xa nsob tsoꞌo juer toꞌo lid xa rik wa.
Leꞌa xa prob wa nsaꞌab ladna gaw masa be taꞌa nlate toꞌo mes ten xa rik wa. No gast be mbek nlen ndawleꞌe las xa prob wa.
Ná ngol dub wizh leꞌa xa prob wa cha ngut. Leꞌa be angel ten Dios cha mbiꞌi xa, usob xa wats Abraham gibeꞌa. Tsoꞌo wa leꞌa xa rik wa no ngut, cha mgaꞌach xa.
’Ná leꞌa gor na uzhebpa kweaꞌ naxncho xa rik wa infierno, leꞌa xa mwiꞌi gaꞌap, sit mnaꞌ xa Abraham no Lázaro nsob wats xa.

Weꞌe leꞌa xa rik wa cha ugeꞌ ndab: “Xus naꞌ Abraham, blats ladna go naꞌ. Btuꞌub ga Lázaro ugazh xa masa dub ngutsyaꞌa xa, cha gidlo xa‑yá toꞌo naꞌ ndontsa igalad naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ uzhebpa kweaꞌ nchoꞌo ndoꞌ bealꞌ sa ndee.”
Leꞌa Abraham cha ndab: “Xiꞌín naꞌ, btseꞌa ladna lu leꞌa lu uzhebpa wen uyoꞌo ndoꞌ gizhliyo, ná leꞌa Lázaro ndee uzhebpa kweaꞌ uyoꞌo. Nat leꞌa Lázaro ndi wen ncho sa ndee, leꞌa lu kweaꞌ ncho sa baꞌ.
No stubga taꞌa gáp naꞌ: leꞌa sa nde besa ndee nsea sa nde bego baꞌ ncho dub bseꞌa uxenpa tlaw‑a. Ta weꞌe leꞌa besa nde sa ndee lá yoo gan yaꞌ sa baꞌ. No ni bego nde sa baꞌ lá yoo gan giꞌid sa ndee.”
’Leꞌa xa rik wa cha ndab: “Naꞌab naꞌ ndoꞌ go xus naꞌ Abraham, utuꞌub ga Lázaro ta lid xus naꞌ,
sa na ncho sgaꞌay be wit naꞌ, yaꞌyab xa lá gun bexa lak mbin naꞌ, ndontsa naꞌanpa no bexa wa iniꞌí gealkweaꞌ ndee.”
Leꞌa Abraham cha ndab: “Leꞌa bexa wa ndenoka ta mkeꞌa Moisés no ta mkeꞌa bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios. ¡Nsabndoꞌ gun bexa lak ndab ta wa!”
Leꞌa xa rik wa cha ukaꞌab ndab: “Xus naꞌ Abraham, leꞌa bexa wa ndenoka ta wa, parea tal leꞌa dub xa ngutla cha ibangal xa, weꞌe gudiꞌizh xa‑yá ndoꞌ bexa wa, leꞌa bexa slaꞌaka be ta ugap nak bexa.”
Ná leꞌa Abraham cha ndab: “Leꞌa tal leꞌa bexa lá gun lak ndab ta mkeꞌa Moisés no ta mkeꞌa bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios, leꞌa bexa wa ni likaga lá gungea ladna ta gudiꞌizh dub xa ibangal ndoꞌ gealgut.”
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Idub tiemp ncho ta ntsabgix be men ndoꞌ ta ugap, parea uzhebpa proꞌob dub xa ntsabgix stubga men.
Leꞌa tal ton utsabgix dub xa ndangea ladna naꞌ ndoꞌ ta ugap, leꞌa xa wa mas gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí ndoꞌ dub xa ikea dub geꞌ siꞌil gen na, cha utsaꞌab be men xa len nitsdoꞌo.
’¡Blaꞌach bega xteꞌe nak bega! Tal leꞌa dub ltsaꞌa bega ugap gunno bega, bidiꞌizhno bega xa ndontsa lá gunta xa ta wa. Tal leꞌa xa igondoꞌka ta li mbin xa wa, bingeꞌ ladna bega ta wa.
Ná tal leꞌa xa dub gaꞌad biaj ugap gunno bega dub wizhtsa, cha dub gaꞌadga biaj gab xa gungeꞌ ladna bega ta li mbin xa wa, leꞌa bega nsabndoꞌka gungeꞌ ladna ndoꞌ xa wa.
Leꞌa isatibtop be xmen Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa:
—Gokno ga besa ndontsa mas igeꞌ ladna besa Dios.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:

—Tal leꞌa bega ndidotsa ngeꞌ ladna Dios lak tuzh dub bid ten ya mostas, leꞌa bega sun gan gab ndoꞌ dub ya sicómoro baꞌ igiꞌib‑a sa nsob‑a, cha yaꞌtsob‑a len nitsdoꞌo. Weꞌe leꞌa ya baꞌ sunka lak ndab bega wa.
’Tal leꞌa bega ndap dub xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ bega, dub xa ngaꞌan ngon no nkeno xa be xman bega, leꞌa gor na mlaꞌnchaꞌ xa ngwaꞌ xa geꞌe, ni dub bega lá ndab ndoꞌ xa: “Uyoꞌo, cha usob ndoꞌ mes.”
Leꞌa bega ndi gab: “Bindeꞌe ta gaw xcheꞌe naꞌ, cha utseano‑yá. Cha list usoꞌ usaꞌa lu ta ikiꞌin naꞌ. Gast itayaw naꞌ weꞌeta gaw lu.”
No lá nsaꞌa bega xno ndoꞌ xa ndun tiꞌin ten bega wa geal mbintsa xa ta ndab bega.
No liga gok bega gor na yá mbin bega itea be ta unibeꞌe Dios, gudtsa bega ndoꞌ Dios: “Leꞌa besa naktsa dub xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ ga, mbintsa besa lak unibeꞌe ga gun besa.”
Leꞌa nes nchaꞌa Jesús gezh Jerusalén, nchaꞌtid xa sa nzheꞌal distrit Samaria nsea distrit Galilea.
Leꞌa gor na ulayaꞌ xa toꞌo dub gezh, cha utoꞌo dub tiꞌi xabgiꞌi nsaꞌgea las na, nsén gealgizh lepra xa. Cha sittsa ngwaꞌibe bexa,
ugeꞌ ndab bexa:
—¡Jesús! ¡Mech! ¡Blats ladna go besa!
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí Jesús bexa, cha ndab xa:
—Waꞌ bego ndoꞌ be uleꞌay iwiꞌi xa bega.
Ndalen nsoꞌ bexa nes, cha myakna bexa.
Leꞌa gor na uniꞌí dub xa wa leꞌa xa myaklana, cha myach xa, ugeꞌ msaꞌa xa xno ndoꞌ Dios.
Cha msaxib xa ndoꞌ Jesús gast ndoꞌ yo ngol xtuzh xa, msaꞌa xa xno ndoꞌ Jesús. Leꞌa xa wa dub xa Samaria.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—¿Ná lid dub tiꞌi bexa ta myakna wa zha? ¿Ma stub sgeꞌa bexa wa nat?
¿Nabtsa dub xa naꞌanpa xa Israel ndee myach mlen msaꞌa xno ndoꞌ Dios?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa wa:
—¡Gosoꞌ, cha byaꞌ! Leꞌa ta na mgeꞌ ladna lu naꞌ wa mbin myakna lu.
Leꞌa bexa fariseo unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ Jesús ná pol gal zha inibeꞌe Dios ndoꞌ gizhliyo. Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa zha inibeꞌe Dios naꞌanpa dub ta iniꞌí be men.
Lá yoo gan gab be men: “Unaꞌ go, leꞌa sa ndee sa nibeꞌe Dios”, no lá gab xa: “Leꞌa sa baꞌ sa nibeꞌe Dios.” Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa Dios nibeꞌela len ladoꞌo be men.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Leꞌa gal zha leꞌa bega nlad iniꞌí naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, masa dub wizhtsa, parea leꞌa bega lá iniꞌí naꞌ zha wa.
Leꞌa ncho be men gab zha wa: “Leꞌa xa wa nsoꞌ sa ndee”, natal gab xa: “Leꞌa xa wa nsoꞌ sa baꞌ.” Parea lá yaꞌ bega ni lá isankea bega tsoꞌo xa wa.
Leꞌa lak nlaꞌ bealꞌ usiꞌi nsu‑yá xeꞌa itea lad gibeꞌa, no liga gak‑a zha ilengal naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Parea ned sian gealkweaꞌ nsabndoꞌ iní naꞌ, no be men ncho tiemp nat uxelad naꞌ.
’Leꞌa lak ngok‑a tiemp uyoꞌo Noé, liga gak‑a gal zha ilengal naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Leꞌa tiemp na uyoꞌo Noé wa leꞌa be men ndeyaw, no ndo bexa, no ndeuchilyaꞌa bexa gast wizh uyoꞌo Noé len barco siꞌil mbindeꞌe Noé. Weꞌe ulen gilog mbit itea be men wa.
No liga ngok‑a zha uyoꞌo Lot wa, ndeyaw bexa no ndo bexa no nsiꞌi bexa taꞌa no nadoꞌo bexa taꞌa no ndas bexa taꞌa no ndeyundeꞌe bexa lid bexa.
Ná leꞌa gor na utoꞌo Lot len gezh Sodoma wa, leꞌa Dios cha mtsoꞌol sa wa, cha ngut itea be men wa.
’No liga gak‑a zha ilengal naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Leꞌa gal wizh weꞌe leꞌa be men ndiꞌib gek lid na wa nsabndoꞌ uxoꞌonbe, ni lá igen koꞌo xa be taꞌa len lid xa. Leꞌa bexa ndeyun tiꞌin geꞌe ni lá igen ilanseaꞌ ta lid na.
Btseꞌa ladna bega lak ngwasea xagots ten Lot.
Leꞌa tal ton ukwaꞌan xteꞌe wen yoo xa ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee, leꞌa xa wa ndi gat. Ná leꞌa tal ton ndi ukwaꞌan gun ta nlad Dios, leꞌa xa wa sbanka.
’Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego, leꞌa teꞌal weꞌe leꞌa top xa ndeyats ndoꞌ dub loꞌon, cha yoꞌo Dios dubtsa xa, leꞌa stub xa wa yaꞌan.
No liga leꞌa top xagots junt ndeyajw, cha yoꞌo Dios dubtsa xa, leꞌa stub xa wa yaꞌan.
No liga leꞌa top xabgiꞌi junt ndeyun tiꞌin geꞌe, cha yoꞌo Dios dubtsa xa, leꞌa stub xa wa yaꞌan.
Weꞌe leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha unabdiꞌizh, ndab bexa:
—Señor, ¿pa yoo ta wa zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa lak sa nyakjunt be bech nluu leꞌa sa wa nax dub man ngut, no liga leꞌa zha ilengal naꞌ leꞌa itea be men iniꞌí‑yá.
No msaktabeꞌe Jesús dub ta mluu xa ndoꞌ be xmen xa, ndontsa mas uxik bexa gudiꞌizhno bexa Dios.
Ndab xa:
—Leꞌa dub gezh uyoꞌo dub juez ni lá ndap mod ndoꞌ Dios no ni ndoꞌ be men.
Leꞌa gezh wa nchoga dub xagots ngut xabgiꞌi ten na. Leꞌa xagots wa cha ngwaꞌusake dub xa nyono xa ndoꞌ juez wa, gun juez regl ta wa.
Leꞌa kwenla leꞌa juez lá kaꞌab gun ta nlad xagots wa, parea ngol gor mbinbeꞌe juez, ndab xa: “Naꞌ ni ndoꞌ Dioska lá ndap mod no ni ndoꞌ be men,
parea leꞌa naꞌ neꞌe ladna tant ndiꞌid xagots ndee ndoꞌ naꞌ. Nat gun naꞌ ta nlad xa, ndontsa yá lá giꞌidta xa, leꞌa naꞌ ngi saklola ndoꞌ xa.”
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Blaꞌach bego xteꞌe ndab juez wa, ná xa dub xa ugap nak.
¿Nsak bega zha leꞌa Dios lá gakno bexa mti Dios, bexa na teꞌal tezhea nab ndoꞌ Dios gakno Dios xa? ¿Nsak bega zha kwenpa ti ikaꞌab Dios ndoꞌ bexa wa?
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa Dios uxax sakno bega. Ná leꞌa gor na ilengal naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ¿bi szheal naꞌ men ngeꞌ ladna Dios ndoꞌ gizhliyo zha wa zha?
Leꞌa wats Jesús nde pla bexa ndanbeꞌe leꞌa mas ndun be ta wen ndoꞌ lak ndun be ltsaꞌa bexa. Leꞌa Jesús cha mbidiꞌizh ndoꞌ bexa wa, msaktabeꞌe xa dub taꞌa, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa top xabgiꞌi utoꞌo nchaꞌyadiꞌizhno Dios tale ten niꞌi ten Dios. Leꞌa dub xa wa xa fariseo, leꞌa stub xa wa xa nsen med nkix be men ndoꞌ gobier.

Leꞌa xa fariseo wa cha usoꞌ ndab ndoꞌ Dios: “Dios, leꞌa naꞌ nsa xno ndoꞌ go, geal leꞌa naꞌ lá ndun lak ndun be men xaꞌaga, bexa na ndun gealwaꞌan no bexa ugap ndanno be men no bexa na ngal stub xa naꞌanpa xagots ten xa. No ni lá nak naꞌ lak nak xa nsen med baꞌ.
Leꞌa naꞌ lá ndaw top wizh kad dub len sman, no nsa naꞌ diezmo ten itea be tiꞌin ndun naꞌ.”
’Ná leꞌa xa nsen med wa sittsa nsoꞌ. Ni lá nwiꞌi xa gaꞌap, ndi msagolp xa ladoꞌo xa tant kweaꞌ ncho ladna xa, cha ndab xa: “Dios, blats ladna go naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ sian ta ugap ndun.”

’Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa xa nsen med wa wen myaꞌan ndoꞌ Dios gor na mlanseaꞌ xa ta lid xa. Ná leꞌa xa fariseo wa naꞌanpa wen myaꞌan ndoꞌ Dios. Leꞌa tal ton gab leꞌa nsak, leꞌa cuent ten Dios leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa nsak. Ná leꞌa tal ton yak tuzh, leꞌa cuent ten Dios leꞌa xa wa nsakka.

No ulenno be men be meꞌed ten na wats Jesús, ndontsa uxoꞌob Jesús yaꞌa na gek be meꞌed, inab xa ulaꞌach Dios be meꞌed wa. Leꞌa gor uniꞌí be xmen Jesús li nseabeno be men meꞌed wa, cha uteyo bexa be men wa.
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha utezh be xmen na, cha ndab xa:
—Blaꞌa bego giꞌid be meꞌed baꞌ wats naꞌ. Lá uka bego giꞌid be meꞌed, leꞌa sa nibeꞌe Dios yate bexa yak lak nak be meꞌed ndee.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega, leꞌa tal ton lá ulaꞌa inibeꞌe Dios xa lak dub meꞌed, leꞌa xa wa nunk lá yate sa nibeꞌe Dios.
Weꞌe leꞌa dub xa nibeꞌe ten bexa judio cha unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ Jesús ndab xa:
—Mech wen, ¿xtaꞌan gun naꞌ ndontsa no naꞌ gap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios, ta nunk lá idub?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan ngi wen ndab lu ndoꞌ naꞌ zha? Naꞌan ton wen ndoꞌ gizhliyo, ndon nabtsa Dios wen nak.
Leꞌa lu yá uniꞌíka ta ndab ley ten Dios: “Lá ugal lu xa ten stubga men. Lá gut lu men. Lá gun lu gealwaꞌan. Lá gun lu gealkwiꞌin. Wankea xus lu nsea xnaꞌa lu.”
Leꞌa xabgiꞌi wa cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Iteanak be ta wa ndunka naꞌ idub zha tuzhta naꞌ.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín Jesús ta wa, cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ xa:
—Stub taꞌa ndun jwalt gun lu: bdoꞌo itea be taꞌa ten lu, cha btseꞌa med wa ndoꞌ bexa uban nak. Weꞌe gap lu sian taꞌa ndoꞌ Dios. Cha utsea cha usankea tsoꞌo naꞌ.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín xabgiꞌi wa ta wa, leꞌa xa uzhebpa uban myoꞌo ladna, geal leꞌa xa dub xa rikpa.
Leꞌa gor na uniꞌí Jesús leꞌa xa uzhebpa uban myoꞌo ladna, cha ndab Jesús:
—Uzhebpa ugan yate dub xa rik sa nibeꞌe Dios.
Ndi mas lid bid itid dub came geꞌed xan dub yagux, ndoꞌ yak dub xa rik xa nibeꞌe Dios.
Leꞌa bexa na mbiꞌín ta wa cha unabdiꞌizh bexa ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Tonxá sun gan yate sa nibeꞌe Dios zhaga?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Leꞌa cuent ten nabtsa be men leꞌa‑yá lá yoo gan. Ná leꞌa cuent ten Dios leꞌa‑yá syoꞌoka gan.
Weꞌe leꞌa Pedr cha ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Unaꞌ go, leꞌa besa mlaꞌa itea be taꞌa ndap besa, cha ndi usankea besa tsoꞌo ga.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega, leꞌa tal ton ulaꞌa inibeꞌe Dios xa, ta weꞌe nlaꞌa xa lid xa no xus xa no wit xa no xagots ten xa no xmeꞌed xa,
leꞌa xa wa mas sian be taꞌa ikaꞌa tiemp nat. No leꞌa tiemp tiꞌi ilen leꞌa xa wa gap gealnaban nunk lá idub.
Cha utezh Jesús isatibtop be xmen na, ndab xa:
—Blaꞌach bego, leꞌa beuna nchaꞌbe Jerusalén, sa yoo itea be ta mkeꞌa bexa polta sakndoꞌ Dios cuent ten naꞌ ndee, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Leꞌa naꞌ yak cuent ndoꞌ yaꞌa bexa naꞌanpa xa judio. Leꞌa bexa wa usalad gunno naꞌ, no xela iníꞌi bexa ndoꞌ naꞌ, no uchukko bexa ndoꞌ naꞌ.
No uzhebpa kin bexa naꞌ, weꞌe gut bexa naꞌ. Parea gal wizh yon leꞌa naꞌ ibangal ndoꞌ gealgut.
Ná leꞌa be xmen Jesús ni lá iniꞌí bexa xtaꞌan mbidiꞌizh Jesús, geal leꞌa ta wa dub ta lá yoo gan yakbeꞌena bexa.
Leꞌa gor na yá nchaꞌlayaꞌ gax Jesús gezh Jericó, leꞌa toꞌo nes wa nsob dub xabgiꞌi lá naꞌ, nab xa med ndoꞌ be men.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín xa nchaꞌtid be men, cha unabdiꞌizh xa ndoꞌ bexa wa ná xtaꞌan ta wa.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ndab:
—Leꞌa sa ndee nseatid Jesús xa Nazaret.
Weꞌe cha ugeꞌ ndab xa:
—¡Jesús, xin David! ¡Blats ladna go naꞌ!
Leꞌa bexa na nseabe ned wa cha uteyo xa wa ndab bexa:
—Lá kwezhta lu xa baꞌ.
Parea leꞌa xa ndi mas ugeꞌ ndab:
—¡Xin David! ¡Blats ladna go naꞌ!
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ngwaꞌisoꞌ, cha unibeꞌe xa yaꞌyoꞌo bexa xa lá naꞌ wa. Leꞌa gor na ulansea xa, cha unabdiꞌizh Jesús ndoꞌ xa ndab xa:
—¿Xtaꞌan nlad lu gunno naꞌ lu?
Leꞌa xa cha ndab:
—Señor, leꞌa naꞌ nlad inaꞌ.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Nat myakna lu lak mgeꞌ ladna lu naꞌ.
Bi leꞌa gor wa leꞌa xa cha mnaꞌla, cha no xa usankea tsoꞌo Jesús, ndab xa leꞌa Dios uzheꞌeb dub Dios juert. No itea be men na uniꞌí ta wa noga li ndab.
Leꞌa gor ulayaꞌ Jesús gezh Jericó, leꞌa xa nseatid len gezh wa.
Leꞌa sa wa ncho dub xa rik nsaleaꞌ Zaqueo. Leꞌa xa wa xa nibeꞌe ten bexa nsen med, ta nkix be men ndoꞌ gobier Roma.
Leꞌa xa nlad iniꞌí Jesús, parea leꞌa xa lá naꞌ Jesús tant kwaꞌad men nde sa wa, leꞌa xa wa dub xa uxuꞌubma.
Cha uxax mned xa ndoꞌ be men wa, cha ukea xa ndoꞌ dub ya sicómoro sa itid Jesús ndontsa iniꞌí xa Jesús.
Leꞌa gor ulayaꞌ Jesús sa wa, cha mwiꞌi xa gaꞌap ndoꞌ ya wa, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ xa wa:
—Zaqueo, uxax ulaꞌ sa baꞌ, leꞌa teꞌal ndee leꞌa naꞌ nsabndoꞌ yoꞌo ta lid lu.
Leꞌa Zaqueo cha uxax ulaꞌ, nten ladna xa mbiꞌi xa Jesús ta lid xa.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí be men ta wa, itea bexa ndenisi Jesús, ndab bexa leꞌa Jesús uyote len lid dub xa ugap.
Ngol gor leꞌa Zaqueo cha usoꞌ ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Bwiꞌi go Señor, leꞌa naꞌ usa itol be taꞌa ndap naꞌ ndoꞌ bexa uban nak. No tal ncho xa mbin waꞌan naꞌ med ten na, leꞌa naꞌ yun cuent med wa gast dap biaj.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ Zaqueo:
—Nat leꞌa Dios mtsuꞌu ke ten lu no ke ten bexa ltsaꞌa lu, geal leꞌa lu ngeꞌ ladna Dios lak mgeꞌ ladna Abraham Dios.
Leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ndalkwan bexa sit nak wats Dios, ndontsa ko naꞌ bexa ndoꞌ be ke ten bexa.
Leꞌa bexa na ndeyoꞌón ta ndadiꞌizh Jesús wa ndanbeꞌe leꞌa tiemp inibeꞌe Dios ndoꞌ gizhliyo yamer ilen. Ta weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha msaktabeꞌe stub taꞌa, geal leꞌa xa nsoꞌla gax sa nde Jerusalén.
Ndab Jesús:
—Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi nsak. Leꞌa xa wa list nsoꞌ yaꞌ stubga nacion sit. Leꞌa sa wa leꞌa dub xa mas nibeꞌe usaꞌa permis gak xa rey leꞌaka lazh xa, leꞌa tsoꞌo wa cha yach xa.
Leꞌa gor na biseata itoꞌo xa nsak wa, cha utezh xa dub tiꞌi xmos xa, cha msaꞌa xa dub gaꞌga med nsakpa gunno bexa tiꞌin ndalen li naꞌan xa.
Parea leꞌa be men lazh xa wa nxee ladna ndoꞌ xa, cha mtuꞌub bexa dub men gab ndoꞌ xa mas nibeꞌe wa leꞌa bexa lazh xa nsak wa lá nlad leꞌa xa wa gak rey.

’Ná leꞌa xa mas nibeꞌe wa ulaxoꞌobka xa wa gak xa wa rey. Leꞌa gor na mlanseaꞌ xa lazh xa, cha utezh xa be xmos xa, bexa na li msaꞌa xa dub tiꞌi med nsak ndoꞌ na wa, ndontsa iniꞌí xa na xtiꞌin mbinno bexa ta wa.
Leꞌa mos ned wa ulen cha ndab: “Señor, leꞌa med li msaꞌa go wa myak dub tiꞌi‑yá.”
Leꞌa rey wa cha ndab: “Uzhebpa wen lu mos. Leꞌa ta na li wen mbin lu tiꞌin nsea dub tuzh med ndee wa, ta weꞌe leꞌa nat leꞌa lu inibeꞌe dub tiꞌi gezh.”
No liga ulen xa itop wa, cha ndab xa: “Señor, leꞌa dub med li msaꞌa ga wa myak dub gaꞌay‑a.”
Leꞌa rey wa cha ndab: “Leꞌa lu no inibeꞌe dub gaꞌay gezh.”
’Cha ulenga xa yon wa ndab: “Señor, ndee med ten go. Leꞌa naꞌ ndee ulochaꞌaw med ndee ndoꞌ dub bleꞌa lad.
Leꞌa naꞌ nzheb ndoꞌ go, geal leꞌa naꞌ uní leꞌa go uzhebpa dub xa nibeꞌe. Nsen ga be taꞌa ni lid ta ten ga, no nteleꞌe ga be taꞌa ni lid go ngas.”

Leꞌa rey wa cha ndab: “Leꞌa lu dub mos uzheꞌeb ugap. Leꞌa be diꞌizh ndab lu wa nluu leꞌa lu ugap ndun. Tal leꞌa lu uniꞌí leꞌa naꞌ ndee dub xa uzhebpa nibeꞌe, no nsen naꞌ be taꞌa ni lid ta ten naꞌ, no nteleꞌe naꞌ be taꞌa ni lid naꞌ ngas,
¿xtaꞌan lá ngaꞌulaꞌa lu med baꞌ banco, ndontsa nat nseal naꞌ isen naꞌ be xin med wa?”
Cha ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa nde sa wa: “Blat bega med nsén xa baꞌ, cha bsaꞌa bega‑yá ndoꞌ xa nsén dub tiꞌi med baꞌ.”
Ná leꞌa bexa cha ndab: “Señor, leꞌa xa baꞌ yá ndapla dub tiꞌi‑yá.”
Leꞌa rey cha ndab: “Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa tal ton utsin gun, leꞌa bexa mas sian taꞌa ikaꞌa. Ná leꞌa tal ton naꞌanpa utsin gun, leꞌa bexa slat be ta ndido ndap xa wa.
Ná leꞌa bexa na li ndakloo ndoꞌ naꞌ wa, bexa na lá nlad gak naꞌ rey ten bexa, utseano bega bexa sa ndee. Cha ulobtoꞌog bega gen bexa.”
Leꞌa gor na mtayadiꞌizh Jesús ta wa, cha nchaꞌata xa Jerusalén.
Leꞌa gor na yá nsalayaꞌ gax bexa gezh Betfagé no gezh Betania, no gax Bet Olivo, cha mtuꞌub Jesús top be xmen na,
ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa wa:

—Waꞌ bega len gezh nde mas ndoꞌ ndee. Leꞌa gor na yate bega toꞌo gezh baꞌ, leꞌa sa baꞌ iniꞌí bega nsoꞌ nchii dub burr tuzh, dub ma ni dub men gol sob tsoꞌo ma. Cha uxaꞌak bega ma, goꞌo bega ma sa ndee.
Leꞌa tal ton gab ndoꞌ bega ná xtaꞌan ngi burr baꞌ nxaꞌak bega, cha gud bega leꞌa Xa Nibeꞌe wa guntiꞌin ma.
Weꞌe leꞌa be xmen Jesús wa cha nchaꞌbe. Cha mzheal bexa burr wa lakka ndab Jesús.
Leꞌa gor na ndeuxaꞌak bexa ma, leꞌa be xwan ma cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan nxaꞌak bega burr baꞌ zha?
Leꞌa bexa cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa Xa Nibeꞌe wa guntiꞌin ma.
Cha mbiꞌi bexa ma wats Jesús. Cha mxoꞌob bexa dubga xab bexa tsoꞌo ma. Cha usob Jesús tsoꞌo ma.
Leꞌa be men cha mte be lad nbix bexa ndoꞌ nes sa isea ma wa.
Leꞌa gor na nchaꞌbelaꞌyoꞌo bexa Bet Olivo, leꞌa bexa kwaꞌad na nseabenkea tsoꞌo Jesús wa mten ladnabe, ugeꞌ ndab bexa leꞌa Dios uzheꞌeb dub Dios siꞌil, geal leꞌa bexa uniꞌí be uyon mbin Jesús.
Ugeꞌ ndab bexa:
—¡Dios uzhebpa nlaꞌach xa nibeꞌe baꞌ, xa na mtuꞌub Dios Xa Nibeꞌe! ¡Uzhebpa wen yoo be men ndoꞌ Dios gibeꞌa! ¡Siꞌil nak Dios nsob gaꞌap!
Leꞌa lat be men wa no pla bexa fariseo nseabe, cha ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Mech, uteyo ga be xmen ga baꞌ naꞌantapa li gab bexa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa tal bexa ndee naꞌanpa iníꞌibe, leꞌa be geꞌ baꞌ leꞌa isaxan iníꞌi.
Leꞌa gor na ulayaꞌ bexa sa nluxeꞌa Jerusalén, leꞌa Jesús cha mwiꞌi ndoꞌ gezh wa, cha mbiꞌin xa,
ndab xa:
—Gezh Jerusalén, uzhebpa nlad naꞌ yakbeꞌena lu ta ncho wizh nat, leꞌa ta wa leꞌa sun gan wen yoo lu. Parea leꞌa nat leꞌa lu lá yoo gan yakbeꞌena‑yá.
Gal dub wizh ilen be men ukendoꞌ lu, gundeꞌe bexa dub muro idub gangeak wats lu, no idub gangeak kwe bexa ukendoꞌ bexa lu.
Cha ulate bexa lu Jerusalén, no bexa ncho sa baꞌ gatbe. Ni stub geꞌ ten lu lá kwiꞌibta tsoꞌo ltsaꞌa na, ke na lá igondoꞌ lu leꞌa Dios mbiꞌid ndoꞌ lu.
Leꞌa Jesús cha nchaꞌa tale ten niꞌi ten Dios, cha usaxan ngontuꞌub xa bexa na nadoꞌotiꞌix be taꞌa sa wa.
Ndab Jesús:
—Leꞌa diꞌizh ten Dios nkeaniꞌi ndab Dios: “Leꞌa lid naꞌ nak dub sa ndadiꞌizhno be men naꞌ.” ¡Ná leꞌa bego ndi ndanno‑yá cuent dub geꞌloꞌo ten waꞌan!
Leꞌa Jesús itea wizh nluu be men wats niꞌi ten Dios, parea leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe, no be mech ten ley, no bexa nsak ten gezh wa nkwaꞌan ná xteꞌe gut bexa Jesús.
Parea leꞌa bexa ni lá izheal xteꞌe gut bexa xa, geal leꞌa itea be men uzhebpa nlaꞌach ta nluu Jesús.
Ngol stub wizh leꞌa Jesús nluugal be men tale ten niꞌi ten Dios, ndadiꞌizh xa diꞌizh wen ten Dios. Weꞌe leꞌa be mech ten ley, no be uleꞌay nibeꞌe, no bexa gox nsak ulen wats Jesús.
Cha ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Ton ulaxoꞌob lu gun lu ta wa zha? ¿Nati ton mtuꞌub lu gun lu ta ndee?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa naꞌ no inabdiꞌizh dub taꞌa ndoꞌ bego, ikaꞌab bega‑yá:
¿Ton mtuꞌub Juan ulaleaꞌ Juan be men zha? ¿Dios nate dub men?
Leꞌa bexa cha ndabbe ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa na:
—Tal leꞌa beuna gab leꞌa Dios leꞌaka mtuꞌub Juan, leꞌa Jesús inabdiꞌizh ná xtaꞌan lá ngungea ladna beuna xa.
Ná tal gab beuna leꞌa Juan dub men mtuꞌub, leꞌa be men ndee ulaꞌgeꞌ beuna gast gat beuna, leꞌa bexa itea mbingea ladna leꞌa Juan dub xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios.
Ta weꞌe cha ukaꞌab bexa ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Leꞌa besa lá iniꞌí ton mtuꞌub Juan.
Leꞌa Jesús cha noga ndab:
—Naꞌ noga lá gáp ton ulaxoꞌob naꞌ gun naꞌ be ta ndee.
Cha mbidiꞌizh Jesús dub taꞌa msaktabeꞌe xa, ndab xa ndoꞌ be men:
—Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi ngos sian ya uv ndoꞌ dub bleꞌa yo siꞌil. Cha mkwaꞌan xa pla be men ulaꞌach sa wa, cha gal zha ite bexa uv usaꞌa ya wa. Leꞌa xa ten yo wa cha ukaꞌan kwenpa.

Leꞌa zha na yá ngol tiemp ten uv, cha mtuꞌub xa dub xmos xa yaꞌ ndoꞌ be men nlaꞌach sa wa, yaꞌyoꞌo xa be ta na ndal xwan yo wa. Ná leꞌa be men wa ndi udin mos wa. Cha naꞌan xtaꞌan usaꞌa men wa yoꞌo xa.
Leꞌa xwan yo wa cha mtuꞌubgal stub mos. Ná leꞌa bexa ndi uzheꞌeb udingal xa wa, cha naꞌan xtaꞌan usaꞌagal bexa yoꞌo xa.
Leꞌa xwan yo wa mtuꞌubgal stub mos. Leꞌa be men wa cha ndi mtsawiꞌi xa, no ulantuꞌub bexa xa.
’Weꞌe leꞌa xwan yo wa cha mbinbeꞌe ndab xa: “¿Xteꞌe gun naꞌ nat? Leꞌa naꞌ utuꞌub xiꞌín naꞌ, xa na nkweaꞌ lad naꞌ. Leꞌa be men wa sapka mod ndoꞌ xa wa.”
Ná leꞌa gor na uniꞌí bexa xa, cha ndi ndab bexa ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa xa: “Leꞌa xa baꞌ leꞌa yaꞌanno yo ndee. Nchaꞌyut beuna xa, cha yaꞌanno beuna‑yá.”
Cha uloꞌo bexa xa dub lad toꞌo yo wa, cha mbit bexa xa.
Cha unabdiꞌizh Jesús ndab xa:
—¿Xteꞌe nsak bega zha? ¿Xteꞌe gunno xwan yo wa bexa?
Leꞌa xa wa ilen gut bexa wa, cha usaꞌa xa yo wa ndoꞌ be men xaꞌaga ulaꞌach‑a.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín be men ta wa, cha ndab bexa:
—¡Dios nunk lá ulaꞌa yoo ta wa!
Leꞌa Jesús cha mwiꞌi ndoꞌ bexa, cha ndab xa:
—¿Lá iniꞌí bega xteꞌe nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios zha? Ndab‑a:
Leꞌa geꞌ na mxelad bexa ndandeꞌe niꞌi,
leꞌa ta wa nat nak geꞌ ndon leꞌa nsak nbexan niꞌi.
Leꞌa itea bexa na ilayat tsoꞌo geꞌ wa, leꞌa bexa wa syuꞌbe. Leꞌa bexa ilaꞌ geꞌ wa tsoꞌo na, leꞌa bexa wa sachkeꞌe.
Bi leꞌa gor wa leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no be mech ten ley nlad isen Jesús, geal leꞌa bexa myakbeꞌena leꞌa Jesús li ndab cuent ten bexa. Ná leꞌa bexa nzhebga ndoꞌ be men.
Cha mtuꞌub bexa wa pla be men cuentta bexa wen nak yaꞌyun preb Jesús, ndontsa gap bexa dub ta usake bexa Jesús ndoꞌ xa na ndon leꞌa nibeꞌe sa wa.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Mech, leꞌa besa uniꞌí leꞌa go ndadiꞌizh gealngea. No ni lá nlaꞌach go ta ndab be men, no ni tal xteꞌe nak be men. Leꞌa go ndi wen nluu lak nlad Dios gak be men.
Nat gud go, ¿nsabndoꞌ kix beuna med nab César xa nibeꞌe Roma, nate naꞌanpa kix beuna ta wa?
Ná leꞌa Jesús mgenlana ta ugap ndanbeꞌe bexa, cha ndab Jesús:
—¿Xtaꞌan ndun bega preb naꞌ zha?
Bsaꞌa bega dub med iwiꞌi naꞌ‑yá. ¿Ton gek ná no leaꞌ ná nkea las med ndee zha?
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Gek César no leaꞌ César.
Cha ndab Jesús:
—Bsaꞌa bego be ta ten César ndoꞌ César. Leꞌa ndoꞌ Dios bsaꞌa bego be ta ten Dios.
Leꞌa bexa wa ni lá ngun gan ngab Jesús dub ta lid leꞌa nak ndoꞌ gaꞌal be men wa. Ndi ngwanseana bexa xteꞌe ukaꞌab Jesús, cha yá naꞌanta xteꞌe ngab bexa.
Weꞌe leꞌa pla bexa saduceo cha ulen wats Jesús. Leꞌa itea bexa saduceo ndangea ladna leꞌa bexa ngut wa yá lá ibantabe. Cha unabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ Jesús,
ndab bexa:

—Mech, leꞌa ley mkeꞌa Moisés ndab leꞌa tal ton dub xabgiꞌi gat, ná lá ngap xa xin xa, leꞌa wit xa wa nsabndoꞌ uchilyaꞌano xagots ten xa ngut wa, ndontsa tal gap bexa dub meꞌed leꞌa meꞌed wa gak cuent xin xa ngut wa.
Uyoꞌo dub gaꞌad wit xa. Leꞌa xa ned wa mchilyaꞌano dub xagots, cha tsoꞌo wa ngut xa, ni lá ngap xagots wa xin xa.
Weꞌe cha mchilyaꞌano wit itop xa wa xagots wa. Leꞌa xabgiꞌi wa cha nogal ngut ni lá ngapgal bexa xin xa.
Leꞌa wit yon bexa wa litsagal ngwasea. Li ngwasea isagaꞌad wit bexa wa, ná ni dub xa lá ngap xin na.
Tsoꞌo wa leꞌa xagots wa cha noga ngut.
Leꞌa zha na iban bexa ngut wa, leꞌa lat bexa wa ¿ton gak xabgiꞌi ten xagots wa zha, xa na li mchilyaꞌano isagaꞌad xabgiꞌi wa?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa be men nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee nchilyaꞌano ltsaꞌa na.
Parea gal zha na gab Dios ná ton iban ndoꞌ gealgut, leꞌa bexa wa naꞌantapa uchilyaꞌano be ltsaꞌa na zha wa.
No ni lá gatta bexa, leꞌa bexa ndi gak cuent be angel ten Dios. No gak bexa xin Dios ta na ubangal bexa.

Parea leꞌa cuent ten ta na iban bexa ngut wa, leꞌa Moisés leꞌa mluu leꞌa bexa ngut wa ibankabe, zha na mkeꞌa xa leꞌa dub yagich nsayolꞌ. Leꞌa sa wa ndab‑a leꞌa Dios nak Dios ndankea Abraham, no Isaac, no Jacob.
Leꞌa Dios naꞌanpa Dios ten bexa ngut, leꞌa xa ndi Dios ten bexa nban. Ta weꞌe uniꞌí beuna leꞌa bexa wa nbanka. Leꞌa cuent ten Dios leꞌa itea bexa ngutla bi nbankabe.
Leꞌa ncho be mech ten ley cha ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Mech, leꞌaka nak ta ndab go.
Weꞌe leꞌa be men wa ni lá ngunta rages inabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ Jesús.
Weꞌe cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ bexa wa:
—¿Xtaꞌan ndab be men leꞌa zha ilen Cristo leꞌa xa wa nak xin David?
Ná leꞌa David wa leꞌaka mkeꞌa libr ten Salmos, ndab‑a:
Leꞌa Dios Xa Nibeꞌe ndab ndoꞌ Xa Nibeꞌe naꞌ:
“Usob wats naꞌ lad gaꞌal ndee,
gast gal gor ute naꞌ bexa ndaklono lu xan ndats lu.”
Leꞌa David ndab leꞌa Cristo nak Xa Nibeꞌe ten xa. ¿Ná xteꞌe yoo gan gak Cristo wa xin David zha?
Leꞌa gor na ndeulaꞌach itea be men wa, leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ be xmen na:

—Blaꞌach bego lá gak bega lak nak be mech ten ley, leꞌa bexa ndal ladna ndesea nak lad koꞌol. No nlad bexa utsin inidiꞌizh be men ndoꞌ bexa be ndoꞌ xgeꞌe. No nti bexa be sa mas nsak isob bexa len be niꞌi sa nzhealbe beuna xa judio. No liga ndun bexa sa ndaꞌdaw bexa sa nyoꞌo dub gast.
Nsea nlat bexa itea ta ndap be xagots ngut xabgiꞌi ten na. No kwenpa ndadiꞌizhno bexa Dios ndontsa gab men leꞌa xa ndankeaka Dios. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa bexa li ndun wa mas uzheꞌeb gealkweaꞌ iniꞌí.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mwiꞌi ná xteꞌe nsaꞌa be men rik wa med gon gax wats niꞌi ten Dios.
Leꞌa dub xagots prob ngut xabgiꞌi ten na no msaꞌa top med byux uxee nsak.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa xagots prob ndee msaꞌa mas sian med ndoꞌ iteanak bexa baꞌ.
Leꞌa bexa msaꞌa sbeꞌen ta myaꞌan sobrtsa, parea leꞌa xagots ndee msaꞌa iteanak med isiꞌi xa be ta nkiꞌin xa.
Leꞌa ncho bexa ndadiꞌizh ndoꞌ Jesús cuent ten be geꞌ chul nakchaꞌaw niꞌi ten Dios, no be ta chul msaꞌa be men usaxkwaꞌa sa wa. Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ bexa wa:
—Leꞌa gal dub wizh leꞌa itea be ta lbaꞌa naꞌ bego baꞌ ilate, gast ni stub geꞌ baꞌ lá kwiꞌibta tsoꞌo ltsaꞌa na.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ Jesús ndab bexa:
—Mech, ¿pol gak ta wa zha? ¿Xteꞌe iniꞌí besa zha yamer gak‑a zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Blaꞌach bego naꞌan ton ukedino bega. Leꞌa kwaꞌad be men ilen gab leꞌa xa nak Cristo xa na mtuꞌub Dios. No gab bexa leꞌa tiemp wa yá nsoꞌ gax. Parea lá isankea bega tsoꞌo bexa wa.
Leꞌa gor na goꞌón bega ncho guerr no ncho be men ndakloo ndoꞌ bexa nibeꞌe bexa, lá yuꞌ ladna bega. Leꞌa ta wa ga nedka nsabndoꞌ li gak, ná leꞌa zha wa biseata gal be wizh lult.
No ndab Jesús:
—No gal zha wa kuyo be nacion no stubga nacion. Leꞌa be xmen dub xa nibeꞌe kuyono be xmen stubga xa nibeꞌe.
No gak be xoꞌo ubiꞌi. No ncho be sa uzhebpa yoo win no gealgizh ugiꞌi. Leꞌa gibeꞌa iluu be ta yanseana be men no izheb bexa.

’Ná leꞌa gor na biseata yoo itea be ta ndee, leꞌa be men isen bega, no isankea bexa tsoꞌo bega, no goꞌo bexa bega len be niꞌi sa nzhealbe bexa judio, sa usake bexa bega. No goꞌo bexa bega litgiꞌib, no usake bexa bega ndoꞌ bexa naktiꞌin ubiꞌi ke na nak bega xmen naꞌ.
Weꞌe sak gudiꞌizh bega diꞌizh ten naꞌ ndoꞌ bexa wa.
Ná lá gunbeꞌe bega xteꞌe utsakndoꞌ bega ikaꞌab bega ndoꞌ bexa wa,
leꞌa naꞌ usa be diꞌizh ikaꞌab bega, ta na ni dub bexa nyono bega lá gun gan ikaꞌab. Ni lá yoo gan gab bexa leꞌa ta ndab bega wa naꞌanpa utsin nak.
Leꞌa ncho xus bega no wit bega no ltsaꞌa bega no amig ten bega leꞌaka yun cuent bega. No gast gut bexa ncho bega.
Leꞌa itea be men ixeeno ladna bega ke na nak bega xmen naꞌ.
Ná leꞌa naꞌ gáp ni dub gichgek bega lá gak perdid.
Leꞌa tal bega uxik ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ wa, leꞌa bega gal usoꞌ gealnaban nsaꞌa Dios.
’Leꞌa gor inaꞌ bega leꞌa kwaꞌad be soldad nde gangeak Jerusalén ndee, weꞌe iniꞌíla bega leꞌa tiemp initndoꞌ Jerusalén yá ngol.
Leꞌa bexa ndencho Judea nsabndoꞌ uxoꞌonbe yaꞌbe bexa be geꞌe ubiꞌi. Leꞌa bexa ndencho Jerusalén uxoꞌon gezh ndee. Leꞌa bexa ndesea geꞌe yá lá ilenta xa sa ndee.
Leꞌa zha wa uzhebpa iniꞌí bexa gealkweaꞌ, no gakka itea be ta nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios.
Leꞌa be xagots nsoꞌno meꞌed no be xagots ndap medoꞌo uzhebpa kweaꞌ itid. Leꞌa be men uzhebpa gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí zha wa, no uzhebpa juert yoo bexa ncho sa ndee.

Leꞌa kwaꞌad bexa Israel gat ndoꞌ spad, no sit goꞌo be men kwaꞌad bexa wa stub nacion xaꞌaga. Leꞌa bexa naꞌanpa xa Israel gunno Jerusalén ndee lakta nlad bexa, gast gal wizh idub tiemp ulaꞌa Dios li gun bexa ta wa.
’Leꞌa wizh no mbeꞌe no be mbeal xaꞌaga inaꞌ ndoꞌ lak naꞌ‑yá nat. Leꞌa be men ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo uzhebpa izheb, no ni lá iniꞌí bexa xteꞌe gun bexa tant uzheꞌeb nbezh nitsdoꞌo no be golp ten nits.
Leꞌa be men gast itid teꞌal ladna tant izheb bexa iniꞌí bexa be ta yoo ndoꞌ gizhliyo, no gast idub gibeꞌa iwiꞌin.
Weꞌe leꞌa be men iniꞌí leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, ilennogal juers ten Dios lat xkaw nsea dub xeꞌa siꞌil.
Leꞌa gor na isaxan yoo be ta ndee lá izheb bega, ndi bten ladna bega leꞌa naꞌ yamer ilen.
No ndab Jesús:
—Bwiꞌi bega lak nak be ya laꞌaw no itea be ya.
Leꞌa zha na li nxich be ya wa, leꞌa bega uniꞌíka leꞌa tiemp bigi yá gal.
No liga zha na naꞌ bega ncho be ta ndee wa, weꞌe iniꞌí bega leꞌa tiemp inibeꞌe Dios ndoꞌ gizhliyo yamer ilen.
’Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bego leꞌa itea be ta ndee itidka zha na biseata gat be men ncho tiemp ndee wa.
Leꞌa gibeꞌa nsea gizhliyo initndoꞌ, parea leꞌa be ta ndáp naꞌ ndee naꞌanpa initndoꞌ.
’Blaꞌach bega leꞌaka bega naꞌanpa gaw bega uzheꞌeb, no naꞌanpa gun bega gealgu, no ni lá yuꞌ ladna bega be ta ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee. Ndi list ute bega, leꞌa wizh weꞌe uxax ilen tsoꞌo bega.
Leꞌa wizh wa ilenka cuent dub tramp tsoꞌo be men ncho idub ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Ta weꞌe list ute bega, bidiꞌizhno tseꞌe bega Dios, ndontsa uxik bega ndoꞌ itea be ta uzheꞌeb yoo ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee, no gun bega gan kwe bega ndoꞌ naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo.
Itea be wizh leꞌa Jesús nluu be men tale ten niꞌi ten Dios. Leꞌa gor teꞌal leꞌa xa ndaꞌ Bet Olivo.
Leꞌa iteanak be men Jerusalén wa itea tempran ndaꞌyoꞌón bexa ta ndadiꞌizh Jesús tale ten niꞌi ten Dios.
Leꞌa zha na nsayal gax ujest Pascua, zha ndaw bexa judio pan lá nyoꞌo levadur,
leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe wa no be mech ten ley nkwaꞌan bexa na xteꞌe gut bexa Jesús dub mod lá iniꞌí be men‑a, geal leꞌa bexa nzheb ndoꞌ be men.
Leꞌa maxuꞌu cha uyoꞌo len ladoꞌo Judas Iscariot, dub xa nak dub isatibtop be xmen Jesús.
Cha ngwaꞌyadiꞌizhno xa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe, no bexa nibeꞌe ten bexa nlaꞌach niꞌi ten Dios, ná xteꞌe yun xa cuent Jesús ndoꞌ yaꞌa bexa wa.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha mten ladnabe, ndab bexa leꞌa bexa usaꞌa med ikaꞌa Judas.
Leꞌa Judas cha uni lak ndab bexa wa, cha usaxan nkwaꞌan xa xteꞌe yun xa cuent Jesús, dub mod na lá iniꞌí be men ta wa.
Leꞌa ngol wizh ndaw bexa judio pan lá nyoꞌo levadur, wizh ndut bexa dub borreg ndaw bexa cuent ten ujest Pascua,
leꞌa Jesús cha mtuꞌub Pedr no Juan, ndab xa:
—Waꞌyundeꞌe bega ta gaw beuna ujest Pascua.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab bexa:
—¿Pa nlad go gundeꞌe besa ta wa zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Waꞌ bega gezh Jerusalén baꞌ, leꞌa toꞌo gezh wa izheꞌal bega dub xabgiꞌi noꞌo dub te ncho nits. Cha isankea bega tsoꞌo xa gast len niꞌi sa ilanseaꞌ xa wa.
Cha gud bega ndoꞌ xwan niꞌi wa: “Leꞌa mech nabdiꞌizh ná ma len cuart gawno mech be xmen xa ta ten ujest Pascua.”
Leꞌa xa wa cha uluu dub cuart siꞌil ndoꞌ bega, ta nde gek niꞌi wa. Leꞌa sa wa listla nde be ta guntiꞌin bega. Cha bindeꞌe bega be ta gaw xcheꞌe beuna sa wa.
Weꞌe leꞌa Pedr no Juan cha nchaꞌbe, cha mzhealka bexa men wa, no be ta ndab Jesús wa. Cha mbindeꞌe bexa ta gaw bexa ujest Pascua.
Leꞌa ngol gor gaw xcheꞌe bexa, cha usob Jesús ndoꞌ mes no be xmen xa.
Cha ndab Jesús:
—Uzhebpa nten lad naꞌ gawnogal naꞌ bega cuent ten ujest Pascua nattsa biseata gat naꞌ.
Li ndáp naꞌ ta wa geal leꞌa naꞌ yá naꞌantapa gaw cuent ten ujest ndee, gast gal tiemp inibeꞌe Dios ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Cha usen Jesús dub vas ncho vin ten uv, cha msaꞌa xa xno ndoꞌ Dios, cha ndab xa:
—Itea bego gu ta ndee.
Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa naꞌ yá lá goꞌota vin ten uv gast gal zha ilen tiemp inibeꞌe Dios.
Cha liga usen xa pan, cha msaꞌa xa xno ndoꞌ Dios. Cha uleꞌa xa‑yá, msaꞌa xa‑yá ndoꞌ bexa wa, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa pan ndee beꞌal las naꞌ, ta usa naꞌ por bego. Nat isaxan bega gun bega ta ndee, ndontsa lá yalad bega leꞌa naꞌ ngut sakndoꞌ bega.
Leꞌa gor na mtayaw xcheꞌe bexa, cha usengal Jesús dub vas ncho vin, ndab xa:
—Leꞌa ta ndee ten ten naꞌ usa naꞌ por bego. Leꞌa ta ndee nluu leꞌa nat leꞌa Dios mbinno be men dub trat kub, ná xteꞌe wen yaꞌan bexa ndoꞌ Dios.
’Ná leꞌa nat leꞌa xa na yun cuent naꞌ no nsob ndoꞌ mes ndee.
Leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, itiꞌidka lak nsabndoꞌ‑yá, parea proꞌob xabgiꞌi na yun cuent naꞌ ndoꞌ yaꞌa bexa wa.
Cha usaxan be xmen Jesús unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa na, ndab bexa:
—¿Tonma beuna nde ndee yun cuent xa?
Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha usaxan ndeyotoꞌo lat be ltsaꞌa na ná ton mas nsak.
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Leꞌa bexa nibeꞌe be nacion naꞌanpa ulaꞌa gun be men dub ta naꞌanpa nibeꞌe bexa. Leꞌa bexa wa leꞌatsa ndab leꞌa bexa uzhebpa be ta wen ndun.
Parea leꞌa bego ndee naꞌanpa nsabndoꞌ li gak. Leꞌa bexa mas nsak wa nsabndoꞌ ndi gak cuent dub xa ndon leꞌa tuzh. Leꞌa dub xa nibeꞌe wa nsabndoꞌ gun tiꞌin ndoꞌ iteata bega.
¿Ton mas nsak? ¿Xa nsob ndoꞌ mes, nate xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ xa wa? Leꞌa xa nsob ndoꞌ mes wa, leꞌa xa mas nsak. Parea leꞌa naꞌ ndee nkeseano bega cuent dub xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ bega.
’Leꞌa bego leꞌakama nak bexa mxik ndoꞌ itea be ta ugan utiꞌid naꞌ.
Ta weꞌe leꞌa naꞌ usa juers ndoꞌ bega ndontsa inibeꞌe bega, lak nsaꞌa Xus naꞌ ta nibeꞌe naꞌ,
ndontsa gaw bega no goo bega ndoꞌ mes ten naꞌ sa inibeꞌe naꞌ. No kadga dub bega isob sa inibeꞌe bega ndoꞌ isatibtop xkwaꞌa bexa Israel.
No ndab Jesús ndoꞌ Simón Pedr:
—Simón, Simón, leꞌa maxuꞌu unab bega ndoꞌ Dios gunno maxuꞌu bega lak ngoꞌo bexa xab trig.
Parea leꞌa naꞌ naꞌab ndoꞌ Dios gakno lu, lá ulaꞌa lu ta ngeꞌ ladna lu naꞌ. Leꞌa gor na yach lu stub biaj igeꞌ ladna lu naꞌ, gokno be ltsaꞌa lu dubtsa kwe bexa igeꞌka ladna bexa naꞌ.
Leꞌa Simón cha ndab:
—Señor, leꞌa naꞌ saano go gast litgiꞌib, no tal go gat leꞌa naꞌ no gat.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa:
—Pedr, leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ lu, leꞌa teꞌal nat gor biseata kwezh boy, leꞌa lu mkwiꞌinla chon biaj, ndab lu leꞌa lu lá nchandoꞌ naꞌ.
No ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Leꞌa zha na mtuꞌub naꞌ bego li lá ngoꞌo bega bols, no ni med, no ni stub nes ndab bega, ¿ncho xtaꞌan mbin jwalt zha wa zha?
Leꞌa bexa cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Naꞌan xtaꞌan ngun jwalt zha wa.
Cha ndab Jesús:
—Leꞌa nat leꞌa bego na ndap bols no med, biꞌi bega‑yá. Leꞌa bego na lá ndap spad, bdoꞌo bega dub xab bega cha usiꞌi bega dub spad.

Leꞌa lak nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios cuent ten naꞌ, leꞌa ta wa gakka cumplir. Leꞌa ta wa ndab: “Leꞌa be men mbinno xa cuentta dub xa ugap.” Leꞌa itea be ta ndab diꞌizh ten Dios cuent ten naꞌ wa, leꞌa ta wa gakka cumplir.
Leꞌa be xmen Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ xa:
—Señor, leꞌa sa ndee nde top spad.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Yá lá gudiꞌizhta beuna ta wa.
Cha utoꞌo Jesús nchaꞌa Bet Olivo lakka ndun xa. Leꞌa be xmen xa cha no usankea tsoꞌo xa.
Leꞌa gor na ulayaꞌ bexa sa wa, cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ bexa:
—Unab bega ndoꞌ Dios gakno bega, ndontsa naꞌanpa utsabgix maxuꞌu bega.
Cha nab Jesús usea stub tuzh sa, dub lak sit ntsaꞌab men dub geꞌ. Leꞌa sa wa leꞌa Jesús cha usaxib mbidiꞌizhno xa Dios,
ndab xa:
—Xus naꞌ, tal leꞌa go nlad, lá ulaꞌa go itiꞌid naꞌ ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ uzheꞌeb ndee. Parea lá gak‑a lak nlad naꞌ, ndi gak‑a lak nlad go.
Weꞌe cha mlundoꞌ dub angel utoꞌo gibeꞌa msaꞌa juers ndoꞌ Jesús.
Leꞌa ta na uzhebpa kweaꞌ ncho ladna Jesús, leꞌa xa mas uzheꞌeb mbidiꞌizhno Dios. Leꞌa nits msanits ndoꞌ xa nsalaꞌ gast ndoꞌ yo cuent byach ten.
Leꞌa gor na mtayadiꞌizhno xa Dios, cha nseaꞌ xa sa ndebe be xmen xa. Ná leꞌa bexa ndeyatsbe tant uban ncho ladna bexa.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan ndi ndeyats bega zha? Goste bega, unab bega ndoꞌ Dios, ndontsa naꞌanpa utsabgix maxuꞌu bega.
Bi li nsoꞌyab Jesús ta wa leꞌa kwaꞌad be men ulen. Leꞌa Judas xa no nak isatibtop xmen Jesús leꞌa nsea ned ndoꞌ be men wa. Cha ubii xa, cha mchealtoꞌo xa ndoꞌ Jesús.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Judas, ¿lbaꞌa myun lu cuent naꞌ Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo zha?
Leꞌa bexa ndeno Jesús uniꞌí ta wa, cha ndab bexa:
—Señor, ¿kuyono besa bexa no be spad ndee zha?
Leꞌa dub bexa wa cha ulobtoꞌog nchaꞌ lad gaꞌal dub xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ uleꞌay ndon leꞌa nsak.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab ndoꞌ be xmen na:
—Unika‑yá. Blaꞌa bego bexa baꞌ.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mgal nchaꞌ xa wa, cha myakna‑yá.
Cha ndab Jesús ndoꞌ be uleꞌay nibeꞌe, no ndoꞌ bexa nibeꞌe ten bexa nlaꞌach niꞌi ten Dios, no ndoꞌ bexa gox nsak, bexa na nseabegiꞌi Jesús, ndab xa:
—¿Xtaꞌan nseano bega spad nsea garrot, nseabesen bega naꞌ cuent dub waꞌan?
Leꞌa itea wizh mluu naꞌ be men tale ten niꞌi ten Dios lat bega, ná naꞌan xtaꞌan ngunno bega naꞌ. Parea leꞌa nat ngolka gor ten bega, gor na gun maxuꞌu ta nlad na.
Cha usen bexa Jesús, cha mbiꞌi bexa xa ta lid uleꞌay ndon leꞌa nsak. Leꞌa Pedr sittsa nchankea tsoꞌo Jesús.
Leꞌa tlaw le ta lid uleꞌay wa mkwaꞌa bexa giꞌ, cha ute pla bexa wats giꞌ wa. Leꞌa Pedr cha no usob wats bexa wa.
Leꞌa dub xagots ndun tiꞌin sa wa uniꞌí nsob Pedr sa wa, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa wa:
—Leꞌa xa ndee no nkeseano Jesús.
Ná leꞌa Pedr cha mkwiꞌin ndab:
—Xagots, naꞌ lá nchandoꞌ ton xa baꞌ.
Tsoꞌoma wa leꞌa stub xabgiꞌi wa uniꞌígal Pedr, cha ndab xa ndoꞌ Pedr:
—Go no nak xmen Jesús.
Leꞌa Pedr cha mkwiꞌingal ndab:
—Mgiꞌi, leꞌa naꞌ naꞌanpa no.
Ngok pa stub gor tsoꞌo wa, leꞌa stub xa ndabgal ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa na cuent ten Pedr:
—Leꞌa xa ndee ta ugeaka no ukeseano Jesús, leꞌa xa ndee xa Galilea.
Leꞌa Pedr cha ndab:
—Mgiꞌi, leꞌa naꞌ lá iní xtaꞌan ndab lu.
Bi li gor wa zha leꞌa dub boy utezhla.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mgeak mwiꞌi ndoꞌ Pedr. Leꞌa Pedr cha mtseꞌa ladna ta ndab Jesús: “Leꞌa teꞌal nat gor na biseata kwezh boy, leꞌa lu mkwiꞌinla chon biaj ndab lu leꞌa lu lá nchandoꞌ naꞌ.”
Cha utoꞌo Pedr tsoꞌo juer, cha uzhebpa mbiꞌin xa.
Leꞌa be xabgiꞌi na li ndeulaꞌach Jesús wa kweaꞌ uníꞌi ndoꞌ Jesús, no udin bexa xa.
No mtsaw bexa ndoꞌ Jesús, cha utichyaꞌa bexa ndoꞌ xa, ndab bexa ndoꞌ xa:
—¡Gud ton utichyaꞌa ndoꞌ lu!
No sianta be diꞌizh ugap ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús.

Leꞌa ngot xeꞌa wa, cha mzhealbe bexa gox nsak ten bexa judio, no be uleꞌay nibeꞌe, no be mech ten ley. Cha mbiꞌi bexa Jesús dub sa nzhealbe sbeꞌen bexa nibeꞌetsa ten bexa judio. Cha ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Gud naga lu nak Cristo xa mti Dios.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Tal leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa ta wa naꞌka, leꞌa bego lá gungea ladna‑yá.
No tal inabdiꞌizh naꞌ ndoꞌ bega, leꞌa bega lá ikaꞌab ndoꞌ naꞌ, no ni lá ulaꞌa bega naꞌ.
Parea leꞌa nat idub nchaꞌa ndoꞌ ndee, leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, yatsoꞌobgal wats Dios lad gaꞌal, Dios xa ndon leꞌa nibeꞌe.
Weꞌe cha itea bexa ndab:
—¿Nat zha lu nak Xin Dios?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌaka bega ndab‑a.
Weꞌe leꞌa bexa wa cha ndab ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa na:
—Yá lá nkiꞌin beuna kwaꞌadta xa usake xa. Leꞌa beuna ndoꞌón ndab xa leꞌa xa leꞌaka ta wa.
Leꞌa itea bexa wa cha mbiꞌi Jesús ndoꞌ Pilat.
Cha usaxan nsake bexa Jesús, ndab bexa:
—Leꞌa xa ndee nkiꞌil be ltsaꞌa besa bexa judio, ndab xa leꞌa besa lá nsabndoꞌ kix med ndoꞌ César xa nibeꞌe Roma. No ndab xa leꞌa xa nak Cristo, dub xa nibeꞌe.
Leꞌa Pilat cha unabdiꞌizh ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—¿Lu nak xa nibeꞌe ten bexa judio zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Goka ndab‑a.
Leꞌa Pilat cha ndab ndoꞌ be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no ndoꞌ be men kwaꞌad wa:
—Leꞌa naꞌ ni dub ke ten xa ndee lá ngaizheal naꞌ.
Ná leꞌa bexa wa ndi mas ugeꞌ ndabbe:
—Leꞌa ta nluu xa baꞌ nchealuyo itea be men, ta usaxan nluu xa Galilea nsea gast Judea ndee.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín Pilat ta wa, leꞌa xa cha unabdiꞌizh naga xa Galilea Jesús.
Leꞌa gor na mbiꞌín Pilat leꞌa Jesús xa Galilea sa nibeꞌe Herodes, cha mtuꞌub Pilat Jesús ndoꞌ Herodes. Leꞌa Herodes leꞌagala be wizh wa ncho Jerusalén.
Leꞌa gor na uniꞌí Herodes Jesús, leꞌa Herodes uzhebpa mten ladna, geal leꞌa xa polta nlad iniꞌí Jesús. Leꞌa xa ndoꞌón ndadiꞌizh be men cuent ten Jesús, no nlad xa iniꞌí xa dub uyon ndun Jesús.
Cha uzhebpa sian taꞌa unabdiꞌizh Herodes ndoꞌ Jesús, ná leꞌa Jesús ni lá ikaꞌab.
Leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe nsea be mech ten ley uzhebpa msake Jesús ndoꞌ Herodes.
Leꞌa Herodes no be soldad ten na cha kweaꞌ uníꞌi ndoꞌ Jesús, cha usalad mbinno bexa Jesús, mgak bexa xa dub lad uyappa, ta ndak sbeꞌen bexa nibeꞌetsa. Cha leꞌaka ndoꞌ Pilat mtuꞌub Herodes Jesús.
Leꞌa wizh wa mzhealdiꞌizh Pilat no Herodes, leꞌa mas polta leꞌa bexa nyobe.
Leꞌa Pilat cha mchealte be uleꞌay nibeꞌe, no bexa nsak, no kwaꞌadta be men gezh wa.
Cha ndab Pilat ndoꞌ bexa:
—Leꞌa bego myun cuent mgiꞌi ndee ndoꞌ naꞌ, ndab bega leꞌa xa nchealuyo be men. Parea leꞌa bega ndewiꞌi leꞌa naꞌ unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ xa, ná leꞌa xa lá ngun ni dub ta na lbaꞌa nsake bega xa.
No ni Herodes lá ngaizheal ke ten xa, ta weꞌe mtuꞌub Herodes xa leꞌaka sa ndee. Leꞌa bega uniꞌí leꞌa xa ndee ni dub ke gat xa lá ndap xa.
Nat leꞌa naꞌ utsaksitsa xa, weꞌeta ula naꞌ xa.
Li ndab Pilat geal leꞌa itea liꞌin zha ndal ujest wa, leꞌa Pilat ngoꞌo dub men nkea litgiꞌib.
Ná leꞌa be men ndi iteanak ugeꞌ ndabbe:
—¡Gat Jesús! ¡Blaꞌa ga Barrabás!
Leꞌa Barrabás wa nkea litgiꞌib ke na uteyono xa bexa nibeꞌe Jerusalén wa, no mbit xa dub men.
Leꞌa Pilat nlad ulaꞌa Jesús, cha ndabgal xa ta wa ndoꞌ be men.
Ná leꞌa be men wa ugeꞌgal ndab:
—¡Ikea xa ndoꞌ cruz! ¡Ikea xa ndoꞌ cruz!
Leꞌa Pilat cha ndabgal biaj yon:
—Leꞌa xa ndee naꞌan xtaꞌan dub ta ugap ngun. Ni dub ke gat xa lá ndap xa. Leꞌa naꞌ utsaksitsa xa, weꞌeta ula naꞌ xa.
Ná leꞌa be men wa no be uleꞌay nibeꞌe ndi mas ugeꞌ ndabbe ikea Jesús ndoꞌ cruz. Kwenpa li ndab bexa gast plo mbinka bexa gan.
Weꞌe leꞌa Pilat ndab sunka ta ndab be men wa.

Cha mgoꞌo xa dub xa na li ndab be men itoꞌo wa, xa na li nkea litgiꞌib ke na mbit xa dub men, no uteyono xa bexa nibeꞌe wa. Cha myun Pilat cuent Jesús ndoꞌ bexa ukeꞌa bexa xa ndoꞌ cruz, lak nlad be men wa.

Leꞌa nes nchaꞌano be soldad Jesús, mzheꞌal bexa dub xabgiꞌi ngwaꞌ geꞌe, xa nsaleaꞌ Simón xa gezh Cirene. Cha mbin bexa juers goꞌo Simón cruz ten Jesús, cha mxoꞌob bexa‑yá tsoꞌo xa, nchaꞌnkea xa tsoꞌo Jesús.
No kwaꞌad be men usankea tsoꞌo Jesús, nsea lat bexa wa nchaꞌa kwaꞌad be xagots ugeꞌ ndoꞌonno Jesús.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mgeaksoꞌ mwiꞌi ndoꞌ be xagots wa, cha ndab xa:
—Bego xagots Jerusalén, lá goꞌonno bega naꞌ, ndi biꞌinno bega leꞌaka leꞌa bega no be xin bega.
Leꞌa gal be wizh leꞌa be men gab: “Uzhebpa wen yoo be xagots lá yoꞌo gan gap meꞌed, no bexa lá yoxinna, no bexa lá ngungaꞌal meꞌed.”
Leꞌa be wizh weꞌe gab be men ndoꞌ be geꞌe ubiꞌi baꞌ: “Ulayat bega tsoꞌo besa”, no gab bexa ndoꞌ be bet: “Ulate bega tsoꞌo besa.”
Leꞌa bexa lndeꞌe ndanno naꞌ, ná naꞌ ni dub ke lá ndap, mata bexa ndap ke wa mas gealkweaꞌ iniꞌí.
Leꞌa be soldad wa mbiꞌi no stop bexa ugap ikea ndoꞌ cruz wats Jesús.
Leꞌa gor na ulayaꞌ bexa sa nsaleaꞌ tit gek men, cha mkeꞌa bexa Jesús ndoꞌ cruz. Cha mkeꞌa bexa dub xa ugap wa ndoꞌ cruz wats Jesús lad gaꞌal, leꞌa stub xa wa wats lad raves.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Dios Xus naꞌ, bingeꞌ ladna go ndoꞌ be men ndee, leꞌa bexa ka lá iniꞌí xtaꞌan ndunbe.
Cha uloꞌo be soldad dub suert ndontsa iniꞌí bexa ná tonpa ikaꞌa be xab Jesús.
Leꞌa kwaꞌad be men ndewiꞌi sa wa. Leꞌa bexa nsak ten bexa judio xela ndeníꞌi ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab bexa ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa bexa:
—Leꞌa xa baꞌ ngokno be men, nat ulat xa leꞌaka xa ndoꞌ gealgut, tal leꞌa xa ta ugeaka leꞌa nak Cristo xa na mti Dios.
Leꞌa be soldad no xela uníꞌibe ndoꞌ Jesús. No msaꞌa bexa vin ulaꞌ goo xa.
Ndab bexa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Tal lu leꞌa nak xa nibeꞌe ten bexa judio, nat blat leꞌaka lu.
Leꞌa gek cruz ten Jesús mkeꞌa bexa dub letr ndab‑a: “TA NDEE XA NIBEꞌE TEN BEXA JUDIO.” Leꞌa ta wa nkea diꞌizh griego, no diꞌizh latín, no diꞌizh hebreo.
Leꞌa dub xa ugap no nkea ndoꞌ cruz no xela uníꞌi ndoꞌ Jesús, ndab xa:
—Tal lu nak Cristo, ulaꞌ ndoꞌ cruz baꞌ, cha uxeꞌe besa ndoꞌ be cruz ndee.
Ná leꞌa stub xa ugap wa cha uteyo xa na li ndab wa, ndab xa:
—Lbaꞌa ntsaksi bexa lu, ¿ná lá nzheb lu ndoꞌ Dios zha?
Leꞌa wa nsabndoꞌka ndeniꞌí gealkweaꞌ ndee, leꞌa wa ndekix ta ugap mbin wa. Parea leꞌa xa ndee ni dub ta ugap lá ngun.
Cha no ndab xa ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Jesús, utseꞌa ladna go naꞌ gor na isaxan inibeꞌe ga.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa wizh nat leꞌa lu no yoꞌono naꞌ gibeꞌa.
Leꞌa ngol gor gawizh cha mkaw idub ndoꞌ gizhliyo, gast gor nkea uyon uzhe.
Leꞌa be gor wa leꞌa wizh yá lá nluꞌuta. Cha usaw lad utaꞌa ncho bseꞌa len niꞌi ten Dios, ngok top bleꞌa‑yá.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús ugeꞌ ndab:
—Dios Xus naꞌ, ndoꞌ yaꞌa ga uchan naꞌ gealnaban ten naꞌ.
Cha ngut xa.
Leꞌa gor uniꞌí xa nibeꞌe ten be soldad ta uyoꞌo wa, cha ndab xa:
—Leꞌa Dios uzhebpa dub Dios siꞌil. Ta ugeaka leꞌa xabgiꞌi ndee dub xa wenka.
Leꞌa itea be men nde sa wa, bexa na li uniꞌí be ta uyoꞌo wa, cha nseaꞌbe bexa uzheꞌeb kweaꞌ ncho ladna bexa.
Naꞌ leꞌa bexa na nchandoꞌ Jesús sittsa ndewiꞌibe, no liga be xagots na li usankea tsoꞌo Jesús zha utoꞌo bexa Galilea.
Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi nsaleaꞌ Kosé xa gezh Arimatea ten distrit Judea. Leꞌa xa wa dub xa nsak ten bexa judio, dub xa wen nak ndoꞌ be men no ndoꞌ Dios.
No nkenkeaꞌ xa zha inibeꞌe Dios ndoꞌ gizhliyo. No naꞌanpa isak ladna xa ta mbinno be ltsaꞌa xa Jesús, bexa nsak ten bexa judio.
Weꞌe cha ngwaꞌ xa ndoꞌ Pilat unab xa Jesús.
Cha uxeꞌe xa Jesús ndoꞌ cruz, cha mtixko xa xa ngut wa dub bleꞌa lad nagud. Cha ulo xa xa wa len dub baꞌa cuent nak geꞌloꞌo len dub geꞌdaꞌa, dub sa ni dub men gol gaꞌach.
Leꞌa ta wa wizh nsaxkwaꞌa bexa judio ta guntiꞌin bexa wizh neꞌe bexa. Leꞌa gor mgaꞌach Jesús dub gor uzhe yamer yatsoꞌ wizh wa.
Leꞌa be xagots na ukeseano Jesús zha na utoꞌo bexa Galilea usankea tsoꞌo Kosé, cha uniꞌí bexa pa nde baꞌa sa mgaꞌach Jesús.
Cha nseaꞌ bexa leꞌaka gezh Jerusalén, cha msaxkwaꞌa bexa be ta uxeꞌe yaꞌlo bexa las Jesús. Cha mneꞌe bexa dub wizh lak nibeꞌe ley ten bexa.
Leꞌa ngol wizh ned ten sman gor bi ukalta naꞌ, utoꞌo be xagots wa, nchaꞌbe bexa sa nde baꞌa mgaꞌach Jesús. Mbiꞌi bexa be ta uxeꞌe li msaxkwaꞌa bexa wa, nsea stapla be xagots nchaꞌano bexa.
Leꞌa gor ulayaꞌ bexa sa wa, uniꞌí bexa leꞌa geꞌ li nsoꞌnyaw toꞌo baꞌa wa yá naꞌanlapa nsoꞌ sa wa.
Cha uyoꞌo bexa len baꞌa, cha uniꞌí bexa leꞌa Jesús naꞌanla sa wa.
Cha ngwatenaꞌ bexa, ni lá iniꞌí bexa xteꞌe gun bexa. Zha leꞌa bexa mnaꞌla top be xabgiꞌi nak lad nagud ndon nlaꞌbealꞌ ndela wats bexa.
Cha mzheb bexa, mwiꞌi bexa ndi ndoꞌ yo. Leꞌa be xabgiꞌi wa cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan nkwaꞌan bega dub xa nban sa ten bexa ngut?
Leꞌa Jesús wa naꞌanla len baꞌa ndee, leꞌa xa ubanla. Btseꞌa ladna bega ta ndab xa ndoꞌ bega zha na bi ncho xa Galilea,
ndab xa: “Leꞌa naꞌ, Xa Myak Men Ndoꞌ Gizhliyo, nsabndoꞌ yak cuent ndoꞌ yaꞌa be men ugap, no ikea naꞌ ndoꞌ cruz. Parea gal wizh yon leꞌa naꞌ ibangal.”
Weꞌe leꞌa be xagots wa cha mtseꞌa ladna be diꞌizh ndab Jesús wa.
Cha nseaꞌbe bexa leꞌaka Jerusalén, mbidiꞌizh bexa ta uniꞌí bexa ndoꞌ isatibdub be xmen Jesús no ndoꞌ iteata bexa ukeseano Jesús.
Leꞌa be xagots na li mbidiꞌizh ta wa ndoꞌ be xmen Jesús wa, leꞌa xa wa Marí xa gezh Magdala no Juana no Marí xnaꞌa Jacob no stapla xagots.
Ná leꞌa be xmen Jesús lá ngungea ladna ta ndab be xagots wa, leꞌa bexa ndi ndab leꞌa bexa wa xa loc.
Parea leꞌa Pedr cha utoꞌo karrel nchaꞌa toꞌo baꞌa. Leꞌa gor na mwiꞌi xa len baꞌa wa, ndon nabtsa be lad ubixyoꞌo Jesús uniꞌí xa. Cha myach Pedr, ngwanseana xa ta uyoꞌo wa.
Bi leꞌa wizh wa leꞌa top xabgiꞌi na no ukeseano Jesús nseaꞌbe nes nchaꞌa gezh Emaús. Leꞌa ta wa pa dub tibdub kilómetro sit wats Jerusalén.
Leꞌa bexa wa nseaꞌbe yadiꞌizh itea be ta na li uyoꞌo Jerusalén wa.
Ná ndalen li nseaꞌbe yadiꞌizh bexa ta wa, leꞌa Jesús cha ulayaꞌ wats bexa, cha no xa nchaꞌano bexa wa.
Parea leꞌa Dios lá ulaꞌa igondoꞌ bexa Jesús.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan nseaꞌbe yadiꞌizh bega nes ndee? ¿No xtaꞌan lbaꞌa uban ncho ladna bega zha?
Leꞌa dub xa nsaleaꞌ Cleofas cha ukaꞌab ndab:
—¿Ndon gokama nak dub xa sit utoꞌo lá iniꞌí xtaꞌan uyoꞌo Jerusalén be wizh ndee zha?
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan uyoꞌo sa wa zha?
Leꞌa bexa wa cha ndab:
—Ta ngwasea Jesús xa Nazaret, xa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios, no sian uyon mbin xa, no uzhebpa wen mluu xa be men. Leꞌa Dios nsea itea be men msak ladna lak mbin xa.
Ná leꞌa be uleꞌay nibeꞌe no bexa nsak ten besa myun cuent Jesús gat xa. Cha mkeꞌa bexa xa ndoꞌ cruz.
Leꞌa besa mbinbeꞌe leꞌa xa leꞌa ulat beuna xa Israel ndoꞌ yaꞌa bexa nibeꞌe, ná nat myonla wizh ngok ta wa.
Leꞌa pla be xagots ncho lat besa ngwaꞌ sa mgaꞌach Jesús wa gor bi ukalta naꞌ,
ná leꞌa bexa lá izheal‑la Jesús sa wa. Cha myach bexa ndab bexa leꞌa bexa uniꞌí be angel ndab leꞌa Jesús ubanla.
Leꞌa pla be ltsaꞌa besa cha no ngwaꞌwiꞌi sa wa, cha uniꞌí bexa be taꞌa lakkata ndab be xagots wa, ná leꞌa bexa no naꞌanpa iniꞌí Jesús.
Leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—Uzhebpa lid leꞌa ndanbeꞌe bega. No uzhebpa chaꞌaw ndangea ladna bega be ta polta mbidiꞌizh be men sakndoꞌ Dios.
¿Lá iniꞌí bega zha lid nsabndoꞌka itid Cristo itea be ta wa, weꞌeta yaꞌ xa wats Dios?
Cha usaxan Jesús ndadiꞌizh itea be ta nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios cuent ten Jesús. Ned mbidiꞌizh xa ta mkeꞌa Moisés, weꞌeta mbidiꞌizh xa ta mkeꞌa iteata bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios.
Leꞌa gor na ulayaꞌ bexa gezh Emaús wa, leꞌa Jesús cha mbinta nchaꞌata mas sit.
Ná leꞌa bexa wa dubpa ndab ndoꞌ Jesús:
—Sa ndeetsa byaꞌanno ga besa, leꞌa nat nseala teꞌal.
Leꞌa Jesús cha weꞌetsa myaꞌanno bexa wa.
Ngol gor nde bexa ndoꞌ mes gaw bexa, leꞌa Jesús cha usen dub pan, cha msaꞌa xa xno ndoꞌ Dios. Cha uleꞌa xa‑yá, cha msaꞌa xa‑yá ndoꞌ bexa wa.
Leꞌa gor wa leꞌa bexa wa cha mgondoꞌ Jesús, ná leꞌa Jesús cha unitndoꞌ sa wa.
Cha ndab dub xa wa ndoꞌ stub xa:
—Ta weꞌeka uzhebpa mten ladna wa gor na li mbidiꞌizh xa xteꞌe nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios, gor na nseaꞌbe min nes wa.
Bi leꞌa gor wa cha myach bexa leꞌaka Jerusalén, sa ndebe isatibdub be xmen Jesús no stapla bexa ndeno bexa sa wa.
Leꞌa bexa nde sa wa cha ndab:
—Leꞌa Jesús ta ugeaka mbanla, leꞌa xa wa mlundoꞌ ndoꞌ Simón.
Weꞌe leꞌa itop bexa wa cha no mbidiꞌizh ta ngwasea bexa nes nchaꞌa Emaús, no xteꞌe mgondoꞌ bexa Jesús gor uleꞌa xa pan.
Leꞌa ndalen ndeyadiꞌizh bexa ta wa, zha leꞌa Jesús ulatsoꞌla tlaw bexa. Cha ndab xa:
—¡Dios gun wen yoo ladna bega!
Leꞌa bexa cha uzhebpa mzhebbe, mbinbeꞌe bexa leꞌa Jesús dub ta ntalad.
Ná leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan nzheb bega? ¿No xtaꞌan lbaꞌa lá ndangea ladna bega leꞌa naꞌ Jesúska?
Bwiꞌi bega yaꞌa naꞌ no xoꞌo naꞌ, no bgal bega naꞌ. Leꞌa naꞌ leꞌaka Jesús. Leꞌa dub ta ntalad lá ndap ni tit no ni las na, lak naꞌ bega naꞌ.
Leꞌa gor na li ndab Jesús, cha mluu xa yaꞌa xa no xoꞌo xa.
Leꞌa bexa uzhebpa mten ladnabe no ndanseana bexa, parea bi lá ndangea ladna bexa ti leꞌa Jesús ta wa. Ta weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha ndab:
—¿Xtaꞌan ndap bega gaw naꞌ?
Cha msaꞌa bexa dub bleꞌa mbeal mgiꞌix no dub bleꞌa mguꞌud ncho mzhin.
Leꞌa Jesús cha usen‑a, cha udaw xa‑yá ndoꞌ gaꞌal bexa wa.
Cha ndab Jesús:

—Btseꞌa ladna bega ta na li mbidiꞌizh naꞌ ndoꞌ bega, zha na li ndesea beuna wa. Ndáp naꞌ leꞌa itea be taꞌa nkeaniꞌi cuent ten naꞌ ndoꞌ be libr mkeꞌa Moisés, no ndoꞌ be libr mkeꞌa bexa mbidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios, no ndoꞌ libr Salmos, leꞌa ta wa nsabndoꞌka li gak.
Leꞌa Jesús cha mbidiꞌizh ndoꞌ bexa lak nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios, ndontsa yakbeꞌena bexa‑yá,
ndab xa:
—Leꞌa diꞌizh ten Dios nkeaniꞌi leꞌa Cristo nsabndoꞌka li gat no iban xa wizh yon ndoꞌ gealgut.

No nsabndoꞌ gudiꞌizh be xmen naꞌ cuent ten naꞌ ndoꞌ itea be men, ndontsa ulaꞌa bexa be ta ugap nak bexa, no utsuꞌu Dios be ke ten bexa. Ndon ned Jerusalén ndee no gast idub ndoꞌ gizhliyo gudiꞌizh bega ta wa.
Leꞌa bego nak bexa uniꞌí be ta li utiꞌid naꞌ wa.
Blaꞌach bego leꞌa naꞌ utuꞌubka Espíritu ten Dios, xa ndabka Xus naꞌ usaꞌa ndoꞌ bega wa. Cha lá ikaꞌan bega Jerusalén ndee, gast ikaꞌaka bega juers ilen gibeꞌa wa.
Weꞌe leꞌa Jesús cha mbiꞌi bexa dub lad toꞌo Jerusalén gax gezh Betania. Cha msaꞌab Jesús be yaꞌa na lad nde bexa, cha unab xa ndoꞌ Dios ulaꞌach Dios bexa.
Ndalen li nsoꞌyadiꞌizh Jesús ta wa, leꞌa xa cha nseaꞌ, mkea xa gibeꞌa.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha msaxib, ngwankea bexa Jesús. Weꞌe cha uzhebpa mten ladna bexa, myach bexa leꞌaka Jerusalén.
Cha itea wizh ndaꞌbe bexa tale ten niꞌi ten Dios, ndankea bexa Dios, no nsaꞌa bexa xno ndoꞌ Dios. Lika nak‑a.
John: Leꞌa zha ndon leꞌa ned, leꞌa xa nak Diꞌizh nchola.
No nsoꞌla xa nak Diꞌizh wa wats Dios,
leꞌa xa wa nak Dios.
Leꞌa zha ndon leꞌa ned wa, leꞌa xa wa nsoꞌla wats Dios.
Leꞌa iteanak be ta ncho leꞌa ta wa ngokndeꞌe juers ten Diꞌizh wa.
Ni dub taꞌa naꞌanpa yoꞌo tal leꞌa xa wa lá ngundeꞌe‑yá.
Leꞌa xa wa leꞌa nsaꞌa gealnaban ten be men,
leꞌa gealnaban wa leꞌa nak xeꞌa ten bexa.
Leꞌa xeꞌa wa nsu sa ukaw,
leꞌa sa ukaw wa lá gun gan yuꞌu xeꞌa wa.
Uyoꞌo dub xabgiꞌi leꞌa Dios mtuꞌub, leꞌa ta wa Juan xa ulaleaꞌ be men.
Leꞌa xa wa mbidyadiꞌizh cuent ten xa nak xeꞌa wa, ndontsa itea be men gungea ladna xa wa.
Leꞌa Juan naꞌanpa leꞌa nak xeꞌa wa, leꞌa xa ndi mbidyadiꞌizhtsa cuent ten xa nak xeꞌa.
Leꞌa xa na ta ugeaka nak xeꞌa, xa nsu xeꞌa ten Dios ndoꞌ be men, leꞌa xa wa mbiꞌid ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee.
No ukesea xa ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee. Leꞌa juers ten xa ngokndeꞌe gizhliyo, parea leꞌa be men ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo lá igondoꞌ xa.
Mbiꞌid xa ndoꞌ bexa Israel, parea leꞌa be ltsaꞌa xa wa lá isakyoꞌón ta ndab xa.
Ná leꞌa itea be men na msakyoꞌón ta ndab xa no mbingea ladna bexa xa, ndoꞌ bexa wa msaꞌa xa juers myak bexa xin Dios.
Leꞌa ta na nak bexa xin Dios wa leꞌa ta wa naꞌanpa dub ta ndun be men, leꞌa ta wa ndi dub ta nsaꞌa Dios.
Leꞌa xa nak Diꞌizh wa myak men, cha uyoꞌo xa lat besa. Sbeꞌen nkweaꞌ ladna xa be men no sbeꞌen gealngea ndadiꞌizh xa. No uniꞌí besa xteꞌe juert nak xa ta na leꞌa xa ga dubkama nak Xin Dios.
Leꞌa Juan wa mluu be men xteꞌe nak xa nak Diꞌizh wa, ugeꞌ ndab Juan ndoꞌ bexa:
—Leꞌa cuent ten xa ndee mbidiꞌizh naꞌ, gor na ndáp naꞌ leꞌa xa na ilen tsoꞌo naꞌ wa mas nsak ndoꞌ naꞌ, geal leꞌa xa wa nedka nchola ndoꞌ naꞌ.
Leꞌa xa uzhebpa utsin nak ndoꞌ beuna, no uzhebpa ndakno xa beuna itea be wizh.
Leꞌa juers ten Moisés leꞌa Dios msaꞌa ley ten na. Parea leꞌa juers ten Jesucristo leꞌa Dios mluu xteꞌe nkweaꞌ ladna xa beuna no xteꞌe nak gealngea ten xa.
Ni dub men gol niꞌí Dios. Ná leꞌa xa na ga dubkama nak Xin Dios, xa na nsob wats Tad Dios, leꞌa xa wa mluu ndoꞌ beuna xteꞌe nak Dios.
Leꞌa dub wizh leꞌa bexa nibeꞌe ten bexa judio mtuꞌub pla be uleꞌay no pla bexa levita, utoꞌo bexa gezh Jerusalén ngwaꞌinabdiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ Juan xa ngoleaꞌ be men ná ton nak Juan.
Leꞌa Juan naꞌanpa ukwiꞌin, ndi gaꞌalka ndab xa ndoꞌ bexa wa:
—Leꞌa naꞌ naꞌanpa leꞌa nak Cristo.
Leꞌa bexa wa cha unabdiꞌizhgal ndab bexa:
—¿Tonxá lu zhaga? ¿Nak lu profet Elí zha?
