Leꞌa ta na nak bega xmen Cristo, ta weꞌe bxobgek bega ndoꞌ itea bexa naktiꞌin. Ndoꞌ xa nibeꞌe Roma bxobgek bega, leꞌa xa wa ndon leꞌa nibeꞌe.
No ndoꞌ be xmen xa wa bxobgek bega, leꞌa xa ntuꞌub bexa utsaksi bexa be men ndun ta ugap, no utsin gak bexa ndoꞌ be men ndun ta wen.
Leꞌa Dios nlad li wen gak bega, ndontsa yá naꞌantapa inisi be men bega, bexa lá nchandoꞌ Dios no naꞌanpa nsakyoꞌón bexa.
Leꞌa Dios uloꞌo bega ndoꞌ be ke ten bega, ndontsa gun bega tiꞌin ndoꞌ Dios, naꞌanpa gun bega be ta ugap.
Gop bega mod ndoꞌ iteanak be men. No bkweaꞌ ladna bega bexa no nak xmen Cristo. No bxobgek bega ndoꞌ Dios, nsea gop bega mod ndoꞌ xa nibeꞌe Roma.
Bego na ncho ndoꞌ yaꞌa stubga men, gop bega mod ndoꞌ xa nak xwan bega, no bxobgek bega ndoꞌ xa. Li bin bega ndoꞌ bexa utsin nak no ndoꞌ bexa uxax nak.
Leꞌa Dios nten ladna gor na nxik bega ndoꞌ dub gealkweaꞌ ni lá nsabndoꞌ itid bega, ta na ndun bega lakta nlad Dios gak bega.

Tal leꞌa dub men ntsaksi bega ta na ndun bega dub ta ugap, cha uxik bega ndoꞌ gealkweaꞌ wa, naꞌanpa nsabndoꞌ itenno ladna bega ta wa. Ná tal leꞌa bega ntid dub gealkweaꞌ ta na ndun bega ta wen, no nxik bega ndoꞌ gealkweaꞌ wa, leꞌa ta wa ta nsak ladna Dios.
Leꞌa Dios mti bega li gun bega ta wa, leꞌa lak mxik Cristo ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ sakndoꞌ beuna, no liga nsabndoꞌ uxik beuna.
Leꞌa Cristo nunk lá ngun dub ta ugap, no ni dub gealkwiꞌin lá ngun xa.

Leꞌa gor na unisi bexa xa wa, leꞌa xa wa ni dub diꞌizh xela lá ikaꞌab ndoꞌ bexa wa. No gor na mtsaksi bexa xa, leꞌa xa ni dub ta ugap lá ngab ndoꞌ bexa wa. Ndi mlaꞌa xa ta wa cuent ten Dios, xa na utsin gab ndoꞌ itea be men ná ton ndap ke.

Leꞌa Cristo wa leꞌa mbiꞌi be ke ten beuna ngut xa ndoꞌ cruz, natsa ulaꞌa beuna be ta ugap nak beuna nsea iban beuna gun beuna ta wen. Leꞌa ta na utid Cristo ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ wa, ta weꞌe leꞌa bego myakna.
Leꞌa polta utesea bega cuent be borreg, ma ukegix. Ná nat myach bega wats Cristo, xa nlaꞌach gealnaban ten bega lak bexa nlaꞌach be borreg ten na.

No liga leꞌa bego xagots, bxobgek bega ndoꞌ xabgiꞌi ten bega. Tal leꞌa bexa lá ndangea ladna diꞌizh ten Dios, leꞌa ncho xa gungeaka ladna‑yá gor na naꞌ xa xteꞌe nak bega, lá nkiꞌin uzheꞌeb gudiꞌizh bega‑yá ndoꞌ xa.
Leꞌa xa inaꞌ xteꞌe utsin nak bega no xteꞌe umbiꞌi nak bega ndoꞌ Dios.
Leꞌa ta ndun chul nak bega wa naꞌanpa ta nsaxkwaꞌa bega gek bega no be ta oro no be lad uyap ndantiꞌin bega.
Leꞌa ta na chul nak bega wa, leꞌa ta wa ta ncho len ladoꞌo bega, dub ta lá initndoꞌ. Leꞌa ta wa ta na utsin nak bega no bchaꞌan nak bega, leꞌa be ta weꞌe uzhebpa ta nsak ndoꞌ Dios.
Li ngok be xagots polta, bexa wen ngok ndoꞌ Dios. Leꞌa bexa wa mgeꞌ ladna Dios, no mxobgek bexa ndoꞌ xabgiꞌi ten bexa.
Lak mxobgek Sara ndoꞌ Abraham, ndab xa leꞌa Abraham leꞌa nak xa nibeꞌe xa. Leꞌa bega slayaꞌ gak lak ngok Sara wa, tal leꞌa bega gun be ta wen no ni naꞌan xtaꞌan izheb bega.

No liga bego xabgiꞌi, uzhebpa blaꞌach bega xagots ten bega no utsin gok bega ndoꞌ xa. Leꞌa xa wa cuentta dub vas lid bid ileꞌa, ná leꞌa Dios dubtsa gealnaban kub msaꞌa ndoꞌ bega no ndoꞌ be xagots wa. Li gak bega ndontsa naꞌan xtaꞌan gun gan lá goꞌón Dios ta inab bega ndoꞌ xa.
Nat itea bego baꞌ, naꞌanpa kuyo bega, no blats ladna bega be ltsaꞌa bega, no bkweaꞌ ladna bega bexa, no utsin gok bega ndoꞌ bexa, no lá izhinna bega.

Ná tal ncho xa ugap gunno bega, naꞌanpa cha noga bega li ugap gunno xa wa. No tal ton inisi bega, naꞌanpa cha noga bega li inisi xa wa. Ndi unab bega ndoꞌ Dios utsin gunno Dios xa, leꞌa Dios leꞌa mti bega li gun bega, ndontsa utsin gunno Dios bega.
Lak nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios, ndab‑a:
Leꞌa tal ton nlad wen yoo, no iniꞌí xa be wizh wen,
lá gudiꞌizh xa ta ugap no ni lá gun xa gealkwiꞌin.
No ulaꞌa xa be ta ugap,
cha ndi utsin gak xa.
No ukwaꞌan xa wen yoꞌono xa be men,
no idub tiemp li nsabndoꞌ gun xa.
Leꞌa Dios nlaꞌach be men wen,
no ndoꞌón xa xtaꞌan ndab bexa.
Ná leꞌa Dios ndakloo ndoꞌ be men ndun ta ugap.
¿Tonma dub xa xela gunno bega, tal leꞌa bega sbeꞌen ta utsin ndun?
Ná tal leꞌa bega iniꞌí dub gealkweaꞌ ta na utsin nak bega, leꞌa Dios gun wen yoo ladna bega. Ta weꞌe naꞌan ton ndoꞌ ná izheb bega, no ni lá yuꞌ ladna bega.

Ndi len ladoꞌo bega wankea bega Cristo Xwan beuna. No list gok bega ndontsa isuꞌu bega ikaꞌab bega guniꞌi ton inabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ bega cuent ten ta ngeꞌ ladna bega Cristo. No utsin ikaꞌab bega gap bega mod ndoꞌ xa.
Weꞌe leꞌa bexa na xela níꞌi ndoꞌ bega ndi ido ladnabe, gor iniꞌí bexa be ta wen ndun bega nak xmen Cristo.
Tal leꞌa Dios nlad, mas wen iniꞌí bega dub gealkweaꞌ ta na ndun bega dub ta wen, ni ka iniꞌí bega dub gealkweaꞌ ke na gun bega dub ta ugap.

Leꞌa Cristo uniꞌí gealkweaꞌ gast ngut xa, ndontsa myuꞌu be ke ten beuna. Leꞌa xa wa ni dub ke lá ndap, ná leꞌa xa ngut sakndoꞌ iteanak be men ndun be ta ugap, natsa yoꞌo xa beuna wats Dios. Leꞌa beꞌal las xa ngutka, ná leꞌa bi ten xa nbanka.
Cha li ngwaꞌyadiꞌizh bi ten xa ndoꞌ xbi be men ndenchonyaw.

Leꞌa ta wa bexa lá uxobgek ndoꞌ Dios tiemp xapta, zha na ukenkeaꞌ Dios naga syach be men wats xa, zha na mbindeꞌe Noé dub barco siꞌil. Leꞌa ta wa uyoꞌo dub xoꞌontsa men len na, bexa lá ngat ndoꞌ gilog wa.

Leꞌa ta utid bexa wa nak cuent ta ntaleaꞌ beuna len nits, ta ndun ndap beuna gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios. Naꞌanpa ntaleaꞌ beuna ndontsa ilate mek beuna, ndi ntaleaꞌ beuna ndontsa umbiꞌi gak ladoꞌo beuna ndoꞌ Dios, juers ten ta na mban Jesucristo ndoꞌ gealgut.
Leꞌa Cristo mkea gibeꞌa, cha nat nsob xa wats Dios lad gaꞌal. Leꞌa iteanak be angel nxobgek ndoꞌ xa, no be espíritu nibeꞌe.
No lak uniꞌí Cristo be gealkweaꞌ zha uyoꞌo xa ndoꞌ gizhliyo, ta weꞌe naꞌanpa izheb bega iniꞌí bega be gealkweaꞌ. Leꞌa tal ton itid ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ, leꞌa xa wa gun gan ndoꞌ ta ugap,
ndontsa idub nban xa naꞌanpa ukwaꞌan xa be ta nladtsa xa, ndi gun xa ta nsak ladna Dios.

Yá utid zha na mbin bega ta na ndal ladna bexa lá nchandoꞌ Dios, bexa ndun be ta bzhiꞌik, no nak bexa sian ta ugap, no ndun bexa gealgu, no ndesea bexa sa nyoꞌo gast ndun be men ta ugap, no ndun bexa itea be ta ndal ladna bexa ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo, no ndankea bexa be ta naꞌanpa nak Dios, dub ta uzhebpa lá nsak ladna Dios.
Leꞌa nat leꞌa bexa lá nchandoꞌ Dios wa ndanseanabe xteꞌe lá ndunta bega ltsaꞌa be ta ugap ndun bexa wa. Ta weꞌe usalad ndanno bexa bega.
Parea gal dub wizh leꞌa bexa wa usaꞌa cuent ndoꞌ Dios itea be ta mbin bexa, gab Dios ná xteꞌe nak ta mbin kadga dub men, bexa ndenban no bexa ngutla.
Leꞌa bexa ngut wa mbiꞌínla diꞌizh ten Dios zha bi nban bexa, ndontsa ibangal bexa gap bexa gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios, mas ngutla bexa ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee.
Leꞌa gizhliyo ndee yamer idub. Ta weꞌe list ute bega, bidiꞌizhno tseꞌe bega Dios.
Leꞌa ndoꞌ itea be taꞌa, leꞌa ta ndee ta mas nsak: Uzhebpa bkweaꞌ ladna bega be ltsaꞌa bega. Leꞌa tal beuna li gun, leꞌa beuna sungeꞌ ladna sian taꞌa ndanno bexa beuna.
No utsin gok bega ndoꞌ itea bexa nsea ta lid bega, naꞌanpa ineꞌe ladna bega xa.
Utsin bintiꞌin bega be ta ndák bega, ta msaꞌa Dios ndoꞌ kadga dub bega, ndontsa li gakno bega be ltsaꞌa bega, lak msaꞌa Dios gun bega.

Leꞌa bego na ndadiꞌizh diꞌizh ten Dios, bidiꞌizh bega‑yá lakkata nak‑a. No bego na ndakno be men, bin bega ta wa idub lak juers nsaꞌa Dios ndoꞌ bega. Weꞌe leꞌa be men iniꞌí ta ndun bega wa, cha gab bexa leꞌa Dios uzheꞌeb dub xa wen juers ten Jesucristo, xa ndon leꞌa wen no ndon leꞌa juert ndoꞌ itea be taꞌa idub tiemp. Lika nak‑a.
Bego amig ten naꞌ, lá yanseana bega gor na uzhebpa kweaꞌ nchaꞌtid bega, leꞌa ta wa ga lika gak.
Ndi bten ladna bega geal no bega nsatid ltsaꞌa be gealkweaꞌ utid Cristo, ndontsa liga uzhebpa iten ladna bega wizh ilengal xa.

Tal leꞌa be men xela níꞌi ndoꞌ bega ke na nak bega xmen Cristo, uzhebpa wen yoo ladna bega, leꞌa ta ndun bexa wa nluu leꞌa Espíritu ten Dios ncho ladoꞌo bega. Leꞌa bexa wa kweaꞌ níꞌi ndoꞌ Cristo, ná leꞌa bega ndi ndun ta nsak ladna Cristo.
Leꞌa bexa na ndut men nsabndoꞌka iniꞌí gealkweaꞌ, no liga bexa ndun gealwaꞌan, no bexa ndun ta ugap, no bexa nyote ndoꞌ ta ten stubga men. Parea leꞌa bega naꞌanpa li nak.
Ná tal leꞌa bega iniꞌí gealkweaꞌ ta na nak bega xmen Cristo, lá ido ladna bega; ndi bsaꞌa bega xno ndoꞌ Dios leꞌa bega nak xmen xa.
Leꞌa nat yamer isaxan tiemp iniꞌí be men be gealkweaꞌ. Leꞌa beuna nak xmen xa ned iniꞌí gealkweaꞌ wa, weꞌe mas juert yoo be men lá nxobgek ndoꞌ diꞌizh wen ten Dios.
Lak nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios, ndab‑a:
Leꞌa be men wen sian be gealkweaꞌ itid ndontsa gap xa gealnaban,
¿mata gal bexa ugap nak, bexa ndap ke ndoꞌ Dios?
Tal leꞌa bega itid ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ lak nlad Dios, byun bega cuent gealnaban ten bega ndoꞌ Dios xa mbindeꞌe bega, no bin bega be ta wen ndoꞌ Dios, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa ulaꞌa bega.

Leꞌa naꞌ ndee nak dub xa nchansu be xmen Cristo, no uní naꞌ xteꞌe utid Cristo be gealkweaꞌ, no gal usoꞌ naꞌ dub sa isoꞌob naꞌ wats Cristo zha ilen xa. Ta weꞌe naꞌab naꞌ ndoꞌ bego na nchansu be xmen Cristo,

utsin blaꞌach bega bexa wa, leꞌa Dios msaꞌa bexa ulaꞌach bega. Bin bega ta wa idub ncho ladna bega, naꞌanpa cuent dub ta lajuerska gun bega. No naꞌanpa ukwaꞌan bega med, ndi gaknotsa bega bexa lak nlad Dios.
No naꞌanpa gak bega cuent dub xa leꞌa nibeꞌe bexa wa, ndi utsin gok bega ndontsa iniꞌí bexa xteꞌe nsabndoꞌ gak bexa.
Weꞌe gor na ilen Cristo xa na nchansu beuna, leꞌa bega gal usoꞌ dub ta uzhebpa nsak, ta nunk lá idub.
No liga bego bexa ben nsabndoꞌ uxobgek bega ndoꞌ bexa nchansu bega. Iteanak bega utsin gok ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa bega, naꞌanpa izhinna bega. Leꞌa diꞌizh ten Dios nkeaniꞌi ndab‑a:
Leꞌa Dios lá ndakno bexa zhin,
leꞌa xa ndi ndakno bexa bchaꞌan nak.
Byak byux bega ndoꞌ yaꞌa Dios xa ndon leꞌa juert, weꞌe uxapso Dios bega gal zha li nsabndoꞌ gun xa.
Blaꞌa bega itea be ta nyuꞌ ladna bega ndoꞌ yaꞌa Dios, leꞌa Dios nlaꞌachka bega.
List ute bega no blaꞌach bega, leꞌa maxuꞌu ndakloo ndoꞌ bega nlad utsabgix bega. Leꞌa maxuꞌu nkesea cuent dub mbiꞌizh nbezh, nkeseakwaꞌan ma ta gaw ma.

Lá ulaꞌa bega gak ta nlad maxuꞌu, ndi mas bgeꞌ ladna bega Dios. Leꞌa bego uniꞌíka leꞌa be gealkweaꞌ ntid bega wa, leꞌa idub ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee ndencho ltsaꞌa bega nokaga lbaꞌa nchaꞌtid ndoꞌ gealkweaꞌ.

Leꞌa zha na yá utidla bega ndoꞌ ta wa dub ndeꞌep, leꞌa Dios gun gaꞌal gak bega, no gakno xa bega, no gun xa juert gak ladoꞌo bega, no mas igeꞌ ladna bega xa. Leꞌa Dios leꞌa nkweaꞌpa ladna beuna, no mti xa beuna yoo beuna wats Jesucristo gibeꞌa idub tiemp.
¡Leꞌa Dios ndon leꞌa nsak no nibeꞌe xa idub tiemp! Lika nak‑a.

Leꞌa Silvano ngokno naꞌ mkeꞌa besa git tuzh ndee. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp leꞌa xa ndee dub xa ugeaka nak xmen Cristo. Mkeꞌa besa git ndee ndontsa utenxeꞌa naꞌ bega, no iniꞌí bega leꞌa Dios ta ugeaka nkweaꞌ ladna bega. ¡Lá yalad bega ta wa!
Leꞌa iteanak bexa nak xmen Cristo ndencho Babilonia ndee, bexa na mti Dios lak mti Dios bega, leꞌa bexa wa nidiꞌizh ndoꞌ bega. No Marc xa nak cuent xiꞌín naꞌ no nidiꞌizh ndoꞌ bega.
Unidiꞌizh bega ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa bega sakndoꞌ naꞌ, ta na nluu leꞌa bega nkweaꞌ ladna bexa.
Leꞌa Dios gun wen yoo ladna bega nak xmen Jesucristo. Lika gak‑a.
II Peter: Leꞌa naꞌ ndee Simón Pedr, dub xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ Jesucristo, xa mtuꞌub naꞌ gun naꞌ tiꞌin ten xa. Nkeꞌa naꞌ git ndee ndoꞌ bego na ndangea ladna Jesucristo lak ndangea ladna besa xa. Leꞌa ta wa ta msaꞌa Jesucristo, xa na leꞌa nak Dios ten beuna, xa na nsaꞌa gealnaban ndoꞌ beuna.
Naꞌab naꞌ ndoꞌ Dios mas utsin gak xa ndoꞌ bega, no gun xa mas wen yoo ladna bega, no mas igondoꞌ bega Dios no Jesús Xwan beuna.
Leꞌa iteanak be ta nkiꞌin beuna ndontsa gak beuna lak nsak ladna Dios, leꞌa juers siꞌil ten Dios nsaꞌa xa ta wa, geal nchandoꞌ beuna xa. No mti xa beuna ta na uzhebpa wen xa no juert nak xa.
Li nsaꞌa Dios uzhebpa be ta wen ndoꞌ beuna lak ndabka xa usaꞌa xa‑yá, ndontsa utsin gak bega lak nak Dios, no ulaꞌa bega be ta bzhiꞌik nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo, be ta ugap nkwaꞌan be men.
Ta weꞌe gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega, idub ncho ladna bega bgeꞌ ladna bega Cristo, no bin bega ta nsak ladna Dios, no mas bgondoꞌ bega xa,
no lá gun bega be ta nladtsa bega, no bxik bega ndoꞌ itea be taꞌa, no wankea bega Dios,
no utsin gok bega ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa bega, no bkweaꞌ ladna bega be men.
Tal leꞌa bega ndunka be ta ndee no mas gunta bega ta wa, leꞌa bega mas igondoꞌ Jesucristo Xwan beuna, no wenka gun bega tiꞌin ndoꞌ Dios.
Ná leꞌa bexa na naꞌanpa ndun be ta ndee, leꞌa bexa wa cuent dub xa lá naꞌ. Leꞌa bexa wa myalad ta mtsambiꞌi Dios ladoꞌo bexa ndoꞌ be ta ugap mbin bexa.
Bega nak beuna xmen Cristo, leꞌa Dios utezh bega, no mti xa bega. Ta weꞌe bin bega itea be ta ndee wa, ndontsa naꞌanpa gailaꞌ bega ndoꞌ be ta ugap.
Leꞌa Dios ndi uxaꞌal sa yate bega, sa inibeꞌe Jesucristo Xwan beuna idub tiemp, xa na nsaꞌa gealnaban ndoꞌ beuna.
Leꞌa naꞌ ndee lá kweasyáp be ta ndee ndoꞌ bega, maska yá uniꞌíka bega‑yá, no ndangea ladna bega gealngea.
Leꞌa nat bi nban naꞌ leꞌa naꞌ nsabndoꞌ gáp be ta ndee ndoꞌ bega ndontsa lá yalad bega‑yá.
Leꞌa Jesucristo leꞌa mluu ndoꞌ naꞌ leꞌa naꞌ naꞌantapa kwen nban.
Leꞌa naꞌ gun iteatsa be taꞌa syoꞌo gan gun naꞌ, ndontsa naꞌanpa yalad bega be ta ndee gal zha gat naꞌ.
Leꞌa gor na mluꞌu besa bega xteꞌe juert nak Jesucristo Xwan beuna, no xteꞌe ilen xa stub biaj, leꞌa ta wa naꞌanpa dub ta ulogektsa besa. Leꞌa besa galka ndi uniꞌíndoꞌ xteꞌe juert nak xa.
Leꞌa Tad Dios leꞌa mluu ton nak Jesús no xteꞌe juert nak xa, zha na ulen ti Dios gibeꞌa ndab Dios: “Leꞌa ta ndee Xiꞌín naꞌ. Naꞌ nkweaꞌ ladna xa no ntenno lad naꞌ xa.”
Leꞌa besa leꞌa mbiꞌín ti Dios ta li ulen gibeꞌa wa, gor ndeno besa Jesús bet wa, dub sa umbiꞌi ndoꞌ Dios.

Ta weꞌe mas ngeꞌ ladna beuna be ta mkeꞌa be profet polta. Leꞌa bega nsabndoꞌ isakyoꞌón be diꞌizh wa, leꞌa ta wa cuent dub xeꞌa nsu len dub sa ukaw. No li bsakyoꞌón bega ta wa, gast gal gor na ilen Cristo cuent dub gor ndat xeꞌa, zha usu xa xeꞌa len ladoꞌo bega.
Parea nsabndoꞌ ned yakbeꞌena bega leꞌa ni dub diꞌizh mkeꞌa be profet wa, lá yoo gan lbaꞌatsa yakbeꞌena be men‑a.
Leꞌa iteanak be diꞌizh mbidiꞌizh bexa sakndoꞌ Dios tiemp polta wa, leꞌa ta wa naꞌanpa ta ulogektsa bexa. Leꞌa bexa ndi mbidiꞌizh ta wa laktsa mluu Espíritu ten Dios gudiꞌizh bexa.

Leꞌa polta leꞌa lat bexa Israel uyoꞌo bexa nkwiꞌin ndab leꞌa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios. No liga yoo be mech lat bega, bexa nlad ukwiꞌinno bega, gudiꞌizh bexa dub ta naꞌanpa ta ugea, ta utsabgix ncho bega. Leꞌa ta wa uluu leꞌa bexa naꞌanpa ta ugea ndangea ladna Cristo xa ngut sakndoꞌ beuna. Ta weꞌe gal dub wizh uxax initndoꞌ bexa.
Leꞌa kwaꞌad be men isankea tsoꞌo be ta ugap ndun bexa wa. No leꞌa ke ten ta nluu bexa, leꞌa be men iníꞌi kweaꞌ ndoꞌ gealngea ten Dios.
Leꞌa bexa wa ukwiꞌinno bega ndontsa gun bexa gan med. Leꞌa Dios polkata mbinbeꞌe utsaksi bexa li gun. Ta weꞌe leꞌa xa ta ugeakapa li gunno bexa wa.
Leꞌa Dios lá ngungeꞌ ladna ndoꞌ be angel mbin ta ugap, leꞌa xa ndi mtsaꞌab bexa wa infierno, dub sa ukaw, sa nchonyaw bexa gast gal wizh utsaksi Dios bexa.

No liga lá ngungeꞌ ladna Dios ndoꞌ be men uyoꞌo tiemp xapta, zha uyoꞌo Noé, xa na mbidiꞌizh xteꞌe nsabndoꞌ gak be men. Leꞌa Dios ndi mtuꞌub gilog siꞌil ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndontsa mnitndoꞌ nits be men ugap wa. Ná leꞌa Dios lá ulaꞌa ngat Noé ndoꞌ gilog wa nsea stub sgaꞌadga bexa.
No liga mtsaksi Dios bexa gezh Sodoma no gezh Gomorra, mtsoꞌol Dios be gezh wa gast ndon diꞌ myaꞌan‑a, ndontsa iniꞌí be men xteꞌe yasea bexa ndun ta ugap.
Naꞌ leꞌa Dios lá ulaꞌa yolꞌ Lot, leꞌa xa dub xa wen, uzheꞌeb kweaꞌ nyoꞌo ladna xa tant ta ugap nak be men sa wa.
Leꞌa Lot wa dub xa wen ngok uyoꞌo lat bexa ugap wa. Leꞌa xa uzhebpa kweaꞌ nyoꞌo ladna itea wizh gor na naꞌ xa no ndoꞌón xa ta ndun be men wa.
Leꞌa be ta ndee nluu leꞌa Dios sun gan koꞌo bexa utsin nak ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ. No sun Dios gan utsaksi bexa ugap, gal wizh na gab Dios ná ton ndap ke.
No mas utsaksi Dios bexa na ndun be ta bzhiꞌik nlad bexa, no lá nxobgek bexa ndoꞌ Dios.
Leꞌa bexa ukwiꞌin wa uzhebpa zhin nak no ngud nak ladoꞌo bexa. No ni lá nzheb bexa xela níꞌi bexa ndoꞌ be espíritu nibeꞌe.
Leꞌa be angel ten Dios uzhebpa mas juert nak ndoꞌ bexa ukwiꞌin wa, parea ni lá gun be angel rages usake be espíritu wa ndoꞌ Dios.

Ná leꞌa be men wa xela níꞌi ndoꞌ be ta na ni lá nyakbeꞌena bexa. Naꞌanpa utsin ndanbeꞌe bexa, no ndun bexa sbeꞌen ta nladtsa bexa. Leꞌa ta na li nak bexa wa, ta weꞌe li gat bexa. Nak bexa cuent be man, bema ndal por na isen be men ma gat ma.

Leꞌa lak xela ndanno bexa be men, no liga iniꞌí bexa gealkweaꞌ. Leꞌa bexa wa ndal ladna ndun be ta ugap tezhea ndoꞌ gaꞌal be men. Leꞌa gor ndawno bexa bega, naꞌanpa ndo ladna bexa ndun bexa be ta bzhiꞌik, ndi nten ladna bexa ndun bexa ta wa.

Leꞌa bexa wa nsaꞌab ladna ndoꞌ itea be xagots niꞌí bexa. No nunk lá nzhanna bexa ndun bexa ta ugap. No nkwiꞌinno bexa be men ndidotsa ndangea ladna Dios. No nlad bexa uzhebpa ta sian gap bexa. Ná leꞌa Dios uzheꞌeb utsaksi bexa.
Mlaꞌa bexa nes ten Dios, cha usabgix bexa. Ndun bexa lak mbin profet Balaam xin Beor. Leꞌa Balaam ndal ladna ndun be ta ugap ndontsa gun xa gan med.
Ná leꞌa ngol gor leꞌa xburr xa uníꞌi ndoꞌ xa cuent dub men, uteyo ma xa. Naꞌanpa ulaꞌa ma gun Balaam ta li mbinbeꞌe xa gun xa wa, ta naꞌan xtiꞌin.
Leꞌa be mech ukwiꞌin wa xa naꞌan xtiꞌin, cuent dub so ni nits naꞌan, no cuent dub xkaw itea lad ndoꞌo mbi. Leꞌa Dios yá mbinbeꞌela leꞌa bexa wa yaꞌbe sa ndon leꞌa ukaw idub tiemp.
Chul ndadiꞌizh bexa, ná leꞌa ta ndab bexa ta naꞌan xtiꞌin. No nkiꞌil bexa be men gun bexa ta ugap lak ndun bexa, nkedino xa be men penkama mlaꞌa be ta ugap nak na.

No ndab be mech wa leꞌa be men syoꞌo gan gun itea be ta nlad na, ná leꞌa bexa wa ni leꞌa lá yoo gan ulaꞌa be ta ugap nak bexa, leꞌa be ta ugap wa nibeꞌe bexa. Leꞌa itea be taꞌa ndun gan ndoꞌ dub men, leꞌa ta wa leꞌa nibeꞌe ndoꞌ xa.

Ta ugeaka leꞌa bexa wa mgondoꞌ Jesucristo Xwan beuna, xa na leꞌa nsaꞌa gealnaban, cha utoꞌo bexa ndoꞌ be ta bzhiꞌik ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee. Ná nat leꞌa bexa myach leꞌakagal ndoꞌ be ta bzhiꞌik, leꞌa ta wa ndi leꞌa ndun gan ndoꞌ bexa. Ta weꞌe ndi mas proꞌob nak bexa ndoꞌ lak ngok bexa zha ned wa.
Ndi mas wen lá igondoꞌ bexa nes wen ten Dios, ndoꞌ li mgondoꞌ bexa‑yá cha mlaꞌa bexa ta unibeꞌe Dios gun bexa.
Leꞌa ta ndun bexa wa nak lakkata níꞌi be men: “Leꞌa mbek nyach ndaw leꞌaka ta nguꞌudna ma. No dub kuch tiꞌi ngos nyach ndatbixte ndoꞌ yalan stub biaj.”
Bego amig ten naꞌ, leꞌa ta ndee git itop nkeꞌa naꞌ ndoꞌ bega. Leꞌa ndoꞌ itop be git ntenxeꞌa naꞌ bega, ndontsa sbeꞌen be ta wen gunbeꞌe bega.
Leꞌa naꞌ nlad lá yalad bega ta mkeꞌa be profet ten Dios tiemp polta. No lá yalad bega ta mluu be apostol bega, be ta unibeꞌe Jesucristo xa nsaꞌa gealnaban, xa na leꞌa nak Xwan beuna.
Leꞌa naꞌ nlad iniꞌí bega leꞌa tiemp ilen ndee yoo be men gun laktsa nlad na. No inisi bexa bega,
gab bexa: “¿Lid ndab Jesús leꞌa xa ilen stub biaj zha? Leꞌa be usan gox polta ten beuna yá ngutla, ná leꞌa itea be taꞌa nak lakka nak‑a zha na ngokndeꞌeta gizhliyo.”
Leꞌa be men wa lá nlad igondoꞌ leꞌa tiemp xapta leꞌa Dios uníꞌi, cha li ngokndeꞌe gibeꞌa no gizhliyo. No leꞌa diꞌizh ten xa myunjunt nits, cha mluꞌu yo bid tlaw nits wa.
No leꞌaka nits wa mnitndoꞌ Dios be ta ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo zha ulaꞌ gilog.
Parea leꞌaka diꞌizh ten Dios utsoꞌol gibeꞌa no gizhliyo ncho nat, gal wizh gab Dios ná ton ndap ke, zha na unitndoꞌ Dios be men ugap nak.
Bego amig ten naꞌ, lá yalad bega ti leꞌa cuent ten Cristo leꞌa dub wizh cuent dub mil liꞌin, no liga dub mil liꞌin cuenttsa dub wizh.

Leꞌa Cristo ilenka zha nsabndoꞌ‑yá lakka ndab xa, naꞌanpa lak ndanbeꞌe be men leꞌa xa chaꞌaw ilen. Leꞌa xa ndi nkenkeaꞌ leꞌa xa lá nlad gak perdid ni dub men. Leꞌa xa ndi nlad leꞌa itea be men ulaꞌa be ta ugap nak bexa.

Leꞌa wizh ilen Cristo, leꞌa ta wa cuent dub zha nlaꞌ dub waꞌan ta lid be men gor teꞌal, ni lá iniꞌí bexa ti ilen xa. Leꞌa gal wizh wa leꞌa gibeꞌa baꞌ initndoꞌ no uzheꞌeb dub ruid siꞌil igen. Leꞌa itea be ta ndiꞌib gibeꞌa baꞌ yolꞌbe. Cha yolꞌ gizhliyo ndee no itea be ta ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Leꞌa ta na li initndoꞌ itea be ta wa, ta weꞌe leꞌa bega nsabndoꞌ umbiꞌi gak ndoꞌ Dios, no gun bega sbeꞌen ta nsak ladna Dios.

Utenkeaꞌ bega gast gal zha ilen xa, no bin bega itea be ta na syoꞌo gan gun bega ndontsa mas uxax ilen xa. Leꞌa gal wizh wa leꞌa gibeꞌa baꞌ yolꞌ cha initndoꞌ‑yá. No be ta ndiꞌib gibeꞌa baꞌ yolꞌ no izhuꞌunbe.
Ná leꞌa beuna ndenbeas yoo dub gibeꞌa kub no dub gizhliyo kub lak ndab Dios yoo‑yá. Leꞌa sa wa sbeꞌen be ta nsak ladna Dios gun be men.
Bego amig ten naꞌ, bego na ndenbeas yoo be ta wa, uzhebpa bin bega juers wen yaꞌan bega ndoꞌ Dios, ni dub ke lá gap bega ndoꞌ Dios.

Lá yalad bega leꞌa Cristo li nkenkeaꞌ ilen ndontsa mas kwaꞌad be men gap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios. Leꞌa Pabl xa cuent nak wit beuna no mkeꞌa ltsaꞌa be ta ndee ndoꞌ git mtuꞌub xa ndoꞌ bega, lak msaꞌa Dios nyakbeꞌena xa be ta wa.

Leꞌa sian be git nkeꞌa Pabl, leꞌa xa nkeꞌaka cuent ten be ta ndee, maska ncho ta nkeꞌa xa uzhebpa bid nyakbeꞌena beuna. Leꞌa ncho bexa ngud nak, bexa ndidotsa ngeꞌ ladna Cristo, naꞌanpa utsin nluu bexa be ta nkeꞌa Pabl wa. No liga ndanno bexa iteata be diꞌizh ten Dios, ta weꞌe leꞌa Dios utsaksi bexa.
Bego amig ten naꞌ, leꞌa nat leꞌa bega uniꞌíka be ta ndee gor na biseata yoo‑yá. Ta weꞌe uzhebpa blaꞌach bega naꞌanpa ukwiꞌinno bexa ugap wa bega, cha ulaꞌa bega ta ngeꞌ ladna bega Dios.

Ndi mas byakbeꞌena bega xteꞌe nkweaꞌ ladna Dios bega, no mas igondoꞌ bega Jesucristo Xwan beuna, xa nsaꞌa gealnaban ndoꞌ beuna. ¡Leꞌa nat no idub ndoꞌ ndee gab beuna leꞌa Dios uzhebpa dub xa juert no dub xa nsak! Lika nak‑a.
I John: Leꞌa zha utexanta gizhliyo leꞌa Jesucristo nchola. Leꞌa besa mbiꞌín ta mbidiꞌizh xa, no uniꞌíndoꞌ besa xa, no uniꞌí besa ta mbin xa, no usen besa xa. Leꞌa xa wa leꞌa nak Diꞌizh nsaꞌa gealnaban, ta nunk lá idub.

Leꞌa xa wa ulen wats besa. Leꞌa besa uniꞌí xa no ndadiꞌizh besa cuent ten xa. Nat leꞌa besa ndadiꞌizh ndoꞌ bega leꞌa xa wa xa nsaꞌa gealnaban nunk lá idub, utoꞌo xa wats Tad Dios, cha mlundoꞌ xa ndoꞌ besa.
Leꞌa besa ndadiꞌizh ta uniꞌí besa nsea ta mbiꞌín besa, ndontsa no bega dubtsa gak beuna, lak dubtsa nak besa no Tad Dios nsea Xin xa Jesucristo.
Nkeꞌa besa be ta ndee ndoꞌ bega ndontsa mas iten ladna beuna.
Leꞌa ta ndee ta mluu Jesucristo ndoꞌ besa, no ndadiꞌizh besa‑yá ndoꞌ bega: leꞌa Dios leꞌa nak xeꞌa, leꞌa wats Dios naꞌan sa ukaw.
Tal leꞌa beuna ndab dubtsa nak beuna nsea Dios, ná cha ndesea beuna sa ukaw, leꞌa beuna ndun gealkwiꞌin, no naꞌanpa ndun beuna lak nak gealngea.
Ná tal leꞌa beuna ndesea ndoꞌ xeꞌa ten Dios lak ncho Dios ndoꞌ xeꞌa, weꞌe leꞌa beuna dubtsa nak nsea be ltsaꞌa beuna. No leꞌa ten ten Jesucristo Xin Dios ntsambiꞌi beuna ndoꞌ itea be ke ten beuna.
Tal leꞌa beuna gab leꞌa beuna naꞌanpa ndap ke, leꞌa beuna nkwiꞌinno leꞌaka leꞌa na, no lá nchandoꞌ beuna gealngea.
Ná tal leꞌa beuna igondoꞌ be ke ten na ndoꞌ Dios, leꞌa xa sungeꞌ ladna ndoꞌ beuna no utsambiꞌi xa beuna ndoꞌ itea be ta ugap. Li gun Dios leꞌa xa uzheꞌeb dub xa utsin nak, no ndun xa lakka ndab xa.
Ná tal leꞌa beuna gab leꞌa beuna lá ndap ke, leꞌa beuna ndanno Dios cuent dub xa ukwiꞌin, no naꞌanpa ta ugea ndangea ladna beuna diꞌizh ten xa.

Bega nak cuent xiꞌín naꞌ, nkeꞌa naꞌ be ta ndee ndoꞌ bega, ndontsa yá lá gunta bega be ta ugap nak. Tal leꞌa beuna mbin dub ta ugap nak, leꞌa beuna ndap dub xa isoꞌ wats beuna ndoꞌ Dios Xus beuna. Leꞌa ta wa Jesucristo xa ndon leꞌa wen.
Leꞌa xa wa msaꞌa leꞌaka leꞌa xa ngut xa, ndontsa utsuꞌu Dios be ke ten beuna, nsea be ke ten be men ncho idub ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Tal leꞌa beuna nxobgek be ta unibeꞌe Dios, leꞌa ta wa nluu leꞌa beuna ta ugeaka nchandoꞌ xa.
Leꞌa tal ton gab leꞌa xa nchandoꞌ Dios, ná lá nxobgek xa be ta unibeꞌe Dios, leꞌa xa wa dub xa ukwiꞌin, no lá nchandoꞌ xa gealngea.
Ná leꞌa tal ton nxobgek ndoꞌ diꞌizh ten Dios, leꞌa xa wa ta ugeakapa nchankea Dios. Li iniꞌí beuna tal leꞌa beuna dubtsa nak nsea Dios natal naꞌan.
Leꞌa tal ton gab dubtsa nak nsea Dios, leꞌa xa wa nsabndoꞌ gun lak be ta mbin Jesucristo ndoꞌ gizhliyo.

Bega nak beuna xmen Cristo, leꞌa ta na li nibeꞌe naꞌ ndoꞌ bega wa naꞌanpa dub ta gol goꞌón bega. Leꞌa‑yá ndi dub ta nchandoꞌ bega gast zha ned mbingea ladna bega Cristo, leꞌa‑yá diꞌizh ten Dios mbiꞌín bega zha wa.
Parea leꞌa naꞌ nkeꞌa dub ta kub nibeꞌe naꞌ ndoꞌ bega, dub ta nchandoꞌ bega lakka nchandoꞌ Cristo‑yá. Leꞌa tiemp ten ta ukaw nsatid, leꞌa xa na ta ugeaka leꞌa nak xeꞌa ten Dios nsula.
Leꞌa tal ton gab leꞌa xa ncho ndoꞌ xeꞌa ten Dios, ná cha nxee ladna xa ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa xa, leꞌa xa wa bi nkesea sa ukaw.
Leꞌa tal ton ikweaꞌ ladna be ltsaꞌa na, leꞌa xa wa nchoka ndoꞌ xeꞌa ten Dios, no naꞌan xtaꞌan gun gan gailaꞌ xa ndoꞌ ta ugap.
Ná leꞌa tal ton ixee ladna ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa na, leꞌa xa wa nkesea sa ukaw, ni lá iniꞌí xa pa nchaꞌa xa, leꞌa ta ukaw wa leꞌa mbin gan lá inaꞌta xa.
Bego nak cuent xiꞌín naꞌ, nkeꞌa naꞌ git ndee ndoꞌ bega, geal leꞌa Jesucristo mtsuꞌula be ke ten bega.

Bego bexa gox, nkeꞌa naꞌ ta ndee ndoꞌ bega leꞌa bega nchandoꞌ Cristo, xa na ncho zha utexanta gizhliyo. Bego bexa ben, nkeꞌa naꞌ ta ndee ndoꞌ bega leꞌa bega mbin gan ndoꞌ maxuꞌu. No ndoꞌ bego na tiꞌi mbingea ladna Cristo, nkeꞌa naꞌ ta ndee leꞌa bego nchandoꞌ Dios Xus beuna.

Leꞌa ndoꞌ bego bexa gox, nkeꞌa naꞌ ta ndee leꞌa bego nchandoꞌ Cristo, xa ncho zha utexanta gizhliyo. No ndoꞌ bego xa ben, nkeꞌa naꞌ ta ndee leꞌa bego juert nak, no ncho diꞌizh ten Dios len ladoꞌo bega, no mbin bega gan ndoꞌ maxuꞌu.
Lá yankea bega gizhliyo ndee, ni be taꞌa ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo. Tal ton ndankea gizhliyo, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa ndankea Tad Dios.

Leꞌa itea be ta ugap ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee naꞌanpa ta nsaꞌa Dios. Leꞌa bexa gizhliyo nkwaꞌan be ta ugap ndanbeꞌe bexa, no nsaꞌab ladna bexa be ta naꞌ bexa, nsea nzhinnona bexa be ta ndap bexa. Leꞌa be ta li ndun bexa wa naꞌanpa ta nsaꞌa Tad Dios, leꞌa ta wa ndi ta gizhliyotsa.
Leꞌa gizhliyo ndee initndoꞌ nsea itea be ta ugap nlad bexa; ná leꞌa tal ton gun lak nlad Dios, leꞌa xa wa iban idub tiemp.

Bega nak cuent xiꞌín naꞌ, leꞌa tiemp ndee be wizh lult. Leꞌa lak ndoꞌón bega leꞌa gal dub wizh ilen dub xa gak anticristo, xa na uka gun be men ta nlad Cristo. Ná leꞌa nat ncho kwaꞌad bexa li nak. Ta weꞌe uniꞌí beuna leꞌa tiemp ndee be wizh lult.

Leꞌa bexa wa utoꞌo lat beuna, parea naꞌanpa ta ugea nak bexa ltsaꞌa beuna. Tal leꞌa bexa nak ltsaꞌa beuna, nal no bexa ndi ncho lat beuna. Ná leꞌa ta na utoꞌo bexa wa nluu leꞌa xa naꞌanpa nak ltsaꞌa beuna nak xmen Cristo.
Leꞌa Cristo msaꞌa Espíritu ten Dios ndoꞌ bega, no nchandoꞌ bega gealngea.
Nkeꞌa naꞌ ta ndee ndoꞌ bega, leꞌa naꞌ uní leꞌa bega nchandoꞌka gealngea, no uniꞌíka beuna leꞌa ni dub gealkwiꞌin lá ilen lat gealngea.
¿Ton bexa na ndun gealkwiꞌin? Leꞌa ta wa xa na ndab leꞌa Jesús naꞌanpa leꞌa nak Cristo. Leꞌa xa li ndab wa xa nka gun be men ta nlad Cristo, leꞌa xa nxelad Dios Xus beuna no Xin Dios.
Leꞌa tal ton gab leꞌa Jesús naꞌanpa nak Xin Dios, leꞌa xa wa lá nchandoꞌ Dios Xus beuna. Ná leꞌa tal ton gab leꞌa Jesús Xinka Dios, leꞌa xa wa nchandoꞌka Dios Xus beuna.
Ta weꞌe lá ulaꞌa bega ta mbiꞌín bega zha ned mbingea ladna bega Cristo. Tal leꞌa bega ndunka be ta mbiꞌín bega zha ned wa, leꞌa bega dubtsa nak no Xin Dios no Dios Xus beuna.
Leꞌa Cristo ndab leꞌa usaꞌa dub gealnaban kub ndoꞌ beuna, ta nunk lá idub.
Nkeꞌa naꞌ be ta ndee ndoꞌ bega, ndontsa gap bega cuent ndoꞌ bexa nlad ukwiꞌinno bega.

Leꞌa bego noꞌo Espíritu ten Dios ta na msaꞌa Cristo ndoꞌ bega. Ta weꞌe naꞌanpa nkiꞌin bega ni dub men uluu bega, leꞌa Espíritu wa leꞌa nluu xteꞌe nak itea be taꞌa. Leꞌa ta nluu Espíritu wa ta ugeaka naꞌanpa gealkwiꞌin‑a. Ta weꞌe dubtsa gok bega no Cristo, lak mluu Espíritu ten Dios bega.
Bega nak cuent xiꞌín naꞌ, nat naꞌanpa ulaꞌa beuna Cristo, ndontsa naꞌanpa izheb beuna zha ulundoꞌ xa, no naꞌanpa ido ladna beuna ndoꞌ xa zha ilen xa.
Leꞌa bega uniꞌíka leꞌa Jesucristo sbeꞌen ta wen ndun, ta weꞌe nsabndoꞌ iniꞌí bega leꞌa itea bexa na ndun ta wen wa xinka Dios.
Binbeꞌe bego xteꞌe uzheꞌeb nkweaꞌ ladna Tad Dios beuna, ndab xa leꞌa beuna nak xin xa. Leꞌa be men gizhliyo lá nchandoꞌ xa, ta weꞌe lá iniꞌí bexa leꞌa beuna xin Dios.
Bego amig ten naꞌ, nat leꞌa beuna nak xin Dios, parea biseata iniꞌí beuna xteꞌe gak beuna. Leꞌa gal zha na ilen Cristo leꞌa beuna yak lak nak xa, geal leꞌa beuna iniꞌí xteꞌe mer nak xa.
Tal ton ndangea ladna li yoo ta wa, leꞌa xa wa ntsambiꞌi leꞌaka leꞌa xa ndoꞌ ta ugap, lak umbiꞌi nak Cristo.
Leꞌa itea bexa na ndun be ta ugap, leꞌa bexa wa ndap ke ndoꞌ Dios, leꞌa Dios nibeꞌe naꞌanpa gun bexa be ta ugap wa.
Ná leꞌa bego yá uniꞌíka leꞌa Jesucristo mbiꞌid ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndontsa yuꞌu be ke ten beuna, leꞌa xa wa ni dub ke lá ndap.
Leꞌa iteanak bexa na dubtsa nak no Cristo naꞌanpa ndunta be ta ugap. Ná leꞌa itea bexa na ndunta be ta ugap, leꞌa bexa wa lá iniꞌí ton nak Cristo, no ni lá nchandoꞌ bexa xa.
Bega nak cuent xiꞌín naꞌ, lá ulaꞌa bega ukwiꞌinno be men bega: leꞌa tal ton ndun be ta wen, leꞌa xa wa xa wenka lak wen nak Cristo.
Ná leꞌa tal ton ndunta be ta ugap, leꞌa xa wa xmen maxuꞌu, leꞌa maxuꞌu li ndun be ta ugap zha utexanta gizhliyo. Ta weꞌe ulen Xin Dios mbizhaꞌa xa be tiꞌin ten maxuꞌu.
Leꞌa bexa nak xin Dios, leꞌa xa wa yá lá ndunta be ta ugap, geal leꞌa xa ndap gealnaban kub msaꞌa Dios len ladoꞌo xa. Lá yoota gan gun bexa be ta ugap, leꞌa bexa myak dub xin Dios.
Leꞌa ta ndee nluu ton nak xin Dios no ton nak xin maxuꞌu: leꞌa itea bexa na lá ndun be ta wen no lá nkweaꞌ ladna xa be ltsaꞌa xa, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa xin Dios.
Leꞌa diꞌizh ndee ta mbiꞌín bega zha nedta: ikweaꞌ ladna beuna be ltsaꞌa beuna.
Lá gak beuna lak ngok Caín xin maxuꞌu, xa mbit wit na. ¿Xtaꞌan li mbin xa zha? Li mbin Caín geal ugap nak ta mbin xa, ná leꞌa wit xa wa utsin nak ta mbin na.
Bego nak beuna xmen Cristo, lá yanseana bega tal leꞌa be men ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee nxeeno ladna bega.
Leꞌa ta na nkweaꞌ ladna beuna be ltsaꞌa nak beuna xmen Cristo, ta weꞌe nluu leꞌa beuna nban ndoꞌ gealgut. Ná leꞌa tal ton lá ikweaꞌ ladna be ltsaꞌa na, leꞌa xa wa bi ncho ndoꞌ gealgut.
Leꞌa tal ton ixee ladna ndoꞌ ltsaꞌa na, leꞌa xa wa cuent nak dub xa ndut men. No uniꞌí bego leꞌa ni dub xa ndut men lá yoo gan gap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios ta nunk lá idub.

Leꞌa beuna yá nchandoꞌ xteꞌe nsabndoꞌ ikweaꞌ ladna beuna be ltsaꞌa beuna: leꞌa Jesucristo msaꞌa gealnaban ten na sakndoꞌ beuna. Ta weꞌe liga nsabndoꞌ usaꞌa beuna gealnaban ten beuna sakndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa nak beuna xmen Cristo.
Leꞌa tal ton ndap taꞌa ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee, cha naꞌ xa leꞌa dub ltsaꞌa xa uban nak, ná lá gakno xa xa, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa nkweaꞌ ladna ltsaꞌa na wa lak nlad Dios gun xa.
Leꞌa bego nak cuent xiꞌín naꞌ, lá yoo gan ikweaꞌ ladna beuna be ltsaꞌa beuna sbeꞌen diꞌizhtsa. Ndi gakno beuna be ltsaꞌa beuna, ta na nluu leꞌa beuna nkweaꞌka ladna bexa.
Tal leꞌa beuna li ndun, leꞌa beuna uniꞌí leꞌa beuna ndun lak nak gealngea ten Dios, no uniꞌí beuna leꞌa beuna gaꞌal nak ndoꞌ Dios.
Tal leꞌa beuna nsak leꞌa beuna naꞌanpa gaꞌal nak ndoꞌ Dios, ná leꞌa Dios leꞌa uniꞌí xteꞌe nak beuna, leꞌa xa nchandoꞌ itea be taꞌa.
Bego amig ten naꞌ, tal leꞌa beuna uniꞌí len ladoꞌo beuna leꞌa beuna gaꞌal nak ndoꞌ Dios, leꞌa beuna naꞌanpa izheb ibii wats Dios.
Leꞌa Dios usaꞌa guniꞌi xtaꞌan inab beuna, tal leꞌa beuna nxobgek ta nibeꞌe Dios, no ndun beuna be ta nsak ladna xa.
Leꞌa ta ndee ta nibeꞌe Dios wa: gungea ladna beuna Jesucristo Xin xa, nsea ikweaꞌ ladna beuna be ltsaꞌa beuna lak ndab xa.
Leꞌa tal ton uxobgek ndoꞌ be ta nibeꞌe Dios, leꞌa xa wa dubtsa nak nsea Dios, leꞌa Dios ncho len ladoꞌo xa. Leꞌa bega uniꞌí leꞌa beuna dubtsa nak nsea Dios, ta na msaꞌa xa Espíritu ten xa ndoꞌ beuna.
Bego amig ten naꞌ, lá gungea ladna bega iteanak be ta nluu be men, ndi blaꞌach bega naga noꞌo bexa Espíritu ten Dios nate naꞌan, leꞌa ncho kwaꞌad bexa nkwiꞌin ndab leꞌa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios.
Lndeꞌe iniꞌí bega ná ton noꞌo Espíritu ten Dios: leꞌa itea bexa na gab leꞌa Jesucristo mbiꞌid ndoꞌ gizhliyo lak nak dub men, leꞌa xa wa noꞌo Espíritu ten Dios.

Ná leꞌa itea bexa na gab leꞌa Jesucristo naꞌanpa ngiꞌid lak nak dub men, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa noꞌo Espíritu ten Dios, ndi nak xa xmen anticristo. Leꞌa bega yá ndoꞌón leꞌa xa wa ilen, leꞌa juers ten xa wa yá ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Bega nak cuent xiꞌín naꞌ, leꞌa bega yá nak xmen Dios, no mbin bega gan ndoꞌ bexa ukwiꞌin wa, leꞌa Espíritu ten Dios ncho len ladoꞌo bega mas juert ndoꞌ espíritu ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee.
Leꞌa bexa wa xa gizhliyo, ta weꞌe ndadiꞌizh bexa be ta gizhliyo. Leꞌa be men gizhliyo cha nlaꞌachka ta ndab xa.

Parea leꞌa beuna xmen Dios. Leꞌa tal ton nchandoꞌ Dios, leꞌa xa wa nsakyoꞌón ta ndab beuna. Ná leꞌa tal ton naꞌanpa nchandoꞌ Dios, leꞌa xa wa lá isakyoꞌón ta ndab beuna. Li igondoꞌ beuna ná ton noꞌo Espíritu ndadiꞌizh gealngea, no ton noꞌo espíritu ukwiꞌin.
Bego amig ten naꞌ, nsabndoꞌ ikweaꞌ ladna beuna be ltsaꞌa beuna, leꞌa ta wa dub ta nsaꞌa Dios gun beuna. Leꞌa tal ton ikweaꞌ ladna ltsaꞌa na, leꞌa xa wa xin Dios no nchandoꞌ xa Dios.
Leꞌa tal ton lá ikweaꞌ ladna be ltsaꞌa na, leꞌa xa wa lá nchandoꞌ Dios, leꞌa Dios sbeꞌen nkweaꞌ ladna be men.
Lndeꞌe mluu Dios leꞌa xa nkweaꞌka ladna beuna: leꞌa xa mtuꞌub dubkama Xin xa ndoꞌ gizhliyo, ndontsa gap beuna gealnaban ta nunk lá idub.
Leꞌa Dios uzhebpa nkweaꞌ ladna be men, naꞌanpa lak nak ta ndankea beuna xa, ndi tant nkweaꞌ ladna xa beuna msaꞌa xa Xin xa ngut xa, ndontsa utsuꞌu xa be ke ten beuna.
Bego nak amig ten naꞌ, leꞌa ta na li nkweaꞌ ladna Dios beuna, leꞌa beuna no nsabndoꞌ ikweaꞌ ladna be ltsaꞌa na.
Naꞌan ton gol niꞌí Dios. Ná tal leꞌa beuna nkweaꞌ ladna be ltsaꞌa na, leꞌa Dios ncho len ladoꞌo beuna, no liga nkweaꞌ ladna beuna bexa lak nkweaꞌ ladna Dios beuna.
Lndeꞌe iniꞌí beuna leꞌa beuna dubtsa nak nsea Dios, no ncho Dios len ladoꞌo beuna: leꞌa xa msaꞌa Espíritu ten na ndoꞌ beuna.
Leꞌa beuna leꞌa uniꞌí no ndadiꞌizh beuna leꞌa Tad Dios mtuꞌub Xin na, utix xa be ke ten be men ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee.
Leꞌa tal ton gab leꞌa Jesús leꞌa nak Xin Dios, leꞌa xa wa ncho Dios len ladoꞌo na, no dubtsa nak xa nsea Dios.

Leꞌa beuna mgondoꞌ no ndangea ladna beuna leꞌa Dios nkweaꞌ ladna beuna. Leꞌa Dios sbeꞌen nkweaꞌ ladna be men. Ta weꞌe leꞌa bexa na nkweaꞌ ladna be ltsaꞌa na, leꞌa bexa wa dubtsa nak nsea Dios, no ncho Espíritu ten Dios len ladoꞌo xa.
Leꞌa ta na li nkweaꞌ ladna beuna be ltsaꞌa beuna wa, leꞌa gal wizh gab Dios ná ton ndap ke, leꞌa beuna naꞌanpa izheb, leꞌa ndoꞌ gizhliyo ndee leꞌa beuna nak lak nak Jesucristo.

Leꞌa Dios nkweaꞌka ladna beuna, ta weꞌe lá nzheb beuna ndoꞌ xa. Leꞌa tal ton igondoꞌ leꞌa Dios nkweaꞌ ladna xa, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa nzheb ndoꞌ Dios. Leꞌa bexa na nzheb ndoꞌ xa wa, leꞌa bexa wa uniꞌí leꞌa Dios utsaksi bexa. Ta weꞌe tal ton nzheb ndoꞌ Dios, leꞌa xa wa biseata igondoꞌ ta na nkweaꞌ ladna Dios xa.
Leꞌa beuna ndankea Dios, geal leꞌa Dios ned mkweaꞌ ladna beuna.

Tal ton gab leꞌa ndankea Dios, ná nxee ladna xa ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa xa, leꞌa xa wa ndun gealkwiꞌin. Ná leꞌa bexa na lá nkweaꞌ ladna be ltsaꞌa na, bexa na naꞌ xa wa, ¿xteꞌema yoo gan yankea bexa Dios, dub xa lá naꞌ bexa zha?
Leꞌa Jesucristo unibeꞌe ta ndee ndoꞌ beuna: tal leꞌa beuna ndankea Dios, leꞌa beuna no nsabndoꞌ ikweaꞌ ladna be ltsaꞌa na.
Leꞌa tal ton ndangea ladna leꞌa Jesús leꞌa nak Cristo, leꞌa xa wa myak xin Dios. Leꞌa tal ton ndankea Dios Xus beuna, leꞌa xa wa no nkweaꞌ ladna bexa nak xin Dios.
Tal leꞌa beuna ndankea Dios no ndun beuna lak ndab Dios, weꞌe uniꞌí beuna leꞌa beuna nkweaꞌ ladna be xin Dios.
Tal leꞌa beuna ndankeaka Dios, leꞌa beuna nxobgek ndoꞌ ta nibeꞌe xa, leꞌa ta nibeꞌe xa wa naꞌanpa dub ta bid.
Leꞌa itea bexa nak xin Dios ndun gan ndoꞌ be ta gizhliyo. Leꞌa ta na ngeꞌ ladna beuna Cristo, ta weꞌe ndun beuna gan ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
¿Tonma ndun gan ndoꞌ be ta gizhliyo zha? Leꞌa ta wa bexa na ndangea ladna leꞌa Jesús nak Xin Dios.

Leꞌa zha na mbiꞌid Jesucristo, leꞌa xa utaleaꞌ no ngut xa, mtsiꞌi xa ten ten xa. Naꞌanpa nabtsa utaleaꞌ xa, leꞌa xa no ngut mtsiꞌi xa ten. Leꞌa Espíritu ten Dios nluu leꞌa Cristo Xinka Dios, leꞌa Espíritu wa sbeꞌen gealngea ndadiꞌizh.
Leꞌa chon bexa ncho gibeꞌa nluu leꞌa Jesús nak Xin Dios: leꞌa ta wa Tad Dios, no Xin Dios xa nak Diꞌizh, no Espíritu ten Dios. Leꞌa yon bexa ndee dubtsa ndab.

Nsea ncho chon taꞌa ndoꞌ gizhliyo nsaꞌa cuent leꞌa Jesús nak Xin Dios: leꞌa ta wa ta ndab Espíritu ten Dios, no ta na utaleaꞌ Jesús len nits, no ten ten Jesucristo mtsiꞌi xa ndoꞌ cruz. Leꞌa yon ta ndee wa dubtsa ndab.
Leꞌa beuna ndangea ladna be ta ndadiꞌizh be men, parea leꞌa ta ndab Dios wa mas ta nsak, ta ndadiꞌizh xa cuent ten Xin xa.

Leꞌa tal ton igeꞌ ladna Xin Dios, leꞌa xa wa uniꞌí len ladoꞌo na leꞌa ta ndab Dios wa ta ugeaka. Ná leꞌa tal ton lá gungea ladna ta ndab Dios, leꞌa xa wa ndanno Dios cuent dub xa ukwiꞌin, leꞌa xa lá ngungea ladna ta mbidiꞌizh Dios lak nak Xin Dios.
Leꞌa ta ndee ta mbidiꞌizh Dios: leꞌa Dios nsaꞌa dub gealnaban nunk lá idub tal leꞌa beuna ngeꞌ ladna Xin Dios.
Leꞌa tal ton igeꞌ ladna Xin Dios, leꞌa xa wa ndap gealnaban wa. Ná leꞌa tal ton lá igeꞌ ladna xa, leꞌa xa naꞌanpa ndap gealnaban wa.
Leꞌa be ta ndee nkeꞌa naꞌ ndoꞌ bego na ngeꞌ ladna Xin Dios, ndontsa iniꞌí bega leꞌa bega ndap gealnaban nunk lá idub, no mas igeꞌ ladna bego Xin Dios.
Leꞌa beuna uniꞌíka tal leꞌa beuna inab dub taꞌa ndoꞌ Dios lak nlad Dios, leꞌa xa soꞌónka‑yá.
Lak uniꞌí beuna leꞌa Dios ndoꞌón ta nab beuna, no liga uniꞌí beuna leꞌa xa usaꞌaka ta wa.

Tal leꞌa dub bega naꞌ leꞌa dub ltsaꞌa bega ndun dub ta ugap nak, dub ta sungeꞌ ladna Dios, weꞌe unab bega ndoꞌ Dios gungeꞌ ladna ndoꞌ xa wa. Leꞌa Dios li gun tal ta mbin xa wa naꞌanpa dub ta uzhebpa ugap nak. Leꞌa ncho be ta ugap ndun be men yá lá gungeꞌta ladna Dios. Leꞌa bexa li ndun ke wa naꞌanpa gáp naꞌ inab bega ndoꞌ Dios gungeꞌ ladna ndoꞌ xa wa.
Itea be ta ugap ndun be men, leꞌa ta wa dub ke ndoꞌ Dios. Parea leꞌa ncho be ke wa leꞌa Dios sungeꞌka ladna.
No uniꞌí beuna leꞌa bexa nakla xin Dios yá naꞌantapa nsankea tsoꞌo be ta ugap. Leꞌa Xin Dios nlaꞌach bexa wa, ndontsa naꞌan xtaꞌan gunno maxuꞌu bexa.
No uniꞌí beuna leꞌa beuna nak xin Dios, maska idub gizhliyo ncho ndoꞌ yaꞌa maxuꞌu.

No uniꞌí beuna leꞌa Xin Dios mbiꞌid, no msaꞌa xa ta nyakbeꞌena beuna, ndontsa igondoꞌ beuna xa na ta ugeaka leꞌa nak Dios. Leꞌa ta wa Jesucristo Xin Dios, xa na dubtsa nak no beuna. Leꞌa xa wa ta ugeaka leꞌa nak Dios, xa nsaꞌa gealnaban nunk lá idub.
Bego nak cuent xiꞌín naꞌ, lá yankea bega be ta naꞌanpa leꞌa nak Dios. Lika nak‑a.
II John: Leꞌa naꞌ ndee xa gox nkeꞌa git ndee ndoꞌ lu, dub xagots mti Dios, no ndoꞌ bexa nak xin la. Leꞌa naꞌ ta ugeaka nkweaꞌ ladna itea bego. No iteanak bexa na nchandoꞌ gealngea ten Dios nkweaꞌ ladna bega.
Leꞌa naꞌ li nkweaꞌ ladna bega, geal leꞌa beuna nchandoꞌ gealngea ten Dios, no idub tiemp nchandoꞌka beuna‑yá.

Leꞌa naꞌ naꞌab ndoꞌ Tad Dios no ndoꞌ Jesucristo Xin Dios Xa Nibeꞌe, mas utsin gak bexa ndoꞌ bega, no mas ikweaꞌ ladna bexa bega, no gun bexa wen yoo ladna bega. No mas igeꞌ ladna bega gealngea ten Dios, no mas ikweaꞌ ladna bega be ltsaꞌa bega.
Uzhebpa mten lad naꞌ gor na mbín naꞌ leꞌa ncho be xin lu ndunka lak ndab gealngea ten Dios, lak unibeꞌe Dios Xus beuna gun beuna.
Nat ndáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bego, ikweaꞌ ladna beuna be ltsaꞌa beuna. Leꞌa ta ndee naꞌanpa dub ta tilaw ndoꞌón beuna, leꞌa‑yá dub ta polkata uniꞌí beuna.
Leꞌa tal beuna nkweaꞌ ladna be ltsaꞌa beuna, leꞌa ta wa gab leꞌa beuna nxobgek ndoꞌ Dios. Leꞌa ta wa lakka mbiꞌín bega polta unibeꞌe Dios: ikweaꞌ ladna beuna be ltsaꞌa beuna.
Uzhebpa ncho be men ndun gealkwiꞌin ndoꞌ gizhliyo, ndab bexa leꞌa Jesucristo naꞌanpa ngiꞌid ndoꞌ gizhliyo cuent dub men. Leꞌa bexa na li ndadiꞌizh wa xa ukwiꞌin, no nka bexa ta nlad Cristo.
Blaꞌach bega lá gak perdid be tiꞌin na li mbin besa lat bega wa, ndi ikaꞌa bega itea be ta nlad Dios usaꞌa Dios ndoꞌ bega.

Leꞌa tal ton itoꞌo len ta ndab diꞌizh ten Jesucristo, cha gungea ladna xa stub ta xaꞌaga, leꞌa xa wa naꞌanpa xmen Dios. Ná leꞌa tal ton ndangea ladna lak mluu Jesucristo, leꞌa xa wa xmenka Dios Xus beuna no xmenka Xin Dios.
Tal leꞌa ncho bexa ilayaꞌ lat bega, cha uluu xa dub ta xaꞌaga nak, lá ulaꞌa bega yoo xa wa len lid bega, no ni lá inidiꞌizh bega ndoꞌ bexa wa.
Tal leꞌa ncho bega inidiꞌizh ndoꞌ bexa wa, leꞌa bega no ndunno bexa ta ugap wa.
Ncho sianta be taꞌa nlad naꞌ gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ bega, parea lá nlad naꞌ ukeꞌa naꞌ‑yá ndoꞌ git. Leꞌa naꞌ ndi nlad gal inaꞌ bega no gudiꞌizhno naꞌ bega, ndontsa mas uzheꞌeb iten ladna beuna.
Leꞌa be xin beal lu stub xagots mti Dios wa no nidiꞌizh ndoꞌ lu. Lika nak‑a.
III John: Leꞌa naꞌ ndee xa gox ntuꞌub git ndee ndoꞌ lu Gayo, leꞌa naꞌ ta ugeaka nkweaꞌ ladna lu.
Amig ten naꞌ, naꞌab naꞌ ndoꞌ Dios wen itoꞌo itea taꞌa gun lu, no wen yoo lu, lak wen nak ladoꞌo lu ndoꞌ Dios.
Leꞌa gor na mlaꞌnchaꞌ pla be xmen Jesús sa ndee, mbidiꞌizh bexa ndoꞌ naꞌ xteꞌeta gaꞌal nsoꞌ lu ndoꞌ gealngea ten Dios. Cha uzhebpa mten lad naꞌ gor na mbín naꞌ ta wa.
Naꞌan stub ta mas nten lad naꞌ ndoꞌ gor na ndón naꞌ leꞌa bexa nak cuent xiꞌín naꞌ gaꞌal nde ndoꞌ gealngea ten Dios.
Amig ten naꞌ, uzhebpa wen ndun lu gor na ndakno lu be xmen Jesús, maska lá nchandoꞌ lu bexa.
Leꞌa bexa wa mbidiꞌizh ndoꞌ be xmen Jesús xteꞌe nkweaꞌ ladna lu bexa. Nat bin ta nsak ladna Dios, gakno lu bexa be ta nkiꞌin bexa nes yaꞌbe bexa.
Leꞌa bexa wa utoꞌo ndun bexa tiꞌin ten Jesús, ni lá inab bexa ta nkiꞌin bexa ndoꞌ bexa lá nchandoꞌ Dios.
Ta weꞌe leꞌa beuna nsabndoꞌ usaꞌa be ta nkiꞌin bexa, ndontsa li gakno beuna gudiꞌizh bexa gealngea ten Dios.
Leꞌa naꞌ mtuꞌubla dub git ndoꞌ be xmen Jesús nyakjunt sa baꞌ, ná leꞌa Diótrefes lá nlaꞌach ta nibeꞌe besa, ndi leꞌa xa nlad inibeꞌe.

Ta weꞌe leꞌa zha na gal naꞌ lat bega, leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ xa wa itea ta ugap ndun xa, leꞌa xa uzhebpa nisi besa. Naꞌanpa nabtsa ta ndee wa ndun xa, no ni lá nsaꞌa xa ta lid xa yoo be xmen Jesús, no ni lá nlaꞌa xa tal leꞌa ncho bego nlad usaꞌa ta lid na yoo bexa wa. No ngontuꞌub xa bego na li utsin ndun wa sa nzhealbe bega.
Amig ten naꞌ, lá gun lu lak ndun bexa ugap, ndi bin lak ndun bexa wen. Leꞌa tal ton gun be ta wen, leꞌa xa wa xmenka Dios. Ná leꞌa tal ton gun be ta ugap, leꞌa xa wa lá nchandoꞌ Dios.

Leꞌa itea men ndab leꞌa Demetrio dub xa wen nak ndoꞌ Dios, ndun xa ta wen lak ndab gealngea ten Jesús. Leꞌa besa ndee no ndab leꞌa xa wa xa utsinka nak. No uniꞌí bega leꞌa besa sbeꞌen gealngeaka ndadiꞌizh.
Ncho sianta be taꞌa nlad naꞌ gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ lu, parea leꞌa naꞌ lá nlad ukeꞌa‑yá ndoꞌ git.
Leꞌa naꞌ ndi nlad iniꞌí xan lu, weꞌe gudiꞌizh wa.
Leꞌa naꞌ naꞌab ndoꞌ Dios gun wen yoo ladna lu. Leꞌa be amig ten lu ndencho sa ndee nidiꞌizh ndoꞌ lu. Unidiꞌizh sakndoꞌ besa ndoꞌ kadga dub be amig ten beuna ndencho sa baꞌ.
Jude: Leꞌa naꞌ ndee Judas wit Jacob, ndun naꞌ tiꞌin ndoꞌ Jesucristo. Nkeꞌa naꞌ git ndee ndoꞌ bego nak xmen Dios. Leꞌa Tad Dios leꞌa mti bega li gak bega xmen xa, no nlaꞌach Jesucristo bega.
Naꞌab naꞌ ndoꞌ Dios leꞌa xa mas gunkweaꞌ ladna bega, no mas wen yoo ladna bega, no mas ikea ladna Dios bega.

Bego amig ten naꞌ, leꞌa naꞌ uzhebpa nlad ukeꞌa dub git ndoꞌ bega, cuent ten ta na ngoꞌo Dios beuna ndoꞌ be ke ten beuna. Nsak naꞌ leꞌa naꞌ nsabndoꞌ ukeꞌa ta ndee ndoꞌ bega, ndontsa naꞌanpa ulaꞌa bega ucheꞌa be men diꞌizh ten Dios. Leꞌa diꞌizh wa ta ndangea ladna beuna, ta na msaꞌa Dios dubtsa biaj ndoꞌ beuna nak xmen xa.

Li ndáp naꞌ geal leꞌa lat bega baꞌ uyote pla bexa ndab leꞌa nak xmen Dios, ná leꞌa bexa naꞌanpa ta ugea nak ta wa. Leꞌa bexa wa nkwiꞌin ndab geal ta na nkweaꞌ ladna Dios bexa wa, ta weꞌe syoꞌo gan gun bexa guniꞌi xtaꞌan nlad bexa. No ndab bexa leꞌa Dios naꞌanpa dubkama nibeꞌe beuna, no naꞌanpa nak Jesucristo Xwan beuna. Parea polkata nkeaniꞌi diꞌizh ten Dios leꞌa Dios utsaksika bexa na li ugap ndadiꞌizh wa.
Leꞌa naꞌ nlad utseꞌa ladna bega stub biaj xteꞌe uloꞌo Dios bexa Israel, bexa nak xmen xa ndoꞌ yaꞌa bexa Egipto. Cha tsoꞌo wa mnitndoꞌ Dios bexa na mlaꞌa ta na ngeꞌ ladna bexa Dios.

Leꞌa ta wa lak ngwasea be angel tiemp polta, leꞌa bexa mlaꞌa sa msaꞌa Dios unibeꞌe bexa. Leꞌa Dios cha mtsaꞌab bexa wa sa uzhebpa ukaw, sa nchonyaw bexa idub tiemp, gast gal wizh utsaksi Dios itea bexa ugap nak.

No btseꞌa ladna bega xteꞌe mbin bexa uyoꞌo gezh Sodoma no Gomorra no be gezh nde gax sa wa. Leꞌa be men wa uzhebpa ugap ngok, mgal bexa be men naꞌanpa xa ten bexa, no mbin bexa sianta be ta ugap ltsaꞌa ta wa. Weꞌe leꞌa Dios mtsaksi bexa ndoꞌ giꞌ ta nunk lá yuꞌu, ndontsa iniꞌí be men leꞌa Dios ntsaksika be men ugap.

No liga nak bexa ugap ncho lat bego baꞌ. Leꞌa bexa wa ndun be taꞌa ncheꞌatsa ladna bexa, no ndun bexa be ta nladtsa bexa, be ta bzhiꞌik. No ngobi bexa be ta unibeꞌe Dios, no kweaꞌ níꞌi bexa ndoꞌ be angel.

Leꞌa zha na ngut Moisés leꞌa angel Miguel uteyono maxuꞌu ná ton goꞌo Moisés. Leꞌa Miguel wa leꞌa xa nibeꞌe lat be angel, parea ni lá ngun xa rages kweaꞌ iníꞌi xa ndoꞌ maxuꞌu. Leꞌa Miguel ndi ndabtsa ndoꞌ maxuꞌu: “¡Leꞌa Dios utsaksi lu!”
Ná leꞌa bexa ugap wa nisi be taꞌa lá nyakbeꞌena bexa. Leꞌa bexa wa nak cuent be man, nchandoꞌ bexa be taꞌa, ná leꞌa bexa ni lá nyakbeꞌena‑yá. Leꞌa ta na li ndun bexa wa leꞌa gun initndoꞌ bexa.
Proꞌob bexa wa, leꞌa bexa ugap nak lak ngok Caín. No ndun bexa ta ugap, ndontsa gun bexa gan med lak mbin Balaam. No gat bexa lak ngut Coré xa ngokloo ndoꞌ Moisés.

No ugap ndun bexa gor nzhealbe bega ndaw bega. Nten ladna bexa ndaw bexa no ndo bexa, parea naꞌanpa ndap bexa mod ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa bexa, ndi ndun bexa ta nladtsa bexa. Leꞌa bexa wa xa naꞌan xtiꞌin cuent be xkaw ndoꞌo mbi ta lá noꞌo gi. No nak bexa cuent dub ya bid ta mgiꞌibla, ta lá yoota gan usaꞌa ngus.

Leꞌa bexa wa ugiꞌi nak cuent golp ten nitsdoꞌo, cuent bchiꞌin ntsaꞌab golp ten nits wa li udalad nak ta ndun bexa. Leꞌa bexa wa nak cuent be mbeal usabgix ni lá iniꞌí pa isob gibeꞌa baꞌ. Ta weꞌe leꞌa Dios utsaksi bexa, yaꞌ bexa sa ndon leꞌa ukaw idub tiemp.

Leꞌa cuent ten bexa wa leꞌa Enoc xa ngok isagaꞌad xkwaꞌa be men uyoꞌo tsoꞌo na uyoꞌo Adán wa mbidiꞌizh xa sakndoꞌ Dios, ndab xa: “Blaꞌach bego, leꞌa Dios Xa Nibeꞌe nseano uzhebpa kwaꞌad luzh be angel ten na,
gab xa ndoꞌ kadga be men xteꞌe nak ta ndun bexa. Cha utsaksi xa itea bexa ugap nak, leꞌa bexa uzheꞌeb be ta ugap ndun, no uzheꞌeb nisi bexa Dios.”
Leꞌa bexa wa xela níꞌi ndoꞌ Dios, no nisi bexa itea be taꞌa, no ndeseakwaꞌan bexa be ta nladtsa bexa. No zhin ndadiꞌizh bexa, no utsin níꞌi bexa ndoꞌ be men, natsa gun bexa gan be ta nlad bexa.
Ná leꞌa bego be amig ten naꞌ, btseꞌa ladna bego be ta mbidiꞌizh be apostol ten Jesucristo Xwan beuna.
Ndab bexa ndoꞌ bega: “Leꞌa be wizh lult ndee yoo bexa gun usalad no sian be taꞌa, no gun bexa be ta ugap laktsa nlad bexa.”
Leꞌa ta wa bexa na nlad uteltsaꞌa be xmen Cristo. Sbeꞌen ndun bexa laktsa nsak ladna bexa, no naꞌanpa ncho Espíritu ten Dios len ladoꞌo bexa.
Ná leꞌa bego amig ten naꞌ nsabndoꞌ mas igeꞌ ladna bega Cristo, no bidiꞌizhno bega Dios lak ndakno Espíritu ten Dios bega.
Lá yalad bego ta na uzheꞌeb nkweaꞌ ladna Dios beuna. No list ute bega gast gal zha usaꞌa Jesucristo gealnaban nunk lá idub ndoꞌ beuna, leꞌa xa uzhebpa utsin ndanno beuna.
Btenxeꞌa bego bexa na lá iniꞌí ná xtaꞌan nsabndoꞌ gungea ladna bexa.

Gokno bego bexa na ndailaꞌ ndoꞌ ta ugap, lak ngoꞌo be men dub xa len dub niꞌi nsayolꞌ. Bkweaꞌ ladna bego bexa ndun ta ugap, parea blaꞌach bega leꞌaka bega ndontsa naꞌanpa no bega gailaꞌ ndoꞌ ta wa, cuent dub taꞌa gast no xab bexa wa ta bzhiꞌik.
Leꞌa Dios sun gan lá gailaꞌ bega ndoꞌ be ta ugap, no sun xa gan isoꞌ bega ndoꞌ xa iten ladna bega no umbiꞌi gak ladoꞌo bega.

Leꞌa xa wa dubkama nak Dios, xa ndon leꞌa ndák, xa uloꞌo beuna ndoꞌ be ke ten beuna. Leꞌa nat no idub tiemp gab beuna leꞌa Dios nak xa ndon leꞌa siꞌil, no xa ndon leꞌa juert, no xa ndon leꞌa nibeꞌe, no xa ndon leꞌa nsak. Lika nak‑a.
Revelation of John: Leꞌa sa ndee nkeaniꞌi be ta mluu Dios ndoꞌ Jesucristo, ndontsa uluu xa ndoꞌ bexa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ xa be ta sken yoo. Leꞌa Jesucristo cha mtuꞌub dub angel mbid uluu‑yá ndoꞌ naꞌ xa nsaleaꞌ Juan, dub xa ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ Cristo.
Ta ugeaka gáp naꞌ leꞌa be ta uní naꞌ wa ta tenka Dios, no leꞌaka Jesucristo mluu ta wa ndoꞌ naꞌ.
Uzhebpa wen yoo ladna bexa na goꞌol be diꞌizh ten Dios ndee no isakyoꞌón bexa‑yá, leꞌa tiemp yoo be ta wa sken ilen.

Leꞌa naꞌ ndee Juan nidiꞌizh ndoꞌ bego nak isagaꞌad xkwaꞌa be xmen Jesucristo ndencho Asia. Leꞌa Dios xa na leꞌaka nak Dios nat no polta no idub tiemp ilen ndee, no isagaꞌad espíritu nde ndoꞌ sa nsob Dios, leꞌa bexa wa utsin gak ndoꞌ bega no gun bexa wen yoo ladna bega.

No Jesucristo li gun, leꞌa xa wa gaꞌal mluu xteꞌe wen nak Dios, no ndon ned xa mbin gan ndoꞌ gealgut, no leꞌa xa nak xa nibeꞌe ndoꞌ itea bexa nibeꞌe ndoꞌ gizhliyo. Leꞌa xa wa nkweaꞌ ladna beuna no mtsambiꞌi xa ladoꞌo beuna ndoꞌ be ke ten beuna no ten ten xa.
No myunno xa beuna dub xa nibeꞌe no dub uleꞌay ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ Dios Xus xa. Idub tiemp yankea beuna Cristo xa ndon leꞌa nibeꞌe. Lika nak‑a.
Blaꞌach bega leꞌa xa ilen ndoꞌ xkaw,
nsea itea be men iniꞌí xa,
gast no bexa ndap ke mbit xa wa.
Nsea itea be ras men nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo
uzheꞌeb goꞌonno xa.
Ta ugeaka lika gak‑a.

Leꞌa Cristo Xa Nibeꞌe wa xa ndon leꞌa juert nak ndab: “Leꞌa naꞌ ndee nak Alfa nsea Omega. Nak naꞌ xa ned nsea xa lult ndoꞌ itea be taꞌa.” Leꞌa xa wa leꞌaka nak Dios nat no polta no idub tiemp ilen ndee.

Leꞌa naꞌ ndee Juan nak beuna xmen Jesucristo. Leꞌa naꞌ nsatid gealkweaꞌ lak nsatid bega‑yá. No nak beuna bexa nibeꞌe Dios, no ndakno Jesucristo beuna nchaꞌuxik beuna ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ. Leꞌa ke na ndadiꞌizh naꞌ diꞌizh ten Dios, no ndadiꞌizh naꞌ xteꞌe nak ta ndun Jesucristo, ta weꞌe mtsaꞌab be men naꞌ isla nsaleaꞌ Patmos cuent dub xa nkea litgiꞌib.
Leꞌa ngol dub wizh doming leꞌa Espíritu ten Dios usen naꞌ. Cha weꞌe leꞌa lad tsoꞌo naꞌ mbín naꞌ dub ti men uzhebpa ugeꞌ cuent ti dub trompet,
ndab xa:

—Leꞌa naꞌ ndee nak Alfa nsea Omega, xa ned no xa lult ndoꞌ itea be taꞌa. Bkeꞌa ndoꞌ git be ta inaꞌ lu, cha btuꞌub‑a ndoꞌ isagaꞌad be gezh nde be xmen naꞌ sa nsaleaꞌ Asia. Leꞌa be gezh wa nsaleaꞌ Éfeso no Esmirna no Pérgamo no Tiatira no Sardis no Filadelfia nsea Laodicea.
Cha mgeaksoꞌ naꞌ lad tsoꞌo naꞌ, ná ton ta na li uníꞌi ndoꞌ naꞌ wa. Cha weꞌe uní naꞌ dub gaꞌad candeler ta oro.
Leꞌa tlaw be candeler wa uní naꞌ nsoꞌ dub xa cuent nluu dub men, nak xa dub lad koꞌol gast gendats xa ndakea‑yá. No nde dub sinch oro ta ladoꞌo xa.
Leꞌa gek xa no gichgek xa ndon nagud naꞌ, cuent naꞌ gich borreg ndon mbe xiꞌil naꞌ‑yá. Leꞌa be ngusndoꞌ xa cuent bealꞌ giꞌ naꞌ.
Leꞌa xoꞌo xa nduꞌu lak nduꞌu dub giꞌib guch ta bronce, dub ta tiꞌi utoꞌo len gor. Leꞌa ti xa ngen cuent sa nsalaꞌ kwaꞌal nits ndoꞌ dub geꞌdaꞌa.
Leꞌa ndoꞌ yaꞌa lad gaꞌal xa ndiꞌib dub gaꞌad ta cuent mbeal ndiꞌib gibeꞌa. Leꞌa toꞌo xa ntoꞌo dub spad top toꞌo na wach. Leꞌa idub ndoꞌ xa nluu cuent nluu wizh gor na uzhebpa ugiꞌi naꞌ bea.
Leꞌa gor uní naꞌ xa, cuent dub xa ngut ulayat naꞌ xan ndats xa. Leꞌa xa cha mxoꞌob yaꞌa lad gaꞌal xa tsoꞌo naꞌ, cha ndab xa:
—Lá izheb lu. Naꞌ leꞌa nak xa ned no xa lult ndoꞌ itea be taꞌa,
xa na nban. Leꞌa naꞌ ngut, parea leꞌa nat leꞌa naꞌ nban idub tiemp. No leꞌa naꞌ mas juert ndoꞌ gealgut no mas juert naꞌ ndoꞌ sa ndencho bexa ngut.
Bkeꞌa be ta uniꞌí lu wa no be ta ncho nat no be ta tilaw yoo.

Nat gáp naꞌ dub ta gol goꞌón lu, xteꞌe nak isagaꞌad mbeal ndiꞌib yaꞌa lad gaꞌal naꞌ ndee nsea isagaꞌad be candeler ndee wa: leꞌa isagaꞌad mbeal ndee nak isagaꞌad be angel nlaꞌach be xmen naꞌ ndencho isagaꞌad gezh wa; leꞌa isagaꞌad be candeler ta oro ta naꞌ lu ndee nak isagaꞌad xkwaꞌa be xmen na ndencho be gezh wa.
’Bkeꞌa ta ndee ndoꞌ angel nlaꞌach be xmen naꞌ ndencho Éfeso: “Lndeꞌe ndab xa nsén dub gaꞌad mbeal ndiꞌib gaꞌap yaꞌa lad gaꞌal na, xa na nkesea lat isagaꞌad candeler ta oro. Ndab xa:

Naꞌ nchandoꞌ be ta ndun bega, xteꞌe juert ndun bega tiꞌin ten naꞌ no uzhebpa nxik bega. Leꞌa naꞌ uní leꞌa bega naꞌanpa nchealtsaꞌa bexa ugap nak; nsea mbin bega preb bexa nkwiꞌin ndab nak apostol ten naꞌ. Cha uniꞌí bega leꞌa bexa wa ndun gealkwiꞌin.
No nxik bega ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ nsatid bega. No juert ndun bega tiꞌin ten naꞌ ta na ndankea bega naꞌ, ni lá ndach ladna bega.
Parea ncho stub taꞌa lá nsak lad naꞌ ndun bega: leꞌa bega yá lá ndankeata naꞌ lakta zha ned wa.

Btseꞌa ladna bega xteꞌe wen ngok bega, cha byach bega ndoꞌ naꞌ, cha bin bega lak mbin bega zha ned wa. Tal leꞌa bega lá gun li, leꞌa naꞌ sken ilen, cha ulat naꞌ candeler ten bega tal leꞌa bega lá ulaꞌa ta ugap ndun bega.
Parea ncho stub ta wen ndun bega, leꞌa bega lá nsak ladna ta ndun bexa nicolaíta, lak lá nsak lad naꞌ ta ndun bexa wa.

Leꞌa bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, bsakyoꞌón bega ta ndab Espíritu ten Dios ndoꞌ be xmen naꞌ. Leꞌa bexa na gun gan ndoꞌ be ta ugap, leꞌa naꞌ usa ngus ten ya nsaꞌa gealnaban gaw bexa wa, ya nsob tlaw be ya xgeꞌa ten Dios.”
’Bkeꞌa ta ndee ndoꞌ angel nlaꞌach be xmen naꞌ ndencho Esmirna: “Lndeꞌe ndab xa nak xa ned no xa lult ndoꞌ itea be taꞌa, xa na ngut no mbangal. Ndab xa:

Leꞌa naꞌ nchandoꞌ be ta ndun bega, no be gealkweaꞌ nsatid bega, nsea ta uban nak bega, parea leꞌa bega xa rik ndoꞌ Dios. No nchandoꞌ naꞌ xteꞌe kweaꞌ níꞌi be men ndoꞌ bega, bexa nkwiꞌin ndab leꞌa xa xa judio, parea naꞌanpa nak bexa xmen Dios, leꞌa bexa ndi nde ndoꞌ yaꞌa maxuꞌu.

Lá izheb bega ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ itid bega. Blaꞌach bego, leꞌa maxuꞌu ukeꞌa pla bega litgiꞌib, gun xa preb bega naga ugeaka xmen Dios bega, kweaꞌ yoo bega dub tiꞌi wizh. Dubtsa ulo ladna bega igeꞌ ladna bega naꞌ maska gut bexa bega. Weꞌe leꞌa naꞌ usa dub gealnaban nunk lá idub ndoꞌ bega.
Leꞌa bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, bsakyoꞌón bega ta ndab Espíritu ten Dios ndoꞌ be xmen naꞌ: Leꞌa bexa na gun gan ndoꞌ be ta ugap, leꞌa bexa wa naꞌanpa itid ndoꞌ gealgut itop wa.”
’Bkeꞌa ta ndee ndoꞌ angel nlaꞌach be xmen naꞌ ndencho Pérgamo: “Lndeꞌe ndab xa ndap spad top toꞌo na wach. Ndab xa:

Leꞌa naꞌ nchandoꞌ be ta ndun bega, no uní naꞌ leꞌa bega ncho dub gezh sa nibeꞌe maxuꞌu. Parea dubtsa ndankea bega naꞌ, no lá ukachko bega ta na ngeꞌ ladna bega naꞌ zha na mbit be men Antipas. Leꞌa xa wa utsin mbidiꞌizh diꞌizh ten naꞌ, ta weꞌe mbit be men xa sa ncho bega baꞌ, dub gezh sa nibeꞌe maxuꞌu.

Parea ncho platsa taꞌa lá nsak lad naꞌ nak bega: leꞌa ncho bega bi ndun ltsaꞌa ta mbin Balaam, xa na mluu Balac xteꞌe gun xa ndontsa isabgix bexa Israel. Mkiꞌil xa bexa wa gaw bexa be xnab ten be dios gizhliyo, no ugal bexa dub xa naꞌanpa xagots ten xa.
No ncho bega bi ndankea be ta nluu bexa nicolaíta wa, ta na uzhebpa lá nsak lad naꞌ.
Ta weꞌe blaꞌa bega be ta ugap nak bega wa. Tal leꞌa bega naꞌanpa li gun, leꞌa naꞌ sken ilen, no kuyono naꞌ bega na li nak wa nsea spad ntoꞌo toꞌo naꞌ.

Leꞌa bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, bsakyoꞌón bega ta ndab Espíritu ten Dios ndoꞌ be xmen naꞌ: Leꞌa bexa na gun gan ndoꞌ be ta ugap, leꞌa naꞌ usa maná gaw bexa ta lá nchandoꞌ bexa. Nsea usa naꞌ dub geꞌ tuzh ta nagud. Leꞌa las geꞌ wa ikea stub leaꞌ bexa dub ta kub, ta ni dub men lá nchandoꞌ, nabtsa xa na ikaꞌa geꞌ wa iniꞌí‑yá.”
’Bkeꞌa ta ndee ndoꞌ angel nlaꞌach be xmen naꞌ ndencho Tiatira: “Lndeꞌe ndab Xin Dios xa ndap ngusndoꞌ na cuent bealꞌ giꞌ wa, nsea xoꞌo xa cuent be giꞌib bronce ta nduꞌu. Ndab xa:

Leꞌa naꞌ nchandoꞌ be ta ndun bega, xteꞌe utsin nak bega ndoꞌ be ltsaꞌa bega, no xteꞌe ngeꞌ ladna bega naꞌ, no xteꞌe ndun bega be tiꞌin ten naꞌ, nsea uzhebpa nxik bega. No uní naꞌ leꞌa bega mas utsin ndun nat ndoꞌ lak zha ned wa.

Parea ncho platsa taꞌa lá nsak lad naꞌ nak bega: leꞌa bega nlaꞌa leꞌa xagots nsaleaꞌ Jezabel nkwiꞌinno be xmen naꞌ. Leꞌa xa wa ndab leꞌa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios, parea nkiꞌil xa bexa ugal bexa dub xa naꞌanpa xa ten bexa, no gaw bexa be xnab ten be dios gizhliyo.
Leꞌa naꞌ msa dub tiemp ulaꞌa xa be ta bzhiꞌik ndun xa wa, parea leꞌa xa lá kaꞌab ulaꞌa be ta wa.
Leꞌa nat leꞌa naꞌ ula isen dub gealgizh xa, no dub gealkweaꞌ siꞌil iniꞌí bexa na mgal xagots wa, tal leꞌa bexa lá ulaꞌa be ta ugap ndanno bexa xa wa.
Leꞌa naꞌ gut be xin xagots wa, weꞌe iniꞌí bega nak xmen naꞌ leꞌa naꞌ nak xa nchandoꞌ gek bega nsea ladoꞌo bega. Leꞌa naꞌ kix ndoꞌ bega no be ta mbin bega.

Parea leꞌa ncho bega ncho Tiatira baꞌ naꞌanpa no ndankea ta mluu xagots wa, no lá igondoꞌ bega be ta nsaleaꞌ bexa ta ugaꞌach ten maxuꞌu. Leꞌa naꞌ gáp ndoꞌ bega leꞌa naꞌ naꞌanpa inibeꞌe gun bega stubga taꞌa.
Parea leꞌa be ta wen nak bega, litsa gok bega gast gal zha ilen naꞌ.
Leꞌa bexa na gun gan ndoꞌ be ta ugap no gun xa lak ndáp naꞌ gast wizh lult, leꞌa naꞌ ula inibeꞌe bexa gast ndoꞌ be nacion.
Usa naꞌ juers ndoꞌ bexa lak msaꞌa Xus naꞌ juers ndoꞌ naꞌ, ndontsa uzheꞌeb inibeꞌe bexa ndoꞌ be nacion, lak nleꞌa men dub gets btsiꞌin no dub bar giꞌib.
No usa naꞌ mbeal siꞌil nlen gor tempran ndoꞌ bexa wa.
Leꞌa bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, bsakyoꞌón bega ta ndab Espíritu ten Dios ndoꞌ be xmen naꞌ.”
’Bkeꞌa ta ndee ndoꞌ angel nlaꞌach be xmen naꞌ ndencho Sardis: “Lndeꞌe ndab xa nibeꞌe isagaꞌad espíritu ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ Dios, xa na nsoꞌnsén isagaꞌad mbeal wa, ta ndiꞌib gibeꞌa. Ndab xa:
Leꞌa naꞌ nchandoꞌ be ta ndun bega. Leꞌa ncho men ndab leꞌa bega ndap gealnaban ndoꞌ Dios, parea leꞌa cuent ten Dios leꞌa bega ngut.
Bsuxeꞌa ladna bega, bxiste bega ta ngeꞌ ladna bega naꞌ, lá ulaꞌa bega initndoꞌ‑yá. Leꞌa naꞌ uní leꞌa ta ndun bega naꞌanpa utsin nak ndoꞌ Dios.
Lá yalad bega be ta mbiꞌín bega, no bxobgek bega, nsea blaꞌa bega be ta ugap nak bega. Tal leꞌa bega lá isuxeꞌa ladna, leꞌa naꞌ ilen dub gor ni lá ndanbeꞌe bega lak nlen dub waꞌan.
Parea ncho stapla bega ndencho Sardis baꞌ umbiꞌi nak ndoꞌ Dios. Leꞌa bega wa iseano naꞌ, gak bega lad nagud leꞌa bega yá nsabndoꞌ li gak.
Leꞌa bexa na gun gan ndoꞌ be ta ugap, leꞌa bexa wa gak be lad nagud, no lá utsuꞌu naꞌ leaꞌ bexa ndoꞌ libr ten gealnaban, no gáp naꞌ ndoꞌ Xus naꞌ nsea ndoꞌ be angel ten xa leꞌa bexa wa xmen naꞌ.
Leꞌa bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, bsakyoꞌón bega ta ndab Espíritu ten Dios ndoꞌ be xmen naꞌ.”

’Bkeꞌa ta ndee ndoꞌ angel nlaꞌach be xmen naꞌ ndencho Filadelfia: “Lndeꞌe ndab xa ta ugeaka nak xa umbiꞌi ten Dios, xa nibeꞌe lak unibeꞌe David. Leꞌa sa na nxaꞌal xa, naꞌan ton gun gan utsaw. No liga leꞌa sa ntsaw xa wa, naꞌan ton gun gan uxaꞌal. Ndab xa:

Leꞌa naꞌ nchandoꞌ be ta ndun bega. Nat leꞌa naꞌ mxaꞌal dub puert ndoꞌ bega, dub ta naꞌan ton gun gan utsaw. Maska ndido juers ncho bega, leꞌa bega nxobgek ndoꞌ diꞌizh ndáp naꞌ, no lá ukachko bega leꞌa bega xmen naꞌ.

Leꞌa nat iniꞌí bega xteꞌe gunno naꞌ bexa nde ndoꞌ yaꞌa maxuꞌu, bexa ndab leꞌa nak xmen Dios parea leꞌa xa naꞌanpa nak xmen Dios, leꞌa bexa ndi ndun gealkwiꞌin. Leꞌa nat leꞌa naꞌ gun ilen bexa ndoꞌ bega isaxib bexa ndoꞌ bega. Weꞌe igondoꞌ bexa leꞌa naꞌ nkweaꞌ ladna bega.
Leꞌa naꞌ ndápka ndoꞌ bega uxik bega, cha lika mbin bega. Ta weꞌe leꞌa naꞌ ulach bega gor na nsea stub gealkweaꞌ ndoꞌ idub gizhliyo, ta na gun preb itea be men nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Nat leꞌa naꞌ sken ilen. Lá ulaꞌa bega be ta wen nak bega, ndontsa naꞌan ton ulat ta uzheꞌeb wen usaꞌa Dios ikaꞌa bega.

Leꞌa bexa na gun gan ndoꞌ be ta ugap, leꞌa naꞌ gunno xa wa cuent dub yatsoꞌ ten lid Dios, dub ta nunk lá itatsoꞌ sa nsoꞌ na. No ukeꞌa naꞌ leaꞌ Dios ten naꞌ las xa no leaꞌ gezh siꞌil ten Dios. Leꞌa ta wa Jerusalén kub ten Dios ta itoꞌo gibeꞌa. No ukeꞌa naꞌ leaꞌ kub naꞌ las xa.
Leꞌa bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, bsakyoꞌón bega ta ndab Espíritu ten Dios ndoꞌ be xmen naꞌ.”
’Bkeꞌa ta ndee ndoꞌ angel nlaꞌach be xmen naꞌ ndencho Laodicea: “Lndeꞌe ndab xa lika nak wa, xa na gaꞌal nluu xteꞌe nak Dios, xa na leꞌa usaned zha mbindeꞌe Dios itea be taꞌa. Ndab xa:
Leꞌa naꞌ nchandoꞌ be ta ndun bega. Ni lid myalꞌ bega no ni lid utii bega. Mas wen myalꞌtsa bega natal utii bega.
Parea leꞌa ta na uzheꞌatsa bega, ni naꞌanpa myalꞌ bega no ni naꞌanpa utii bega, leꞌa naꞌ sabna bega.
Leꞌa bega ndab leꞌa bega xa rik no sian taꞌa ndap bega, naꞌan xtaꞌan ndun jwalt bega. Ná leꞌa bega lá iniꞌí leꞌa bega cuent dub xa uban nak, dub xa proꞌob ni lá naꞌ ni lá ndap xab na.

Ta weꞌe ntenxeꞌa naꞌ bega isiꞌi bega be ta oro ndoꞌ naꞌ ta msambiꞌi ndoꞌ giꞌ, ndontsa ta ugeaka gak rik bega. No isiꞌi bega lad nagud ta gak bega, ndontsa lá uluu gealudalad ten bega ta lá ndap bega xab bega. No yoo colirio ta ramed ndoꞌ bega, ndontsa utsin inaꞌ bega.
Leꞌa naꞌ nbeyo itea bexa nkweaꞌ lad naꞌ no ntsaksi naꞌ bexa. Ta weꞌe idub ncho ladna bega byach bega ndoꞌ naꞌ.
Blaꞌach bego leꞌa naꞌ nsoꞌ toꞌo puert nsea nbeꞌezh naꞌ. Leꞌa tal ton goꞌón ta ndáp naꞌ, no uxaꞌal xa toꞌo puert, weꞌe yoꞌo naꞌ len lid xa no junt gaw xcheꞌe besa.
Leꞌa bexa na gun gan ndoꞌ be ta ugap, leꞌa naꞌ usa dub sa isob bexa wats naꞌ sa inibeꞌe naꞌ, lak mbin naꞌ gan ndoꞌ ta ugap, cha nsoꞌob naꞌ wats Dios Xus naꞌ sa nibeꞌe xa.
Leꞌa bego na ndap nchaꞌ na, bsakyoꞌón bega ta ndab Espíritu ten Dios ndoꞌ be xmen naꞌ.”
Tsoꞌo wa leꞌa naꞌ uní leꞌa gibeꞌa myaꞌal dub ta cuent puert. Leꞌa ti ned xa mbín naꞌ cuent dub trompet wa cha uníꞌigal ndoꞌ naꞌ, ndab xa:
—Ukea sa ndee, leꞌa naꞌ uluu ndoꞌ lu be ta tilaw yoo ndoꞌ ta ncho nat.
Cha bi leꞌa gor wa leꞌa Espíritu ten Dios usen naꞌ. Cha li uní naꞌ leꞌa dub xa nibeꞌe nsob ndoꞌ dub yaxil siꞌil gibeꞌa.
Leꞌa xa nsob sa wa ndon nlaꞌbealꞌ cuent be geꞌ jaspe nsea cornalina. Leꞌa gangeak sa nsoꞌ yaxil wa nkea dub mbeꞌalzhin nlaꞌbealꞌ cuent geꞌ esmeralda.
Leꞌa gangeak sa nsoꞌ yaxil wa no nde stub gaꞌal bdap yaxil. Cha uní naꞌ leꞌa ndoꞌ be yaxil wa ndiꞌib dub gaꞌal bdap bexa gox xa nsak, bexa nak be lad nagud, ndiꞌib coron ta oro gek bexa.
Leꞌa ndoꞌ yaxil nsoꞌ tlaw wa ntoꞌo bealꞌ usiꞌi no níꞌi usiꞌi nsea ngen ruid siꞌil. Leꞌa lad ndoꞌ yaxil wa ndibyolꞌ dub gaꞌad xeꞌa, leꞌa ta wa isagaꞌad be espíritu ten Dios.

Leꞌa lad ndoꞌ yaxil wa nax dub ta cuent nitsdoꞌo gandid xeꞌa lakta naꞌ dub vidr. Leꞌa wats yaxil wa nsea gangeak wats yaxil wa uní naꞌ dap ta nban, idub las‑a nsoꞌ be ngusndoꞌ‑yá lad ndoꞌ‑yá no lad tsoꞌo‑yá.
Leꞌa ta nban ta ned wa cuent nak dub mbiꞌizh. Leꞌa ta itop wa cuent nak dub bser. Leꞌa ta yon wa ndap ndoꞌ na cuent ndoꞌ men. Leꞌa ta idap wa cuent nak dub mtsi nchaꞌnsaꞌab.
Leꞌa idap be ta nban wa leꞌa kadga dub‑a ndap dub xoꞌop xkwag na. Leꞌa gangeak tsoꞌo xkwag‑a no len xkwag‑a ndiꞌib ngusndoꞌ‑yá. No teꞌal tezhea lá nbeasyab be ta wa:
Ndon go, ndon go, ndon go dubkama nak Dios Xa Nibeꞌe,
xa ndon leꞌa juert ndoꞌ itea be taꞌa.
Leꞌa go leꞌa nak Dios tiemp polta, no Dioska go nat,
no Dioska go idub tiemp ilen.
Leꞌa kad biaj li ndab be ta nban wa ndoꞌ Dios xa nsob ndoꞌ yaxil xa nban idub tiemp, ndankea be ta wa xa, no nsaꞌa be ta wa xno ndoꞌ xa.
Weꞌe leꞌa isagaꞌal bdap bexa gox wa nsaxib ndoꞌ xa nsob ndoꞌ yaxil, xa nban idub tiemp, gast ndoꞌ yo ndal xtuzh bexa, ndankea bexa wa xa, no nte bexa coron ten bexa lad ndoꞌ yaxil, ndab bexa:
Go Dios Xa Nibeꞌe, leꞌa besa nsabndoꞌ yankea go,
no gab besa leꞌa go nak dub Dios uzhebpa xa juert.
Leꞌa go mtexan iteanak be taꞌa;
ngokndeꞌe‑yá lak nlad go yoo‑yá, no liga ncho‑yá nat.
Cha uní naꞌ leꞌa yaꞌa lad gaꞌal xa na nsob ndoꞌ yaxil wa nchoꞌob dub libr nyuꞌud nkea letr ndoꞌ‑yá, leꞌa tsoꞌo‑yá nsénkea dub gaꞌad se.
Cha uní naꞌ dub angel juert ten Dios, ugeꞌ unabdiꞌizh xa, ndab xa:
—¿Ton dub xa suꞌu guzhaꞌa be se nsénkea libr baꞌ, cha uxaꞌal xa‑yá?
Parea ni dub xa ncho gibeꞌa, no ni dub xa ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo, no ni dub xa ncho xan gizhliyo lá isuꞌu uxaꞌal‑a ni iwiꞌi xa ndoꞌ‑yá.
Cha uzhebpa ndon naꞌ geal lá izheal ni dub xa uxaꞌal libr wa, no goꞌol xa‑yá no ni iwiꞌi xa ndoꞌ‑yá.
Parea leꞌa dub xa gox xa nsak wa ndab ndoꞌ naꞌ:

—Yá lá goꞌonta lu. Unaꞌ leꞌa xa nsaleaꞌ Mbiꞌizh ten Judá, xa ulen ras ten David, leꞌa xa wa mbin gan ndoꞌ maxuꞌu. Leꞌa nat leꞌa xa wa sun gan guzhaꞌa isagaꞌad se nsénkea libr baꞌ wa, cha uxaꞌal xa‑yá.

Cha weꞌe uní naꞌ leꞌa wats yaxil wa, tlaw be idap ta nban wa no tlaw bexa gox xa nsak wa, nsoꞌ dub Borreg Ben cuent nak dub man mbit be men. Ndap ma dub gaꞌad xkach ma nsea dub gaꞌad ngusndoꞌ ma, leꞌa ta wa isagaꞌad espíritu mtuꞌub Dios ndoꞌ idub gizhliyo.
Weꞌe leꞌa Borreg wa cha ulen usen libr nchoꞌob ndoꞌ yaꞌa lad gaꞌal xa nsob ndoꞌ yaxil wa.

Leꞌa gor usen Borreg libr wa, leꞌa idap be ta nban wa nsea be isagaꞌal bdap bexa gox xa nsak wa cha usaxib ndoꞌ Borreg wa, gast ndoꞌ yo ngol xtuzh bexa. Leꞌa itea bexa wa ndap be arpa no be vas oro ncho ta uxeꞌe len na, leꞌa ta wa ta ndadiꞌizhno be men Dios, bexa umbiꞌi nak ndoꞌ Dios.
Cha mbiltoꞌo bexa dub cant kub, ndab bexa ndoꞌ Borreg:
Leꞌa go nsabndoꞌ isen libr baꞌ, no guzhaꞌa ga be se nsénkea‑yá,
geal leꞌa go ngut, mtsiꞌi ga ten ten ga,
ta weꞌe myak besa xin Dios ndoꞌ itea be ras be men,
no itea be diꞌizh ndadiꞌizh xa, no itea be gezh,
no itea be nacion.
No mbinno ga besa bexa nibeꞌe nsea be uleꞌay ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ Dios, inibeꞌe besa ndoꞌ gizhliyo.

Weꞌe cha mwiꞌi naꞌ, cha mbín naꞌ sian ti be angel idub gangeak sa nsoꞌ yaxil wa, nsea ti be ta nban wa, no ti bexa gox xa nsak wa. Leꞌa bexa wa uzhebpa bexa kwaꞌad luzh, gast lá gun naꞌ gan gáp naꞌ plo bexa.
Ugeꞌ ndab bexa:
Leꞌa Borreg Ben xa na leꞌa be men mbit wa,
nsabndoꞌ gab beuna leꞌa xa wa xa nibeꞌe,
no uzheꞌeb sian be taꞌa ndap xa,
no uzheꞌeb ndák xa,
no uzheꞌeb xa juert nak xa,
no yankea beuna xa leꞌa xa uzhebpa xa nsak.
Cha mbín naꞌ leꞌa itea be taꞌa mbindeꞌe Dios, be ta ncho gibeꞌa no ndoꞌ gizhliyo no xan gizhliyo no len nitsdoꞌo, leꞌa be ta wa ndab:
Leꞌa xa nsob ndoꞌ yaxil baꞌ nsea Borreg Ben baꞌ,
leꞌa beuna idub tiemp nsabndoꞌ yankea bexa baꞌ,
no yankea beuna bexa ta na uzheꞌeb wen nak bexa,
no ta na uzheꞌeb juert nak bexa.
Leꞌa idap be ta nban wa cha ndab:
—¡Lika nak‑a!
Leꞌa isagaꞌal bdap bexa gox xa nsak wa cha usaxib gast ndoꞌ yo ngol xtuzh bexa, cha ngwankea bexa wa Dios, xa nban idub tiemp.
Weꞌe cha uní naꞌ leꞌa Borreg Ben wa mbizhaꞌa se ned nsénkea libr nyuꞌud wa, nsea mbín naꞌ leꞌa dub ta nban wa uníꞌi cuent usiꞌi, ndab ta wa:
—¡Utseawiꞌi!
Cha uní naꞌ dub way nagud. Leꞌa xa nsob tsoꞌo ma wa nsén dub ya btangin. Cha weꞌe msaꞌa Dios dub coron ndoꞌ xa wa, cha utoꞌo xa gun xa gan lakka ndun xa gan wa.
Cha mbizhaꞌa Borreg wa se itop nsénkea git wa, cha mbín naꞌ leꞌa ta nban ta itop wa ndab:
—¡Utseawiꞌi!

Cha weꞌe utoꞌo dub way nane. Leꞌa Dios msaꞌa juers ndoꞌ xa nsob tsoꞌo way wa, ndontsa gun xa naꞌantapa wen kwe be men ndoꞌ gizhliyo. Cha weꞌe isaxan bexa kuyo bexa, cha gut bexa leꞌaka ltsaꞌa bexa. No msaꞌa Dios dub spad siꞌil ndoꞌ xa wa.
Cha mbizhaꞌa Borreg wa se yon nsénkea git wa, cha mbín naꞌ leꞌa ta nban ta yon wa ndab:
—¡Utseawiꞌi!
Cha mwiꞌi naꞌ cha uní naꞌ dub way nagats. Leꞌa xa nsob tsoꞌo ma wa nsén dub ta nben be taꞌa.
Leꞌa lat idap be ta nban wa mbín naꞌ cuent ti dub men ndab:
—Leꞌa dub kil trig natal chon kil cebad izheꞌa dub med denario. Parea lá guzhaꞌa lu aceit nsea vin.
Cha mbizhaꞌa Borreg wa se idap nsénkea git wa, cha mbín naꞌ leꞌa ta nban ta idap wa ndab:
—¡Utseawiꞌi!

Cha uní naꞌ dub way lasan. Leꞌa xa nsob tsoꞌo ma wa nsaleaꞌ Gealgut. Leꞌa tsoꞌo xa wa nsankea xa nsaleaꞌ Hades, sa ndencho bexa ngut. Leꞌa bexa wa usen juers gut bexa dub cuart be men nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo, gut bexa be men nsea spad, nsea win, nsea gealgizh, nsea be man ugiꞌi.
Weꞌe leꞌa Borreg wa cha mbizhaꞌa se isagaꞌay wa, cha uní naꞌ xbi be men xan dub altar, bexa na ngut ke na mbidiꞌizh bexa diꞌizh ten Dios.
Cha ugeꞌ ndab bexa:
—Dios Xa Nibeꞌe, leꞌa go dubkama nak Dios, no ndunka go ta ndab ga. ¿Polxá utsaksi ga be men ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo, no ukixke ga ta mbit bexa besa zha?
Weꞌe leꞌa dub angel ten Dios cha msaꞌa lad nagud gak bexa, cha ndab angel ndoꞌ bexa:
—Bneꞌe bega steꞌep ndalen gatta be ltsaꞌa bega, bexa na ndun ltsaꞌa tiꞌin mbin bega, bexa no gat lak ngut bega.
Cha uní naꞌ mbizhaꞌa Borreg wa se isaxoꞌop nsénkea libr wa, cha weꞌe ngok dub xoꞌo siꞌil. Leꞌa ndoꞌ wizh cha mkaw cuent dub bleꞌa lad nagats. Leꞌa ndoꞌ mbeꞌe cha mnaꞌ nane cuent ten.
Leꞌa be mbeal ndiꞌib gibeꞌa cha ulate ndoꞌ gizhliyo, lak nlate be ngus laꞌaw gor na nkwiꞌin dub mbi siꞌil ya wa.
Leꞌa gibeꞌa cha unitndoꞌ cuent dub gor nyuꞌud dub bleꞌa git. Leꞌa itea be geꞌe no be isla gast mzheꞌa be sa nde na.

Leꞌa iteanak be men cha mkachndoꞌ len be geꞌloꞌo no lat be geꞌ las be geꞌe ubiꞌi. Leꞌa ta wa bexa mas nibeꞌe ndoꞌ gizhliyo, no bexa nsak, no bexa rik, no bexa naktiꞌin, no bexa juert nak, no iteanak bexa nchaꞌndoꞌo ndoꞌ stub men, no bexa naꞌanpa li nak.
Ndab bexa ndoꞌ be geꞌe ubiꞌi nsea ndoꞌ be geꞌ wa:
—¡Ulate bega tsoꞌo besa! Bkachko bega besa ndoꞌ Xa Nibeꞌe nsob ndoꞌ yaxil baꞌ, no ndoꞌ ta ndakloo Borreg Ben ndoꞌ besa,
leꞌa nat ngol dub wizh uzheꞌeb utsaksi Borreg wa be men. ¿Tonma gun gan uxik ndoꞌ ta wa?
Tsoꞌo wa uní naꞌ dap be angel nde idap skin gizhliyo. Leꞌa bexa wa nsénsaꞌab idap mbi ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo, natsa lá uxoꞌon mbi ndoꞌ gizhliyo ni ndoꞌ nitsdoꞌo no ni dub ndoꞌ ya.
No uní naꞌ stub angel nchaꞌkea lad sa nlen wizh, leꞌa xa wa nsén dub se ten Dios xa nban. Cha ugeꞌ uníꞌi xa ndoꞌ idap angel wa, bexa na msaꞌa Dios juers ndoꞌ na guzhaꞌa bexa gizhliyo no nitsdoꞌo.
Ndab angel wa:
—Lá guzhaꞌa bega gizhliyo ni nitsdoꞌo no ni be ya baꞌ, gast gor na ukeꞌa besa se xtuzh be men ndun tiꞌin ndoꞌ Dios ten beuna.
Cha weꞌe mbín naꞌ plo bexa nkea se wa xtuzh na: dub gayoꞌo ncho top gaꞌal ncho dap mil bexa nkea se lat itea be ras bexa Israel.
Leꞌa ta wa dub tibtop mil bexa ras ten Judá.
Nsea stibtop milga bexa ras ten Rubén.
Nsea stibtop milga bexa ras ten Gad.
Nsea stibtop milga bexa ras ten Aser.
Nsea stibtop milga bexa ras ten Neftalí.
Nsea stibtop milga bexa ras ten Manasés.
Nsea stibtop milga bexa ras ten Simeón.
Nsea stibtop milga bexa ras ten Leví.
Nsea stibtop milga bexa ras ten Isacar.
Nsea stibtop milga bexa ras ten Zabulón.
Nsea stibtop milga bexa ras ten Kosé.
No stibtop milga bexa ras ten Benjamín.

Tsoꞌo wa uní naꞌ uzhebpa kwaꞌad luzh be men, gast naꞌan ton gun gan ulaꞌab bexa. Leꞌa bexa wa bexa itea be nacion, nsea itea be ras, nsea itea be gezh, no itea be diꞌizh ndadiꞌizh bexa. Nde bexa lad ndoꞌ yaxil ten Xa Nibeꞌe no ndoꞌ Borreg Ben. Leꞌa bexa wa nak be lad nagud, nsea dubga xos yagin nsén bexa.
Cha uzhebpa ugeꞌ ndab bexa:
Leꞌa Dios ten beuna xa nsob ndoꞌ yaxil baꞌ nsea Borreg Ben baꞌ,
leꞌa bexa wa leꞌa ngoꞌo beuna ndoꞌ be ke ten beuna.

Leꞌa itea be angel wa nde idub gangeak wats yaxil wa, no wats bexa gox nsak wa, no wats idap be ta nban wa. Cha usaxib be angel wa ndoꞌ xa nsob ndoꞌ yaxil wa, gast ndoꞌ yo ngol xtuzh bexa. Cha ngwankea bexa Dios,
ndab bexa:
¡Lika nak‑a!
Idub tiemp gab beuna leꞌa Dios ten beuna dub Dios siꞌil,
no ndon leꞌa xa juert nak,
no ndon leꞌa xa nibeꞌe,
no ndon leꞌa xa ndák.
Yankea beuna xa, no uzheꞌeb usaꞌa beuna xno ndoꞌ xa idub tiemp.
¡Lika nak‑a!
Weꞌe leꞌa dub xa gox nsak wa unabdiꞌizh ndoꞌ naꞌ, ndab xa:
—¿Nchandoꞌ lu bexa nak lad nagud baꞌ zha? ¿Uniꞌí lu pa utoꞌo bexa baꞌ zha?
Leꞌa naꞌ ndáp ndoꞌ xa:
—Señor, go leꞌa uniꞌí.
Leꞌa xa wa cha ndab ndoꞌ naꞌ:
—Leꞌa bexa baꞌ bexa mxik ndoꞌ gealkweaꞌ siꞌil; msat bexa be xab bexa, no msambiꞌi bexa, no mgud xab bexa no ten ten Borreg Ben baꞌ.
Ta weꞌe nde bexa baꞌ wats yaxil nsob Dios,
teꞌal tezhea ndun bexa tiꞌin ndoꞌ Dios sa ncho Dios.
Leꞌa xa nsob ndoꞌ yaxil baꞌ leꞌa nsobulaꞌach bexa.
Yá lá gantana bexa, no lá gakta ladna bexa.
No ni lá uchuta bea bexa, no ni stub xtii lá iniꞌíta bexa.
Leꞌa Borreg nsoꞌ tlaw sa nsoꞌ yaxil baꞌ leꞌa ulaꞌach bexa,
no goꞌo xa bexa sa ndiblen nits nsaꞌa gealnaban.
Leꞌa Dios utsambiꞌi itea nitsndoꞌ bexa baꞌ.
Leꞌa Borreg wa cha mbizhaꞌa se isagaꞌad nsénkea libr wa, cha msoꞌ ti gibeꞌa pa dub tol gor.
Weꞌe cha uní naꞌ isagaꞌad angel nde ndoꞌ Dios wa, cha usen bexa wa dub gaꞌ trompet.

Weꞌe ulen stub angel noꞌo dub tas oro, cha uyatsoꞌ xa lad ndoꞌ altar. Cha usen xa sian be ta uxeꞌe, cha mtsoꞌol xa‑yá len tas ndoꞌ altar ta oro nde sa nsob Dios, ndontsa gast ndoꞌ Dios ilayaꞌ xlaꞌa uxeꞌe wa, no be ta unab bexa nak xmen Dios.
Leꞌa ta nsén angel wa utoꞌo zhen ten be ta uxeꞌe wa, ulayaꞌ‑yá ndoꞌ Dios nsea be ta unab be xmen Dios wa.

Leꞌa angel wa cha uloꞌo bkuꞌu ncho ndoꞌ altar wa, cha ulo xa‑yá len tas wa, cha mtsaꞌab xa ta wa ndoꞌ gizhliyo. Cha weꞌe uníꞌi usiꞌi, no mgen dub ruid siꞌil, no nlaꞌ bealꞌ usiꞌi, nsea ngok dub xoꞌo siꞌil.
Leꞌa isagaꞌad be angel li nsén dub gaꞌga trompet wa listla ndebe ukweꞌezh‑a.
Leꞌa angel ned wa cha mkweꞌezh trompet wa, cha ulaꞌ gigeꞌ no giꞌ noch ten. Ulaꞌ‑yá ndoꞌ gizhliyo, cha mtsoꞌol‑a gax itol be ya ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo nsea itea be gix ugeꞌa.
Leꞌa angel itop wa cha mkweꞌezh trompet ten na, weꞌe leꞌa dub ta cuent geꞌe siꞌil nsayolꞌ ulayat ndoꞌ nitsdoꞌo. Cha myak ten gax itol nitsdoꞌo wa.
Cha ngut gax itol be man ncho len nitsdoꞌo. Nsea gax itol be barco ndesea ndoꞌ nitsdoꞌo wa ngwazhaꞌa.
Leꞌa angel yon wa cha mkweꞌezh trompet ten na, cha ulayat dub mbeal siꞌil nsob gibeꞌa, nsayolꞌ‑a cuent gor nsoꞌbealꞌ dub bleꞌa ged. Ulayat‑a ndoꞌ nits, pa gax itol be yowbeꞌe no be sa ndiblen nits.
Leꞌa mbeal wa nsaleaꞌ Ta Ulaꞌ. Leꞌa gax itol be nits wa cha myak ulaꞌ. Weꞌe uzhebpa kwaꞌad be men ngut ta na lita myak ulaꞌ nits wa.

Leꞌa angel idap wa cha mkweꞌezh trompet ten na, cha ngwazhaꞌa gax itol wizh no mbeꞌe no be mbeal ndiꞌib gibeꞌa. Cha mkaw ta niꞌi dap gor ten be wizh, no liga be teꞌal dap gor naꞌanpa isu xeꞌa mbeꞌe ni mbeal.
Cha mwiꞌi naꞌ no uní naꞌ dub angel nchaꞌnsaꞌab gaꞌap, ugeꞌ ndab xa:
—¡Ay, ay, ay! ¡Proꞌob bexa na ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo gor na ukweꞌezh schon angel be trompet ten na!
Leꞌa angel isagaꞌay wa cha mkweꞌezh trompet ten na, cha uní naꞌ dub mbeal utoꞌo gibeꞌa ulayat ndoꞌ gizhliyo. Leꞌa mbeal wa leꞌa usen liab ten geꞌed doꞌo.
Cha mxaꞌal mbeal wa geꞌed wa. Leꞌa sa wa utoꞌo zhen cuent zhen ten dub gor siꞌil. Leꞌa zhen wa mtsaw ndoꞌ xeꞌa wizh, cha mkaw ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Leꞌa lat zhen wa cha utoꞌo mbit, cha mteꞌachso bema ndoꞌ gizhliyo. Leꞌa ma wa ndap juers god ma lak ndod dub nix.
Leꞌa angel wa cha ndab ndoꞌ bema wa, lá gaw ma be gix ugeꞌa ncho ndoꞌ gizhliyo nsea ni dub ya ugeꞌa nsea ni dub ya ubiꞌi. Nabtsa be men naꞌanpa noꞌo se ten Dios xtuzh na god ma.
Leꞌa angel wa ndab naꞌanpa gut bema bexa wa, ndi utsaksitsa ma bexa dub gaꞌay mbeꞌe. Leꞌa gealkweaꞌ ten ma wa lak gealkweaꞌ ndod be nix.
Leꞌa gal be wizh wa leꞌa be men ukwaꞌan ná xteꞌe gat bexa, ná leꞌa bexa lá yoo gan gat. Nlad xa gat xa, ná leꞌa gealgut ndi uxoꞌon ndoꞌ bexa.
Leꞌa be mbit wa cuent nak way list ndebe yaꞌ ndoꞌ guerr. Leꞌa gek ma nsob dub ta cuent nak coron ta oro. Leꞌa ndoꞌ ma nak cuent ndoꞌ be men.
Leꞌa gichgek ma nak cuent gichgek xagots. Leꞌa ndeay ma nak cuent ndeay mbiꞌizh.
Leꞌa las ma ntsaw be xo cuent xo giꞌib. Leꞌa be xkwag ma nbezh lak nbezh sianpa carret ten way karrel nchaꞌbe ndoꞌ guerr.
Leꞌa ndoꞌ xne ma nsob dub xguꞌuch ma, ta cuent nak xguꞌuch nix. Leꞌa ta wa ndap juers utsaksi ma be men dub gaꞌay mbeꞌe.
Leꞌa xa nibeꞌe ten be mbit wa, leꞌa ta wa dub mbi bxin nibeꞌe geꞌed doꞌo wa. Leꞌa diꞌizh hebreo leꞌa mbi bxin wa nsaleaꞌ Abadón, leꞌa diꞌizh griego leꞌa ta wa Apolión.
Li utid gealkweaꞌ ned wa, parea ndun jwalt ilen stop gealkweaꞌ.
Leꞌa angel isaxoꞌop wa cha mkweꞌezh trompet ten na, cha mbín naꞌ cuent ti dub men utoꞌo lat idap be xkach altar ta oro wa, ta nde lad ndoꞌ sa nsob Dios.
Cha ndab ti men wa ndoꞌ angel isaxoꞌop wa, xa nsén trompet:
—Bxaꞌak idap be angel ndenchii sa nax yowbeꞌe siꞌil nsaleaꞌ Eufrates.
Cha weꞌe myaꞌak idap be angel wa, bexa ndenkeaꞌ gut gax itol be men nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo. Leꞌa Dios leꞌa ndab ná xá gor‑a no xá wizh na‑yá no xá mbeꞌe na‑yá no xá liꞌin na li gun bexa.
Cha mbín naꞌ ndab xa plo kwaꞌad be soldad ndiꞌib tsoꞌo way. Leꞌa ta wa top gayoꞌo millón bexa.

Cha uní naꞌ ta mluu Dios ndoꞌ naꞌ, leꞌa be way nsea bexa ndiꞌib tsoꞌo ma. Leꞌa ta ntsaw ladoꞌo bexa wa nane naꞌ cuent giꞌ, no azul naꞌ‑yá cuent naꞌ zafiro, no guch naꞌ‑yá cuent naꞌ azufre. Leꞌa gek be way wa cuent nak gek mbiꞌizh nak, leꞌa toꞌo ma ntoꞌo giꞌ no zhen no azufre.
Cha ngut gax itol be men nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo, ta na li ntoꞌo giꞌ nsea zhen nsea azufre toꞌo way wa.
Leꞌa ta juert nak be way wa, leꞌa ta wa xne ma nsea toꞌo ma. Leꞌa xne ma cuent nak mbeꞌal nak, ndap‑a gek‑a ta weꞌe ndawkeꞌa ma men.

Leꞌa iteata be men lá ngat ndoꞌ be gealkweaꞌ wa, ni lika ná lá kaꞌab bexa ulaꞌa bexa be ta ugap ndun bexa, ta ndankea bexa be mbi bxin no be dios gizhliyo, be ta oro, nsea plata, nsea bronce, nsea geꞌ, nsea ya, be taꞌa ni lá naꞌ, no ni lá ndoꞌón, no ni lá nsea.
No ni lá nlaꞌa bexa ta ndut bexa men, no ta bruj ndun bexa, no ta na ngal bexa dub men naꞌanpa xa ten bexa, no ta ndun bexa gealwaꞌan.
Cha uní naꞌ stub angel juert utoꞌo gibeꞌa, nsea xa lat dub xkaw, no dub mbeꞌalzhin nkea gek xa. Leꞌa ndoꞌ xa wa uzheꞌeb nlaꞌbealꞌ cuent ndoꞌ wizh. Leꞌa idub xoꞌo xa uzhebpa nsoꞌ bealꞌ nsayolꞌ.
Leꞌa yaꞌa xa nsob dub libr tuzh nsaꞌnyaꞌal ndoꞌ na. Leꞌa xoꞌo xa ná lad gaꞌal cha ulatsoꞌ ndoꞌ nitsdoꞌo, leꞌa ná raves ulatsoꞌ ndoꞌ yo.
Cha ugeꞌ utezhat xa cuent gor ngiꞌi dub mbiꞌizh, cha ugeꞌ uníꞌi usiꞌi dub gaꞌad biaj.
Leꞌa gor mtaníꞌi usiꞌi wa, leꞌa naꞌ ndiꞌizh ukeꞌa ta ndab usiꞌi wa, parea leꞌa naꞌ mbín dub diꞌizh utoꞌo gibeꞌa, ndab‑a ndoꞌ naꞌ:
—Naꞌanpa ukeꞌa lu be ta ndab isagaꞌad usiꞌi wa, ndi nabtsa lu uniꞌí xtaꞌan‑a.
Leꞌa angel na li uní naꞌ ulatsoꞌ ndoꞌ nitsdoꞌo no ndoꞌ yo wa, cha uxits xa dub yaꞌa xa gaꞌap.
Cha ndab xa:
—Lak ta ugeakapa ncho Dios nban idub tiemp, xa mtexan gibeꞌa no gizhliyo no nitsdoꞌo no iteata be ta ncho, no liga ta ugeakapa nak leꞌa tiemp gun Dios ta mbinbeꞌe xa wa yá ngol.
Leꞌa gor na ukweꞌezh angel isagaꞌad wa trompet wa, leꞌa Dios gun itea be ta ugaꞌach mbinbeꞌe xa gun xa, lak mbidiꞌizh bexa polta sakndoꞌ Dios, bexa mbin tiꞌin ndoꞌ xa.
Leꞌa ti men na li mbín naꞌ utoꞌo gibeꞌa wa uníꞌigal ndoꞌ naꞌ, ndab xa:
—Waꞌ, cha usen libr nsaꞌnyaꞌal ndoꞌ na baꞌ, ta lbaꞌa nsén angel baꞌ wa, xa nsoꞌ ndoꞌ nitsdoꞌo nsea ndoꞌ yo.
Cha ngwaa naꞌ ndoꞌ angel, cha ndáp naꞌ usaꞌa xa libr wa ndoꞌ naꞌ. Leꞌa xa cha ndab ndoꞌ naꞌ:
—Usen‑a, cha udaw‑a. Leꞌa gor na ncho‑yá toꞌo lu leꞌa‑yá utiꞌi cuent mzhin, ná leꞌa gor na kab lu‑yá leꞌa‑yá yak ulaꞌ len lu.
Cha weꞌe usen naꞌ libr tuzh nsob yaꞌa angel wa, cha udaw naꞌ‑yá. Leꞌa‑yá utiꞌika gor na ncho‑yá toꞌo naꞌ lak utiꞌi mzhin, ná leꞌa gor na udab naꞌ‑yá, leꞌa‑yá cha myak ulaꞌ len naꞌ.
Leꞌa angel wa cha ndab ndoꞌ naꞌ:
—Leꞌa lu nsabndoꞌ gudiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios stub biaj xteꞌe gunno Dios be gezh, nsea be nacion, nsea bexa ndadiꞌizh isandoꞌ diꞌizh, nsea bexa nibeꞌe ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Weꞌe cha usen naꞌ dub lod cuent bar nkeꞌa medid, cha mbín naꞌ dub ta cuent ti men ndab:
—Waꞌ, cha bkeꞌa medid niꞌi ten Dios nsea ndoꞌ altar, no blaꞌab bexa ndankea Dios sa wa.
Parea naꞌanpa ukeꞌa medid lu no tale ten niꞌi wa, leꞌa sa wa myak cuent ndoꞌ bexa lá nchandoꞌ Dios. Leꞌa bexa wa leꞌa inibeꞌe gezh ten Dios dub top gaꞌal ncho top mbeꞌe.
Leꞌa naꞌ utuꞌub top men gudiꞌizh sakndoꞌ Dios dub mil ncho top gayoꞌo ncho chon gaꞌal wizh. Leꞌa bexa wa gak lad nagats, ta na nluu leꞌa bexa uban ncho ladna.
Leꞌa itop bexa ndadiꞌizh wa nak cuent top ya olivo nsea top candeler, ta nde ndoꞌ Dios xa nibeꞌe ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Tal ton dub men nlad ugap gunno bexa wa, leꞌa bexa wa itoꞌo bealꞌ toꞌo na, ta utsoꞌol be men gakloo ndoꞌ bexa wa. Li gat itea be men nlad ugap gunno bexa.

Leꞌa itop bexa wa gap juers utsaw bexa gibeꞌa, ndontsa lá ilaꞌ gi idub zha na gudiꞌizh bexa sakndoꞌ Dios. No gap bexa juers yunno bexa nits wa ten, no sian be gealkweaꞌ gast plo nlad bexa utsaksi bexa be men nde ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Leꞌa zha mtayadiꞌizh bexa wa, leꞌa dub man uzheꞌeb itoꞌo len geꞌed doꞌo. Cha kuyono ma itop xa wa, cha gun ma gan gat bexa.
Leꞌa bexa ngut wa kwesaꞌal ndoꞌ xgeꞌe ten gezh wa, sa ngut Cristo ndoꞌ cruz. Leꞌa bexa gezh wa ugap nak cuent bexa Sodoma nsea bexa Egipto.
Leꞌa bexa itea be gezh, no bexa itea be ras be men, no bexa ndadiꞌizh itea be diꞌizh, nsea bexa itea be nacion iniꞌí ndesaꞌal bexa wa chon wizh itol. No ni lá ulaꞌa bexa igaꞌach bexa ngut wa.
Leꞌa be men gizhliyo uzhebpa iten ladna geal ngut bexa wa, gast usaꞌa bexa be regal ikaꞌa be ltsaꞌa bexa, leꞌa itop bexa wa mbin uzhebpa gealkweaꞌ utid be men.
Leꞌa zha na ngwaꞌa chon wizh itol wa, leꞌa Dios cha msaꞌa gealnaban ten bexa, mban bexa ndoꞌ gealgut. Cha uzhebpa mzheb be men uniꞌí bexa wa.
Cha mbiꞌín itop bexa wa dub diꞌizh ugeꞌ utoꞌo gibeꞌa, ndab‑a:
—Ukea bega sa ndee.
Weꞌe cha mkea bexa gibeꞌa ndoꞌ dub xkaw, ndewiꞌi bexa ndaklono bexa wa.

Cha bi leꞌa gor wa ngok dub xoꞌo siꞌil. Leꞌa dub bleꞌa tuzh gezh wa myubyoꞌo, cha ngut dub gaꞌad mil men. Leꞌa bexa naꞌanpa ngat wa uzhebpa mzheb, ndab bexa leꞌa Dios nsob gibeꞌa uzheꞌeb dub Dios juert nak.
Li utidla top gealkweaꞌ wa, parea leꞌa ta yon wa sken ilen.
Leꞌa angel isagaꞌad wa cha mkweꞌezh trompet ten na. Cha mgen cuent ti be men gibeꞌa ugeꞌ ndab xa:
Leꞌa sa nibeꞌe be men ndoꞌ gizhliyo
myak sa nibeꞌe Dios ten beuna nsea Cristo.
Leꞌa xa wa leꞌa inibeꞌe idub tiemp.
Leꞌa isagaꞌal bdap bexa gox xa nsak nde ndoꞌ be yaxil lad ndoꞌ Dios, cha msaxib bexa gast ndoꞌ yo ngol xtuzh bexa, ngwankea bexa Dios,
cha ndab bexa:
Nsaꞌa besa xno ndoꞌ go Dios Xa Nibeꞌe,
xa ndon leꞌa juert ndoꞌ itea be taꞌa.
Leꞌa go leꞌa nak Dios nat no polta
no idub tiemp ilen ndee.
Leꞌa go nsobno juers siꞌil ten ga,
nat leꞌa go leꞌa nibeꞌe.
Leꞌa be men gizhliyo ngoklobe ndoꞌ go,
ná leꞌa nat ngol wizh utsaksi ga bexa.
No gab go ndoꞌ bexa ngutla
ná xteꞌe nak be taꞌa mbin bexa.
No usaꞌa ga ta wen ikaꞌa bexa ndadiꞌizh sakndoꞌ ga,
bexa ndun tiꞌin ten ga, no bexa umbiꞌi ten ga,
no itea bexa nxobgek ndoꞌ ga,
lak bexa nsak no bexa naꞌanpa xa nsak.
No unitndoꞌ ga bexa ndut be men ndoꞌ gizhliyo.
Cha myaꞌal niꞌi ten Dios gibeꞌa. Leꞌa len niꞌi wa mluu caj ten Dios. Cha ulaꞌ bealꞌ usiꞌi, no uzheꞌeb nsoꞌ ruid, no uníꞌi usiꞌi. No ngok dub xoꞌo siꞌil, no uzheꞌeb ulaꞌ gigeꞌ ubiꞌi.
